[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum ca pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D432}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A r+yAtsa la kalpa tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[1b.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_de nas yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos/_bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/_rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[1b.3\]]par zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje las sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phyung ngo /_oM AHhUM/_de gsung ma thag tu tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen 
[\[1b.4\]]po dang /_brgya byin dang /_gzhon nu dang /_b+h+ring gi ri ti dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po dang /_b+hai ba sa ta dang /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang /_nag po chen po dang /_srin mo chen mo 'phrog 
[\[1b.5\]]byed ma dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_mig dmar dang /_lag pa dang /_phur bu dang /_spen pa dang /_pa ba sangs dang /_sgra gcan dang /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dang /_srin po dang /_chu lha dang /_gshin rje dang /_me lha dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_sa'i lha mo dang /_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_'jog po dang /_mtha' yas dang /_dung skyong dang /_rigs ldan dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po dang /_
[\[2a.2\]]srin po'i bdag po lang ka mgrin bcu dang /_lha'i bu drug khri la sogs pa sa steng dang /_sa bla dang /_sa 'og pa thams cad skad cig de nyid la dpal 'byung ba'i mchod rten gyi spo de la 'khod do/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten gsum gyi bdud thams cad der lhags nas 
[\[2a.3\]]byang chub chen po'i bar du gcod par rtsom mo/_/de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye bcom ldan 'das ston pa bde bar gshegs pa byang chub kyi bar du gcod pa'i bdud kyi rigs 'di rnams zhi ba dang med par mdzad du 
[\[2a.4\]]gsol zhes pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad las mchog tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags 'di nyid sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod ma thag tu nyid kyi 
[\[2a.5\]]mdun du khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba sku mdog mthing nag tu 'dug pa/_zhal stong phrag stong ha har bzhad pa/_zhabs stong phrag stong brkyang bskum gyi tshul du bzhugs pa/_phyag stong phrag stong du gdug pa'i mtshon cha ral gri dang /_ral gri kyog po dang /_chu gri dang 
[\[2a.6\]]gri gug dang /_spu gri dang /_kha T+wAM ga dang /_rtse gsum dang /_rtse dgu pa dang /_mdung dang /_'phen mdung dang /_ldong mdung dang /_mda' dang /_mda' ste'u kha dang /_mda' rtse lnga pa dang /_mda' kha brag pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]rtse dgu pa dang /_rtse mo bcu gsum pa dang /_sta re dang /_dgra sta dang /_sta leb dang /_so sta dang /_'phen sta dang /_bzhar sta dang /_dbyug pa dang /_tho ba dang /_gtun shing dang /_'khor lo dang /_phub dang /_mgo bo dang /_bing ti pa la dang /_gzhu dang /_gzhu 
[\[2b.2\]]mnyen dang /_thod pa dang /_thod tshal dang /_gri zlum dang /_gri [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_gri lcags kyo dang /_zhags pa dang /_rnga yab dang /_ba dan dang /_me'i phung po dang /_chu'i skyogs dang /_brag dang /_thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang /_phur pa dang /_thod pa'i phreng ba dang /_zhing 
[\[2b.3\]]dbyug dang /_me ri dang /_so'i phreng ba dang /_dril bu dang /_jeng dang /_pi wang dang /_gling bu dang /_rdza rnga dang /_pa Ta ha dang /_rnga zlum dang /_rked nyag dang /_dung dang /_bsil phreng dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_khab dang /_gsil byed dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[2b.4\]]sbrul zhags la sogs pa'i mtshon cha du ma bzung nas phyag lhag ma rnams g.yas na ral gri phyar nas g.yon pa sdigs mdzub phyar bar mdzad do/_/zhal stong phrag stong la 'dzum pa dang /_bzhad pa dang /_ha ha zhes sgrogs pa dang /_mche ba gtsigs pa dang /_so 'dar ba dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]gyen du gdangs pa dang /_khrag bldag pa dang /_rngam pa dang /_zhi bar yang mdzad de/_zhal gyi kha dog kyang tha dad do/_/dbu skra yang nag po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po la sogs pa tha dad do/_/sku stod la glang po che'i ko ba gyon nas/_sku smad kyang stag gi pags pas 
[\[2b.6\]]dkris shing /_phyag dang /_zhal dang /_zhabs kyi bye brag gis rgyan yang tha dad de/_rin po che du ma dang /_rus pa'i phreng ba dang /_sbrul gyi chun po dang /_mi mgo'i phreng ba dang /_mi'i pags pa dang /_seng ge'i pags pa dang /_ma he'i pags pa la sogs pa tha dad do/_/zhal 
[\[2b.7\]]re re la yang spyan gsum gsum dang /_gnyis gnyis dang /_re re'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba de la 'di skad du bka' bsgo'o/_/oM kye mi g.yo ba/_khro bo drag po/_'jigs byed chen po/_gtum po chen po/_dpa' bo chen po/_bdud kyi 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]tshogs thams cad sod cig_/chings shig_/btogs shig_/rgyob cig_/phrol cig_/gtubs shig_/dril cig_/phul cig_/non cig_/gzir cig_/phug cig_/tshos shig_/sregs shig_/phye mar gyis shig_/med par gyis shig_/
[\[3a.2\]]khos shig_/sdoms shig_/zo shig_/'thung shig_/sdigs shig_/hU~M hU~M hU~M dza dza dza haM laM traM phaT/_ces gsungs pa dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po de khros nas hU~M zhes brjod pas zhal gsum phyag drug par byas te/_klu'i tshogs thams cad ma lus par zos te/_phaT ces brjod 
[\[3a.3\]]nas zhal bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs kyang bzhir byas nas lha ma yin thams cad med par byas so/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa drang srong khros pa'i dbyibs ltar byas nas lha'i gdon thams cad pham par byas te/_tshogs kyi bdag po gdan du byas so/_/gzhon nu'i cha byad 
[\[3a.4\]]du byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas lha'i bu'i bdud pham par byas so/_/g.yon pa sa la btsugs nas bi nA ya ka med par byas so/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/lha la sogs pa rnams sdang zhing /_/khros nas gdug pa rnams 'jigs byed/_/
[\[3a.5\]]sna tshogs rab mang sbyor mdzad pa'o/_/chos rnams gang gis cir ma mthong /_/lus dang sems dang ngag rnams dag_/kun rdzob stong pa rnam dag nas/_/mi gnas sna tshogs zung 'jug bde/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sprul pa rnam par 
[\[3a.6\]]dag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/bde bar gshegs rnams 'dus pa'i sku/_/sna tshogs lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/nam mkha' gang ba'i bsam gtan bya/_/skad cig bsam gtan mngon rdzogs shing /_/skad 
[\[3a.7\]]cig yi ge rnam dgod byed/_/skad cig la ni gsang sngags 'don/_/'jigs gzugs skad cig sprul pa 'gyed/_/tshar gcod zil gyis gnon mdzad phyir/_/skad cig khros spyan nag po 'bar/_/mkha' la gzigs pas lha rnams skrag_/sa la gzigs pas klu rnams sa skrag_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams dang /_/bla ma la yang phyag 'tshal zhing /_/rtag tu mchod de dga' chen bskyed/_/lus ngag yid kyi sdig bral gang /_/dkon mchog gsum mchod bde don gnyer/_/sangs rgyas bzhugs shing chos gsungs pa'i/_/smon lam dag pa'i 
[\[3b.2\]]blo bskyed bya/_/byang chub sems kyang bskyed bya zhing /_/dge ba'i phung po dus gsum du/_/gzhan gyi don du bsngo bar bya/_/byams dang snying rje bsam par bya/_/dga' ba'i dge la yid kyis dmigs/_/nam mkha' che mtshungs blo yis ni/_/btang snyoms chen po 
[\[3b.3\]]bsgom par bya/_/de ltar dad ldan brtson 'grus can/_/g.yo sgyu bral zhing bla ma bkur/_/snying brtse le lo med pa yi/_/srid pa'i sred pa spong byed pa/_/dga' ba'i tshal lam ne'u gsing dang /_/phug gam lha khang stong pa 'am/_/shing drung nags dgon ljongs 
[\[3b.4\]]rnams su/_/bde ba'i yid kyis gnas par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/nam mkha'i 
[\[3b.5\]]dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/hU~M gi yi ge las skyes pa/_/mi g.yo mgon po rgyal po'i skur/_/rnal 'byor dag pa'i lus bsgom bya/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa'i sku/_/lha dang lha min bdud tshogs rnams/_/shin tu skrag par mdzad pa'i phyir/_/g.yas kyis 
[\[3b.6\]]ral gri mkha' la phyar/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin/_/pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la ni/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng gnas pa/_/g.yon brkyang gar bzhugs stag sham can/_/phuHsgrogs klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan/_/dmar ser gyen skra spyan rtsa dmar/_/spyan zlum 
[\[3b.7\]]khro tshul mche ba gtsigs/_/tshangs pa lha dbang khyab 'jug dang /_/dbang phyug che sogs lha rnams dang /_/lha ma yin rnams skrag par byed/_/bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar dbus na/_/khro bo du ma'i tshogs dang bcas/_/brtan g.yo khams gsum ma lus rnams/_/rang gi 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]sprul par shes byas nas/_/de ltar gus bcas yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/rgyun mi 'chad par gang bsgoms pas/_/las dang nyon mongs kyis bslad pa'i/_/tha mal pa yi rnam rtog ldog_/bdag 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor la/_/shin tu yid brtan byed gyur na/_/ral 
[\[4a.2\]]gri la sogs grub brgyad kyi/_/snod du rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos mi bzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas 
[\[4a.3\]]par/_/haM gi yi ge las skyes par/_/drag chen khro bo'i rgyal po ni/_/sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom/_/ral gri chu gri sta re ni/_/g.yas kyi phyag na rim bzhin 'dzin/_/sdigs mdzub 'khor lo kha T+wAM ni/_/g.yon gyi phyag na rim bzhin 'dzin/_/spyan gsum 
[\[4a.4\]]khro gnyer gyen du bskyod/_/dbu skra sma ra gyen 'greng ser/_/rol pa'i klu yi rgyan gyis brgyan/_/thod pa'i phreng ba stag sham can/_/glang chen pags pas stod g.yogs byas/_/rus pa'i rgyan gyis rab brgyan cing /_/pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan dbus na/_/g.yon brkyang 
[\[4a.5\]]g.yas bskum tshul du 'gying /_/haM pheM nam mkha'i phyogs sgrogs pa/_/bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid che/_/'di ltar skad cig dran pa'am/_/ming shes tsam gyis 'dod pa sgrub/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par dag pa zhes 
[\[4a.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/ma~M las skyes pa'i mi g.yo ba/_/'jigs byed chen po bsam par bya/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]drod kyi steng na 'gying /_/zhal 
[\[4a.7\]]bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs kyang bzhi/_/g.yas pa ral gri rdo rje 'dzin/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thod khrag go/_/zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi'i steng na 'gying /_/sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan ldan zhing /_/stag gi sham thabs rnam par brgyan/_/stod du na ra'i pags pas brgyan/_/dmar 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]ser gyen skra 'jigs tshul che/_/ha har bzhad cing rta skad 'tsher/_/khro bo du ma'i sprin spro zhing /_/zhal rnams gdangs pas mche ba gtsigs/_/spyan bcu gnyis po rab tu bgrad/_/'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed/_/char sprin mdog 'dra me chen gzi/_/thabs 
[\[4b.2\]]chen 'dod pa'ang 'dis rdzogs byed/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po mi 'gyur rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/yi ge hU~M 
[\[4b.3\]]las byung ba yi/_/mi g.yo mgon po gtum po che/_/bdud rnams skrag byed bsgom par bya/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i sku/_/pad dkar nyi ma'i steng dkyil na/_/pus mo sa la btsugs nas bzhugs/_/phyag g.yas ral gri 'dzin pa ste/_/g.yon pa sdigs 
[\[4b.4\]]mdzub zhags pa 'dzin/_/spyan gnyis dmar la zlum pa ste/_/gzhon nu khros pa'i cha byad can/_/rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/sbrul dkar po yis do shal byas/_/stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/sna tshogs khro bo rnam par 'phro/_/bskal pa'i 
[\[4b.5\]]me yi dbus na gnas/_/gang gis nyi ma zla ba yi/_/mdun du rnam par dran byed na/_/bdud rnams ma lus zad nas ni/_/bde ba chen po'i lus rnyed 'gyur/_/a ta sa yi me tog gi/_/'od ldan bcom ldan lha yis mchod/_/bdag gi snying 
[\[4b.6\]]ngam snying dkyil bsgom/_/myur du 'dod pa rdzogs par byed/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis du ba'i mdog_/yang na sngon po bai DUr gzi/_/bdud rnams brlag par mdzad pa'o/_/g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum bzhugs pa'am/_/
[\[4b.7\]]yang na g.yon pa sa la btsugs/_/thabs tshul rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/_/sdig pa thams cad zad byed pa/_/blo gros phung po rgyas par byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa dpal gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu yi/_/ye shes sems dpa' snying gar bsgom/_/'od ni cher 'bar drag po'i gzi/_/shes bya'i sgrib las rnam par rgyal/_/de yi thugs kar mtshan ma ste/_/sa bon rtag 
[\[5a.2\]]par dmigs pa ni/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam dag rgyu/_/las kyi las rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros/_/ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas gzhug_/des ni mi shes bag chags rnams/_/blo ldan blo la 'jog mi byed/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[5a.3\]]pa kun dmigs nas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/spyi bor rang gi rigs bsams nas/_/rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan 'gyur/_/de ltar de la brtson chen bya/_/'dis ni rgyal rnams mnyes gyur nas/_/myur du rgyal ba nyid thob 'gyur/_/'phags 
[\[5a.4\]]pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/dge byed ras ris bkra shis kyis/_/sdig pa'i dri ma rnam bsal nas/_/sgrub po rnams la mchog ster byed/_/gtsang byed bram ze las rnyed dam/_/
[\[5a.5\]]rgyal po'am bu mo bzang gi ras/_/'jam zhing 'thas par brdungs byas te/_/'dod pa bzhin du bri bar bya/_/rams sam mig sman khu ba dang /_/sman gsum me tog gnyis ldan pa'i/_/khu ba shing sbyin gsum sbyar nas/_/gzhan yang sna tshogs tshon gyis bri/_/de las khro bo'i 
[\[5a.6\]]rgyal po mi g.yo ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste/_g.yas ral gri/_g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang 'brel ba/_klus brgyan pa/_pad+ma dang /_nyi ma dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng na g.yon brkyang bas 'gying zhing bskal pa'i me'i nang na khro bo du ma'i tshogs 'phro ba bri'o/_/
[\[5a.7\]]lha'i dbang phyug mi g.yo mgon po ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/_zhal re re spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa'o/_/skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/_phyag g.yas gsum na ral gri dang /_chu gri dang /_sta re bsnams pa/_g.yon gsum na sdigs 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]mdzub dang /_'khor lo dang /_kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa dang /_klus brgyan cing thod pa'i do shal can/_stag gi sham thabs dang /_glang po che'i stod g.yogs dang /_thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can/_rus pas brgyan cing pad+ma dang /_nyi ma'i steng na g.yon brkyang zhing g.yas bskum pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[5b.2\]]'gying ba/_bskal pa'i me'i gzi mdangs kyi nang nas khro bo bcu 'phro ba bri'o/_/lha min rgyal po mi g.yo ba ni zhal bzhi re re la yang spyan gsum gsum dang ldan zhing /_phyag bzhi'i g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje/_g.yon gnyis na sdigs mdzub dang thod khrag can/_
[\[5b.3\]]stod la mi'i pags pa gyon zhing stag gi sham thabs can/_rus pa dang /_klus yan lag brgyan pa/_bskal pa'i me 'bar zhing khro bo'i tshogs kyi sprin du ma 'phro ba/_pad+ma la zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan cing skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa bri'o/_/bdud thams 
[\[5b.4\]]cad 'dul ba'i mi g.yo ba ni gtum po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ral gri dang /_zhags pas 'brel ba/_skra nag po'am ser po gyen du brdzes pa/_rin po che'i cod pan dang /_do shal dang /_yan lag thams cad brgyan cing stag gi sham thabs can/_sbrul dkar po se 
[\[5b.5\]]ral khar thogs pa/_bskal pa'i tshogs kyi mer 'bar ba'i nang na khro bo du ma 'khrug cing /_pad+ma dang nyi ma la pus mo g.yas pa 'thab stangs kyi tshul du bzhugs pa'am/_yang na g.yon pa gshed po'i tshul du btsugs shing lhag ma nam mkha' la 'greng zhing bteg pa bri'o/_/
[\[5b.6\]]gang yang rang 'dod pa zhig de ltar bris nas/_de'i mdun du rang nyid kyi 'dra 'bag tshon sna tshogs kyis bris la/_ri mo mkhan la go ba legs par bskyed nas/_mdzes pa g.yon du phul te/_bkra shis brjod nas/_rang gi gnas kyi dben pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa mngon 
[\[5b.7\]]sum du mi g.yo bar bsgrubs te/_me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod nas/_ye shes kyi khro bo'i rgyal po yang de nyid la bstim par bya'o/_/gang yang dngos grub 'dod pas spos dang /_me tog dang /_sgron ma dang /_zhal zas dang /_gos la sogs pas rgyun du 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]mchod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'grub pa la gdon mi za'o/_/'dir skye bo 'ga' ni dman pa ste/_skur pa 'debs na shin tu yang lhung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sku dben pa'i sa phyogs su sba bar bya'o/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa'am/_
[\[6a.2\]]ral gri la sogs brgyad rnams dang /_/mchog gi sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan las rnyed 'gyur/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gsang ba rnam par 
[\[6a.3\]]dag byed cing /_/dngos grub myur phyir gsang sngags rnams/_/rim pa dbye ba ngo mtshar nyon/_/bcu bzhi'i dbyangs las yum gyis brgyan/_/gsal byed gnyis pa'i dang po la/_/gsum pa'i lnga pas nye bar brgyan/_/gsum pa'i gsum pa der bzhag go/_/lnga pa'i lnga pa brgyad pa 
[\[6a.4\]]la/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pas mdzes par byas/_/me dang dbyangs bcu gsum par 'brel/_/drod gnyis pa dang drag mtha' 'brel/_/sum cu gsum dang dbyangs drug 'brel/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga pas brgyan no/_/nyi shu gnyis dang bcu gcig 'brel/_/de la nyi zlas rnam brgyan pa'o/_/
[\[6a.5\]]gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu/_/stong khri 'bum mam bye ba bcu/_/sa ya bzlas kyang lha mthong 'gyur/_/snying po sdig bral dga' ba ste/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags/_/sdug bsngal zad byed bde ba che/_/sgrub pa rnams la skyed byed pa'i/_/gsang 
[\[6a.6\]]sngags drag po dran byed na/_/'jig rten 'dir yang tshe ring 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur ro gzhan ci smos/_/oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85 haM/_gzung ba dag pa ye shes kyi sngags so/_/oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_'dzin pa'i sems dag pa ye shes 
[\[6a.7\]]kyi sngags so/_/oM badzra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85 haM/_sku brtan pa rdo rje ye shes kyi sngags so/_/oM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi sngags so/_/oM a tsa la te dza badzra puSh+pe/_d+hU pe/_dI pe/_gan d+he/_nai bi d+ye sa pa ri wA re b+h+yaHdzaHhu~M pa~M hoH/_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]san+t+r-ip+tA sarba satrAnA~M/_i maM ba liM gr-i h+Na kha kha khA hi khA hi b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha Ni hUM phaT/_mchod pa dang gtor ma'i sngags so/_/zho dang 'o ma 'bras chan dang /_/sA lu dkar dang til dkar dang /_/gro dang nas dang bra bo dang /_/shing tog la sogs rtag par mchod/_/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM 
[\[6b.2\]]maN+Dal ma d+h+ye A gats+tsha ya/_sa ma ya s+t+waM/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma ma sha truM a mu ka s+ya sha rI raM kI la ya hUM phaT/_ka ti mu ta stam b+ha ya/_hr-i di kI la ya hUM phaT/_pA de kI la ya swA hA/_phur bus gdab pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta 
[\[6b.3\]]badzra NAM/_oM a tsa la kA na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM trA~M ma~M haM/_las la bskul ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM a tsa la kA na tsaN+Da ta na ta na/_maT+Ta maT+Ta/_mo Ta mo Ta/_taT+Ta taT+Ta/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_A be sha ya A be sha ya/_ma 
[\[6b.4\]]hA man+t+ra b+ha la ka_/d+hu na d+hu na/_ti ni ti ni/_kha da kha da/_big+h+nAn/_ma ra ma ra duSh+TA na duSh+TA na daSh+TAn rak+Sha haM/_sarbAn/_ku ru ku ru/_ki ri ki ri/_ma hA big+h+nAM badzra/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_tri ba ling+ta raM ga na rak+ta/_oM oM oM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_a tsa la te dza/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_
[\[6b.5\]]hU~M hU~M/_a man+tika_/kro d+ha ma hA ba la/_shro trA ya/_ma nA ya/_man+ta ha~M ma~M/_shud+d+ha tu mok+Sha/_du pya du/_badzra nA ma taM/_a pra ti ha te b+h+yaH/_dz+wA lA ya trA ya/_a sa ha na/_ma hA swA hA/_las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM tra tra a mo 
[\[6b.6\]]g+ha/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT/_tra ma ya tra ma ya hU~M/_tra ta haM maM/_oM ba lin+ta te dzo mA li ni swa hA/_cho ga thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA k+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM a mo g+ha e h+ye hi a pra ti ha ta e h+ye hi a tsa la wa te dza/_a nan+ta ka na/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_tsu ru 
[\[6b.7\]]tsu ru/_ta Ti ta Ti/_ta Ta ta Ta/_big+h+naM g+hA ta ya/_mA ra ya/_khA da ya/_s+pho Ta ya/_tra ta staM/_tsa me na/_a nu ban+d+ha/_A dz+nyA ku ru/_a sa ha da/_a na a gra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_haM haM/_a Ti ba la/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Na/_bi Sha Na/_nan+ta nan+ta/_A be sha ya A be sha ya/_
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]a tsa la te dza/_sarba tra a nut+ta re ki tsa ta/_ta Ta ta Ta/_d+harma d+harma/_phaT phaT haM/_'di ni bsrung ba dam pa'i sngags so/_/khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i/_/gang gis gsang sngags rnams shes na/_/yi ge tsam gyis bdud brlag byed/_/mang du brjod na 
[\[7a.2\]]smos ci dgos/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang sngags rnams 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gsang sngags grub pa las byung ba'i/_/las kyi sbyor ba'i dbye ba yis/_/'dod rnams 
[\[7a.3\]]shin tu 'grub byed de/_/bsam gtan rnam dag chos rnam dag_/ye shes rnam dag sku rnam dag_/rang byung rnam dag don rnam dag_/bya ba rnam dag byed pa dag_/sgyu ma sgyu ma'i ye shes che/_/sgyu 'phrul lta bu'i 'khrul 'khor dang /_/mig yor smig rgyu'i gzugs 
[\[7a.4\]]brnyan 'brel/_/sna tshogs chu bur bzhin g.yo ba'i/_/gang gis bdud las rgyal byed pa'i/_/yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub par bya/_/rgyal gyi skar mar btsugs byas te/_/thod pa dkar po dri chus bran/_/'di ni las rnams kun bya'i phyir/_/dus su bsrung zhing 
[\[7a.5\]]bskyed bya ste/_/dus su mchod dang gtor ma byas/_/bar chad kun las rnam rgyal yin/_/yang na gro ga'am spra tshil la sbrul nag po'i gzugs byas nas gu gul tshil chen gyis bdug cing sngags drag tu brjod de/_gang 'dod pa'i lus la byabs nas/_khrus byas te rtswa 
[\[7a.6\]]ku sha'i chun pos 'og nas g.yug cing /_/nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dun ti/_/phu Ta phu Ta phaT ces brjod na/_gang la klu gnod pa de sos par byed do/_/yang na gong du bstan pa'i yungs kar dang /_gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags drag tu brjod na klu 'bros so/_/slar yang 
[\[7a.7\]]mi ldog go/_/'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin pa la yungs kar bskyed pa la sngags mang du bzlas nas gtor na 'byer ro/_/byis pa gsar du btsas pa bsrung ba ni kham phor la rdo rgyus kyis bris pa bcang ngo /_/spra tshil gyi gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas pa'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]snying gar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bcug la kha la tsher ma btsugs na bsgrub bya'i kha la tsher ma btsugs par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa la btsugs na rengs so/_/snying la gtsugs na dran pa stor bar byed do/_/mi'i rje ngar gyi rus pa'i phur bu'am/_lcags 
[\[7b.2\]]phur yan lag gang dang gang la btab pa de zha ba'am rengs par byed do/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba la mang du bsngags nas dgra bo'i sgo 'og tu btab na 'byer ro/_/g.yul du zhugs nas ral gri la bsngags te/_bzung na rgyal lo/_/gang la yang gtor ma'i bye brag gis 
[\[7b.3\]]'grub nges so/_/dur khrod du phyin te snod thod pa la pad snal dkar po'i sdong bu dang /_tshil chen gyi mar me byas la tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la sbar ba'i du ba mig la byugs na gzhan gyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyi ma'am zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe mi g.yo 
[\[7b.4\]]mgon po'i sku kham pa la byas nas me tog shel pa li ka'am/_daN+Dot+pa las mchod cing sngags mtshan thog thag bzlas pas tshe lo stong thub bo/_/yang zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe dum bu drug pa'i thod par khrag sna tshogs blugs te/_maN+Dal nag po'i thog tu bzhag nas kha me 
[\[7b.5\]]long gis bcad de/_de'i steng du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g.yo ba bzhag ste/_rang nyid gcer bu'i lus ma he'i rnam lngas byugs te/_mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang nyi ma dang zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe maN+Dal gru bzhi pa byas nas grwa 
[\[7b.6\]]bzhir ral gri btsugs la/_rang nyid gcer bu lus thams cad thal bas byugs te mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gter kha dbye bar 'dod pas mi g.yo mgon po'i sku kham pa las byas la/_sman drug la sogs pa dri zhim po 
[\[7b.7\]]thams cad dang lhan cig pa'i rin po che'i snod kha sbyar du bcug nas maN+Dal dkar po'i dbus su khri'u la bzhag nas/_dus gsum du mchod cing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/_gsol ba gdab cing a ga ru la sogs pa'i spos sreg cing bstod pa byas na zla ba gsum gyi 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]rjes su gter rnyed nges so/_/gal te char 'bebs par 'dod na/_klu yod pa'i gnas su klu'i dkyil 'khor byas te/_spra tshil lam bag zan la dga' bo la sogs pa'i gzugs byas te kha dog tha dad par byas nas maN+Dal der gzhug ste/_dam tshig pa 
[\[8a.2\]]bskyed nas dbus su mi g.yo mgon po dang bcas pa la ye shes kyi lha bcug nas/_ka ra dang /_bu ram dang /_sbrang dang /_'o ma la sogs pas mchod cing rtsa ba'i sngags 'brug ltar bsgrags pas klu rnams skrag nas char pa'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/gal te mi 'beb 
[\[8a.3\]]na thod pa dum bu gcig par klu'i gzugs rnams bcug la/_gdug pa can gyi mes bsros na char shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam zhag bdun du 'bebs pa la the tshom med do/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyor ka phra mo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang dag 
[\[8a.4\]]bshad bya ba/_/bsam gtan brtan las byung ba ni/_/'khrul med nyid de gnod rnams sel/_/khams gsum rgyal po cher nyon cig_/spro bsdu'i rim pa goms gyur las/_/ji srid 'dod pa'i dus bar du/_/rang sems gnas nas brtan par 'gyur/_/dngos med dngos 
[\[8a.5\]]sogs ma lus pa'i/_/rnam rtog rab rib kun bsal nas/_/nyon mongs nad rnams ma lus pa/_/bag chags dang bcas gtan bcom nas/_/'phral du yang ni brod dga' skye/_/spro yang mi dmigs bsdu mi dmigs/_/skye med 'gag med ting nge 'dzin/_/'byung 
[\[8a.6\]]med 'gro med bsam gtan la/_/gnas na ye shes myur du thob/_/bla med ye shes yon tan dang /_/mthu rnams che bar 'gyur ba ni/_/bla ma mnyes las rnyed 'gyur ba'i/_/de nyid bdud rtsi bcud kyis len/_/gus pas rtag par nyin mtshan du/_/rgyun chad med par 
[\[8a.7\]]goms byas na/_/myur du phyag rgya chen po yi/_/dngos grub snod du 'gyur ba yin/_/'bad rtsol byang chub yan lag ste/_/le lo gnyid dang g.yeng ba spang /_/sngags gsal dmigs pa brtan gyur cing /_/bsam gtan thon nas 'khrul 'khor brtsam/_/skar ma rgyal gyi 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]nyin par la/_/gro ga'am yang na shin shun la/_/gur gum gi wang tsan dan gyis/_/rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud bcas/_/dbus su ming dang sngags spel bri/_/mu khyud la ni rtsa sngags bri/_/rwa kun la ni hUM dang ming /_/spel te g.yas nas bskor la bri/_/dkyil 'khor dkar 
[\[8b.2\]]po'i dbus su ni/_/me tog dkar po'i steng bzhag nas/_/lha yi skur ni bskyed byas te/_/stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas/_/gang zhig 'dod pa'i dpung pa 'am/_/lus la bcangs na srung bar byed/_/kham phor sar pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris te/_sgor bcangs na gsar 
[\[8b.3\]]du btsas pa'i byis pa srung ngo /_/dur khrod kyi ras la sngags ming dang bcas pa bris te/_spra tshil gyis gtums nas dur khrod kyi bum par bcug nas/_kha rdo rje rgya gram gyis bcad de sbas na mngal skems par byed do/_/phyung nas 'o mas bkrus na sos so/_/gal te bsad 
[\[8b.4\]]par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por byas pa'i steng du kham pa las byas ba'i mi g.yo mgon po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang /_rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang thod khrag g.yon na 'chang ba byas pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[8b.5\]]de nas dri ma drug dang bag zan las bsgrub bya'i gzugs sor brgyad byas nas/_rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo bsad pa'i sham bu dang bcas pa snying gar bcug ste/_de'i sku'i zhabs su bzhag nas rang nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas zur bzhir mi rus sam seng ldeng ngam/_
[\[8b.6\]]lcags las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa bzhag pa la thun mtshams thams cad du btab pas shes pa brgyal bar bsam mo/_/de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi phur pa mi g.yo bar bsgoms pa'i thugs bskul nas/_de las khro bo lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs pa grangs med pa spros pas/_
[\[8b.7\]]bsgrub bya rlung gi 'khor lo la bzhag nas 'ongs pas skad cig tsam gyis phung po gtor nas/_shes pa ling ga la bstim par bya'o/_/de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byas pas hom khung du bsreg pa'am/_mnan pa byas na dbang phyug chen po yang gsod par nges na gzhan lta 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]smos kyang ci dgos/_yang na d+ha du ra dang /_khyi khrag dang /_nya'i khrag gis 'khor lo ral gri'i rtse mo ltar rno bar byas nas/_lte ba'i dbus su gru gsum ma'i nang du bsgrub bya'i ming dang rgyud du bcas pa bris la/_de zhags pas bskor bar bya'o/_/rtsibs 
[\[9a.2\]]rnams su sngags kyi rkang pa brgyad pa bri'o/_/mu khyud la ming dang bcas pa'i snying po bri'o/_/de'i rgyab kyi mu khyud la las thams cad pa bri'o/_/mu khyud gsum pa la rdo rje dang ral gri spel nas bri bar bya'o/_/de nas thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug nas zhing skras bcings 
[\[9a.3\]]te/_bsgrub bya dag za ba'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas khro bo shin tu khros pas khrag 'dren pa'i lta bas bltas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gang la byas pa de khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi'o/_/dur khrod du sbas na mtshon gyi bskal pa babs nas 'chi'o/_/shing gcig gi 
[\[9a.4\]]rtsar sbas na rengs so/_/chu mdor sbas na 'byer ro/_/lam rgya gram du sbas na smyo'o/_/lha rten zhabs su sbas na zha bor 'gyur ro/_/klu yod pa'i sar sbas na mdzes zin pa la the tshom med do/_/rang nyid kyi nyal ba'i zhabs su sbas na 'dod pa'i bu mo khugs so/_/ci ste rgyal 
[\[9a.5\]]mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na dmag kyang rengs so/_/de dag thams cad la khro bo 'bar ba dud pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa phyag bzhi zhabs bzhi spyan gsum dang ldan par blta'o/_/dur khrod kyi ras la dmag dpon gyi ming dang spel ba'i sngags rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte bar bris la mtha' yi ge 
[\[9a.6\]]la~M brgyad kyis mnan te/_de'i phyi rol du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rgya gram bris la/_de spra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying gar bcug nas gang 'thab pa'i mtshams su bzhag na dmag rengs so/_/gzhan yang gza' skar la bltas te 'phyar ro/_/bskrad 
[\[9a.7\]]par 'dod na gro ga'am ras la bya rog dang 'ug pa'i khrag gis gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo bris te/_u ts+tshA Ta ya spel bar bya'o/_/char che ba'am ser ba gcad par 'dod na/_gro ga la gur gum mam gi wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa byas la mu khyud gsum pa byas te/_
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]rtsibs bzhi la snying po'i sngags yi ge hU~M la bskor ba bris la/_dbus kyi lte bar yi ge k+ShiM bris te/_de la rtsa ba'i sngags g.yon skor du bris nas/_mu khyud dang po la las thams cad pa'i sngags bri'o/_/gnyis pa la ral gri'i phreng ba/_gsum pa la kun tu me ri'o/_/de ltar dmigs 
[\[9b.2\]]te mchod nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na char ches pa dang ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/yang bsad par 'dod pas kham pa'i spar bu la mi g.yo ba'i snying po mtshal gyis g.yon skor du bris nas dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi nang du gong du bstan pa'i ling ga'i snying gar ming 
[\[9b.3\]]dang bcas pa bcug nas gan rkyal du steng du kha gzar te las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing zhag bcu drug tu las bya'o/_/de nas dur khrod kyi sa las byas pa'i mchod rten khru gang pa nag po'i bum pa'i nang du rang gis bsrung ba nyid bcug nas/_mchod rten bang rim 
[\[9b.4\]]gsum man chad stong pa'i nang du tsha tsha lnga bzhag pas gru gsum kha bkag cing lho phyogs su bzhag go/_/des zla ba gnyis na 'chi nges so/_/gal te gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad par 'dod na dbang chen gyi dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po bris te/_zur thams cad rdo rje 
[\[9b.5\]]rgya gram gyis mtshan par byas nas/_grwa thams cad la~M gyis mtshan pa ste/_rdo rje phur pas bsgrub bya'i ling ga'i steng du mnan na/_zhag bdun gyis rig sngags 'chad do/_/yang na hU~M bzhi mgo sprad pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro/_/da ni tsu tsun+d+ha ra'i pags pa la 'khrul 
[\[9b.6\]]'khor rengs pa'i sbyor ba dang bcas pa'am/_sbu la sdong bu byas shing tshil la mar me byas nas/_du ba de bzhar nas mig la bskus na dgras mi mthong ngo /_/yang dpral bar thig le bya ste lag pa la bskus na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur nges so/_/rkang pa la bskus 
[\[9b.7\]]na dpag tshad brgyar 'gro nus so/_/sA lu'i phye ma la gzugs byas te phye ma des bskus na dgra rengs par byed do/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bcas pas dgra bo'i sgo'am dpung la gtor na nad kyis thebs so/_/tsu tsun+d+ha ra'i pags pa la 'khrul 'khor bris nas/_
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]dbugs kyis brgyangs te sngags stong bzlas na dgra de sbos nas 'chi'o/_/de la sngags ni/_tad+ya thA/_na mo stu te/_ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/_oM ga Na ga Na a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/_oM ga NaHga Na pa ti pra dzri ti ye swA hA/_na mo stu ti ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/_
[\[10a.2\]]oM karka tra ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_dA ra dA ra/_bi dA ra bi dA ra/_ha na ha na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_da d+ha ba dA d+ha ba/_ga ra ga ra/_b+haM dza b+haM dza/_dzaM b+ha dzaM b+ha/_mo ha mo ha/_de hi de hi/_d+hA pa ya d+hA pa ya/_d+hA ya n+ya d+hA ya n+ya/_sid d+hi me bra yats+tsha/_sa ma sa ma/_sa ma mA ra ya ma tsu sma ra ma pu tra 
[\[10a.3\]]pa tsa na ya swA hA/_oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/_oM tu ru tu ru swA hA/_oM su ru su ru swA hA/_oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/_oM shIn+taM puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_oM ga ta briM d+hu kri pi ta tsit+ta/_ma hA bi d+ha rA ga gas ts+tshin+ti/_ma ha b+ha ya/_pa ra kra ma/_ma hA hA sti/_ma hA d+ha kr-i Ni ya/_pra tsit+ta yA mi swA hA/_oM 
[\[10a.4\]]ku ru ku ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_oMHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHoM na mo na maHswA hA/_bzlas pa'i sngags oM brta ka swA hA/_zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang tshogs kyi bdag po'i sbyor ba las rlung bcing bar 'dod na gur gum dang /_gi wang dang /_yung ba ser pos 
[\[10a.5\]]rgyal po'i ras la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi steng du ri rab rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan pa bris la/_ya~M dang la~M rim pa bzhin du bkod nas de'i dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po byi ba la zhon pa/_kha dog gser btso ma lta bu phyag bzhi pa/_g.yas dang po na bgrang phreng g.yon 
[\[10a.6\]]dang por rtse gsum 'og ma gnyis kyis thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba 'dzin pa/_sna nam mkha' la phyar nas blta ba bris te/_de'i snying gar zla gam ljang gu'i steng du/_la~M ya~M la~M bris la rnal 'byor pa dbang chen yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[10a.7\]]bzlas na rlung bcing ba'i mchog yin no/_/yang thog gam shing gi rtse mo la bzhag na rlung bcing bar byed do/_/da ni tshogs kyi bdag po yi/_/sna tshogs las grub 'di bshad bya/_/rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'i/_/dbang chen nyis brtsegs dbus su ni/_/zhal gcig 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]phyag bzhi rtse gsum dang /_b+hi ti pA la bgrang phreng dang /_/a sho ka ni bzung byas te/_/byi ba'i steng na sems dpa' yi/_/skyil krung gis bzhugs khros nas ni/_/sngon po rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/_/bsam la la du la phug dang /_/'o ma zho dang sbrang dkar dang /_/mar dang chan 
[\[10b.2\]]dang sran ma sha/_/btsos pa'i sha dang shing tog rnams/_/dus dang dus su mchod byas na/_/gter rnams 'di yis ster bar byed/_/yang na bdag nyid mi g.yo ba/_/zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa'i sku/_/ral gri mda' dang rdo rje g.yas/_/zhags pa gzhu dang mdung 
[\[10b.3\]]thung g.yon/_/khams gsum gang ba'i hU~M las bskyed/_/sna tshogs mdog can khro bo ni/_/du ma mtshon cha rnams bzung ba/_/rang las spro zhing bsdu byed pa'i/_/mdun du tshogs kyi bdag po ni/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma la/_/bzhengs te mda' dang gzhu 'dzin 
[\[10b.4\]]pa/_/bskyed nas btsos pa'i shas mchod nas/_/bsnyen pa stong byas las rnams 'grub/_/yul gyi tshwa dang sa gsum la/_/tshogs bdag de yi gzugs byas nas/_/gnod pa'i ming dang ldan bcug na/_/lo nyes mi ngas phyugs ngas sogs/_/gang gi mtshan nas 
[\[10b.5\]]bzung ba de/_/gnod pa kun las srung bar byed/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/las rnams grub pa'i yan lag tu/_/gces par gyur pa'i sbyin sreg go/_/tshal 
[\[10b.6\]]ni gnyis te rtsub ngos dang /_/yid 'ong rang gi khyim du bsgrub/_/sa ni las kyi dbye bas shes/_/skyon dang bral bas thab brtsig bya/_/rgya la sor tshad nyi shu bzhi/_/de yi ngos la sor bcu gnyis/_/dpangs ni de yi rgya las ni/_/sor bzhi chung bar bskor bar bya/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[10b.7\]]dbyibs can brgyan bltas nas/_/ral gri 'bar ba dgod par bya/_/zur bzhir rdo rje phyed pa bzhi/_/thab khung kha la rdo rje yi/_/phreng ba gsal por bskor bar bya/_/'di ni 'phrin las kun gyi'o/_/yang na khru gang nang gru gsum/_/rim gsum sum gnyis sor tshad do/_/nang 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]du rdo rje rgya gram bri/_/gsad pa la ni bsngags pa'o/_/til dang 'bras dang 'o ma dang /_/zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/pa la sha dang be shing sogs/_/me tog dkar po yod pa ste/_/dkar gsum mngar gyis bsres pa rnams/_/zhi ba'i las la shin tu 
[\[11a.2\]]shis/_/sA lu nas dang gro dang ni/_/rgya rtsi che dang na gu la/_/sardza gu gul gur gum bcas/_/tsam pa zho dang nye'u shing /_/me tog gser mdog la sogs rnams/_/rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis/_/tsan+dan dmar dang gur gum dang /_/bra bo til dang rgya sran dang /_/
[\[11a.3\]]khre dang cung tse spel ba dang /_/ba ser mo yi bdud rtsi lnga/_/na ga khro dang tsan+dan dmar/_/me tog dmar po dbang la shis/_/bsad la khrag dang dug yungs kar/_/tshwa gsum ling gar bcas pa'o/_/gos dkar rgyan yang dkar po ste/_/yo byad kun kyang dkar byas dang /_/
[\[11a.4\]]bsam pa bzang pos shar bltas pa/_/'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub/_/rgyan gos yo byad kun ser zhing /_/rgyas pa'i yid byas byang du bltas/_/dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor byas na/_/'dis ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub byed/_/rgyan dang gos dang yo 
[\[11a.5\]]byad kun/_/kha dog dmar zhing snum gyur nas/_/myos pa'i yid lta bus bltas na/_/dbang gi las rnams 'grub par byed/_/rgyan gos gnag cing yo byad gnag_/rtsub pa'i yid bltas khros pa'i skad/_/'byin cing lho yi phyogs su bltas/_/drag 
[\[11a.6\]]po'i las rnams myur du 'grub/_/de la las byed pa'i dus su mi rus la byas pa'i phur pa mi g.yo bar bsgoms la/_sngon du bsnyen pa song bas dang pos kha/_gnyis pas snying ga_/_gsum pas lte ba/_bzhi pas pus mo rnams su dam par gdab bo/_/spra 
[\[11a.7\]]tshil lam/_thal chen nam/_bag zan la ling ga byas la ske tshe dang /_re lcag dang /_nya'i rngog gzhob rnams brdungs la khrag dang sbyar nas gro ga la rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i dkyil du ming dang sngags spel te bris pa'i snying kar bcug la/_oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]mu ka s+ya staM b+ha ya/_kI la ya hU~M phaT ces gdab bo/_/bsgrub bya'i shes pa rlung gi steng du bzhag la dbugs dang bcas pa drang ngo /_/gal te gso bar 'dod na phur bu dang ming bton te 'o ma blug cing /_oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru kurban+tu ye swA hA/_zhes brjod 
[\[11b.2\]]na zhag bdun nas sos par 'gyur ro/_/yang gsod pa'i las bya bar 'dod na/_hU~M las skyes pa'i mi g.yo ba long ba zhes bya ba shin tu dmar ba'i mig gcig yod pa/_ral gri dang zhags pa can kha dog ljang nag rtsub cing 'khrug pa/_rin po che'i brag phug tu gnas 
[\[11b.3\]]pa la dus rtag par rgyun du mchod nas gru gsum thams cad kyi dbus su bsams te sha dang khrag dang dug dang gzugs brnyan rnams zhal du bsregs na myur du 'chi'o/_/rengs par 'dod pas rnga mo'i rus pa la dze ta ya dze ta ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg go/_/lkugs 
[\[11b.4\]]par 'dod na ra'i sha la b+ha ti ra b+ha ti ra zhes khri tsho gsum bsreg go/_/smyo bar 'dod na khyi sha dang chang dang dug sna tshogs pa la un+man+don+man+da/_zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsreg go/_/dgra bo'i mig long bar 'dod pas skyer pa'i shing dang bong bu'i rtug pa la a ta ka ra zhes stong rtsa brgyad du 
[\[11b.5\]]bsreg go/_/sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang /_rnga mo'i rus pa la mo ha ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsregs na rmongs par byed do/_/yung ba dang tsan+dan la dz+wa ra da pa na ya zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na yams 'chad do/_/sbal pa dzi ra dang khyi nag po'i sha la tsi ti dz+wa lA+oM ma pa na ya/_stong 
[\[11b.6\]]bsregs na mdze 'chad do/_/khu ba dang /_khrag dang /_d+ha du ra la su tri tshin+da zhes stong rtsa bsregs na mngal skams so/_/gtum po drag po'i nga rgyal gyis/_/dUr ba'am gi wang ngam lan tshwa'am/_/rgya skyegs bsregs na yams nad dang /_/'khrugs dang 'jigs dang 
[\[11b.7\]]'byung po ldog_/zho dang ku mu da dang sbrang /_/bya rgod klad pa khwa yi tshil/_/'di rnams bsregs na smyo nad dang /_/lgang dang bu mi thon pa sel/_/kye gzhan yang sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis/_/sna tshogs las rnams 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/brtan pa chen po'i ye shes ni/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'ga' las myur du thob byed cing /_/g.yo 'dod sred la bla ma slu/_/tshig la sems zhing don mi tshol/_/bag med g.yeng dang ser sna dang /_/brkam chen snying rje med pas ni/_/bskal pa brgya dang stong phrag tu/_/bsgrubs kyang nam yang mi 'grub ste/_/lus 
[\[12a.2\]]dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo/_/ngal ba las ni gzhan du min/_/bza' btung zhim po sna tshogs rnams/_/rtag par nyin re dus gsum du/_/grogs po kun la byin pas kyang /_/lan gcig bla ma mchod pa yis/_/brgya yi char yang mi phod do/_/de nas de'i tshe 
[\[12a.3\]]lha'i dbang po dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu drug khris khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/_kye ho brtse ba'i sems mnga' 'on kyang 'khrugs 'dra zhing /_/dga' zhing shin tu dag kyang ra ri sna tshogs spras/_/lha yi khams rnams kun la ral gri phyar ba'i tshe/_/lha 
[\[12a.4\]]min tshogs kun brgyal zhing rab tu skrag par snang /_/srid pa'i nyon mongs kun la bsdigs pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis/_/bdud rnams brgyal zhing skrag nas skad phyung thag ring 'bros/_/yi ge phyed pa a he'i ku cos log phyogs skrag_/che ba yi ni shin tu che gyur khyod kyi sku/_/
[\[12a.5\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shin tu bsngags shing bstod/_/klu rnams 'dus pas cha shas lus kyis phyogs par brgyan/_/lha dbang bu mo rnams kyis rin chen rgyan rab gsol/_/spyan bgrad ljags 'dril stag lpags 'dzin pa khyod la bstod/_/bstod pa 
[\[12a.6\]]chen po des bstod nas tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa lha tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga'o/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum pa las 
[\[12a.7\]]dngos grub thams cad yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta a tu la dA sa badzra dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa ban+de chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]{D433}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_kro d+ha rA dza sarba man+t+ra gu h+ya tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/_khro bo mi g.yo mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/khams gsum zhe sdang can 
[\[12b.2\]]gzigs nas/_/zhe sdang thams cad zad bya'i phyir/_/bcom ldan thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/_/zhe sdang mi g.yo mgon por mdzad/_/ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag_/sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang /_/rnam dag bsam gtan 'phrin las rnams/_/bcom ldan 
[\[12b.3\]]rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/_/dur khrod 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i sar/_/'dzin pas btud de nges zhus la/_/kye kye yang dag khro chen gtso/_/ma lus rnam dag la gnas phyir/_/mgon po mi g.yo'i gsang rgyud las/_/sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gang /_/ngo mtshar 
[\[12b.4\]]thar pa nges par gso/_/de nas yang dag ye gsungs pa/_/dpa' bo dur khrod gnas pas legs/_/rus pa'i rgyan nges phyag rgya drug_/gnas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid de/_/rgyu bzhi tshad med bzhi ru gnas/_/ye shes rtog pa'i rtog pa'o/_/rgyun ma chad pa'i 
[\[12b.5\]]dam pa yis/_/nyi zla shes rab thabs kyi gdan/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas/_/gyur pa'i mtshan ldan ye shes lnga/_/phyag rgya drug mdzes byin brlabs nas/_/dur khrod ma ni 'khyud pa'o/_/phung po la sogs thub par gnas/_/pad+ma rdo rje byin gyis brlabs/_/
[\[12b.6\]]bsrung ba'i sbyor ba med pa dang /_/mtshan ma bral dang 'dus ma byas/_/byed pa rnam med rtog pas 'das/_/sku ni dug 'dzoms gnag pa'i tshul/_/rdo rje zhags pa bsdigs gnas pa/_/g.yon brkyang gnas pa spyan rtsa dmar/_/pad+ma gri gug shes rab tshul/_/g.yon 'khyud 
[\[12b.7\]]tshim byed rgyan bral ba'i/_/thabs dang shes rab ma chags dang /_/tha ma byin za mnan te gnas/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na'o/_/hU~M la rgya gram rdo rje gnas/_/e las chos 'byung grub pa mo/_/mtshon cha ra ba dra bas so/_/rten pa phyag rgya lha lnga gnas/_/mos pa 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]rnam par grub pa yin/_/mos pa rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gnyis med 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ni/_/'khor lo mi bskyod ye shes che/_/mgrin pa phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung /_/rna cha gzugs kyi 'od dpag med/_/
[\[13a.2\]]rus pa'i rna rgyan don yod grub/_/thal ba snang mdzad rnam dag go/_/mig la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/_/rna ba zhe sdang ma zhes grags/_/sna ni ser sna'i rnam par bor/_/lce la phrag dog rdo rje ma/_/lus la rdo rje gti mug go/_/yid la chos kyi dbang phyug ste/_/dkyil 'khor lus 
[\[13a.3\]]nyid rnam dag pa/_/rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te/_/ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do/_/bdud rtsi rnam lnga tshon sna lnga/_/g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo nyid de/_/so sen ba spu twa ra Na/_/snying gi dbus kyi lte ba nyid/_/phung po lnga yi gtso mo ste/_/khams dang skye mched lha mor 
[\[13a.4\]]grags/_/'byung ba sgo ba bzhi nyid de/_/'dom gang gru bzhi lham pa ste/_/mi g.yo mgon po rnam par nges/_/lus kyi rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//oM Ar+ya a tsa la mAr+ya ra ya kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_snying po'o/_/oM Ar+ya a tsa la kro d+ha bi ba ta sa hU~M phaT/_nye 
[\[13a.5\]]ba'i snying po'o/_/oM tsaN+DA ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_gsang ba'i snying po'o/_/oM ha/_na ma hi/_swa hA hu/_bau ShaT he/_hU~M hU~M ho/_phaT haM/_rgyan byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/oM pad+ma bo larga mi yaM/_TaM haM maM byAM/_badzra pra ta ka ko la hU~M phaT/_shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/
[\[13a.6\]]ka sa mA ra kha na hi mA ra kha ni sa mA ra ya phaT/_bsad pa'i'o/_/sarba a margaM me a hU~M/_thun mong grub pa'o/_/a gats+tsha phaT/_bskrad pa'i 'o/_/swA hA rat+na na/_rgyas pa'i'o/_/d+harmA gu ta hU~M/_dbang gi'o/_/karma pu ta shIn+ta~M ku ru hU~M/_zhi ba'i'o/_/sngags kyi rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[13a.7\]]rtog pa'i dum bu las khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba las/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las/_/khro bo'i tshogs rnams 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]spros nas ni/_/gtso mo thabs kyi yan lag bkang /_/lag pa g.yas par gshin rje'i gshed/_/g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya/_/rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/dpung pa g.yas par mi g.yo ba/_/g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal 
[\[13b.2\]]po'o/_/pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/_/dbyig pa sngon po cher 'bar ba/_/pus mo g.yon par stobs po che/_/spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur/_/gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni/_/rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya/_/yang ni yab yum sbyor ba las/_/byang chub 
[\[13b.3\]]sems sprin 'du 'phro las/_/hU~M tshogs khro mor spros nas ni/_/gtso mo shes rab yan lag dgang /_/lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma/_/g.yon na gzhan gyis mi thub mo/_/de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma/_/gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o/_/gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas gnas 
[\[13b.4\]]par/_/de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma/_/g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi/_/phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya/_/pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang /_/sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/_/g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las/_/spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma/_/rkang pa gnyis 
[\[13b.5\]]la sa yi ni/_/sa 'dzin lha mo gzhag par bya/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/_/byang chub sems sprin 'phro 'du las/_/gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rigs/_/phyung nas lus la dkyil 'khor bkod/_/de dag phan tshun sbyor ba las/_/rjes chags chen po'i sgra 
[\[13b.6\]]yis ni/_/bde gshegs tshogs rnams bskul bya ste/_/de dag la ni yang yang gzhug_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+w+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_chu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/_/gsal ba lha yi rang bzhin ni/_/kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste/_/brjid 
[\[13b.7\]]pa'i khro bo gar dang bcas/_/yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis par/_/rnal 'byor can gyis brtan par bsgom/_/dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir nan tan bskyed par bya/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor du/_/rigs kyi khro bo spro ba ni/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/_/rnam par 'phrul pa bshad par bya/_/rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/_/gti mug mi g.yo mgon po ni/_/
[\[14a.2\]]zhal ni gnag dang dkar dang dmar/_/'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/_/dbyig pa 'khor lo rdo rje bsnams/_/phyag g.yas na ni bsnams par mdzad/_/thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang /_/dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa ni/_/dbang po la sogs tshogs 
[\[14a.3\]]bcas dang /_/mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad/_/pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/_/shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs gyur pa/_/rnam snang dbu rgyan ldan pa'o/_/rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/_/ser sna mi g.yo mgon po ni/_/rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can/_/gser 
[\[14a.4\]]mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/spyan gsum gsus che nor bus brgyan/_/ser dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/_/mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par rgyu/_/'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/_/rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni/_/g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/_/snying 
[\[14a.5\]]gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang /_/dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa na/_g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/_/mi bzad bgegs ni skrag mdzad pa/_/pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/_/lho yi phyogs na bzhugs par gyur/_/rang sngags yi ge las byung ba'i/_/'dod chags mgon 
[\[14a.6\]]po mi g.yo ba/_/spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog_/zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar/_/zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang /_/'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can/_/dpa' bo g.yon brkyang pa yis gnas/_/'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrugs/_/pad+ma ral gri gtun shing 
[\[14a.7\]]ni/_/g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/_/snyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang /_/dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/_/pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/_/phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/_/klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su/_/nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/_/phrag dog mi g.yo mgon po ni/_/don yod rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/_/sngo ljang ut+pal 'dab ma'i mdog_/zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/_/zhal gdangs la ni rnam par 'gyur/_/gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/_/'bar ba'i 'od 
[\[14b.2\]]kyis rnam par brgyan/_/sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang /_/gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na/_/sdigs mdzub zhags pas phyag mtshan cing /_/dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams/_/g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis/_/pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/_/phyogs bcu dag tu 
[\[14b.3\]]gzigs nas ni/_/bgegs chen 'jigs pa bsal mdzad nas/_/byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/_/de ltar phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs/_/mthar byed rab tu zad mdzad nas/_/sems can yongs su btul byas te/_/zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis 
[\[14b.4\]]bkang /_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtag pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//_//[{D434}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA gu h+ya tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gsang rgyud chen 
[\[14b.5\]]po/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'og min gyi gnas na rab tu dgyes shing bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[14b.6\]]so/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rdo rje chos dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /_rdo rje khu tshur la sogs te rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang thabs 
[\[14b.7\]]cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis badzra rak+Sha rak+ShaM hU~M zhes gsungs te rdo rje khro bos phyogs mtshams gtams so/_/bsrung ba'i don du rab brtson zhing /_/bgegs kyi sbyor ba brlag par mdzad/_/hU~M phaT de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis haM zhes gsungs te rang 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]gi thugs ka nas khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba phyung ste/_g.yas na ral gri g.yon sdigs mdzub/_/char sprin lta bur shin tu gnag_/sbrul dang thod pas yang dag brgyan/_/mi bskyod pas ni byin brlabs shing /_/bde gshegs 'od zer dpag med 'phros/_/
[\[15a.2\]]dngos grub bde ba kun stsol mdzad/_/oM badzra sid+d+hi hU~M/_de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/A li kA li rab sbyor zhing /_/zla ba rdo rje sbyor ldan pas/_/yang dag rdzogs te mngon sangs rgyas/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su ni/_/brkyang bskum tshul du yang dag gnas/_/dga' 
[\[15a.3\]]byed ma ni mdun du ste/_/rin chen phreng ma g.yas su dgod/_/glu mkhan mo ni g.yon du ste/_/brtson 'grus gar byed rgyab tu gnas/_/'gugs byed ma ni shar du ste/_/rnam par 'ching ma lho ru dgod/_/gnyis med ma ni nub tu ste/_/rnam par 'phel ma byang du dgod/_/
[\[15a.4\]]'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig go/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[15a.5\]]zhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer spros te lha thams cad kyi dbu la 'od zer thim par gyur te/_rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par gyur to/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ru/_/mchod pa'i tshogs ni rnam 
[\[15a.6\]]par bstim/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/_/reg bya lha mo dpag med de/_/mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag mchod/_/kye kye mtha' gnyis rnam par ma g.yos shing /_/sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'gro don dpag med mdzad/_/'jigs byed chen po 'gro ba kun sgrol 
[\[15a.7\]]zhing /_/srid pa gsum na dgyes par gar mdzad pa/_/srid pa'i chu bo skems shing mi mthun bdud rnams 'joms/_/srid pa'i rlung gis ma g.yos thugs rje mi g.yo mgon/_/rab brjid mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa chen po'i 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dam tshig go/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/rgyal po rtag ldan thod pa ru/_/lcags kyu lnga sogs gzhag par bya/_/rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor bzhag_/thod pa ru ni yang dag gnas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud rtsi chen po'i dam tshig go/_/de nas yang dag bshad 
[\[15b.2\]]bya ba/_/tshangs pa brgya byin gshin rje dang /_/chu bdag gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sogs/_/me dang srin po rlung gi lha/_/'byung po sa yi lha mo dang /_/lha ma yin sogs 'khor bcas dgug_/oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pen+na twata swa hA/_oM khA hi khA hi pheM pheM 
[\[15b.3\]]swA hA/_bdud rtsi sha dang khrag la sogs/_/gtor ma thams cad sbyin par bya/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/khru 
[\[15b.4\]]bzhi pa yi tshad du bya/_/sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor nyis 'khor ring thung la/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/_/'khor lo lta bur byas nas kyang /_/rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor/_/gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi/_/rta babs bzhi 
[\[15b.5\]]dang yang dag ldan/_/dbus su ral gri chen po dgod/_/shar du rdo rje yang dag dgod/_/lho ru rin chen phreng ba ste/_/nub tu chos kyi pi bang ste/_/byang du rdo rje rtse gsum mo/_/sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang /_/lcags sgrog dril bu mkhas pas bzhag_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15b.6\]]kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dam tshig go/_/de nas char pa mi 'bab na/_/stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du yang /_/dngul gyi gzhong pa bzhag nas kyang /_/bag zan las ni byas pa'i gzugs/_/pad+ma sum brtsegs dag tu bya/_/steng du klu yi gzugs bzhag la/_/gur 
[\[15b.7\]]gum gyis ni byugs byas la/_/mtshams su oM dang pa~M bkod de/_/tsan+dan dkar pos sbyin bsreg bya/_/kha dog mang po sbyor ldan pas/_/klu yi gzugs ni nges par dgug_/des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/_/kham pa'i gab tshe dkar po ru/_/pri yang ku yi khu ba yis/_/
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ral gri brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bri/_/rgya mtsho'i ngos las sa blangs la/_/klu yi gzugs ni mngon byas te/_/nam mkha' lding gi khu bas byug_/til mar la ni sbyin bsreg bya/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/kham phor ser po'i nang du ni/_/bsgrub bya gzugs 
[\[16a.2\]]gzhug ldong ros kyis/_/ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa bri/_/des ni yang dag gnas par bya/_/shin tu rno ba'i lcags dag la/_/khru do tshad kyi ral gri bya/_/maN+Dal dkar po'i steng du bzhag_/zla ba drug ni rig pa bzlas/_/til mar gyis ni bskus byas nas/_/zla ba gzas zin tshe na 
[\[16a.3\]]bsgrub/_/thogs pa'i mkha' la lding bar 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang sha sna lnga/_/grib ma dag la bskams byas te/_/lcags gsum dag gis dkris byas te/_/shar bltas zas ni smyung bar gnas/_/gzas zin tshe na khar gzhug bya/_/mnyam par gzhag ste nyi shu bzlas/_/
[\[16a.4\]]khar bcug gzhan gyis mngon mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das dngos grub chen po'i dam tshig go/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/sa gzhi dkar la zlum pa la/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i me sbar te/_/ser skya'i mar gyis sbyin bsreg bya/_/dngos grub chen po thob par 
[\[16a.5\]]'gyur/_/yungs kar gyis ni sbyin bsreg bya/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'thob/_/til nag pos ni sbyin bsreg bya/_/sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/dUr ba'i myu gus sbyin bsreg bya/_/tshe yi rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_/seng ldeng dag la phur 
[\[16a.6\]]ba bya/_/gsang sngags nyi shu gcig bzlas nas/_/'dod pa'i gzugs la dbab par bya/_/dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las dngos grub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[16a.7\]]yongs su dgyes nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa rnams la rnam par gzigs nas/_oM AHhU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra gsungs te mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs kyis rang gi bdag po mthong bar ma gyur te/_phyogs bzhi nas mngon du phyogs nas 'di yis 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]gsol ba btab bo/_/e ma bcom ldan ngo mtshar che/_/stong pa'i ngang la ci ste bzhugs/_/bdag ni tshangs spyod byams pa ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa kun nas slong /_/e ma'o bde ba chen po'i sku/_/tshig kun gyis ni ma spros pa/_/bdag ni rjes chags snying rje che/_/'gro ba 
[\[16b.2\]]yang dag sgrol bar mdzad/_/e ma dri med dag pa'i sku/_/stong pa'i ngang la ma bzhugs par/_/rab tu dga' bas bdag la rol/_/'gro ba'i don la rjes chags brjod/_/e ma'o don kun grub mdzad pa/_/dag pa'i ye shes dri med sku/_/bdag gis 'gro kun gzung 
[\[16b.3\]]ba'i phyir/_/gtso bo khyod ni yang dag bzhengs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dgyes te sku yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so/_/oM Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M phaT/_oM badzra kI li kI la ya/_sarba big+h+nAn ban d+ha ya hU~M phaT/_gsang 
[\[16b.4\]]sngags dang phur bu'i sngags so/_/oM na maHsa man+ta badzra NA~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M tra Ta hUM/_ma~M pa~M ha~M ma~M ta sha hU~M/_ma ma hU~M phaT swA hA/_shin tu rno ba'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/_/de nas 'khor rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi don khong du chud par gyur to/_/
[\[16b.5\]]'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po rdzogs so//_//[{D435}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra a mr-i ta tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud/_dpal 
[\[16b.6\]]rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje bdud rtsi gsang ba'i pad+ma la bzhugs so/_/gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i khang pa na/_mA ma 
[\[16b.7\]]kI dang thabs cig tu/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can rol te/_/de nas lha mos de zhus pa/_/gsang chen zhes bya cher gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog_/sngon du lha khyod kyis gsungs pa/_/bdud rtsi yi ni sgrub pa'i thabs/_/bde ba chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal/_/de nas bcom 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]ldan rdo rjes bshad/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bsam med zad med phra mo ste/_/don yod dbang po las 'das pa/_/dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis/_/mA ma kIr chags dang ldan nas/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 
[\[17a.2\]]'dzin gyis/_/gsang chen mngon sum du ni mdzad/_/rgyud rnams kun la gsang ba yi/_/ye shes rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog_/de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/_/brtan por 'khyud dang 'o byed dang /_/dga' ba'i rol pas mnyam sbyor dang /_/dbyangs dang sil snyan gar rnams kyis/_/rdo rje bdud 
[\[17a.3\]]rtsi rgyud kyi mchog_/de ltar myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs te/_/'gro ba gsum ni nges bskyed do/_/khyod la dga' ma zhal bzang ma/_/de yi sgrub pa bdag gis bshad/_/nyon cig de yi sems kyis tshig_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/_/sems 
[\[17a.4\]]can don du phan don du/_/sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog_/rnal 'byor gang gis shes gyur na/_/'khor ba'i bcings las myur bar grol/_/bstan du med cing ye shes che/_/dngos grub 'jig rten gsum sgrub bo/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du/_/sgrub pa pos ni 
[\[17a.5\]]bde ba spyod/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung bar bya/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab ste/_/rdo rje mA ma kIs 'o btab/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab pas/_/de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo des/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi 
[\[17a.6\]]las byung ba'i/_/nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus/_/cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni/_/mchod pa dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/_/'dir ni mchod pa ji ltar te/_/de bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags/_/dga' ba chen po thob dka' ba/_/rab tu dgyes nas 
[\[17a.7\]]bka' stsal 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/'o btab pas ni dgar 'gyur te/_/bzhad nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don dang /_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bsgral ba'i phyir/_/dga' ba chen po sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]mA ma kIs ni 'dir bris pa/_/zur gsum dkyil 'khor bris nas su/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma mA ma kI/_/nang du snying po dang ldan pa'i/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa ni bya/_/de dbus gsang chen rig ma dang /_/gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/_/
[\[17b.2\]]g.yas pa la ni dkar po 'dod/_/g.yon du dmar por rab gsungs te/_/lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan byas pa/_/lha yi na bza' me tog phreng /_/lha yi dri yis byug byed pa/_/lha yi dngos grub byed zhi ba/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/phyi rol du ni dkyil 'khor yang /_/
[\[17b.3\]]sgo bzhi pa ni rab tu brtags/_/shar du khro gnyer ma bzhag ste/_/lho na 'jigs par 'jigs byed ma/_/nub na rta yi gzugs can ma/_/byang du tshogs kyi 'dren ma mo/_/mkhas pas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/_/rig ma brgyad ni mnyam por bri/_/mdzes pa mo dang zhi ba'i 
[\[17b.4\]]zhal/_/zla ba mo dang dung can mo/_/ri bong 'dzin dang dkyil 'khor mo/_/ri bong 'dzin ri mo yid dga'/_/yid la bde bar byed ma dag_/_rig ma brgyad dang dge ma brgyad/_/thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni yid dga' ma/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[17b.5\]]dag ni mtshams dag la/_/rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya/_/mchod pa pi wang rnga de bzhin/_/de bzhin spos dang me tog sogs/_/dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa ni/_/dga' ba rol pa sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya/_/ma dang 
[\[17b.6\]]bran mo bu mo dang /_/sring mo gnyen mo de bzhin te/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi de dag las/_/blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod/_/ma las bdud rtsi blangs pas ni/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur/_/sring mo nad med na so gzhon/_/bu mo yi ni 'dod kun sbyin/_/bram ze mo ni don yod 
[\[17b.7\]]grub/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dod byas/_/lce ni dril bar byas nas su/_/kha yis pad+mar blang bar bya/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/de nas myur bar dngos grub bo/_/bung ba rtse ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyod/_/'dus dang gru mo dang brkyang ba/_/yar bteg 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]zer ni shin tu brkyang /_/byed pa'i bcing ba sbyor ba yis/_/sa gsum dag ni bsgrub par bya/_/sha chen dang ni khrag chen gyis/_/de bzhin bshang gci khu ba dag_/de dag rdo rje bdud rtsi lnga/_/nyin dang nyin du bsgrub par bya/_rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/gal 
[\[18a.2\]]te dngos grub bdag 'dod na/_/de yis don rnams thams cad ni/_/sgrub pa pos ni mchog tu bsgrub/_/dbang dang dgug dang 'thab pa dang /_/gsod dang bskrad pa la sogs pa/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/_/bya ba thams cad kun du bya/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/
[\[18a.3\]]bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i mngon tshul bstan pa'i le'u dang po'o//_//de nas mgu ba'i 
[\[18a.4\]]lha mo de/_/pad+ma rgyas pa'i mA ma kI/_/brtan po 'khyud pa byas nas su/_/dbang po thams cad la 'o btab/_/ma mchu sos bzung 'o btab ste/_/sid sgra sngags ni brjod par bya/_/rdo rje bcings pas sku yang 'dzin/_/rdo rje can gyis gsang byas te/_/pad+mar rdo rje bcug nas su/_/
[\[18a.5\]]chags na dga' ste 'dod par bya/_/sid sgra snyan po sgra rnams dang /_/kauk+ki le dang gling bu sogs/_/lha mo mA ma kI dang rtse/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/_/nu ma bzung la gzir byas te/_/sen mo ri mos gdab par bya/_/de yang gos ni phud byas te/_/steng 'og la yang blta 
[\[18a.6\]]bar bya/_/rgyas pa'i pad+mar 'o btab nas/_/dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya/_/rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI/_/lha mo chen mo legs so legs/_/gtan du 'dod la chags pa yis/_/bdag gis khyod la dga' bar bya/_/gang zhig 'dod pa khyod kyis zhus/_/khyod la bdag gis 
[\[18a.7\]]mchog tu sbyin/_/de nas lha mo mA ma kI/_/tshig 'di dag ni ched du gsol/_/bcom ldan nyid kyis de bzhin nyid/_/byang chub sems kyis rnam sprul pa/_/phra bas shin tu phra ba yis/_/zad med ye shes ji ltar rol/_/de 'dra lha yis spyod pa ni/_/dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]'jug pas/_/de dag the tshom 'byung bas na/_/bdag ni ngo mtshar dam par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen bshad/_/nyon cig de nyid mA ma kI/_/ye shes sbyor ba 'bigs byed pa/_/shin tu phra ba gsang chen po/_/ye shes shes bya 
[\[18b.2\]]ngo bo nyid/_/de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa/_/mi 'jigs zad med rtag pa ni/_/gdod ma med cing dbang po spangs/_/yod nyid dang ni med nyid kyang /_/dbang po dang bcas dbang po med/_/'byung ba kun tu ma mthong ba/_/sbyor 
[\[18b.3\]]ba lam gyis mthong ba'o/_/sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/_/phyi dang nang du bcas pa'o/_/phyi ni gzugs kyi phung po sogs/_/'byung ba rnam pa kun rdzob ste/_/sna tshogs g.yo dang mi g.yo ba/_/khams gsum dang ni ma lus par/_/de gcig pos ni khyab pa ste/_/
[\[18b.4\]]thams cad rnam shes kho na'o/_/ci phyir sems can bdag med rnams/_/rnam shes phung po brtan pa yin/_/blun sems snyigs ma'i mi rnams kyis/_/'ga' yang shes pa ma yin no/_/sems las ma byung sems kyi ngos/_/ye shes shes bya'i ngo bo nyid/_/thams 
[\[18b.5\]]cad rnam shes gcig nyid do/_/gang tshe lus la rkyen nyid 'gyur/_/chos rnams dang ni chos gcig 'gyur/_/dngos po dag ni de tshe 'gyur/_/ci yi phyir na chos rnams kyi/_/mang po nyid du chos rnams kyang /_/chu rgyun bzhin du rgya mtsho la/_/thar pa ni gcig kho na ste/_/mang 
[\[18b.6\]]po nyid du mi rnyed de/_/ji ltar nang du cher gnas pa/_/bla ma'i zhal kho na las thob/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar nam mkha' gang /_/nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste/_/snying dang snying po rnam ldan zhing /_/'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par bklubs/_/de dbus rdo rje can bzhugs te/_/byang sems 
[\[18b.7\]]bdud rtsi dang ldan pa/_/cha shas chos min rnam grol ba/_/thig le de yis rnam par spangs/_/der gnas rtag tu zag pa ni/_/bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi gzugs/_/khams rnams kun gyi gzhi yin pa/_/steng 'og tu yang rnam par khyab/_/des ni mthong ba thos pa yang /_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]mnam pa dang ni myang ba yang /_/reg dang bde ba'i longs spyod ni/_/zas dang me tog phreng ba dang /_/rgyan dang gos kyis brgyan pa ste/_/ngag gis sna tshogs grags pa yang /_/blang ba dang ni gzung ba rnams/_/rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang /_/'dug dang de bzhin nyal 
[\[19a.2\]]ba dang /_/sad pa dang ni log pa dang /_/thams cad rmi lam mthong ba ste/_/bzhad dang de bzhin cho nge dang /_/shin tu yid 'phrog gar dang ni/_/rnga rnams dag kyang brdung ba ste/_/sna tshogs pa dag 'dir brjod pas/_/smyon pa dang ni myos pa'i gzugs/_/gti mug 'dod chags de de 
[\[19a.3\]]nyid/_/gzugs med mang po'i gzugs can de/_/pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams/_/du ma'i gzugs can kun gyi bdag_/sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin/_/khyab pa'i dngos kyis khyab nas su/_/de nyid dam pa cher gnas so/_/de bzhin nyid de mA ma kI/_/bzlas med 'dzin 
[\[19a.4\]]pa yang med de/_/bgrang phreng bya ba 'ga' yang med/_/zas spangs pa yang mi bya'o/_/b+ha ga'i pad+ma mchod byas te/_/mkhas pas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/de yis de nyid 'grub pa'o/_/gang de bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su pad+ma ste/_/rtsa 
[\[19a.5\]]gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis la/_/de yi dbus su de gtso ste/_/de dag las gzhan shin tu mchog_/rtsa dag dgu ni rnam par gnas/_/sgo dgu la gnas rig pa dag_/sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lha mo/_/rtag tu rdo rje can mnyam blta/_/de bas de dag rab 
[\[19a.6\]]byed na/_/chags bral zhes gsungs kun rig pas/_/de dag gsang chen mchog rab ni/_/zhal bzang ma kye sbyor bar bshad/_/sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad sogs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes te/_/gtan du dga' ba'i yid bde ba/_/sbyor bas dam pa rab bstan to/_/
[\[19a.7\]]gsang ba'i pad+ma mthong nas dang /_/shin tu rgyas pa'i mA ma kI/_/rdo rje'i bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/de nyid bdag gis bshad par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las de bzhin nyid sbyor 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ba ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas mgu ba'i lha mo des/_/ha ra nu pur gyis brgyan te/_/'di dag dbyangs ni blangs nas su/_/sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed/_/phyung mdzad bde chen rdo rje las/_/bdag gis mchog gi yig 
[\[19b.2\]]'bru 'tshal bar bgyi/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar bde ba chen po ste/_/rdo rje'i don te bde ba chen po lags/_/sa 'dzin pa dang skad phreng dang /_/drug ldan la sogs mtha' 'khob tshul/_/sna tshogs thun mong rnam dag gi_/snyan pa'i sgra yis blang bar bya/_/de rnams dbyangs dag 
[\[19b.3\]]blangs nas su/_/dga' ba yid bde rnam sprul gyis/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pas/_/de bzhin nyid kyis the tshom bcad/_/rdo rje can khyod bka' drin gyis/_/rtag par ye shes bya ba bgyi/_/
[\[19b.4\]]bcom ldan chags pa dang bral ba'i/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba 'di/_/rdo rje theg pa 'byung ba yi/_/sbyor ba bdag gis bstan par bgyi/_/da dung bdag la the tshom mchis/_/phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam sprul pa/_/ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung /_/de dag gi sngags ji ltar lags/_/
[\[19b.5\]]sngags rnams gang las skye ba lags/_/khyad par du ni lha rnams kyang /_/lha ni de bdag the tshom na/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bdag la gsungs/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs/_/phyag rgya sngags dag 'byung ba ni/_/bshad de nyon cig mA ma 
[\[19b.6\]]kI/_/phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gsungs te/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs las 'byung /_/sku ni phyag rgya mchog 'gyur te/_/gsung ni phyag rgya sngags kyi las/_/thugs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni/_/bsam gtan ri mo gnyis med gnas/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las/_/sbyor ba'i phyag 
[\[19b.7\]]rgya shes bya ste/_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mi bri'o/_/phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs yin te/_/lha ni lha mo bud med do/_/dbang po thams cad bde ba ru/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar mchod par bya/_/rdo rje'i pad+ma mnyam sbyor zhing /_/las thams cad ni 'grub par bya/_/ji ltar dpag bsam 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]shing chen gyis/_/yal ga brgya phrag stong can dang /_/rtsa dang de la gzung ba ni/_/skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ba bzhin/_/de ltar bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i yum yin te/_/sngags 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[20a.2\]]bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/_/rdo rje bcug nas mA ma kI/_/nyon cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni/_/dang po rnam snang mdzad sbyor te/_/oM badzra a mr-i ta ma hA su kha/_/sa bon bzhi dang mnyam ldan la/_/swA hA yi ge yang sbyor ro/_/rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul 
[\[20a.3\]]te/_/yi ge gnyis dang bzhi pa ste/_/bzhi pa yis ni mnyam ldan pa/_/mA ma kI yi snying po'i mchog_/brgyad dag kho na'o dbus ma gang /_/brgyad la rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/'dab brgyad la ni sbyar byas te/_/lha mo sngags kyis sngags phyung ngo /_/sgo srungs dag gi 
[\[20a.4\]]sngags rnams ni/_/nyon cig skal bzang mA ma kI/_/de yi tha ma sngags phyung ste/_/sa bon brgyad ni sngags rig pas/_/stong pa'i lha yis gnon byas te/_/rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan la/_/swA hA yi ge mnyam par ldan/_/dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin rnams/_/bzhi 
[\[20a.5\]]ni sgo srungs kyi yin te/_/bzhi ni spos dang puSh+pe sogs/_/ma ning yi ges grwa bzhi la/_/swA hA rnam par snang mdzad yang /_/lha mo gsang ba'i mA ma kI/_/rnga sogs kun gyis mchod par bya/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[20a.6\]]pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las sngags phyung ba'i rim pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gsum pa'o//_//de nas sbyin sreg las dag gi_/cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/_/sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga 
[\[20a.7\]]yis/_/sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yin/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/_/de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang /_/'thab dang bskrad kyang de bzhin du/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa rnams/_/de kun bdag gis bshad par bya/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying byed pa/_/
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]dkur brten bcas pas gnyis gnas pa/_/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan byas te/_/slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya/_/khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas/_/rkang gnyis g.yas brkyang bya ba dang /_/g.yon brkyang bya ba yang byas te/_/rkang mnyam dang ni sa ga 
[\[20b.2\]]yis/_/sa ni sbyong bar byed ma thag_/sa la reg na 'jam skye'o/_/de nas bgegs rnams bskrad nas su/_/gzhan yang srul po la sogs pa/_/gong du bla ma phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyi nas sa yi lha mo dgug_/oM e h+ye hi lha mo che/_/sa yi brtan ma 'jig rten yum/_/rin 
[\[20b.3\]]chen thams cad rab rdzogs pa'o/_/lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan byed ma/_/ha ra nu pur sgra 'byin ma/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu mchod/_/yon 'di dag ni bzhes nas su/_/sbyin sreg las ni 'grub par mdzod/_/hi hi hi hA swA hA/_bshang gci khrag dang khu ba yis/_/dkyil 
[\[20b.4\]]'khor sa la gtor bar bya/_/byin brlab bya ba'i phyir spos ni/_/sha chen gyis ni dbul bar bya/_/de nas rig ma 'jug byas te/_/gdol pa mo dang sme sha ma/_/gar mkhan ma dang bram ze mo/_/de kho na bzhin rgyal mo dang /_/dmangs rigs mo dang rgyal rigs mo/_/dri dang 
[\[20b.5\]]spos kyis mchod byas te/_/lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/_/yan lag lnga la yi ge hri/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su yi ge bru~M/_/spyan ma sgrol ma gos dkar ma/_/yid dga' ma bdag bsgom par bya/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su slob dpon gyis/_/me tog gtor ba kho nar bya/_/de nas 
[\[20b.6\]]sngags pas hom khung ni/_/tshad mar kun tu bri bya ste/_/zhi la zlum por bya ba ste/_/khru gang tsam du thig gdab po/_/khru phyed sa la brkos nas su/_/dkar rtsi tshon gyis byug par bri/_/kun tu 'khor lo tshul ltar yang /_/glo ru mnyam por bri ba'o/_/rgyas pa la ni khru do ste/_/de la khru 
[\[20b.7\]]gang brko bar bya/_/gru bzhi pa ni mtha' mnyam du/_/mugs dang btsag gis bri ba'o/_/mngon spyod la ni zur gsum ste/_/sor nyi shu ni yangs pa'i tshad/_/nyi shu phyed ni brko byas na/_/dbus su rdo rje rgya gram yang /_/'bar ba phreng gis 'khrugs pa bri/_/de bzhin dbang dang 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]dgug pa la/_/zla gam yang dag bri ba'o/_/hom khung yang dag ston nas su/_/phyogs kyi cha yang bstan par bya/_/byang du mngon du kha bsgyur te/_/sngags pas zhi ba brtsam par bya/_/rgyas pa la ni shar du yang /_/mngon spyod la ni lho na ste/_/dbang ni nub tu 
[\[21a.2\]]kho na bshad/_/dgug dang bskrad kyang de bzhin no/_/mngon spyod rtag par nag po ste/_/tshon lnga yis ni dbang sogs bya/_/'bras dang til dang 'o ma dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig par/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/_/zhi ba rgyas pa sbyin sreg bya/_/bsreg shing rnams 
[\[21a.3\]]kyang thams cad la/_/dri zhim 'o ma can shing ngo /_/sna tshogs zas sam gtor ma yang /_/'byung po thams cad sbyin par bya/_/gtor ma gang yang sgrub pa pos/_/khrag 'thung phyag rgya chen pos sbyin/_/gang zhig yid kyi 'dod pa ni/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/_/dbyar gyi 
[\[21a.4\]]dus ni zhi ba ste/_/rgyas pa de bzhin dgun gyi dus/_/dpyid ka mngon spyod las rnams ni/_/sgrub pa pos ni thams cad bya/_/shar dus zhi ba rab tu gsungs/_/rgyas pa de bzhin srod la ste/_/nyin phyed la 'am nam phyed la/_/rtag par mngon spyod bya ba'o/_/hom khung 
[\[21a.5\]]dbus su yi dam lha/_/yi ge hU~M gis bskyed nas su/_/zhal ni gdangs pa bsam byas te/_/sbyin sreg de la dbul bar bya/_/sbyin sreg 'bum phrag phul gyur na/_/mdun du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur/_/dang po me ni dgug bya ba/_/lha thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas/_/
[\[21a.6\]]'od zer phreng 'khrugs drag po'i lha/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'o/_/oM e h+ye hi/_'dir gshegs gdon mi za bar khyod/_/me lha mngon sum dngos grub sbyin/_/drag po khams gsum gyis mchod pa/_/khyab 'jug tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba/_/'di dag yon 
[\[21a.7\]]yang bzhes nas su/_/zhabs g.yon brjes kyang rdo rje can/_/oM hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_dang po la ni yon dbul te/_/phyi nas lha bshos me tog dbul/_/oM lha yi me tog shin tu dmar/_/dri zhim shin tu mdzes pa ni/_/me tog de ring bzhes nas su/_/'di la byin gyis 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]brlab par gsol/_/hU~M me tog gi sngags so/_/oM mar me 'od zer 'bar ba ni/_/ngan 'gro 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa/_/lha yi mig byed bkra shis pas/_/mar me khyod kyis bzhes su gsol/_/hU~M mar me'i sngags so/_/oM tsan+dan ga pur dang bcas pa'i/_/dri zhim 
[\[21b.2\]]spos me dge ba ni/_/mthu dang bcas par bya ba 'di/_/bzhes nas byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/hU~M spos kyi sngags so/_/oM sna tshogs lha yi dri zhim pa/_/sna tshogs ga pur rnam brgyan pas/_/sna tshogs yi ge hU~M las byung /_/dri 'di 'bul te bzhes su gsol/_/hU~M dri'i 
[\[21b.3\]]sngags so/_/dang por mchod pa'i cho ga ni/_/the tshom med par me la bya/_/phyi nas rang gi yi dam lha'i/_/bzlas sngags rig par brjod par bya/_/dbyangs dang gar dang zas rnams kyi/_/rnam pa du mar rol byas te/_/rig ma dang ni sgrub pa pos/_/tshogs la mchod pas mnyes 
[\[21b.4\]]par bya/_/gal te dngos grub dag 'dod na/_/sku gsung thugs ni 'grub pa'o/_/bla ma me lha rdo rje 'dzin/_/mchod par byas nas rdzogs par bya/_/oM me lha las ni grub par mdzad/_/sems can thams cad bde ba 'dren/_/sku gsung thugs dngos grub don du/_/lha 
[\[21b.5\]]rnams las ni rjes su skyobs/_/me lha zhi bar gshegs nas su/_/sa gzhi zhi bar mdzad mdzod cig_/rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa yis/_/sgrub pa po dang thams cad dang /_/bdag gi bsod nams 'bras 'gyur dang /_/sngags kyi dngos grub rab sbyin cig_/a A i I u U/_
[\[21b.6\]]r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_e ai/_o au/_aM aH/_hU~M swA hA/_rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa zhes 
[\[21b.7\]]bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o//_//khyod la mig sman bshad par bya/_/tshil chen gyi ni snying po yi/_/ban da la ni dud pa blang /_/'ug pa'i mgo bo bsregs nas su/_/khrag chen dang ni bsres par bya/_/mtshan mo la ni btags nas su/_/zhib mor phye mar kho nar bya/_/bya rgod rje ngar 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bkang nas su/_/mi yi rus pa'i thur mang gis/_/mig la bskus nas gzugs kun ni/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis byed/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'i/_/mig sman dngos grub sbyor ba ni/_/nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgrub par bya/_/zhi 
[\[22a.2\]]ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin dbang 'gugs las byed do/_/sna tshogs drag po'i gdon rnams dang /_/zhag bzhi pa yi rims dang dug_/thams cad med par byed lha mo/_/dga' ma khyod la bden par bshad/_/rgyal po'i khab na chen por mchod/_/dgra bo rnams kyang zad 
[\[22a.3\]]byed de/_/de bzhin bgegs kyang 'gag par byed/_/mig sman ldan par bzla bar bya/_/oM 'dod pa'i gzugs can mig yangs ma/_/bshang gci khrag la dga' byed ma/_/zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i lha mo/_/drag po'i gzugs can mA ma kI/_/hrIM hrIM hU~M hU~M a aMH/_a hA hAM swA hA/_
[\[22a.4\]]dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/_/de kho na bzhin g.yas ni dkar/_/g.yon ni dmar por de rig nas/_/g.yas phyogs ral gri 'khor lo can/_/g.yon du zhags pa dang lcags kyu/_/de bzhin rdo rje dril bu yang /_/b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom byas te/_/de la mig sman bsgrub 
[\[22a.5\]]par bya/_/b+ha ga gur gum gyis bkang nas/_/phyi nas ling ga gzhug par bya/_/de la brjod par bya sngags ni/_/oM yig sgra yig phye ba dang /_/badzra a mr-i ta zhes bkod/_/sgra sgrogs sprin dang phaT yig go/_/bdud rtsi dang ni mnyam ldan pas/_/b+ha ga'i dbus nas dbyung bar bya/_/
[\[22a.6\]]de la sngags 'bum bzlas nas su/_/de yis thig le kho nar bya/_/bud med kyis khyo 'khol 'gyur te/_/mdun na 'don bcas rgyal po yang /_/skyes pa gang gis de byas na/_/bud med gang la skal can 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i khab can chen por tshed/_/dgra bo rnams ni zad byed do/_/
[\[22a.7\]]dur dur ar ka'i 'bras blangs te/_/bdud rtsi dang ni bsres byas na/_/zhal gsum drag po'i gzugs dang ni/_/gshin rje'i gshed khro bzlas nas su/_/sha chen dang ni ldan byas te/_/chang dang bsres la sbyin par bya/_/rtag tu myos nas 'khor nas su/_/mi ni bskams nas shi 
[\[22b\]]
