[\[22b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/oM hrIHSh+T+riHwi kr-i tA na na sarba sha trUM bi nA sha ya/_stam b+ha ya/_mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_sngags pas gi'u wang blangs nas/_/b+ha ga la ni yig 'bru bri/_/tsan+dan gyis ni mnyam byugs nas/_/khyod dang lhan cig gnas par bya/_/gnas ma dag ni bde chen te/_/'khor g.yog dngos 
[\[22b.2\]]por 'gyur bar ro/_/bshang gci gzugs brnyan byas nas su/_/sha chen gyi ni spos dbul te/_/dgra yi skra yis dkris byas nas/_/rus pa'i phye mas byug par bya/_/dgra sgor brkos nas sbas byas na/_/zhag bdun gyis ni shi 'gyur ro/_/bshang gci khrag dang bsres pa 
[\[22b.3\]]yi/_/sha chen gyis ni sbyin bsreg bya/_/dur khrod kyi ni bsreg shing yang /_/shing gcig pa dang lam mdo na/_/me yi hom khung bris nas su/_/nyin phyed nam phyed sbyin bsreg bya/_/khro chen gshin rje'i gshed po yi/_/sku la thal bas bskus pas ni/_/bsgoms nas 
[\[22b.4\]]dgra la cher gnon na/_/gdon mi za bar shi 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las las chen po bstan 
[\[22b.5\]]pa zhes bya ba le'u lnga pa'o//_//rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las/_/dpal ldan rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi/_/sgrub pa mdor bsdus bshad par bya/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa yang /_/de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal las byung yin/_/gwa bzhi 
[\[22b.6\]]par ni thig gdab ste/_/khru gang yang na khru do'o/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba/_/'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa la/_/dpal ldan rdo rje hU~M mdzad bzhag_/zhal gsum de bzhin phyag drug ste/_/rgyan thams cad kyis yongs rdzogs pa/_/phyag rgya yis ni phyag brgyan pa/_/rig ma 
[\[22b.7\]]bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa/_/u ma'i sra ba'i nu mar bzhugs/_/cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po/_/khro dang ldan par bzhad byed zhal/_/g.yas pa la ni mda' bris te/_/de kho na bzhin g.yon na gzhu/_/phyag bzhi pa ni bris pa la/_/phyag gnyis pas ni nu ma bsnams/_/rig ma thams 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]cad zhal gsum ste/_/de bzhin sgo srungs lcags kyu dang /_/de bzhin me tog spos me ma/_/dri yang yang dag bri bar bya/_/sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin dbyangs/_/gar mkhan ma yang phyag drug nyid/_/de bzhin gling bu ma bri ste/_/pi wang ma dang rnga chen ma/_/rdza rnga ma 
[\[23a.2\]]dang sil snyan kun/_/dkyil 'khor la ni bri ba'o/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las/_/skal ba bzang po yang bzhag ste/_/phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/_/bzang po de dag kho na'o/_/rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_/sgrub pa po yang mdun bri'o/_/bgrang phreng de bzhin rdo rje dang /_/
[\[23a.3\]]dril bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya/_/gtor ma'i gtor ma mchod rdzas dang /_/chang skyems ro dang dga' ston mchod/_/nag po'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la/_/dkyil 'khor la ni rdul tshon gdab/_/dbus su gru bzhi bri ba'o/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/sngags yig gcig pa 
[\[23a.4\]]gtso bo ni/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgrub par bya/_/phyi nas slob dpon la mchod pa/_/bdag gam rgyal srid dbang nyid dam/_/bran mo bu mo de bzhin du/_/ma dang sring mo dbul bar bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub pa yi/_/dngos grub gal te bdag 'dod na/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal las 
[\[23a.5\]]byung ni/_/sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ngo /_/bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pa/_/ngan song thams cad med byed pa/_/rdo rje se gol mnyam sbyor gyis/_/dpal ldan rdo rje hU~M mdzad 'grub/_/rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i/_
[\[23a.6\]]byang sems rnam par sprul par gsungs/_/lan grangs du mar rig ma dang /_/dkyil 'khor du ni rol bar bya/_/b+ha ga'i dbus la myang byas pa/_/gang dag dpa' bo sngags la gnas/_/pad+mar kha yis 'o byas nas/_/bdud rtsi khu ba kho nar blang /_/lag pa yi ni sor mo la/_/gnas de la ni 
[\[23a.7\]]blang mi bya/_/blang bar gyur na 'jig 'gyur nas/_/mthu yang 'jig nas 'bras bu med/_/rig ma chen mos kyang phyung nas/_/rdo rje la yang 'o gdab bo/_/de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/_/khu ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi ni/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi bsgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas lha mo mA ma kI/_/dga' ba'i rol bar cher bzhugs pas/_/thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[23b.2\]]phyag byas nas/_/dbyangs 'di dag ni ched du brjod/_/dpa' bo chu skyes sngon po'i sku/_/dpa' bo gzhan gyis yongs bskor zhing /_/phyag rgya mo tshogs mnyam ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ston gyi nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_/nga ro bung ba sgra sgrogs ltar/_/bskal par bzhugs 
[\[23b.3\]]pa skal bzang ba/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/_/thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad mdzes/_/yang dag dbang po lam gyis ni/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ma lus pa yi khams gsum la/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi dpe med pas/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi rigs chen mo/_/shin tu chags pas 
[\[23b.4\]]dga' byed pa/_/sen mo rjes dang bcas pa'i sku/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bur phyag sngo ba/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje khyod kyis bdag dang ni/_/shin tu dga' ba'i rjes su chags pas longs spyod cig_/khams gsum la ni bsgrub 
[\[23b.5\]]par bya ba'i don gyi phyir/_/khyod ni skyon med dam pa'i stong pa las/_/yig 'brus rdo rjes gyur pa'i mgon po khyod/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu gang gis khyod mthong nas/_/de dag 'khor ba ru ni ga la 'gro/_/de ltar dbyangs ni blangs nas su/_/rdo rje gar ni rnam par byed/_/rked pa dang ni rkang pa dang /_/dpung pa dang 
[\[23b.6\]]ni mgo bo'i gar/_/gar gyi gzhung gi mtshan nyid do/_/rjes thabs rjes su rim pa dang /_/bstod pa dang ni 'gying bag ste/_/rgyas dang 'dud dang gsal po ru/_/rgyas pa dang ni smin bskyod gar/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/_/stabs brgyad kyis ni gar byed bya/_/rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI/_/
[\[23b.7\]]gar byas nas ni lha mo des/_/rdo rje cing gis rdo rje ni/_/rdo rje be con 'o btab byed/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes kyang /_/'o btab mA ma kI pad+mar/_/ston cig lha mo pad+ma ni/_/de la mchod pa brtsam par bya/_/bzhugs shig mi g.yo bar rig mo/_/bdud rtsi bsam gtan brtsam par bgyi/_/de bzhin 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]nyid mchog brtsam pa ni/_/bdud rtsi thig le'i gzugs can te/_/mkha' yi dbus su zla ba 'dra/_/stong pa de nyid ched du brjod/_/'jigs med zad med phra mo ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'joms byed pa/_/lte ba'i dbus su gnas lha mo/_/snying po gsang ba'i 
[\[24a.2\]]spyod yul la/_/khu ba'i gzugs kyis zag nas su/_/b+ha ga ling ga'i dkyil du gnas/_/'di ni srog chags rnams kyi srog_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po rten/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang 
[\[24a.3\]]nam mkha' kho na yang /_/g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs pa'i/_/khams gsum la ni ma lus par/_/de ni bdag gis rtag tu bsam/_/de las bskyed de bdag dang khyod/_/tshangs pa lha dbang khyab 'jug sogs/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/shes bya shes pa'i bdag 
[\[24a.4\]]nyid gtso/_/de nyid dam pa de bsam mo/_/skye ba dang ni shi ba dang /_/thams cad de la 'dus pa yin/_/skyed pa byed pa po de gcig_/rang bdag gyur pa lhan cig pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa kun nas kun/_/zhi nas zhi ba khyab pa po/_/ci phyir khang pa de bkang bas/_/de bas skyes 
[\[24a.5\]]bur bshad pa yin/_/lus la gnas phyir lus can te/_/shed byed phyir na shes par 'dod/_/bdag la bdag gis rig pa'i lha/_/de phyir lha zhes 'dod pa yin/_/'jug las khyab 'jug ces gsungs te/_/ngag gis rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur/_/ston du med pa gsang ba 
[\[24a.6\]]'di/_/nan tan du ni gsang bar bya/_/skyon can min dang g.yo can min/_/dam tshig la ni mi sdang ba/_/chad par lta ba med pa la/_/bla ma la chags 'dul ba can/_/phrag dog chags pa spong byed pa/_/dkyil 'khor la ni zhugs pa dang /_/rdo rje bstan pa'i slob ma dag_/de la 
[\[24a.7\]]rgyas pa'i bstan pa 'di/_/de bzhin nyid mchog bshad par bya/_/slob dpon rig ma dang ldan nas/_/de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las dbyangs dang gar dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_de bzhin nyid cher dmigs pa dag bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pa'o//_//de nas lha mo yang langs nas/_/bzhad nas 'di dag zhu ba ste/_/bcom ldan 'di la the tshom 
[\[24b.2\]]zos/_/dam pa'i ngo mtshar bdag bskyed de/_/zhi gzugs rdo rje can de las/_/khro bo'i gzugs ni ci ltar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te/_/khro bo'i gzugs ni rnam par phyung /_/'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag 
[\[24b.3\]]po can/_/'jigs byed la yang 'jigs par byed/_/zhal bzhi la ni phyag brgyad de/_/thod pa'i dbu rgyan 'jigs par brgyan/_/kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bsnams te/_/thod pa dang ni khrag dga' ba/_/gtum po rgyu ma'i phreng 'khrugs pa/_/rig ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/_/dur 
[\[24b.4\]]khrod chen po bzhir bzhugs pa/_/phaT yig sngags kyi nga ro can/_/'byung po ro langs tshogs pa dang /_/dur khrod la ni rol mdzad pas/_/de 'og dbang dang bcas pa'i lha/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/bza' byed rdo rje can chen po/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung gzugs 
[\[24b.5\]]ni phyung /_/dang po'i rig ma 'jigs can ma/_/mi sdug gdol pa sme sha can/_/ser mo rigs can drag mo dang /_/'jigs par byed ma brgyad du 'dod/_/sngags 'di dag ni bzla byas te/_/gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo /_/'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs/_/rgyu ma phreng gi 
[\[24b.6\]]rgyan skud brgyan/_/sha chen dag ni gsol byed pa/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung bdag phyag 'tshal/_/sgrub pa po rnams phan byed phyir/_/bzlas pa'i sngags ni bshad par bya/_/gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/_/bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa sbyor/_/bdun pa yi yang gsum pa ste/_/gnyis kyi 
[\[24b.7\]]tshig ni gnyis su sbyor/_/kun la de bzhin nyid ldan te/_/yi ge phyed kyis rnam par brgyan/_/drug pa'i bzhi pa phyung byas te/_/bdun pa'i dngos pos gdan du bya/_/bcu gsum pa yis steng gnon pa'i/_/swA hA mthar bzhag sngags ni phyung /_/dang po rnam par snang mdzad da dbul/_/khrag 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]'thung rtsa ba'i sngags yin no/_/sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi/_/mthu chen nyon cig mA ma kI/_/lan cig tsam gyis sngags bzlas na/_/skad cig 'jig rten gsum 'jig go/_/khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang /_/zos par byed par the tshom med/_/de yis 
[\[25a.2\]]'dod pa thams cad sbyin/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las dpal ldan khrag 'thung bskyed 
[\[25a.3\]]pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis/_/gzugs ni yang dag bshad par bya/_/zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste/_/drag po nag po dud pa'i 'od/_/'od zer phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang /_/gtum mos spyan ni dmar po can/_/dmar 
[\[25a.4\]]ba'i smin ma ag tshom 'bar/_/drag chen po ni zil gyis gnon/_/phyag na dgra sta bsnams brtson pa/_/gtun shing rdo rje zhags pa dang /_/g.yon gyi phyag gi sdigs mdzub kyis/_/sdang ba thams cad sdigs par byed/_/ral gri phyag mtshan bsgom par bya/_/rig ma brgyad dang 
[\[25a.5\]]mnyam ldan zhing /_/sgo srungs dang yang yang dag ldan/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma bsgom byas te/_/'dab mar rig ma brgyad ni bkod/_/bdud rtsi ma dang bdud rtsi zhal/_/bdud rtsi can dang bdud rtsi spyan/_/grangs med ma dang gzugs bzang ma/_/mdzes pa'i gzugs can bde grub ma/_/
[\[25a.6\]]thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste/_/phyogs dang mtshams la dgod par bya/_/phyag gis pad+ma bsnams par brtson/_/de dag lha mo gar byed nas/_/sna tshogs gzugs rnams mchog sbyin ma/_/bzhad cing rol par mdzad byed do/_/sngags kyi rgyal po dbyung bar bya/_/rnam 
[\[25a.7\]]par snang mdzad yang 'bul nas/_/tshig 'di yis ni yongs su dgod/_/dang po yi ni gnyis pa ste/_/stong pa nyid ni gdan ldan pa/_/stong pas steng nas gnon pa'i sngags/_/mtha' nas swA hA sbyor byed do/_/gtan du shin tu dga' 'byor nas/_/bdud rtsi bdud rtsi phyung nas su/_/bdud 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]rtsi bdud rtsi sbyor ba yis/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgrub par bya/_/don kun dngos grub thams cad yang /_/de yis myur bar bsgrub par 'gyur/_/pho'am gal te mo dag gis/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dran byed na/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/_/de yi phyag mthil la kun 
[\[25b.2\]]gnas/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/dus rtag par ni bsgom par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/_dpal bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba le'u dgu 
[\[25b.3\]]pa'o//_//de nas ro langs chen po yi/_/sgrub pa gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/_/ling ga gcig dang lam mdo dang /_/shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang /_/ri dang chu 'gram de rnams la/_/las thams cad ni bsgrub bya 
[\[25b.4\]]ste/_/de bzhin ro langs slong ba ni/_/'gags nas shi ba mo rnams ni/_/mtshan thams cad ni kun rdzogs pa/_/gdol pa mo dang sme sha can/_/khyim tshos ma rnams de dag na/_/mdzes pa bzang ba rma med pa/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags pa ste/_/lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed/_/
[\[25b.5\]]bud med ro yi skra bzung ste/_/gtsang ba'i chu yis bkru bar bya/_/sngags dang sman gyi rdo leb la/_/ga bur tsan+dan dkar po yis/_/de la byug par byas te/_/sna tshogs me tog spos rnams kyis/_/mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar bya/_/mar khu chen pos bskus nas su/_/
[\[25b.6\]]yungs kar ngo la brdeg par bya/_/khrag 'thung zhes bya sgrub pa pos/_/de la dkyil 'khor yang bri ste/_/thod pa zhes bya zla gam mam/_/gzhu yi tshul gyis bkang bar bya/_/thod pas nye bar brgyan byed cing /_/rig ma brgyad dang ldan par bya/_/sha yi khams can 
[\[25b.7\]]thod pa dbang /_/kha T+wAM thams cad kyis 'dzin te/_/zhal gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs/_/phyag drug ral gri phyag na 'dzin/_/dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol du/_/sgo srungs ma ni rab tu brtags/_/glang rna dang ni glang chen rna/_/zhal mdzes de bzhin zhal gdug ma/_/drag mo zhags 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]pa lcags kyu 'dzin/_/mi sdug 'jigs pas 'jigs byed rnams/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/_/me tog mchod pa yang dag bri/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rig ma yang /_/dkyil 'khor la ni mchod pa bri/_/de nas dpa' bo sgrub pa pos/_/dung chen gyis ni 
[\[26a.2\]]brgyan byas pa/_/thod pa'i phreng bas thod bcings pa'i/_/khrag 'thung gzugs ni sgom byed pas/_/de la cang te'u brdungs nas su/_/gar byed cing ni khang par 'jug_/de yi snying gar gnod pa'i sngags/_/b+h+yo yig de la bzla bya ste/_/lha yi dkyil 'khor mchod nas su/_/khrag 
[\[26a.3\]]chen gyis ni gtor bar bya/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags chen ni/_/sgrub pa pos ni bzlas ma thag_/khro dang ldan pa'i ag btsar bya/_/ro langs kyis ni gang sgrogs byed/_/de tshe sngags pas mi 'jigs te/_/khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya/_/langs pa'i ro langs de yis kyang /_/sgrub 
[\[26a.4\]]pa po la 'di skad smra/_/dpa' chen po kye las gang yang /_/bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can/_/ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang /_/mkha' la rgyu bar 'dod pa dang /_/sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod pa/_/las de dag ni bsgrub par bgyi/_/de nas sgrub pa po yis ni/_/yid la gang dang gang 'dod 
[\[26a.5\]]bslang /_/de ltar thams cad bsgrub bya ba/_/rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI/_/ro langs bsgrub pa'i mchog gyur pa/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung yin/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du/_/sgrub pa po yi bde yang 'dren/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/
[\[26a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las ro langs bsgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te/_/
[\[26a.7\]]cang mi gsung bar cher bzhugs so/_/dbugs dgag phyir nas mi g.yo nas/_/mi 'jigs pa dang mi gsung bar/_/ting 'dzin mchog la zhugs pa la/_/mA ma kIs ni yang zhus te/_/bcom ldan rdo rje phra mo ni/_/sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/_/ci ltar rnam pa gang gis ni/_/de bzhin 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]nyid de thob par bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/_/bzhad pa mdzad nas gsung 'di ni/_/spyan yang phye nas bka' stsal pa/_/de nyid sngon bzhin bshad pa ste/_/bdud rtsi gzugs ni khu ba yin/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan byas te/_/rtag par rgyun du 
[\[26b.2\]]myang bar bya/_/rdzas ni re re'i mthu dag ni/_/bshad pa nyon cig mA ma kI/_/ye shes shes bya sgrub byed pa'i/_/khu ba dngas par bza' bar bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du/_/khrag chen rab tu bsgrub bya ste/_/gang zhig bud med rnams kyi 'am/_/bu mo yi ni rtag tu 
[\[26b.3\]]blang /_/khrag chen des ni mA ma kI/_/don ni thams cad byed pa po/_/drag shul shi ba rnyed na ni/_/sha chen po yang bza' bya ste/_/gsal shing btsugs dang 'gags pa 'am/_/g.yul du bsad pa gang de ni/_/zab cing bstan pas za byed na/_/tshe dang nad med 'phel bar 
[\[26b.4\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin 'dod pa'i bde ba dang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'tsho/_/'dod kun 'bras bu des sbyin no/_/rdo rje chu dang bshang gci ni/_/rang gis bza' bar rig par bya/_/phye ma zhib mor byas pa la/_/khrag chen gyis ni bsre 
[\[26b.5\]]bar bya/_/snga dro de bzhin nyin phyed dang /_/phyi dro la ni bza' bar bya/_/dus gsum zos nas rnal 'byor pas/_/de nas rdo rje chu ni btung /_/nyin dang nyin du mA ma kI/_/sgrub pa po gang sgrub byed pa/_/lus la nad ni med 'gyur zhing /_/rgas pa'i nad kyang med par byed/_/skal bzang 
[\[26b.6\]]rgyas pa'i mdangs ldan pa/_/rgyal po'i sgor yang rgyal bar 'dren/_/de ni 'dod pa kun sbyin pas/_/mchog rab de nyid thob pa yin/_/rnal 'byor de yang kun shes te/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/_/'dod chags zhe sdang las grol nas/_/brkam pa phrag dog 
[\[26b.7\]]rnam spangs nas/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/de yis sgrub pa 'grub pa'o/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud 'di ni/_/don mang gsang ba'i rim pa can/_/ma lus rdo rje theg pa 'di/_/'di las byung gyur lha mo kye/_/rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kIs/_/'dod chags kyis ni bde 'gyur bas/_/
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]khyod la dam pa'i dngos ston na/_/bdag gis gang la yang mi ston/_/'di ni gsang chen dam pa yin/_/yid dag kun gyi bdag la gnas/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma shes te/_/gzugs med stong pa mi 'gyur bas/_/de na de nyid rig chen po/_/rdo rje spyi gtsug nor 
[\[27a.2\]]bur 'dod/_/shin tu gsang nas gzungs lha mo/_/pha dang bu la'ang bstan mi bya/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/gdan du gsang ba bstan pa dang /_/bla ma la chags brtul zhugs brtan/_/de la sbyin nas de nyid bstan/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni/_/bde 'grub shin 
[\[27a.3\]]tu thob dka' ba/_/yang dag rdzogs pas skal bzang zhi/_/snying po ye shes 'dus pa yin/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las/_/sgrub pa po gang dbang bskur ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/_/de la kun gyis phyag byed de/_/phyag ni lan gsum byas nas su/_/
[\[27a.4\]]rdo rje slob dpon skal bzang mchog_/de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/_/'khor ba las 'dren gtso zhes gsungs/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po/_/ston pas dga' ma la bstan nas/_/phra mo'i gzugs su 
[\[27a.5\]]rdo rje can/_/de nas b+ha gar cher bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las bdud rtsi lnga sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rdo rje bdud 
[\[27a.6\]]rtsi'i rgyud lo tsA ba gyi co zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D436}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ku la lo ka nA tha pany+tsa da sha ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba/_
[\[27a.7\]]dpal ldan rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'di ni mchog tu gsang /_/'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa'i mchog_/rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas/_/gnyis med sngags ni rab bshad bya/_/dam tshig spyod pa nges par grol/_/bya ba dus tshod 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]rnam par spangs/_/de nyid gsum ldan yang dag lha/_/'jig rten mgon po 'gro ba'i bdag_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa'i lha/_/mthong dang ma mthong 'bras rab ster/_/de 'dir sngags ni mtshungs med pa/_/bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas/_/drag chen 'jigs byed lus la ni/_/lnga pa'i 
[\[27b.2\]]thig le dang bcas shing /_/rnam gcod dang po yang dag ldan/_/chen po lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan/_/lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas/_/lus gsum gyis ni sngags mchog la/_/yi ge rnams kyi bsdu ba las/_/mtshan nyid cho ga bzhin du bzlas/_/'di yi rjes dran sngags pa 
[\[27b.3\]]yis/_/gtsang ngam yang na mi gtsang rung /_/lha bzhin mthong ba lha rnams kyis/_/de yi lha mo 'dod lha bzhin/_/'di bzhin sngags kyi 'dod lha yi/_/bya ba med cing sgrub pa'ang med/_/mchod med me la sbyin sreg med/_/rnal 'byor ldan dang yang dag ldan/_/dus tshod rnams las 
[\[27b.4\]]rnam nges grol/_/rtse gcig sems ni g.yo mi byed/_/sgrib pa dang bral mtshungs pa yi/_/mchog gi bsam gtan yang dag sbyar/_/rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//snying ga'i 'khor lo'i 
[\[27b.5\]]nang song ba'i/_/de nyid gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro/_/dbye ba nyis 'gyur de las ni/_/ye shes nyid ni kun 'gro bya/_/mi 'gyur dga' ba'i yul rig pa/_/sems kyi rjes su rtogs pa can/_/bya ba de yi bde 'dod phyir/_/rtogs pa kun nas 'jug par 'gyur/_/de yi 
[\[27b.6\]]ngo bo rtogs nyid 'jug_/de sems dga' ba'i spyod yul la/_/bya ba dang ni las rnams kun/_/tshig dang bcas pas the tshom med/_/bsam gtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan/_/brtan par dgod bya blo ldan gyis/_/'gro kun dgra yi rang bzhin gyi/_/sa steng sa 'og 
[\[27b.7\]]mtho ris sgrub/_/lte ba'i pad+mar pad+ma che/_/rnam gsum nam mkha'i nang song ba/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan/_/nam mkha' phyag rgya'i bdag nyid bzhin/_/srog 'bab pa yi tshad kyis ni/_/gnas gnyis po yis goms par bya/_/de bzhin rab tu dgod byas nas/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'jig rten mgon po'i sku ru 'gyur/_/gang gis gzhan du bzlas byas dang /_/las rnams kyang ni bsgrub byas na/_/de ni mkha' la khu tshur bsnun/_/rmongs pas spun stong 'joms par byed/_/bsam gtan sbyor bas cho ga bzhin/_/las gang rtag tu bya ba ste/_/
[\[28a.2\]]de las myur du sgrub byed do/_/de yi las ni yid kyir 'dod/_/rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las bdag gi de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//rang bzhin bsam gtan dang bcas shing /_/dzA ti mtshal gyi 'od zer bzhin/_/se 'bru le brgan me tog bzhin/_/
[\[28a.3\]]li khri dmar po dang mtshungs gtso/_/sngags kyi sku yi lha yi lha/_/zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/_/mkha' pad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/_/khyab bdag zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams/_/mchog sbyin phyag gis yang dag rol/_/mu tig nor bus rnam par brgyan/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[28a.4\]]phyag dang spyan gsum po/_/gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs sku/_/dpa' bo dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon/_/rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dgyes pa/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/_/sngags rnams kun la bsam gtan bya/_/gang dang gang gis bsgom pa yis/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[28a.5\]]goms par gyur pa'i phyir/_/de ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/_/yid bzhin nor mchog ji bzhin no/_/lha ni dkar pos zhi rab ster/_/de bzhin ngag ni rab sad byed/_/dbang dang dgug pa'i de nyid la/_/sku mdog dmar po rnam par bsam/_/du ba dmar po'i 'od mdog can/_/rlung 
[\[28a.6\]]gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pas/_/dgra bo rnams ni nyer skrod pa/_/'dir ni the tshom med par byed/_/du ba skya bo dmar ba yis/_/rnam par zhe sdang nges sbyor ba/_/gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag_/rengs pa la ni ser por shis/_/lug gi steng du gnas pa la/_/rkan gyi bar du rnam phug 
[\[28a.7\]]na/_/srid pa gsum du gang gang gnas/_/thams cad rab tu rmongs par byed/_/gzhan dag rmongs pas ci zhig bya/_/don mang tshig ni rab 'dus pa/_/'jig rten gsum gyi las rnams ni/_/yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yi/_/rgyud gzhan rnams la nyer gyur pa/_/gsungs dang ma gsungs 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]gyur pa ni/_/rang bzhin bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/_/bya ba 'di la the tshom med/_/gang zhig lha ni nam mkha' mtshungs/_/kha dog dbye bas so so ste/_/'jig rten gsum na gang spyod pa'i/_/las rnams thams cad bya ba'o/_/skal bzang byed pa'i sngags rnams ni/_/snying ga'i 
[\[28b.2\]]chu skyes dbus song ba/_/snying ga'i chu skyes sbyor ba yis/_/dbang la sogs pa yang dag bsgrub/_/yi ge gsum dang bcas pa'i lha/_/steng du 'gro ba gsum ldan pas/_/mi rnams las ni rtag bsgrubs pa/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams zhal la gnas/_/rnam pa gsum ni 'gugs par 
[\[28b.3\]]byed/_/pad+ma gzugs ldan gyur pas mdzes/_/rtag sbyor rgyun du rnal 'byor pas/_/mar me g.yo med gnas pa bzhin/_/sngon gsungs lha yi lha dbang phyug_/skya rengs dmar po dang mtshungs 'od/_/mtshan mo phyed kyi dus gnas la/_/rnal 'byor nyid ni yang dag spyod/_/
[\[28b.4\]]de yi gzugs 'dzin lus la ni/_/yang dag sngon du bkod pa yis/_/zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lha/_/bsgrub bya'i lus la yang dag blang /_/thams cad bla ma'i zhal la gnas/_/zhags pa lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis/_/de las lcags kyu bsnun nas ni/_/zhags pa yis 
[\[28b.5\]]ni 'gugs par byed/_/rnam par myos shing lus ni dmar/_/yang dang yang du brgyal gyur te/_/bu ga sgo dgu nas bsnun nas/_/khrag ni rab tu 'bab par byed/_/sgrib pa med par dang mtshungs par/_/rang lus rnam par blta bar bya/_/de yi dbugs las bzhengs pa'i sngags/_/
[\[28b.6\]]yi ge'i dbang po dang por bsam/_/'bar zhing 'bar ba lta bu yis/_/kha yi sgo ru sngon 'dod rol/_/pad+ma'i gzugs 'dzin de yang ni/_/kha yi nang nas nges par 'byung /_/bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim gyur te/_/ji srid de snying chu skyes la/_/gang zhig de yi snying gnas pa/_/'dir ni de'i snying 
[\[28b.7\]]kun nas phrogs/_/mer mer por ni blangs pa yis/_/sgrol ma'i gzugs bzhin yid 'phrog pa/_/de ni gsum pas cho ga bzhin/_/rlung gis lo ma g.yo ba ltar/_/rang gi khyim du rim par bsgom/_/gcig gi ngo bor gyur pa mchog_/lha dang lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs/_/mtshan mo 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]mdun du bsgrub par bya/_/bran gyi ngo bos 'jug 'gyur zhing /_/'tsho ba dang ni nor gyis kyang /_/sa stengs 'jig rten slar ci smos/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/sngags kyi dbang po sgrub pa pos/_/rang dbang med rnams sbyar mi bya/_/sngags 
[\[29a.2\]]kyi rgyal dbang bzlas byas pas/_/rgyal srid sgrub pa de mchog go/_/gzhan du gang gis rab bsgrubs na/_/bud med 'dod pas long bzhin myos/_/gal te lha yi bu mo yang /_/de yi skad cig nyid la mchi/_/rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa las lha'i de kho na nyid 
[\[29a.3\]]kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//'jig rten dbang phyug snying po mchog_/sba zhing srog bzhin yang dag bsrung /_/dam tshig spyod pa dman pas kyang /_/'dren pa'i bdag nyid sngags bzlas bya/_/gcig pu grogs dang bral byas te/_/blo dang ldan pas 'bum du bzlas/_/de yi 
[\[29a.4\]]mngon sum 'ong 'gyur te/_/'khor lo gsum du legs 'gro mchog_/'jig rten thams cad 'byin pa dang /_/sdud pa dang ni yang dang yang /_/nam mkha'i go 'phang bder 'gro ste/_/dran pas 'di la the tshom med/_/sems dang sems med sbyor ba ni/_/sems ni sems med la des 
[\[29a.5\]]mthong /_/sems ni sems ma la thim nas/_/rab 'jug lus skyes ma rnams la/_/nad bcas nad med pa dang ni/_/nad med de bzhin nad bcas byed/_/zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog_/sngags kyi rgyal po'i dbang pos so/_/gzhan du byis pa rmongs pa yis/_/zla ba 
[\[29a.6\]]'dzin par 'dod pa bzhin/_/gang zhig rang bzhin sbyor bral bas/_/las rnams bsgrub pa de mchog min/_/gang gis gsum gsum gnas skabs gsum/_/'jig rten mgon po nyid rig nas/_/chu 'dzin bral ba'i nam mkha' bzhin/_/'jig rten mgon po'i go 'phang 'gro/_/
[\[29a.7\]]zhes pa ni dpal pad+ma 'bar ba'i rgyud chen po las phyung ba rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/_byang chub rin chen gyis bskul nas/_shud ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]chen por bsgyur ba'o//[ {D437}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tA re ku ru kul+le kalpa/_bod skad du/_'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru ku l+le'i rtog pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 
[\[29b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi ni/_/gzhung dang rtog pa nyams shing nub par gyur nas yang /_/sgrol ma 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin zhes bya rgyud kyi gtso/_/de yang nub par gyur nas rtog pa 'di yang 'byung /_/sems can mang po'i don du rnal 'byor pa/_/rgyas par 
[\[29b.3\]]bstan pa'i rgyud las bsdus byas nas/_/rtog pa 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyan par gyis/_/'jig rten skyabs med gyur la rnam bltas nas/_/'gro kun don byed pa yi tshul 'di ni/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal gyur 
[\[29b.4\]]bltas nas/_/gus pa chen pos khyod kyis blang bar byos/_/'jig rten rnam rtog zhi bar bya phyir rtog pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni rab tu gsungs/_/dpal ldan gru 'dzin ri la 'jam dpal dang /_/pad+ma bsnams dang rgyal bar byed pa dang /_/sgrib pa rnam sel blo gros rgya mtsho 
[\[29b.5\]]dang /_/byams pa la sogs tshogs rnams thams cad kyis/_/gang yang chos kyi tshig 'di thos gyur nas/_/rjes su yi rang spyi bos gus phyag byas/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis mnga' byas bstod pa 'am/_/yang na glu dang dbyangs dag byas pa yis/_/sna tshogs gar gyis 'di ni mchod 
[\[29b.6\]]pa byas/_/gnod sbyin srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten dang /_/sna tshogs bu mo dang ni rgyu skar dang /_/sa yi dbang dang lag na rdo rje dang /_/rlabs rnams sna tshogs can gang gnas pa yi/_/klu yi bu mo zur gyis blta bas lta ba dang /_/sa 'og skyong dang lha dbang grub pa'i bu mos mchod/_/dri za'i rgyal 
[\[29b.7\]]mo nu ma shin tu rgyas pa dang /_/rig pa 'dzin dang mi 'am ci yi chung ma dang /_/gnod sbyin chung ma ri yi bu mo'i bu dag ni/_/gang yin bdag dang skyabs med ces ni 'di skad smra/_/gang phyir skyabs med skyabs gyur sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dir/_/mgon med mgon gyur 'jig rten mgon po khyod/_/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]bde ba bskyed cing ngo mtshar che gyur gang /_/mgon po tshogs kyi tshig dbang 'di thos nas/_/nyid kyi dbang du byed pa'i gsang sngags gsungs/_/sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kun thos pas/_/mthar thug sangs rgyas bde ba du ma 'byung /_/rdo rje reg pas khams kyang 
[\[30a.2\]]'dzag par 'gyur/_/zur gyis lta bar byed pas lta byed cing /_/rkang pa dag kyang sa la gya tshom 'dor/_/'dod chags shin tu bde bas khu 'bab tshe/_/'di ltar mthong nas lha yi bu mo la/_/'gro ba dbang byed ku ru kul+le'i sngags/_/ras ris bri dang gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/dus la bab 
[\[30a.3\]]pa'i tshig 'di mgon smros zhes/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs/_/de tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug las rnams rab tu gsungs/_/ku ru kul+le'i ri mo'i lugs/_/gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni/_/sgrub pa po yis 'bras thob pa/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/ri 
[\[30a.4\]]mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis/_/tshes grangs gang dang dus gang la/_/sgrol ma 'byung las bshad pa bzhin/_/de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/_/ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis/_/gang gi mig ni dmar 'gyur zhing /_/lag pa de bzhin rkang pa dmar/_/bya yi mig can e n+ya'i rkang /_/
[\[30a.5\]]des ni sgrol ma bri bar bya/_/dpyid kyi zla ba dang po yi/_/mya ngan med pa'i tshes brgyad nyin/_/thun ni phyed dang gnyis pa la/_/sgrol ma'i mig ni bri bar bya/_/mngar gsum bza' zhing nya la sogs/_/sha dang chang yang spang bar bya/_/dmar po'i gos kyang rtag tu bgo/_/dmar po'i dri yis rtag tu 
[\[30a.6\]]byug_/byams pa'i sems ni bskyed byas la/_/tho rangs khrus byas bsangs nas su/_/lan gsum gos ni brjes nas su/_/dbang du byed ma yang dag bri/_/zhal gcig mig ni yangs pa dang /_/phyag bzhi ma la gur gum mdog_/bcu drug lo lon sgeg bcas 'dra/_/bud 
[\[30a.7\]]med sgyu mas rgyags pa bri/_/gzhon nu ma dmar ser mos byas pa'i skud pa las ras byas la/_de dang thags mkhan gnyis ka zan dang 'o ma bza' bar bya zhing /_de nas pad+ma'i gdan la stod g.yogs dmar po'i gos dang bcas pas rin po che'i rna cha dang /_rin po che'i cod pan dang /_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_gnyis pas mda' sna rtser 'gengs pa/_g.yon pas gzhu 'dzin pa dang /_ut+pal dmar po gnyis pa na bsnams pa dang /_'od dpag med cod pan na bzhugs pa ri'i phug na gnas pa'i ku ru kul+le'o/_/ku ru kul+le'i 'og tu ni sgra gcan 'dzin 
[\[30b.2\]]no/_/de'i steng du 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa'o/_/'dod pa'i lha'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de la pad+ma dmar po'i gdan no/_/de la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can gyi bcom ldan 'das ma bris la/_ras ris rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/de'i mdun 
[\[30b.3\]]du mchod pa rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad byas la/_yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/sgrol ma'i snying po ni 'di yin te/_oM ku ru ku l+le hrIHhU~M swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags so/_/de nas sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum tsam byas la/_yang ston zla tha [{]chungs sam[,]chung ngam[}]/_dpyid zla 'bring 
[\[30b.4\]]po'am/_dbyar zla 'bring po'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i dus tshigs kyi nyin par tho rangs kyi khrus byas la gso sbyong bzung nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol/_/de nas theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags pa'i tshogs la mchod 
[\[30b.5\]]ston byas nas yon phul la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang bar bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang na bzhugs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la dga' ba'i tshogs rnams la phyag byas nas 
[\[30b.6\]]bzod par gsol te/_gang na bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris bkram pa'i phyogs der nye bar song la/_dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i don du rig pa 'dzin pas bsam gtan dang ldan par gnas la yi ge grangs kyi 'bum bzlas pa bya'o/_/cha gcig gis ni shes rab 'phel/_/cha gnyis 
[\[30b.7\]]kyis ni dbang du byed/_/gang zhig cha ni gsum pa yis/_/mis ni dug kyang 'gugs par 'gyur/_/myos shing 'gying ba'i bud med rnams dang ni/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/_/sbyor ba goms pas lha mo mdzes rnams la/_/sngags 'chang des ni ci 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]ltar 'dod par spyod/_/de yi ming tsam gyis ni mtshungs med dug can 'bros pa dang /_/gdengs ka'i gtso bo'i 'od kyis dpal ldan dag kyang nya bzhin 'gyur/_/bzlas brjod ldan pa yi ni ngag gi dbang phyug byed 'gyur bas/_/rig pas 'gying ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i 
[\[31a.2\]]mkhas pa'ang lan med byed/_/rig pa 'dzin pa glang po rta yi rgyab tu zhon pa dang /_/rig ma mdzes mas legs par 'khyud cing mgul nas 'jus pa las/_/sngags rig pa yi gtso bo yi ni stobs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur/_/mthar gyur pa yi rgyal srid longs spyod dag la yid kyis spyod/_/
[\[31a.3\]]'dod pa'i lha las dga' ba'i bu la sogs pa ri khrod ma/_/sred med bu las dpa' mo mi phyed pa las bde sogs dang /_/tshogs bdag las ni dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dkar mo dang /_/sa 'dzin lha las phun tshogs mnga' ba sngags kyis rnam rgyal byed/_/gsang sngags ldan par bcom 
[\[31a.4\]]ldan 'das ma gang zhig sgom byed pa/_/des ni sna tshogs gter dang gser dang dngul dang rna cha dang /_/gos la sogs pa'i nor rnams kun la ched du gang bsams pa/_/sems kyis thams cad ma lus kun nas longs spyod byed/_/rgyal las rgyal srid dbang po'i yul 'das shing las 'bras 
[\[31a.5\]]bu dang /_/klu dang chu klung rgya mtsho rnams las chu rnams 'gugs/_/sngags dang ldan pas 'thung zhing zas la sngags kyis dag par byed/_/skye bo sngags med par ni longs spyod grub pa med/_/nags skyes glang po rta mchog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang ldan pa/_/dug bcas gdengs ka can gyi sbrul mchog dang /_/
[\[31a.6\]]chu srin chu glang stag dang bse dag dang /_/rang gi sngags kyi stobs kyis bkug nas ni/_/zhon yang ngo mtshar med par byas pa yi ni mig dag gis/_/lta bar gal te gsang sngags grub pa de yis mthong bar 'gyur/_/gal te snying rje'i lta bas 'jig rten 'di ltar sdug bsngal bas/_/rgud par 
[\[31a.7\]]gyur pa'i mi mnyam pa la bsngags pa des/_/yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'jig rten la phan sgron ma yin/_/'jig rten ma lus sgron mer byed cing zhi bar byed/_/bdud rnams bcom nas nor gyi char rgyun 'bebs par byed/_/dpag bsam shing du gyur nas 'gro rnams ci 'dod sbyin par byed/_/nor 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]gyi dbang phyug ma lus pa yi nor rnams kun bkug nas/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir du sbyin par byed/_/de bzhin phongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ched du gos dag dang /_/stan dang khyim dang bla re dag tu sgrol mas mdzad pa dang /_/rgya mtsho'i gling du tshong ba'i gru zhig gyur pa'i phongs pa la/_/
[\[31b.2\]]gzings dang gru la sogs par sgrol mas mdzad par 'gyur/_/sgrol ma de bsgoms rnal 'byor pa/_/dang po sdug bsngal lhan cig gyur/_/de spangs nas ni cung zhig na/_/mis ni ston mo rnyed par 'gyur/_/gnyis par gos ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin btsun mo dang yang 'phrad/_/
[\[31b.3\]]de nas so rtsi longs spyod 'gyur/_/ma blangs par yang ci 'dod spyod/_/gal te tshangs spyod yin na yang /_/lha mchog bskyed pa'i bu mo spyod/_/sems can gsod la dga' ba yis/_/bstan pa 'di la 'grub mi 'gyur/_/dge ba bcu la dga' 'gyur zhing /_/theg pa che 
[\[31b.4\]]la sems gcig pas/_/rdo rje chos kyi bka' bzhin du/_/dngos grub mchog ni des spyod 'gyur/_/'di ni ras ris la 'jug pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o//_//chos mchod pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/gang gi chos nyid brnyes gyur na/_/chos kyi dbyings su rang gyur pa/_/de 
[\[31b.5\]]nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/de'i rjes la dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brag gi yi ge las byung ba/_/dpag bsam shing ni rnam par bsgom/_/ut+pal yongs su gyur pa las/_/shing ni g.yon du bsgom par bya/_/sna tshogs nor gyi char pa dag_/
[\[31b.6\]]nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab pa yis/_/'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byed pa/_/de ltar bsgoms na nor bdag 'gyur/_/gling bzhi pa yi sems can rnams/_/sems kyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas/_/rtag tu rin chen bdun rang bzhin/_/de dag la ni rab sbyin bya/_/yongs kyi 
[\[31b.7\]]gtso bo rin chen dang /_/de bzhin rin chen rgya mtsho skyes/_/bud med rin chen rta rin chen/_/de bzhin ral gri rin chen dang /_/glang po rin chen sogs rin chen/_/sangs rgyas rnams la yid kyis dbul/_/bud med rgyan gyis brgyan byas la/_/sna tshogs gzugs can 'gying ba rnams/_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu dbul/_/'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/rig pa 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/_/rin po che ni yongs rgyas pa'i/_/yongs kyi gtso bo nor dbang phyug_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/_
[\[32a.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya/_/de bzhin rin chen gzhan dag kyang /_/gus dang bcas pas yongs btang na/_/rdo rje chos su gyur nas ni/_/sems can kun gyi don byed 'gyur/_/'di ni dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa'i thabs so/_/sems nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do/_/sems 
[\[32a.3\]]nyid kyis ni rnam par grol/_/sems kyis 'ching ba rnams las thar/_/sems kyis grol ba dang ldan 'gyur/_/sems ma gtogs par dngos don rnams/_/gzhan dag gzhan par ma mthong ste/_/sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos grub kun/_/gang phyir phun tshogs gzhan ma mthong /_/
[\[32a.4\]]gang yang snod dang sems can rnams/_/'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa dag_/zag med lhag par mthong ba yis/_/sems tsam yin zhes rab tu bsgrags/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/sems kyi me long phyis byas na/_/rang bzhin glo bur ba yi skyon/_/rim gyis rab tu 
[\[32a.5\]]zad par 'gyur/_/dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba/_/dri med rdzogs pa'i zla ba ste/_/sems nyid zla bar bsgom byas nas/_/de yi steng du sa bon dgod/_/dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa na/_/me yi mdog gi steng na gnas/_/yi ge i dang yang dag ldan/_/nam mkha' gnyis 
[\[32a.6\]]kyis rnam par brgyan/_/de yi sna tshogs 'od rnams kyis/_/'gro ba'i dri ma med byas nas/_/stong gsum 'di sogs mkha' dbyings te/_/ku ru kul+le'i rir zhugs pas/_/de yis sgrol ma bskul nas ni/_/bkug nas mdun du gnas par byed/_/de nas mkhas pas sa bon la/_/
[\[32a.7\]]mchod pa chen po'i sprin rnams spro/_/me tog spos dang mar me dang /_/de bzhin dri dang lha bshos sogs/_/phyag rgya phreng ba de bzhin du/_/gar dang glu yis mchod sogs mchod/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/_/sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/_/'gro ba'i 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dge la rjes yi rang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung /_/sngags 'di lan gsum brjod nas ni/_/de nas gshegs su gsol bar bgyi/_/sems ni byams pas gnas byas la/_/slar yang der ni gzhag par bya/_/snying rje'i sems ni bskyed byas nas/_/rab dga'i 
[\[32b.2\]]sems kyang bskyed par bya/_/phyi nas thams cad btang snyoms la/_/sems tsam la ni mnyam par gzhag_/tha mal rnam par spang ba'i phyir/_/sems kyang slar yang stong par bya/_/yang srid len pa'i phung po lnga/_/stong pa nyid kyi me yis bsreg_/oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ah+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_/
[\[32b.3\]]yud tsam stong pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/byas nas sems ni ngal sos bya/_/sngon gyi dam bcas dran byas nas/_/sa bon tsam zhig yang dran bya/_/gcig pu mya ngan 'das pa yis/_/sems can bslus par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las/_/bdag gis 
[\[32b.4\]]de dag ci ltar bsgral/_/'di ltar bsams nas brtse ldan des/_/sems med pa yi stong pa yang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sems/_/sems nyid kyis ni bskyed par bya/_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs las sa bon/_/de la ut+pal zhes byar 'gyur/_/ut+pal dkyil 
[\[32b.5\]]du zla ba'i gzugs/_/yi ge a las byung ba'o/_/slar yang zla ba der sa bon/_/de las 'od zer 'phros gyur pa/_/de yis ma lus 'jig rten khams/_/rnam par sbyangs par bsgom par bya/_/de yis sbyangs shing gsal byas nas/_/'od zer kun gyis sangs rgyas 
[\[32b.6\]]tshogs/_/ut+pal la zhugs bsgom par bya/_/de las sgrol ma 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bstan 'dra'i lha mo btsod mdog can/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pas/_/dam tshig gzugs ni mnyam bskyed nas/_/ye shes 'khor lo yang dag bkug_/yud tsam 
[\[32b.7\]]gyis ni nges rdzogs pa'o/_/ye shes 'khor lo mdun gnas pa/_/dam tshig phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/_/kha yi lam nas gzhug par bya/_/lag pa thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgom par bya/_/gung mo gnyis ni rtse mor sbyar/_/rtse mo'i nang du ming med 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gzhug_/mdzub mo gnyis ni dbu mar sbyar/_/mthe bong gnyis ni 'og tu bkug_/dam tshig phyag rgya 'di bcings nas/_/'khor lo bkug nas gzhug par bya/_/sangs rgyas rnams la tshigs bcad 'dis/_/dbang bskur bar ni gsol ba gdab/_/byang chub rdo rje 
[\[33a.2\]]sangs rgyas la/_/ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa/_/bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/_/rgyal ba'i dbang bskur zhes bya bas/_/spyan la sogs pa lnga pa'o/_/rgyal po'i me tog dbang bskur zhing /_/chen por gyur pa de stsol mdzod/_/
[\[33a.3\]]rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba/_/khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa/_/gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/_/sangs rgyas sgrol ma dbang bskur bas/_/chos ni gtsug gi nor bur 'gyur/_/'od zer dmar po sna tshogs kyis/_/'gro 
[\[33a.4\]]ba gsum po snang bar byed/_/dbang bskur rin chen thob 'gyur na/_/dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed/_/ji ltar slar bstan cho ga yis/_/lo phyed brtan par brtsams nas ni/_/gtor ma dus gsum gtang bar bya/_/sngags 'di yis ni khar ba 'am/_/khur ba la sogs cho ga 
[\[33a.5\]]yis/_/rmi lam mtshan ma thob par 'gyur/_/ral gri sa 'og dngos grub dang /_/mi snang ba dang bcud len dang /_/mi mthong ba dang mkha' spyod nyid/_/de bzhin rkang byug mig sman dang /_/rmi lam mtshan ma ston 'gyur zhing /_/dngos grub rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gal 
[\[33a.6\]]te de la dga' 'gyur na/_/grub pa phra mo sgrol mas grub/_/'khor los sgyur nas rgyal srid dang /_/dbang po'i longs spyod thams cad byed/_/sgom dang bzlas par ldan pa la/_/rmi lam du yang rab grub ba byed/_/zla drug tha ma'i zla gcig go/_/mtshan gcig rangs par 
[\[33a.7\]]bzlas byas te/_/ut+pal phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/bzlas nas phyag rgya yud kyis 'bar/_/phyag rgya 'di yi mthu yis ni/_/btsun mo dang bcas tshangs pa dang /_/dbang po nye dbang drag po sogs/_/bkug nas dbang du 'gyur bar byed/_/deng nas brtsams nas dngos grub kun/_/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]bdag 'khor 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/_/chu dang 'dam gyi skyon dag gis/_/pad+ma gos par mi 'gyur ltar/_/dngul chu reg nas du mar 'gyur/_/bsdus nas slar yang gcig tu 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gyur na/_/dngos grub thob pa'i sems de 
[\[33b.2\]]bzhin/_/grub pa'i dngul chus reg gyur nas/_/zangs ma gser du 'gyur ba bzhin/_/grub pa'i gsang sngags kyis reg nas/_/sngags pa sangs rgyas skur yang 'gyur/_/lha yi dbang phyug du 'gyur zhing /_/khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[33b.3\]]rigs su byung nas ni/_/'khor lo bskor bar yang 'gyur ro/_/bltams dang rab tu 'byung mdzad pa/_/dka' ba spyod pa'i spyod mdzad cing /_/byang chub spyod pa'ang spyod mdzad na/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang dran par mdzad/_/lha las babs dang sprul pa dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[33b.4\]]bskor ba dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa chen po dang /_/dur khrod gshegs pa de bzhin no/_/'jig rten gsum du lus spangs nas/_/rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs sku yis/_/gnas gtsang mar ni slar gshegs nas/_/sprul par byung ba'i sku yang 'ong /_/glegs bam ras ris rim 
[\[33b.5\]]pa yis/_/chos kyi sku yang 'jug par mdzad/_/gang gis de yi grub pa'i sngags/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de nyid kyi thugs la rnam par brtags nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na 
[\[33b.6\]]rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje ji ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i sku chos kyi dbyings kyi sku sa'i phyogs gang du dus byed par 'gyur ba yin/_de nas lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[33b.7\]]gang yang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis 'di skad du/_ci ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i sku chos kyi dbyings kyi sku mi phyed pa'i sku sa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig tu dus byed par 'gyur ba yin zhes smra/_des 'di skad nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang mya ngan las 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]'das pa zhes bya ba de ni bde ba can du 'gro ba'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/_ci lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos sku spangs nas bde ba can du 'gro ba'am/_rigs kyi bu 'on te sprul pa'i sku spangs nas longs 
[\[34a.2\]]spyod rdzogs pa'i skus bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/_lag na rdo rje chos kyi sku spangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_ci ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyi skyes bu gang zhig gis dgos pa'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir sgyu ma sprul nas dgos pa sgrub par byed do/_/
[\[34a.3\]]de bzhin du gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/_/'khor los sgyur ba 'das gyur nas/_/skye ba yongs su 'dzin par mdzad/_/gang tshe sangs rgyas 'das pa na/_/de tshe 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung /_/de gnyis med par 'jig rten 'dir/_/
[\[34a.4\]]nam yang 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gdul bya'i 'jig rten la brten nas/_/rkang gnyis mchog gis brtul nas ni/_/lo ni brgyad cur bzhugs mdzad de/_/sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i gnas su gshegs/_/sangs rgyas sgyu ma spangs nas ni/_/rgyal ba'i pho brang bde chen du/_/rab zhi 
[\[34a.5\]]bde ba chen po la/_/kun du dga' ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs/_/byed po rtag pa gcig pus bzhugs/_/yin snyam drang srong rnams sems te/_/de lta'i ngo bo de min zhes/_/de ni skad cig bsdoms par 'dod/_/bdag tu 'dzin pas 'khrul pa rnams/_/rtag tu rtag pa'i don 'dod pa/_/
[\[34a.6\]]mi rtag nyid la 'jug bya'i phyir/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gtong mdzad/_/dngos po kun gyi dngos bdag nyid/_/thugs kyis thams cad mkhyen te dag_/'di dag 'di gnas ma yin zhes/_/byas pa'i nges pa yod ma yin/_/kun rdzob bden pa la brten nas/_/stong gsum 'di sogs gdul 
[\[34a.7\]]bya la/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa/_/nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'jug_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba de nyid min/_/sangs rgyas 'gags pa'ang de bzhin te/_/thams cad ro gcig gyur pa yi/_/'byung dang 'jig pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de ni chos dbyings gzugs gcig 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]ste/_/sgrib pa lnga po spangs pa'o/_/zab cing rgya ni che ba'i gzugs/_/de nyid ngo bor de nyid bzhugs/_/gnyis ka yod pa ma yin phyir/_/gdod nas yod pa ma yin no/_/de ni gdod nas ma skyes pas/_/skye ba ma yin 'gag ma yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras 
[\[34b.2\]]pa/_lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum la rjes su ston pa mdzad pa/_skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa ci lta bu yin/_smras pa/_kyai byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ji snyam du sems/_gang sangs rgyas ji snyed pa de gang zhig yod pa yin nam/_
[\[34b.3\]]'on te med pa zhig yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/_lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams ni yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_ma skyes pa ni skye ba yin/_/skyes pa phyir yang skye mi 'gyur/_/don dam nyid du dpyad 
[\[34b.4\]]na ni/_/de phyir gdod nas ma skyes pa/_/de bzhin 'chi ba 'chi mi 'gyur/_/'chi ba med pa 'chi ba min/_/mi gnas pa la gnas pa med/_/gnas pa de la gnas mi dgos/_/gal te ma skyes nyams 'gyur zhing /_/ma skyes pa nyid skye 'gyur na/_/ri bong gi ni rwa nyid 
[\[34b.5\]]kyang /_/skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur/_/gang tshe yod pa skye 'gyur na/_/skyes pa slar yang skye bar 'gyur/_/gal te med pa skye na yang /_/mo sham bu yang skye bar 'gyur/_/de phyir thams cad ma rig pa/_/'du byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid yin/_/phung po lnga ldan 'gro ba 
[\[34b.6\]]rnams/_/snang ba tsam du rnam par shes/_/re zhig rigs pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/_thams cad skyed pa med pa'i phyir/_/sngags 
[\[34b.7\]]'di ci ltar rgyud ci ltar/_/dkyil 'khor sgom pa ji lta bu/_/dngos grub de ni ji ltar 'grub/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/_/dngos po rnams ni 'byung ba ltar/_/sngags dang phyag rgya sogs brten nas/_/dngos grub rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]dngos grub rnams ni kun rdzob pa/_/sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa yang /_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/kun rdzob nyid du rab sgrub 'gyur/_/rtog pa gnyis pa'o//_//sngags bzlas pa yi cho ga'i rim/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/
[\[35a.2\]]gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/sgrub pos dngos grub 'gyur bas so/_/byi ru yis ni dbang du byed/_/pus kar gos ni dug zhi byed/_/shel gyis shes rab 'phel bar byed/_/las gsum la ni sbyar bar bya/_/skye gnas kyi rnam par dag pa a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 
[\[35a.3\]]lta bu'i thab khung byas la/_mya ngan med pa'i shing la me sbar nas/_cho ga bzhin du ut+pal dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas te/_gar mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la mngar gsum gyis bsgos nas/_rtsa ba'i sngags dang bya ba yin no/_/phyi nas 'khrul 'khor bya ba yin 
[\[35a.4\]]te/_zla mtshan gyis gos pa'i ras la dkyil 'khor gru gsum bris nas/_dkyil 'khor du bsgrub bya dang /_sgrub pa po'i ming dang bcas pa'i bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas par bris te/_che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyur cig byas nas/_de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis spel nas/_
[\[35a.5\]]rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang /_lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag dang /_ga bur dang /_gur gum dang /_gla rtsi rnams kyi tshon rtsis bri bar bya'o/_/shes rab 'phel bar 'dod na thab khung de nyid du a rga'am/_ka ra bI ra'i shing la bram ze'i sbyin sreg gi me blangs la sbar 
[\[35a.6\]]te/_a ka ru ka'i sha'i khyi'i ma'am/_shu dag gi sbyin sreg khri bya'o/_/dug zhi bar byed na thab khung de nyid du tsan+dan gyi shing la me sbar la/_ping ta ka ra'i me tog gi sbyin bsreg bya'o/_/des ni dug thams cad zhi bar 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/sna tshogs kyi zug gzer 
[\[35a.7\]]rnams med par byed cing zhi bar byed do/_/mkha' lding gi rig pa'i rgyud kyi cho ga'o/_/khams gsum pa yi lam gnas pa'i/_/btsun mor grags pa ji snyed pa/_/sbyin sreg 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba yis/_/de kun bkug nas spyod par byed/_/byams pa chags pa'i lta ba yis/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]sems de yis ni dbang du byed/_/'gro ba thams cad dbang byas nas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub nges par spyod/_/'di ni dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'o/_/rnam pa kun mkhyen zhes bya ba/_/shes rab med par thob mi 'gyur/_/de phyir de thob 'dod pa gang /_/shes rab rnon po bsgrub par 
[\[35b.2\]]bya/_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg sbyor ba yis/_/chos rnams kun la spyod pa'o/_/blo ni dag gsal dri ma med/_/de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin/_/rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar 'gyur/_/gri ha pi da'i lo ma dang /_/sha ti dang ni shing mngar dang /_/bram ze mo dang ma ga ta/_/sbrang dang bcas pas 
[\[35b.3\]]bza' bar bya/_/shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i cho ga'o//_//dug rjes sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas/_/'khor lo bzang rtsa de bzhin te/_/mche ba'i dug gis bzung ba la/_/bskus dang 'thungs pas zhi bar mdzad/_/dug gzhil ba'i sman no/_/dza ri tsaN+DA li dag dang /_/nad pa'i 
[\[35b.4\]]sdi ni mar khur bcas/_/lus kyi srin bu shi ba'i ro/_/zos nas dbang du 'gyur ba yin/_/dbang du bya ba'i sman no/_/dug 'gugs pas ni 'gro ba zhi/_/shes rab 'phel bas sangs rgyas nyid/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ni/_/skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur/_/bdag gzhan don rab 
[\[35b.5\]]bsgrub pa la/_/theg pa chen por thabs gzhan med/_/rig pa lan gcig bsgrubs pa yis/_/'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/_/hrIHyig myos pa'i snod bsams nas/_/bud med rnams ni 'dzag par 'gyur/_/lce snying dkyil du hrIHde nyid/_/bsams na blo rnams skye bar byed/_/
[\[35b.6\]]mche bas bzung ba las bsgoms pa/_/chos kyi yi ge mdzes pa yis/_/yi ge dag ni dug zhi byed/_/sgrol ma'i snying po khams gsum las/_/rgyal ba yin par brtse ba can gyis rnam shes bya/_/ngag gi skyon rnams zad pas dug sel sems kyi skyon spangs pas/_/shes rab 
[\[35b.7\]]'phel 'gyur lus kyi skyon rnams zad pas dbang du byed/_/de phyir 'gro 'di mi dge la zhen dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/_/de phyir rgyal ba'i sras kyis phan phyir sdig rnams spang bar bya phyir bgyi/_/phyag rgya bcing ba'i khyad par gyis ni nges par lus kyi skyon rnams zad par 'gyur/_/
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]sngags kyis lce yi tshogs kyi skyon rnams gang yin pa yi sems kyi skyon/_/bsam gtan dga' ba'i sems kyis dga' bar 'gyur bar dad pa dri med kyis/_/lus kyi yid rnams g.yo ba med pa de tshe sangs rgyas byin gyis rlobs/_/sdig med mig 
[\[36a.2\]]gis sdig lta snying rje ldan pa 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/sbyin pas bsod nams stobs lhag gyur par sa stengs gtso bo sbyin bdag brtson ldan 'gyur/_/le lo spangs pas mkhas pas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal cung zad kyang mi myong /_/de phyir sangs rgyas sras 
[\[36a.3\]]kyi snying rje'i nor dang brtson 'grus spyod pa dag la brten/_/nam mkha'i dkyil du sangs rgyas rnams bltas bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas rnams la sems/_/rmi lam na yang rtag tu bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskor ba mthong /_/mkhas pas 'chi tshe ri rab 
[\[36a.4\]]rtser gshegs dang /_/bzhon pa sna tshogs zhon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mthong 'gyur zhing /_/sdig pa byas pas dmyal ba'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur/_/de rnams rnam dag rgyud yin te/_/blo yang der ni gnas par 'gyur/_/de yi phyir ni ci 
[\[36a.5\]]nas kyang /_/gos dkar dag gi btsun mor 'dod/_/de nyid dug ni zhi byed pas/_/rta mgrin gyis ni go 'phang gnas/_/'dod chags rdo rje'i tshig 'byung ba/_/'gro ba gsum po dbang du byed/_/'dod chags kyi rigs kyi rgyud bsgrub pa'o//_//de nas sbyor ba 
[\[36a.6\]]gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/_/slar yang gru gsum gzhan zhig go/_/dbang po phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/_/oM la sogs pa mkhas pas bri/_/mtshams drug tu ni sa bon drug_/chos kyi sa bon dkyil du'o/_/yi ge phuHyi nang byas 
[\[36a.7\]]pa/_/de ni sgo yi ma them bri/_/sbrul bskrad pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas bud med skal ba dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/_sbyor ba gzhan dag bshad par bya ste/_'dab ma bdun pa'i ut+pal byas la/_de la yi ge bdun sbyar bar bya'o/_/de'i lte ba la hrIHgnyis kyis brten pa'i bsgrub bya'i 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ming dbang du bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du gro ga'am/_yang na me tog dang bcas pa'i ras la bris la rig pa'i ril bu byas nas dpung pa la gdags par bya'o/_/bdag po bud med bran du 'gyur/_/rgyal po'ang zhabs 'bring nyid du 'gyur/_/shin tu dag cing gtsang ma yis/_/sngags 
[\[36b.2\]]'di btu bar bya ba yin/_/dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'o/_/bsrung ba'i don du 'khrul 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ut+pal 'dab bzhi byas nas ni/_/de la dbus su zla ba bri/_/shar du mda' ni bri bar bya/_/lho nyid du ni gzhu bri'o/_/mi 'jigs lag pa nub tu'o/_/byang du ut+pal 
[\[36b.3\]]bri bar bya/_/dbus kyi zla bar bsrung bya ste/_/sa bon bdun gyis bskor ba'o/_/'khor lo phyi yi rim pa la/_/ut+pal phreng bas brgyan pa'o/_/'di ni gro ga la bris la/_/rang gi dpung la gdags par bya/_/gzhan yang byis pa rgan po dar la bab/_/'khrul 'khor gyis ni 
[\[36b.4\]]rang srung 'grub/_/gal te dbang phyug thob par bya 'dod na/_sa bon gyi grong khyer bris la de'i dkyil du gzhu bri bar bya'o/_/gzhu'i dkyil du rin po che'i rnam pa lta bu'i ut+pal gyi myu gu bri bar bya'o/_/ut+pal snying po'i dbus su yi ge dzruM la yi ge bdun gyis bskor ba'o/_/sa 
[\[36b.5\]]le sbram gyi byang bu la mngon par bris la khyim gyi steng du nges par gzhag par bya'o/_/phyi rol nas ut+pa la'i phreng bas mngon par bskor bar byas nas tshes bcu gnyis sam brgyad la rin po che lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa gang bas phab la khrus byas nas mchod nas bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas 
[\[36b.6\]]na/_lo gcig gis nor 'dzin dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i rig pa'i ril bu yang dag par gdags par bya'o/_/de nas sbyor ba gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_mig dmar la bab pa na 'gron bu gan rgyal du gnas pa rnyed na lag mthil du bzhag nas 
[\[36b.7\]]sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/_rgyan po 'debs pa na pha rol po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/'gron bu de blangs la ku ru kul+le'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_tshes bcu gnyis sam/_brgyad la khrus byas nas mchod la dar gyi nang du gtums nas dpung pa la btags na/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'dis nor gyi dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro/_/'gron bu de snod du bcug pa'i nang du sba bar byas na nyin rer kAr ShA pa Na re re rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/don bsgrub pa dang /_rgyal srid bsgrub pa dang /_rgyal po rnyed pa dang /_'bras bu bsgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/rtog pa gsum 
[\[37a.2\]]pa rdzogs so//_//gang gis rdul tshon mthong tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas myur du thob par byed/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i rim pa bzhin/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis nye bar brgyan/_/de yi dkyil du lha mo bkod/_/
[\[37a.3\]]b+ha ga'i rnam pa kha dog legs/_/mda' ni shar du bri bya ba/_/gzhu ni lho yi phyogs su'o/_/mi 'jigs lag pa nub tu ste/_/byang du de bzhin ut+pa la'o/_/mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du'o/_/rdo rje 'khor lo sogs de bzhin/_/gos dmar po yi stod g.yogs bgos/_/dar 
[\[37a.4\]]dmar pos gdong bkab pa yi/_/slob ma der ni gzhug par bya'o/_/'dis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'khor lor me tog dbul bar bya ste/_pra tIts+tsha badzra hoH_zhes bya'o/_/g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/_/dkyil du bab na ni mchog go/_/mda' la 
[\[37a.5\]]bab na ni dbang du byas pa'i las la dbang bar 'gyur ro/_/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la bab na ni dug 'gugs pa la bslab par bya'o/_/ut+pal la bab na shes rab 'phel ba la bslab par bya'o/_/gzhu la bab na ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/_/'jug pa'i 
[\[37a.6\]]dus su 'di skad smra bar bya'o/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa gang gi yang mdun du brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/_yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar 
[\[37a.7\]]gyur ta re/_zhes pa brjod nas/_de'i rjes la dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/_dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi spangs/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par rgyud las grub pa yin no/_/mna' bsgag par yang bya ste/_chos kyis rgyal po dam tshig che/_/nga las blangs nas 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'ga' nyams na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag_/gsang sngags spyod mchog spyod pa rnams/_/khrag chen dang ni snying chen kyang /_/de tshe phyungs nas gsol bar byed/_/chos kyis bstan pa skyong byed pa/_/nga la khyod kyis brnyas mi bya/_/rtag tu gos dmar 
[\[37b.2\]]bgo bya zhing /_/phreng ba dmar po bcing bar bya/_/mtshal gyi phye ma dag gam ni/_/dmar po'i dris kyang byug bya zhing /_/rin chen dmar po sogs kyis brgyan/_/chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom bya zhing /_/sngags kyang chags pa'i sems kyis bzla/_/btsag gam 
[\[37b.3\]]sin d+hu ra dag gis/_/pho brang dag ni bri bar bya/_/mtshal gyi phye ma dag gam ni/_/gur gum dang ni tsan+dan dmar/_/byi ru'i phye ma dag kyang rung /_/kar ke ta yi phye mas bris/_/sbyin sreg yang na 'khor lo'o/_/rab tu gnas pa de bzhin te/_/kun kyang dmar ba'i rang 
[\[37b.4\]]bzhin sbyar/_/sangs rgyas ngur smrig mtshon byed yin/_/srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing /_/bden pa min pa yang mi smra/_/ma byin pa yang blang mi bya/_/gzhan gyi chung ma bsten mi bya/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam 
[\[37b.5\]]pa gang gsum pa'i/_/mi dge ba dag spang bar gyis/_/chos dang de bzhin zang zing dang /_/byams dang mi 'jigs zhes bya bzhi/_/sbyin pa khyod kyis rtag tu byin/_/med na bsam gtan las kyis so/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag kyang /_/khyod kyis rtag tu bstan par bya/_/pha rol 
[\[37b.6\]]phyin pa'i sku dag dang /_/stobs rnams dang ni dbang dag dang /_/bud med 'gro ba brnyas mi bya/_/sgrol ma'i ming can khyad par du/_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyim pas kyang /_/bud med de ni blang mi bya/_/grong khyer sgo dang grong dag dang /_/yul gang na ni sgrol ma ni/_/sgo stengs bzhi mdo 
[\[37b.7\]]rtsig ngos dang /_/sum mdo dag tu khyad par du/_/gnas pa'i gnas der rtag phyag bya/_/bstod cing mchod pa chen po bya/_/gnas der gnas pa byas nas ni/_/sngags la sogs pa bsgrub par bya/_/sgrol ma'i ming can bud med gang /_/kha dog dmar ser mig legs ma/_/
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]de mthong rnal 'byor gus pa yis/_/yid kyis phyag ni bya ba yin/_/ban+d+hu ze'u 'bru'i me tog dang /_/de bzhin ka ra bI ra 'dzin/_/gzhan yang me tog dmar po la/_/sgrub pa pos ni 'gom mi bya/_/de ltar sdom pa byin pas ni/_/gtsang zhing dag 
[\[38a.2\]]pa'i lha rdzas chu/_/bum pa bzhi na gnas pa'i chus/_/slob ma sngags chus dag par bya/_/slob dpon gyis ni rim pa bzhin/_/mda' gzhu sogs kyi phyag rgyas bkru/_/dang por mda' can bum pas te/_/gnyis pa gzhu dang ldan pas so/_/gsum pa mi 'jigs 
[\[38a.3\]]pa lag ste/_/ut+pal gyis ni bzhi par ro/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas shAkya yis/_/seng ge'i sras bcas rdo rje 'dzin/_/rgyal srid chen por dbang bskur ltar/_/de bzhin bdag gis khyod dbang bskur/_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor 'di ru 
[\[38a.4\]]rnyed/_/rdul tshon 'di gzigs sangs rgyas rnams/_/rab tu dgyes par gyur pa yin/_/'di ni 'chi med nad med kyang /_/mya ngan med cing phongs pa med/_/theg pa chen po gtsang ma 'dis/_/khyod kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob/_/mda' sogs bzhi yis dbang bskur 
[\[38a.5\]]bas/_/dam chos snod du byas nas ni/_/slob ma la ni gsang ba dag_/cho ga bzhin du sbyin par bya/_/de la re zhig dang po klu la bsdigs pa la bslab par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo bud d+ha bo d+hi/_sa twe b+h+yaH_na mo as+tha/_ma hA a n+yar+ya pra ka lA yaM/_namasmap+te b+h+yo/_bud d+ha ko 
[\[38a.6\]]Ti b+h+yaH_tad+ya thA/_oM hrIH_hrIH_hrIH_sarba nA gA nAM/_a nan+ta ku lA nAM/_bA su ki ku lA nAM/_sha~M ka pA la ku lA nAM/_karko Ta ku lA nAM/_pad+ma ku lA nAM/_ku li ka ku lA nAM/_pun+da rI ka ku lAnA~M/_ga nA ka ku lAnA~M/_me ka ku lAnA~M/_dzA la dA ku lAnA~M/_dza la d+ha ra ku lA nAM/_badzrI mu ta ku 
[\[38a.7\]]lAnAM/_saM brta ku lAnAM/_e sa brta ku lA nAM/_ku mu d+ha ku lAnAM/_ka ha ra ku lA nAM/_sau gan d+hi ku lA nAM/_ha na ha na sha re na/_ban d+ha ban d+ha tsa bin tA Da ya tA Da ya up+ta lenAM/_birtaM na/_a b+ha yA na/_de hi de hi/_pra la ya/_ka le badzra la da ra/_ma b+ha ta ra yan/_bar Sha na ta 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]nA gA na ba shi ku su/_ku ru ku ru phuH/_ku ru ba ya ku ru ba ya/_phuHphuH_oM ku ru kul+le hrIH_hU~M swA hA phaT/_sngags 'dis dgon pa'i lci ba las dkyil 'khor byas la/_cho ga bzhin du tsan+dan gyis byug pa pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la/_shar la sogs pa 'dab ma la dga' 
[\[38b.2\]]bo la sogs pa'i klu brgyad bzhag nas/_sha kha ra dang gu gul gyis/_rgyu skar snar ma la bab pa'i tshe/_brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_klu rnams la bdug pa byin nas/_de nas mchod pa'o/_/gal te char 'bab par mi 'gyur na/_chang gis khrus byas la/_seng ldeng gi mes gdung 
[\[38b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/de ltar byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te char 'bebs par mi byed na/_mdzes thebs par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa 'di dag bya ba'i zas dang ldan par bya ba yin no/_/phyi nas nye bar bsdus la chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o/_/lha yang dus su char 
[\[38b.4\]]'bebs shing /_/lo thog phun sum tshogs par shog_/'jig rten mtha' dag skyid pa dang /_/rgyal po chos dang ldan gyur cig_/ces yongs su bsngo ba yang bya'o/_/char shin tu ches pa gcad 'dod na/_sbrul 'dul ba'i mi las sbrul cig blangs la/_tsan+dan gyis 
[\[38b.5\]]byugs nas 'o ma blud par bya zhing /_sngags 'di lan bdun bsngags par byas pa'i bum pa dmar po ma tshos pa'i nang du bcug la/_phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab nas/_bum pa bcag par gyur na/_de ma thag tu char pa gcod par byed do/_/phyi nas tshogs kyis ston mo bya/_/yang 
[\[38b.6\]]na nyan thos dge 'dun mchod/_/khye'u bu mor zas skom sbyin/_/de ltar byas na klu rnams dga'/_/char ni 'bab par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/gal te 'di ltar mi byed na/_/klu rnams dga' bar ma byas pas/_/mdze yis thebs par gyur pa yin/_/rgyal po'i bu dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang 
[\[38b.7\]]bcas pa khrus byas la phyir bzlog pa'i tshes lnga la phyir bzlog pa'i rtsa ba btsal nas/_'o ma'am/_yang na mar dang sbyar te/_dngul gyi snod du blugs la btung zhing dge slong la gsol bar byas na/_lo gcig gi bar du sbrul gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dge 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]ba'i las kyis gal te sbrul gyis bzung na/_sbrul de nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang mdze nad sos par 'dod na/_sngags 'di nyid kyis dug med par byas nas/_zos na mdze nad 
[\[39a.2\]]sos par 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis chu la bsngags la sbrul gyis bzung ba'i rma la bkrus na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/yang klu mthong bar 'dod na/_ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma la/_yi ge'i grangs kyis 'bum bzlas nas/_klu gnas shing byin gyis brlabs 
[\[39a.3\]]pa mtshe'u la sogs par btab na/_de'i rjes la klu'i chung ma 'dar bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa po la kye bcom ldan 'das ci zhig bgyi zhes bka' lung nod par byed do/_/sngags pas kyang 'dod pa de blang bar bya'o/_/rtog pa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhon nu sgra 
[\[39a.4\]]gcan 'dzin bzang pos gang gi tshe bsod snyoms la rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas yang 'od ma'i tshal du zhugs te/_lhung bzed bkru ba'i phyir rdzing bu ring por zhugs pa na/_grags 'dzin ma'i bus dge slong dkar po dang 'khrul nas rdzing bur drangs pa dang /_de'i tshe gzhon 
[\[39a.5\]]nu sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos rig pa 'di bzlas so/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis ji ltar 'ga' zhig rang gi khyim nas byung ba bzhin du/_sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po yang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo /_/nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[39a.6\]]to/_/yab lags khyed kyis bdag la gsang sngags gang stsal ba'i mthu de bdag gis mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang du mthong /_klu rnams kyi drung du'o/_/de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das srog chags gzhan dag srung ba'i slad du 
[\[39a.7\]]sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe de'i dus su sngags 'di dang /_rtog pa 'di lag na rdo rje la bskul nas nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams la bka' drin gsal bar byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir gsang sngags 'di dang /_rtog pa 'di tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas/_klog par byed pa de'i lus la dug gi gnod pa mi 'byung /_dug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_shu ba'i 'jigs pa 
[\[39b.2\]]mi 'byung /_g.yan pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_mdze nad kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_nad kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_klu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_sbrul gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_stag dang gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_dgra'i 
[\[39b.3\]]'jigs pa mi 'byung /_dbul ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa srung ba'i phyir/_nag po chen po nyid kyi bsod snyoms kyis gsos pa'i srin mo'i 'phrog ma la byin no/_/de yang 
[\[39b.4\]]sngon gyi las mi dge ba la skal ba ngan par gyur pas/_nag po chen po dang rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas gnas par mi byed/_brtse bar mi byed/_bstan pa srung bar yang mi byed do/_/de nas srin mo de yi mug par gyur pa dang /_de la nag po chen po dbang du bya bar 'dod pas/_
[\[39b.5\]]ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa 'di gsungs so/_/de nas bzung nas skal ba che zhing bzang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir sems can dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gsang sngags 'di nyid dang /_rtog pa 'di nyid la goms par bya'o/_/gzhan yang shin tu dga' ba'i bu 
[\[39b.6\]]gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa stobs che zhing mtshan dang ldan pa zhig skyes so/_/'on kyang blo rtul bar gyur to/_/de nas shin tu dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa stobs che zhing mtshan dang ldan pa zhig skyes 
[\[39b.7\]]par gyur na/_'on kyang blo rtul bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar na de'i shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/_gal te bdag gi bu de'i yi ge dang bcas par gyur na/_de lta na khyod kyis bstan pa rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar gsan nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]sngon du zhugs nas rtog pa 'di dang gsang sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/de bka' stsal gyis shin tu dga' ba'i bu gzhon nu snar ma zhes bya ba 'di shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lo bcu gnyis kyis bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang /_
[\[40a.2\]]bzo'i gnas kyi thabs thams cad la mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir shes rab chen po 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags dang /_rtog pa 'di la bslab par bya ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub bka' 
[\[40a.3\]]stsal pa/_ro yi skyon dang bral ba yi/_/dngul chu legs par blangs nas su/_/rdo rje gtan gshong du byas nas/_/'jig rten mgon dang btags par bya/_/slar yang chos sku dang btags la/_/dza ba ti ki ti ka dang /_/byi na'i lo ma'i khu ba dang /_/nyi ma gsum du 
[\[40a.4\]]mnye bar bya/_/ban+da ka ko la yi lo ma dang /_/ha ka badzra 'o ma dang /_/rna ma phug pa'i khu ba dang /_/nu ma'i 'o ma dang mnye ba/_/dngul chu dang ni rtsab mo yis/_/lan bdun bar du bkru zhing mnye/_/lcags kyi snod du legs bcug nas/_/pri ta ra ka'i zan bcug 
[\[40a.5\]]btso/_/ka na ka yi me tog gong bu dag_/'og dang steng du nges par bskor/_/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas na/_/dngul chu de ni g.yas nas 'khor/_/mu zi nyi mas bsgos pa la/_/gsang sngags des ni bzlas byas nas/_/lcags snod me la bzhag pa la/_/phye 
[\[40a.6\]]ma'i sbyor ba cung zhig blugs/_/mu zi cung zad zhu gyur nas/_/nam mkha'i 'dab ma bcug nas bzhu/_/phyi nas phyi ni sa le sbram/_/de la ma ki ki yang bzhag_/dngul dang zangs kyang de nas gzhug_/de bzhin lcags kyang lnga 'gyur ro/_/gzhan kun drug 'gyur bzhu byas nas/_/
[\[40a.7\]]nyi ma'i 'od dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/de yi ri thig gzhan phung chen/_/mkhas pas sgyur bar byed pa yin/_/man cas bra zhing bsgyur nus na/_/dngul chu grub par shes par bya/_/ma he ra dang bcas pa yi/_/spyi yi 'o mas rdo rje bsad/_/byi ba mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]khra dang ni/_/grub pa'i 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]dngul chu nang du gzhug_/'di dang dngul chu 'dres gyur na/_/mar ka ta la sogs pa'ang 'ju/_/ku ru kul+le'i rnal 'byor pas/_/mig gi phyir ni mu tig bzhu/_/rtag tu gzigs ma rtswa zos ma/_/bud med brgya la 'dod pa spyod/_/mtshan bdun tsam zhig sbyor bas ni/_/
[\[40b.2\]]brtul zhugs can ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/_/dngul chu mkha' spyod bsgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/zha nye'i ril bu byas nas ni/_/'bang hu'i sa bon snod du ni/_/khrag 'dzag kany+tsa'i snod bcug nas/_/sa snod dmar por bcug nas ni/_/dngul chu dang bcas zha nye de/_/'chi bar 
[\[40b.3\]]'gyur bar the tshom med/_/de dang dngul chu srang re bsres/_/phyi nas srang gcig drug cur bsre/_/rang dang mnyam par bsgrub byas nas/_/dngul gyi ril bu byed pa yin/_/sgrol mas dngul chu grub gyur nas/_/sems can don byed nus par 'gyur/_/sems can don 
[\[40b.4\]]las bsod nams tshogs/_/tshogs las byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/_/dngul chu bsgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/bstan pa'i krun to'i me tog sngo/_/tsi tra ka sngon zhes bya dang /_/rnal 'byor pa yis zla gcig tu/_/'o ma dar 'thungs lo stong 'tsho/_/sngags kyi bka' las nag po 
[\[40b.5\]]blang /_/'od ma'i snod du bcug nas ni/_/tshes brgyad la bsgrub rnal 'byor pas/_/nyi zla skar ma gnas yang 'tsho/_/yung ba bung dang 'dra snyed nas/_/'o ma dang mnyes 'thungs nas ni/_/tshangs pa mdun na 'don mnyam pa'i/_/tshe dang ldan 'gyur the tshom med/_/
[\[40b.6\]]de bzhin shing chen 'bras bu yi/_/chu shing 'bras bu 'dra rnyed nas/_/gang dang gang na gnas pa der/_/gal te gso sbyong la gnas pa/_/'o ma dang mnyes 'thungs nas ni/_/skra dkar gnyer ma rengs par 'gyur/_/bcud kyis len bsgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/bu 'dod pas ni bu 
[\[40b.7\]]ga yin/_/ba b+ha ga yi shing me tog_/brtul zhugs gnas pa'i 'o ma dang /_/chung ma gso sbyong ldan byas te/_/'thungs na skal bzang bu ldan 'gyur/_/sngags 'di shu dag gi ni 'bras bu dag_/btags nas 'o ma dang ni bsre byas nas/_/btsun mo dang yang gso sbyong ldan 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]byas te/_/'thungs na rgyal ba'i mtshan ldan bu thob 'gyur/_/lag sman rtsa ba gang gi 'o ma dang /_/khrus byas 'thungs par gyur na bu btsas 'gyur/_/don grub pa yi sku 'dra yongs rdzogs gzugs/_/mtshon gyis mtshon rnams kyis ni 'jigs med ni/_/
[\[41a.2\]]dzA la she la rtsa ba nas bton nam/_/rtsa ba blangs nas lan bdun mngon bsngags te/_/mgo bo la ni bcings par byas na ni/_/lo gcig rims ni med par byed pa yin/_/rnal 'byor pas ni gser shing rtsa ba dag_/blangs nas gang gi mgo la bcings byas na/_/
[\[41a.3\]]de yi nyin bzhi pa yi gnod pa dag_/rims kyis zin pa rims ni med par 'gyur/_/so phag du ba chang dang rtsab mo dang /_/ra gnyis pa yi rgyal ba'i khu ba bcas/_/zangs ma'i snod du bud med 'o ma dang mnyes nas/_/mig la bskus na mig gi nad rnams sel/_/
[\[41a.4\]]shing thog u tsa ta yi rtsa ba blangs nas ni/_/sngags 'di brgya phyed par du bzlas nas su/_/ci ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang 'thungs na/_/dam pa'i mi dbang de'i mtshan la rung nas/_/na ga sa la zhes byar rab grags pa/_/de yi 'o ma dag dang ldan byas des/_/mtshan ma 
[\[41a.5\]]stobs bskyed bu 'phel bu tsha bskyed/_/sngags 'di brgya phyed bar du bzlas nas su/_/gi wang dang ni so ma skyes pa'i lce/_/mi dbang rtsa ba rgyu skar bzang po la/_/de yi dpral bar thig le byas nas ni/_/thig le de mthong 'jig rten gsum dbang byed/_/shi ba'i ro yi mi 
[\[41a.6\]]dang snying dang lce/_/dpral ba dang ni de bzhin sna dag ni/_/blangs nas skar ma rgyal gyi dus la ni/_/til mar la btsos skye bo dbang du byed/_/sbrul gyi dbang po'i mgo bo'i mig sman dang /_/ming ngan gcod dang me tog zhes bya'i khrag_/mig sman de yi mig la bskus 
[\[41a.7\]]byas na/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/sngags 'di brgya phyed rkang pa sar bzhag nas/_/sa yi nang na yod pa'i nor btsal na/_/rkang pa gang du bzhag pa g.yo 'gyur ba/_/de na gter dag yod pa shes par bya/_/rkang pa'i bol 'gul na ni nye bar 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'gyur/_/rkang mthil 'gul na ring na gnas pa yin/_/gang na gter yod zer bar mngon byas nas/_/rig pa 'dzin pas nyin bzhin 'og tu blta/_/gang yang byi ba mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]phyi ma na/_/gu gul dang ni bcas pa byugs tsam gyis/_/glang chen myos pas gsal zhing bde bar 
[\[41b.2\]]'byung /_/shin tu gnag pa'i khyi mo yi/_/'o ma bsrubs nas mar sar gyis/_/bskus nas rnga lpags lham gon na/_/chu yi steng na 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sa bkong tsha nya'i tsher ma dag_/bsdus nas tshang tshing khyim sbas na/_/chang rnams brlag ste phyung nas ni/_/bzang po 
[\[41b.3\]]nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/rdza mkhan rdza ma bsregs pa'i me/_/thog gis bcags pa'i shing btsugs na/_/de me 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/_/chang blugs slar yang 'bar bar 'gyur/_/zong la gong bstan sngags bzlas nas/_/sngon sngags tshong pa rnams bstan pa/_/
[\[41b.4\]]rnal 'byor pa yis tshong 'grub ste/_/tshong pa rnams las khe cher rnyed/_/chang gi sa bon byed pa la/_/spre'u'i mi gtsang bcug gyur na/_/chang snod bcas pa brlag par 'gyur/_/ba ku las bkrus spyad du rung /_/ba ku la yi chus bkrus na/_/byis pa ma mas blangs nas ni/_/
[\[41b.5\]]'byung po skra yis bdug byas na/_/ngur smrig bskon pas sos par 'gyur/_/byis pa nu zho 'thungs skyugs na/_/rma bya'i sgro bsregs thal ba yis/_/mgul pa bcings pa byas na ni/_/sbyor ba mchog gis slar sos 'gyur/_/yad ka ba ka ni cho ga dang /_/ldan pa'i zha nye byang 
[\[41b.6\]]du sko byas nas/_/kha yi nang du bcug nas 'dug na ni/_/'ching dang mtshon cha mi byams pa las thar/_/k+Sha ma ra ya yi ge rnams dang ldan/_/yi ge kun kyang e yis brgyan pa la/_/yang dag ka ba ka yi mtha' mar ni/_/sgo nga bzhi dang tshad gsum gnyis gnyis sbyin/_/dan til 
[\[41b.7\]]ut+pal sa ra pu ka dang /_/ni tshu la dang gi ri kar Ni chus/_/lan bdun bar du bkrus pa'i zha nye yis/_/byang bu la ni blo dang ldan pas bri/_/shing sgrog lcags sgrog khri mon g.yul ngo ru/_/mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa dang gzhan dag ni/_/zhe sdang ba dag nges par 'joms byed par/_/rgyud 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]chen 'dis ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/gang gis sngags kyi rgyal po bris nas ni/_/rig pa byas nas dpung pa la btags na/_/de yi dbang phyug nor sbyin dang mnyam 'gyur/_/gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs nor gyi gter thob 'gyur/_/oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/_
[\[42a.2\]]lhung bzed la ni btags nas su/_/yul gyi mu ge byung ba'i tshe/_/slongs mo pas ni bsod snyoms thob/_/ut+pal sdong bu'i phyi shun khu ba ni/_/'o ma dang bkrus bud med kyis 'thungs na/_/rang gi las kyis mngal rlugs pa dag kyang /_/des ni nges par gnas pa byed pa yin/_/
[\[42a.3\]]ma ga ta yi 'bras bu lnga tsam zhig_/btags nas bud med gang gis 'o ma 'thungs/_/gsang sngags 'di yi mthu rab che ba yis/_/de ni bde ba dang ldan btsa' bar 'gyur/_/nim pas ba du 'o mar rab btags nas/_/rdo rje'i chu dang lhan cig bsres byas nas/_/skyes pa'i 
[\[42a.4\]]tshe na mngal ni bsku byas na/_/bud med de ni bde bar bu btsa' 'gyur/_/glang po ma ga ni yi shu dag bcas/_/rta yi dri dang ma he'i mar gsar bcas/_/ba bla dang ldan sbyor ba byas nas ni/_/nu ma dag ni sgrub byed 'phel bar byed/_/bza' ba thams cad zos nas ni/_/sna 
[\[42a.5\]]nas chu ni 'thungs na ni/_/mgo bo'i dus min skra dkar dag_/sngags kyi sbyor bas de med 'gyur/_/a ba sha yi rtsa ba dang /_/ka ma tsa ka gser shing 'bras/_/ldan par ga bur chus btags nas/_/lus mchog bkrus bsrubs mdzub mo 'jib/_/'khrig pa'i tshe na mi 
[\[42a.6\]]'dzag na/_/bdag po mi gus 'gro bar 'dod/_/'ching ba yi ni sbyin par 'dod/_/de 'dzag bya phyir de yis bsku/_/'khrig pa sbyor tshe phag zhig las/_/mar me sbar bar byas nas ni/_/mi 'dod pa yang myur du 'byung /_/de yang mngal du yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]gnas/_/rdo rje me yis 
[\[42a.7\]]khyim tshig na/_/mi gang sngags kyis chang gis 'thor/_/me ni 'chi bar gyur to zhes/_/sbyor ba 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs/_/sems can gang dag 'khor gnas dang /_/'jig rten mgon pos de skad bsgrags/_/ri yi rgyal po po ta lar/_/bcom ldan gzhan sdug 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]pas sdug pa/_/sangs rgyas ma gyur ci yang med/_/sems can don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sngar spyad ma yin ci yang med/_/nyams pa slar yang gso bar bsam/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams 
[\[42b.2\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[42b.3\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D438}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_na maHtA rA e ka biM sha ti sto tra gu Na hi ta sA ka/_bod skad du/_sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[42b.4\]]gis bstod pa phan yon dang bcas pa/_rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo/_/spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma/_/'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi/_/ge sar phye ba las ni byung ma/_/phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba 
[\[42b.5\]]kun du/_/gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma/_/skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis/_/rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma/_/phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyi/_/pad+mas phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma/_/sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba/_/bzod pa bsam gtan 
[\[42b.6\]]spyod yul nyid ma/_/phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor/_/mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bar spyod ma/_/ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu bsten ma/_/phyag 'tshal tut+t+wa ra hU~M yi ge/_/'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma/_/'jig rten 
[\[42b.7\]]bdun po zhabs kyis mnan te/_/lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma/_/phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa/_/rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma/_/'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma/_/phyag 'tshal trad ces bya dang 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]phaT kyis/_/pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma/_/g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te/_/me 'bar 'khrugs pa shin tu 'bar ma/_/phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen mo/_/bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma/_/chu skyes zhal ni khro 
[\[43a.2\]]gnyer ldan mdzad/_/dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma/_/phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya'i/_/sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma/_/ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i/_/rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrug ma/_/phyag 'tshal rab tu dga'
