[\[83b.3\]]par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don shes par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi shes na ngas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'o/_/ljon shing gang dang gang gi rtsa ba zil pa'i chu la bsnur na kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kha dog 'byung 
[\[83b.4\]]ba'i le'u ste sum cu so drug pa'o//_//gzhan yang rengs par bya ba'i sngags bshad par bya'o/_/oM dza la ya wa nA hU~M zhes pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don shes par 'gyur ro/_/oM wa ra wa ra/_pra wa ra pra wa ra hU~M zhes pa 
[\[83b.5\]]khri phrag gcig bzlas te phyi nas phogs bdun bzlas shing gdong bkru ba dang btung bar byas na/_thos pa tsam gyis zin pa dang /_bklags pa tsam gyis zin par 'gyur ro/_/oM pra wa ra hraHrab tu dgug pa'i sngags so/_/oM pA su ga ya li hU~M bskrad pa'i sngags so/_/
[\[83b.6\]]oM kha Ta pa tsa tra hraHgsad pa'i sngags so/_/oM ru a swA sa bi du paHrmugs par byed pa'i sngags so/_/oM haHhaHdzaHdgug pa'i sngags so/_/oM hi tiSh+Tha he baHhU~M mkha' 'gro ma 'ching ba'i sngags so/_/oM mAM raM hA 'byung po 'ching ba'i sngags so/_/AHswA hA bya 
[\[83b.7\]]khyung bcing ba'i sngags so/_/oM mAM hU~M bya bskrad pa'i sngags so/_/oM dz+waM raM me rengs par bya ba'i sngags so/_/oM dzaM dzaM dzaM chu rengs par bya ba'i sngags so/_/oM haM dzaM yaM swA hA ral gri rengs par bya ba'i sngags so/_/oM dzaM maM raM khu ba rengs par bya ba'i sngags so/_/
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dben pa'am rdo rje'i khyim mam khang stong rnams su gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la bya ba thams cad bya ba ni chang dang sha dang khrag dang ba lang sha rnams dang bcas pas sru mo dang /_ne 
[\[84a.2\]]ne mo dang /_sring mo dang /_tsha mo dang /_ma yar mo dang /_bu mo dang /_zhang po'i chung ma rnams la/_rnal 'byor pas snyoms par 'jug pa ni dang po ske nas 'khyud de/_mchu nas sos bzung la nu ma la sen mos brud mtshan mar sor mo gzhug go/_/de nas bskyod pa dang 
[\[84a.3\]]des b+ha ga tsum+ba na bya'o/_/oM gau ri heM ban d+ha mu hraM sarba gau ri ta/_dz+nyA naM da dA maN+Da la s+pho Ta ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/_/blo gros can gang gis 'di rnams byed pas nges par bde ba thams cad 'grub par 
[\[84a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/bza' ba dang btung ba dang ldan par rnal 'byor ma dang stabs gcig na/_lha mo u mA the tshom med par spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/_/dgun gyi dus na me tog ban d+hu spyi bor btags na spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 
[\[84a.5\]]las rengs par bya ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so bdun pa'o//_//gzhan yang mi rnams zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bshad par bya ste/_thab khung gru bzhi pa gting du khru phyed brus par sbyin sreg stong phrag bdun bya ba ni ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis oM k+ShaM sa 
[\[84a.6\]]ma sid+d+hi d+ha pa ya hrAM swA hA zhes pa dang bcas par gzhan du mi sems par ro/_/ar+g+ha dbul sbyin sreg thams cad du mar dang sbrang rtsi dbul lo/_/gal te ma grub na rgyud thams cad du bshad pa'i sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa po btags pa de rnams mi rigs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84a.7\]]'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste sum cu so brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang lha mos gsol pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das mi la bde ba ster bar 'gyur ba'i theg pa gang dang gang gi de kho na nyid nges par nyan par 'tshal bas sgrub pa po gang dang gang 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]gis bza' ba dang btung ba la longs spyad na lus 'grub pa la/_gal te gshe bar byed pa la chad pa ma bcad na/_ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dang gang gis khyod kyis chang 'thungs pa dang sring mo blangs pa dang sha chen po zos pa zhes smra na/_de'i tshe 
[\[84b.2\]]shing su b+ha any+dza nI'i rtsa ba brdungs pa chang gis phrul pa la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te de'i khar chang blugs nas phyis gsus pa la sngags bri zhing bzlas par bya ba ni/_oM ka ma le bi ma le/_ra taM sma rA mi che ge mo las ur+d+ho man+t+ra ma d+yA mAM saM haM haM haHhaHzhes pa'i sngags 
[\[84b.3\]]dran pa tsam gyis chang dang sha nges par skyug par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir che ge mos sring mo blangs pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang smra bar mi nus shing /_rang gi lus rnam par dag par yang byed do/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las ston mo dang shes rab 
[\[84b.4\]]mas rnam par dag par byed pa'i le'u ste sum cu so dgu pa'o//_//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos la sogs pa'i rim pas tshangs par spyod pa la brtan par gnas pa yongs su spyad par byas nas nyi ma rgas pa dang /_chen por gnas 
[\[84b.5\]]pas thams cad rab tu phye la/_rnga bo che dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_pa Ta ha chen po dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rdza rnga chen po dang /_tam bu ra dang /_gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra rdung lugs sna tshogs pa dang /_dri za rjes kyi glu la sogs pa'i sgra dang gar thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[84b.6\]]bya zhing dam tshig can dang stabs gcig tu gnas la/_phyi nas thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ni/_oM a shru Ni pra hU~M/_zhes pa 'di brjod na nges par nag po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs the tshom med par 'byung ngo /_/slad kyis thams cad 'grub 
[\[84b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rol mo'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dus shes pas shes bya thams cad rkang par mnan par bsams pas brlag par 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]'gyur ba ni shes pas bde ba thob par ji ltar bya na/_bsgom bya sgom byed bsgom pa spangs la/_brtan par gnas pa'i sbyor ba bsam du med par mthar gtugs kyi bar du nges par bya'o/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rab tu sbyor 
[\[85a.2\]]ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//gzhan yang byol song bskrad par bya ba'i sngags bshad par bya ste/_oM dzaM dzaM zhes pa dran par byas na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/haM raHzhes pa dran par byas na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/praHpraHzhes pa dran 
[\[85a.3\]]par byas na rta 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/Ta hU~M zhes pa dran par byas na seng ge 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/e hi TaM sa Na haHzhes pa dran par byas na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/muHzhes pa dran par byas na spre'u 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/gau wa gaHzhes pa dran par byas na glang 
[\[85a.4\]]'bros par 'gyur ro/_/saHku lu ku lu zhes pa dran par byas na rgyal pos cung zad kyang gnod pa bya bar nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las byol song bskrad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//gzhan yang mnyam par sbyor bas rje 
[\[85a.5\]]btsun rtogs te/_mchog tu zab pa la mnyam par sbyar na rang bzhin bde ba mchog tu 'gyur ba skye bas so/_/bde ba thob par byed pa ni sems ma yin zhing sems las byung ba yang ma yin no/_/dngos po dang dngos po med pa yang rtogs pa dang mi ldan pa blon po gcol chung 
[\[85a.6\]]mchog tu zab pa gang gis mi shes pa'i mi des gnyis su med pa'i ye shes tshig tsam du yang dran par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/_mnyam par sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi le'u bshad par 
[\[85a.7\]]bya ste/_steng 'og yang dag par mnan te/_lte ba'i dbus su zla ba bsgoms na zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i bug pa bkag ste thig le bsgoms na nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lce stengs su bkug na rgas pa dang shi ba las 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dgang ba dang /_dbyung ba dang /_bum pa can rim pa ji lta bar dran par byas na zla ba phyed kyis mkha' spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis yid bsad pa la zla ba'i sbyor ba bya ba ni sngags kyi sbyor ba rnam par byed pas skad cig tsam gyis kyang 'phrog ste/_
[\[85b.2\]]lag pa rab tu gcag par bya'o/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//'dir rnal 'byor pa gza' rnams kyi gtso bo bsgrubs nas yang dag pa'i bde ba shin tu khyab par byed pa'i sbyin bsreg bya ste/_
[\[85b.3\]]bdag nyid la gur gum dang /_sman ha re Nu dang khu ba dang dngul chu rnams lus la byugs na phas kyi dpung 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las phas kyi dpung 'joms pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//gzhan yang lha mos gsol 
[\[85b.4\]]pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang dang gang la sngags dang sman gyi nus pa 'grub par 'gyur gsungs shig nyan par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma thams cad bzang po yin te/_'on kyang dus tshod la ltos par rigs pas de'i phyir dus 
[\[85b.5\]]tshod brjod par bya'o/_/nyi ma ni lnga pa la'o/_/zla ba ni gnyis pa la'o/_/gza' rnams kyi gtso bo ni bdun pa la'o/_/sngags pa ni bzhi pa la'o/_/gza' lhag pa ni gsum pa la'o/_/mig dmar ni drug pa la'o/_/spen pa ni gcig pa la ste/_rang rang gi dus tshod nges 
[\[85b.6\]]par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gzung ba dang dor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o//_//gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid can gyis rmi lam brtags la sems can rnams kyi rmongs pa dang bral ba'i dus tshod dang rab tu ldan par bya ba'i 
[\[85b.7\]]phyir gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_tshes grangs kyi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]brjod par bya ste/_nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'am/_brgyad dam/_bcu'am/_tshes gcig rnams kyis ri dang /_chu stod dang /_me bzhi dang /_skag dang /_mchu dang /_nag pa dang /_tha skar dang /_bra nye dang /_smin drug rnams dang rab tu ldan 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]par bya'o/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las skar ma'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//gzhan yang nam yid ches pa'i dus su mkhas pas rgyu ba'i rtsa gnyis mnan par bya zhing /_shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa la nye bar gnas nas shes 
[\[86a.2\]]bya thams cad lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du mnan na 'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba the tshom med par thob pa ni yul rnams ye shes kyi mes bsregs nas sgyu ma snang ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang 'gro ba rnams kyis shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa bsam du med pa'i 
[\[86a.3\]]zhing bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor 'dis 'o ma 'thungs na lbu ba ltar dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/rlung phyir 'don cing dag par byas na dge ba bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dge ba bsam pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu 
[\[86a.4\]]rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//lha mos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam gyi cho ga'i rim pa bshad du gsol/_gang gis gang sbar la sbyin bsreg bya/_snying rje dang ldan pas sems can thams cad bde ba la ji ltar dgod/_dang por dngos grub 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas nas sbyin 
[\[86a.5\]]bsreg bya'o/_/myur ba ni rtag pa bstan na bde ba'i rang bzhin ye shes go ste/_skad cig de la lus can rnams kyis ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las lam gyi cho ga'i rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//gzhan yang a tharba sha ba rI'i 
[\[86a.6\]]sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/oM sarba man+t+ra Ni dA naM k+She maM ra~M hU~M k+ShaHhaHzhes pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phogs gcig bklags pa tsam gyis sgrub pa po rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad tshegs med par zad par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las a tharba sha ba rI'i sngags kyi le'u 
[\[86a.7\]]ste lnga bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//ldang 'phrul gyi gtsug lag khang chen po ra sa ra mo cher pha rgyal khams pas zhus pa'i don du/_paN+Di ta chen poman+ta shrI dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rwa dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba//_//
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]{D441}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ya thA la b+d+ha kha sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/_/
[\[86b.2\]]sa gsum kun gyi snying po dang ldan pa/_/dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad/_/de ni mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o/_/gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag pa/_/byis pa 'di ni don dam sgom pa yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin mthong 
[\[86b.3\]]min te/_/sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_/rin chen tog dang pad ldan 'jug pa ste/_/lha de rnams kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/dang po'i chos las de rnams 'byung ba ste/_/mkha' dang lhan cig 
[\[86b.4\]]sems can khams rnams kyang /_/gzhug rnams su ni bstan bcos tshad mar byas/_/gdod nas dag pa'i go 'phang mkha' mnyam mtshungs/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan dang yang ldan/_/gang zhig chos de nyid kyi rang bzhin can/_/sa gsum po yi chos ni 'byung 
[\[86b.5\]]'gyur ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la ni phyag 'tshal ba'i/_/bsod nams kyang ni mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal bas/_/chos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'thob par 'gyur/_/sems can 
[\[86b.6\]]thams cad yongs su bsgom par yang /_/bya ba 'di ni thar pa'i rang bzhin no/_/dngos kun rdo rje sems dpar dag byas pa'i/_/thar pa chos kyi rang bzhin bya ba ste/_/chos 'di 'jig pa med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/'jig rten pas ni rang bzhin gzhan du byas/_/'di 
[\[86b.7\]]ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dag ni/_/chos 'di yi ni dang po 'byung ba ste/_/rnal 'byor gnas ni lha mo skul byed ma/_/der ni dang por chos rnams 'byung 'gyur ba'o/_/der ni sngags rnams rdo rje gcig dngos bsgom/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dngos dmigs sam/_/
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis kyang rab brgyan cing /_/sku mdog kyang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin can/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dge ba ste/_/gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni bsgom par bya/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus gnas par/_/
[\[87a.2\]]yi ge bskyed pa nyid du bsam par bya/_/yi ge'i gzugs ni yongs su gyur pa las/_/rdo rje rang bzhin nyid du bsam par bya/_/mchu yi mtha' ni sngags pas bsgom bya ba/_/rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin te/_/gnyis su med pa'i sku yi rang bzhin can/_/
[\[87a.3\]]rdo rje sems dpa' dmigs par bya ba'o/_/'di ni sems nyid yongs su grub pa ste/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa yis ni gsungs pa yin/_/gang zhig bsgom pa 'di yis sgom byed pa/_/sems kyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di ni lha mo bzhi rnams 
[\[87a.4\]]ro gcig pa'o/_/ngo bo blos ni mkha' dang mnyam las bsgom/_/de lta'i chos byas sems kyi rang bzhin te/_/lha mo thar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bsgom/_/rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong ba/_/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can/_/rnal 'byor gnas dang rol 
[\[87a.5\]]pa ste/_/thams cad mnyam pa'i btsun mor bcas/_/bkod pa dag dang ldan par gnas/_/mkhas bcas dngos las byung de la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gang mthong bar/_/gzung ba sangs rgyas spro bsdu'o/_/bzhi yi ngo bo lha mo bzhi/_/dbus su nges par 
[\[87a.6\]]gnas pa ste/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis/_/sa gsum la ni khyab pa'o/_/lha yi der ni kha bzhi pa'i/_/lha tshogs rdo rje nyid yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/_/rnam 'phrul thams cad 'di yi'o/_/ci lta ci ltar sems can rnams/_/skye bar 
[\[87a.7\]]'gyur ba lan nyid de/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul ni/_/sna tshogs rdo rje yin par 'gyur/_/de las gang byung lha kun kyang /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin/_/sems can rnams ni chos kyi ngo bor blta/_/sa gsum thams cad gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]rol pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs shing /_/de yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma kun mthong /_/lha yi dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o//_//rtag tu mchog ldan khyod kyi ni/_/dam tshig lha mo thams cad kyi/_mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo ni/_/du mchis bdag cag 
[\[87b.2\]]zhu bar 'tshal/_/de la glu bzhi gsungs pa ste/_/steng dang dbyer med byas pa'i chos mnyam rang snang ma/_/zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog tu mnyam byed ma/_/gang phyir sgyu ma'i mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam/_/mkha' mnyam thams cad rol pa zhi ba med pa'o/_/
[\[87b.3\]]ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ru d+ha/_mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun du rol pa ste/_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos mnyam snang /_/lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pi wang mtshungs/_/byas pa'i snang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o/_/gang zhig chos rnams snang 
[\[87b.4\]]ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/_/der ni rdo rje mdzad pa gzugs can lta bu ste/_/rdo rje'i theg pa der ni gzugs sogs 'dod yon gyi/_/bde ba mi zad sna tshogs dang mnyam stsol mdzad pa'o/_/rnal 'byor gnas ni du ma'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni/_/du ma'i gzugs 
[\[87b.5\]]'dzin der ni rdo rje dang mnyam zhing /_/nyid dang 'dra ba'i sems dpa' rnams ni spro mdzad pa'i/_/rdo rje dbyings dang lhan cig mchog stsol mdzad/_/rang bdag mkha' mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni/_/gang zhig rtse gcig sems kyis 'di nyan cing /_/brjod 
[\[87b.6\]]bcas sems kyi glu 'di 'dzin pa'o/_/glu 'di nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa ste/_/der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sad byed cing /_/rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ni rgyud kyang len par 'gyur/_/'di ni rdo rje'i tshig ste rdo rje 
[\[87b.7\]]gzhan rang bzhin/_/sngags pas thugs chud dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing /_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pad mchog der bsgom pa/_/dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni hU~M gi dbye ba can/_/gzugs rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par brtag_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]thugs kyi ngo bo ra gcig bsam rdo rje theg pa'o/_/sems ni mkha' mnyam sems kyi theg pa rang bzhin med/_/gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yang ni lus can ma yin te/_/der ni rdo rje la ni med pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i rang 
[\[88a.2\]]bzhin te/_/'jig rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad/_/sems can 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du ni sad mdzad pa/_/kye lags rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i dngos/_/lha mo bzhis smras rdo rje kun tu spangs pa ste/_/nang du gnas pa rdo rje rol par ldan pa dang /_/
[\[88a.3\]]thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis der ni rab tu gnas/_/thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos ni rnam par 'byung ba'o/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje spro bya zhing /_/spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsdu byas te/_/sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir ro/_/sems ni 'gog par gyur pa 
[\[88a.4\]]na/_/kun kyang mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong /_/yang dang yang du sngags bsdus pas/_/gcig pa'i rnam par bya ba'o/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du/_/chos rnams kyi ni rang 
[\[88a.5\]]bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/_/gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yi dngos po ste/_/de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsungs/_/bram ze dang ni khyi dag gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing /_/rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[88a.6\]]go 'phang de la len pa'i rang bzhin no/_/rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i ngo bor des mthong ste/_/de dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la sbas/_/de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni/_/lha mo thams cad der ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/_/gtso 
[\[88a.7\]]bo dang bcas mdzes pa gcig pu 'byung gyur khyod/_/mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu ste/_/rdo rje rnam par sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid/_/der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste/_/yan lag phyed pa'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/der ni 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin/_/gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe/_/lha yi g.yon gyi phyed dang gcig tu gyur par blta/_/lung nyid tshad mar byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' de bsgom bya/_/gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//
[\[88b.2\]]glang po dang ni rta dang mi dang khyi dang ni/_/ba lang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams/_/dam tshig de nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te/_/mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyis rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i/_/dam tshig 'di ni lha mo bzhi pos gsungs pa'o/_/rnal 
[\[88b.3\]]'byor pa la bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cing /_/sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te/_/dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying po ste/_/'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs 
[\[88b.4\]]bya zhing /_/de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dpyad par bya/_/lha 'di rnam snang lha mo lnga rnams de'i bdag nyid/_/rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te/_/skul byed mas ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro/_/gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te skur mthong ba/_/
[\[88b.5\]]rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di skad gsungs/_/bden pa bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs/_/'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom pa rdo rje'i gsang sngags te/_/de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgom pa/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse 
[\[88b.6\]]gsum pa nyid do/_/rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom/_/ngas ni rdo rje'i theg par 'di skad du/_/chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan/_/sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos 
[\[88b.7\]]bcas lus bsgom min/_/lha mos skul ba byed pa'i dngos po ste/_/de ltar chos las nges par brtag bya bas/_/sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_/dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa ste/_/sems 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin can/_/snga ma ci bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya/_/ci ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste/_/dngos po 'di ni theg par 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_/dbus 
[\[89a.2\]]su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par/_/sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste/_/rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya ba'o/_/ci ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu/_/'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor bsgrub/_/de ltar bstan du 
[\[89a.3\]]med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi rang bzhin gyis/_/bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste/_/de la rdo rje'i chu ni yi dam lha yi rang bzhin can/_/thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya/_/chos dang dge 'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste de rnams mnyam 
[\[89a.4\]]pa'i rang bzhin te/_/zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya/_/bza' dang bca' dang mal stan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin/_/gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig pa'i 
[\[89a.5\]]rang bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum char ra rdo rje'i ngo bor mdzad/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje can gyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs/_/de yi rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur/_/sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par 
[\[89a.6\]]bstan pa yis/_/rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste/_/sems can rang bzhin la ni theg par med/_/sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o/_/de lta'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi/_/sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/_/thugs dang spro dang slar yang 
[\[89a.7\]]bsdus bya ba/_/gsum car yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no/_/sems ni ri rab hU~M dang mnyam byas te/_/dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed/_/sems dub gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag_/der ni sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya/_/bsdus pa'i ngo bos 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]slar yang sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' der ni sku g.yos mdzad/_/slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te/_/de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de la rdo rje sems dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir/_/de'i phyir spro ba'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs/_/sngags 
[\[89b.2\]]pas brtan par gyur na spro/_/brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa/_/lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi 'byin/_/nges par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos/_/thams cad bden pa 'di rnams bstan/_/de lta'i chos ni bsgom pa yi/_/dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/_/mkha' 
[\[89b.3\]]dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya/_/gang yang dri ma cis kyang gos pa min/_/kye rnal 'byor pa/_bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje bskyed par bsgoms pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad pa'o/_/lha mo rnams ni lha dang gcig pa'i 
[\[89b.4\]]rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa bskyed mdzad pa'o/_/rjes su 'dzin pas bsgom pa'i sems dang ni/_/yi ge hU~M gis kyang ni de 'grub 'gyur/_/brla dang rkang pa dag tu rnam rtog pa'i/_/rmongs pa yid la bya ba ma yin no/_/'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor 
[\[89b.5\]]lo 'di nyid ni/_/rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis ni yang dag bcings/_/sngags pas nam mkha'i khams su khro bo'i lha/_/bye ba stong phrag dag ni spro bya ste/_/gcig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni/_/slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yin/_/byang chub theg pa sems kyi rang 
[\[89b.6\]]bzhin te/_/byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/_/gnyis ka rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste/_/sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no/_/rgyud gzhan dang thun mong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam 
[\[89b.7\]]pa'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po tAk+Sha ka ga Na dang /_lo tsA ba mang 'or dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]{D442}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta ra ha s+yo gu h+ya sa mA dza nA ma ma hA kalpa rA dza/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po/_dpal 
[\[90a.2\]]rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/_/brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi 
[\[90a.3\]]lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[90a.4\]]dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[90a.5\]]dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje 
[\[90a.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[90a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang /_de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]phra rab snyed rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 
[\[90b.2\]]'od dpag med dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa dang de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[90b.3\]]kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad shin tu yongs su gang bar snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 
[\[90b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa de dag nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku 
[\[90b.5\]]bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to/_/de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par ro/_/la la ni mA ma kI'i rnam par ro/_/la la ni gos dkar mo'i rnam par ro/_/la la ni dam 
[\[90b.6\]]tshig sgrol ma'i rnam par yang dag par gnas par gyur to/_/la la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo'i rnam pas/_la la ni sgra'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/_la la ni dri'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/_la la ni ro'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/_la la ni reg bya'i ngo bo'i rnam pas yang dag par gnas par gyur to/_/
[\[90b.7\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gru bzhi rdul med pa dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa ni/_gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du rgyas/_/sangs rgyas sprin ni kun 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]tu bkram/_/me stag 'phro ba mang po 'khrug_/gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de/_de bzhin 
[\[91a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag nyid bzhag par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[91a.3\]]don yod grub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis 
[\[91a.4\]]gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu/_de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par 
[\[91a.5\]]gyur to/_/de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[91a.6\]]pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rig pa chen po skyes bu'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[91a.7\]]kyis byin gyis brlabs so/_/byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs ka nas mngon par byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/byang chub sems ni rab 'jug pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/rab 
[\[91b.2\]]tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa'i dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi rin po che'i sprin 
[\[91b.3\]]gyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/rdo rje snying po btus pa yi/_/de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[91b.4\]]gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so/_/'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom 
[\[91b.5\]]skye bar byed pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa 
[\[91b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can la yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[91b.7\]]gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ba dang /_yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang /_mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[92a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/_ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i 
[\[92a.3\]]snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/badzra d+h+rika_/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis nag 
[\[92a.4\]]po dkar po dmar po'i rnam pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[92a.5\]]te gti mug gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dzi na dzika_/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 
[\[92a.6\]]chen por sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis dkar po nag po dmar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya 
[\[92a.7\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rat+na d+h+r-ika_/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rin chen tog gi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba nam mkha' mchog gi gnas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i g.yas phyogs su bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[92b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/A ro lika_/de nas 'di phyung 
[\[92b.3\]]ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis dmar po nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[92b.4\]]thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod mchog gi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying 
[\[92b.5\]]po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/pradz+nyA d+h-ika_/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis ljang khu 
[\[92b.6\]]nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so/_/zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/_/yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste/_/rigs ni lnga po 'di rnams nyid/_/'dod dang thar par bsgrub pa'o/_/
[\[92b.7\]]de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dwe Sha ra ti/_de 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/_shar phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[93a.2\]]pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/mo ha ra ti/_de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[93a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa/_rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[93a.4\]]snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rA ga ra ti/_de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i 
[\[93a.5\]]skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 
[\[93a.6\]]'chang ba rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/badzra ra ti/_de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/_byang gi grwar 
[\[93a.7\]]bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/ya mAn+ta krIta/_de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas shar 
[\[93b.2\]]phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di 
[\[93b.3\]]nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/prarlun+ta kr-ita/_de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[93b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung 
[\[93b.5\]]thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/pad man+ta kr-ita/_de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/_/
[\[93b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs 
[\[93b.7\]]rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/big+han+ta kr-ita/_de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/_/
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung dang thugs mnyes par byed pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[94a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal 
[\[94a.3\]]nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/snying po sku gsung thugs mchog ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung 
[\[94a.4\]]thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed 
[\[94a.5\]]kyis sems lus kyi rnam pa dang /_lus sems kyi rnam pa dang /_sems tshig tu brjod pas skyed cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni nam mkha' lta 
[\[94a.6\]]bur yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma ho kun du bzang po yi/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can/_/skye ba med pa sbyor ba yis/_/skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 
[\[94a.7\]]gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/dngos po med la sgom pa med/_/bsgom pa 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bsgom pa ma yin nyid/_/de ltar dngos po dngos med de/_/sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 
[\[94b.2\]]mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/dngos po thams cad rnam bral phung po khams/_/skye mched gzung ba 'dzin 
[\[94b.3\]]pa rnam spangs pa/_/chos bdag med mnyam nyid kyis rang gi sems/_/gdod nas ma skyes stong nyid rang bzhin no/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 
[\[94b.4\]]mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa/_/chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/_/nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par/_/byang 
[\[94b.5\]]chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[94b.6\]]snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing /_/chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/_/chos bdag med las kun tu byung /_/byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[94b.7\]]pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas ye shes 'od zer sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med/_/nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/_/'dis ni dngos po rab tu bsgrags/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das/_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[95a.2\]]pa rdo rje don yod grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/_/byang chub 
[\[95a.3\]]sems cing mngon rtogs med/_/byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas gsungs so/_/de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[95a.4\]]gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/_/chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che/_/yang dag don ni dag pa'i don/_/byang chub 
[\[95a.5\]]sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi bdag med yang dag byung /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa/_/rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med/_/byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun du bzang po thams cad don/_/byang chub sems ni rab skor ba/_/
[\[95a.6\]]byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che/_/byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dag_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa/_/byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[95a.7\]]sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]'phro ba sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/_/oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste/_/
[\[95b.2\]]'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che/_/sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam/_/'od zer lnga ni kun du khyab/_/kun nas yongs su zlum po ste/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis spras/_/mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/_/bsgom par byas nas bsdus pa yis/_/
[\[95b.3\]]gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che/_/sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_phyag rgya yang ni bsgom par bya/_/bsdus pa gnyis med sbyor ba yis/_/mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog rab dang /_/
[\[95b.4\]]rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che/_/tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang /_/don grub phyag rgya chen po rnams/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/_/rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/_/
[\[95b.5\]]rnam par gtsigs gsal 'jigs su rung /_/shel dang zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra/_/thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_/rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan/_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[95b.6\]]sprin ni kun du 'khrigs/_/rtse mo dgu pa'i rdo rje che/_/de yi phyag tu rnam par bsgom/_/ma ra ka ta'i 'od 'dra ba/_/rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/_/kun du 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab/_/phyag na rin chen bsnams par bsgom/_/pad ma rA ga'i mdog 
[\[95b.7\]]'dra ba/_/gtso bo 'dod chags 'od 'bar 'chang /_/rab 'bar phyag na pad ma bsnams/_/'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya/_/'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i/_/sna tshogs don yod rdo rje can/_/zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]du ni bsgom/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 
[\[96a.2\]]'di gsungs so/_/oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_rin chen chen po kha dog lnga/_/yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/_/sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/_/rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu bsgom/_/rin chen brtan par gyur na spro/_/brtan par ma gyur yong mi spro/_/
[\[96a.3\]]sangs rgyas 'bar ba mnyan pa'i 'od/_/rab mchog sprin rnams spro bar bya/_/'khor lo rdo rje rin chen ches/_/pad ma ral gri mtshon cha 'dzin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams/_/spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas 
[\[96a.4\]]par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/pad ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gsal/_/pad ma sgom pas bsgom par bya/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag gsal/_/
[\[96a.5\]]rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya/_/sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya/_/sangs rgyas rab mchog 'di rnams nyid/_/sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul 
[\[96a.6\]]thob pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/_/
[\[96a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]dam pa bshad du gsol/_/mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/_/mtshan nyid min pa thams cad spangs/_/kun du bzang po sku yi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba/_/ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong mdzad/_/
[\[96b.2\]]kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/sems can kun gyi sems chen po/_/rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med/_/kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/
[\[96b.3\]]'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa/_/'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso/_/'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[96b.4\]]nyams dga' rab tu bshad/_/de nas de phyir thugs dkyil 'khor/_/mchog thugs rdo rje rab 'dra ba/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag rab bshad bya/_/lus dang ngag sems bsgoms pa yis/_/shes rab can gyis thig 
[\[96b.5\]]gdab pa/_/thig skud sar pa legs bkal ba/_/tshad ma bzang po mdzes pa yis/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/_/ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhi dang /_/sgo bzhi bar ni rab tu brtag_/de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/_/rab 
[\[96b.6\]]tu zlum po bri bar bya/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/_/de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya/_/de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni/_/in dra nIla'i kha dog 'dra/_/'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa/_/'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed/_/shar du 'khor lo chen po ni/_/rdo rje 'bar bas 
[\[96b.7\]]rnam par brgyan/_/lho ru rin chen chen po ni/_/'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs/_/nub tu pad+ma chen po ni/_/pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra/_/byang du ral gri chen po ni/_/'od zer 'bar ba rab 'khrigs bri/_/dbus su sprin ni zhi ba'i 'od/_/spyan ni shar gyi gla 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ru bri/_/mA ma kI yi rigs byung ba'i/_/rdo rje de bzhin lho ru'o/_/pad ma kha bye sdong bur bcas/_/nub tu kun du bri bar bya/_/byang du ut+pal mdzes pa ni/_/mthing ka sprin dang 'dra ba bri/_/tho ba kun nas 'od mdzes 'bar/_/shar gyi sgor ni bri bar 
[\[97a.2\]]bya/_/rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba/_/dbyug pa lho ru kun du bri/_/pad ma ral gri 'bar 'od byed/_/nub tu kun du bri bar bya/_/rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje can/_/byang du rdo rje bri bar bya/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de/_/yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas/_/
[\[97a.3\]]lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis/_/nan tan du ni mchod par bya/_/btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba/_/lo grangs bcu drug la rnyed nas/_/dri dang me tog brgyan byas te/_/de dbus su ni 'dod pa bya/_/yon tan ske rags mA ma kI/_/shes rab can gyis 
[\[97a.4\]]de byin brlabs/_/zhi ba spro bya sangs rgyas gnas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan/_/bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes/_/de bzhin 
[\[97a.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_/kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi/_/rdo 
[\[97a.6\]]rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni/_/gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis/_/spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don/_/spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to/_/rnam par mi rtog don las byung /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'khrugs/_/theg pa'i mchog ni bla na med/_/
[\[97a.7\]]rab mchog dngos grub sgrub par byed/_/gdol pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs/_/gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams/_/theg chen bla na med pa yi/_/theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/_/sems can mtshams med las sogs pa/_/sdig pa chen po byed pa yang /_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]de rnams kun kyang theg pa che/_/mchog gi sgrub pa 'dir 'grub 'gyur/_/slob dpon smod pa po gzhan dag_/bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yong mi 'gyur/_/srog gcod pa yi sems can gang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra la dga' ba dang /_/gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang /_/
[\[97b.2\]]rtag tu 'dod pa spyod dga' gang /_/bshang gci zas su za ba ste/_/de rnams sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur/_/ma dang sring mo bu mo la/_/sgrub po gang gis 'dod byas na/_/theg chen mchog gi chos su ni/_/dngos grub rgya chen des 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas gtso 
[\[97b.3\]]bo'i yum dag la/_/mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te/_/de ni blo can rnam mi rtog_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/_
[\[97b.4\]]rmad du byung bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams 
[\[97b.5\]]cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gsan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma smra cig_/chos nyid dag 'di sangs rgyas ni/_/snying 
[\[97b.6\]]po ye shes can rnams kyi/_/snying po'i chos kyi don byung ba/_/'di dag byang chub spyod pa'i gnas/_/de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 
[\[97b.7\]]skrag la brgyal bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid gnyis su 
[\[98a.2\]]med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas 
[\[98a.3\]]par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur/_dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas chos kyi dbyangs 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/_/e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba/_/chos don dag pa bdag med 
[\[98a.4\]]pa/_/rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas/_/rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med/_/rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso/_/dus gsum dag gi lam du 
[\[98a.5\]]'byung /_/nam mkha' chen por khams gyur pa/_/nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/nam mkha'i sku las yang dag byung /_/nam mkha'i lam la gnas pa po/_/nam mkha'i thugs te chos kyi mchog_/spyod pa'i gnas khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[98a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las kun du spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang 
[\[98a.7\]]ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje 
[\[98b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang /_/gnas dang gnas ni rnam par bsgom pa ste/_/de dag 
[\[98b.3\]]nyid mchog rab kyi sngags kyi ni/_/mtshan nyid mtshan ma bsgrub pa nyid du bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta 
[\[98b.4\]]thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako\u0f85 haM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas rdo rje don yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_rtag 
[\[98b.5\]]tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas/_/sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya/_/mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos 
[\[98b.6\]]gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang chen 'di gsungs so/_/sngags dmigs pa yi lus kyis ni/_/ngag dang yid la 
[\[98b.7\]]bskul byas pas/_/bsgrub bya rab mchog dngos grub dang /_/yid ni yang dag dga' mdzes pa/_/sems kyi dmigs pa bdag med pa/_/ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom/_/rnam gsum sbyor ba nam mkha' dang /_/mnyam nyid gnas ni grub par bya/_/lus dang 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]ngag dang sems dmigs pa'i/_/ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med/_/sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis/_/byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di/_/rnam par dpyad nas bsdu ba yis/_/byang chub sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin/_/
[\[99a.2\]]sngags kyi brtags pa bsgom par bya/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/_/sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis/_/sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[99a.3\]]'khor bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas/_/phra mo'i sbyor ba kun du brtsam/_/sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam/_/yungs kar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/_/ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba/_/gsang ba'i ye shes brtags pa bsgom/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[99a.4\]]dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te/_/de yi steng du gnas dgod do/_/hU~M nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/spyan gyi tshul gyi 
[\[99a.5\]]sbyor ba la/_/de nas pad ma rdo rje sgom/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis/_/de yi steng du yongs su bsgom/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[99a.6\]]bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro/_/'khor dag khyad par dag tu spro/_/ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba/_/rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du/_/nas kyi 'bru tshad nan tan gyis/_/sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam/_/tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad kyi/_/'dab ma brgyad pa 
[\[99a.7\]]ge sar bcas/_/sna yi rtse mor 'di shis te/_/byang chub gzhol bas bsgom par bya/_/'khor lo la sogs khyad par du/_/bsgom pa der ni brtag par bya/_/dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas/_/nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]chub gnas rnams ni/_/bsdu bas der ni spro bar bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yi/_/chos kyi gnas ni rab tu dbyung /_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/de nyid don kun ston pa pos/_/spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa/_/gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to/_/
[\[99b.2\]]gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa/_/shes rab can gyis zla drug bsgom/_/gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen ni/_/legs mchod nas kyang bsgom par bya/_/zas su bshang gci bya ba'i phyir/_/dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pas bya/_/bla med de nyid 'grub pa ni/_/sangs 
[\[99b.3\]]rgyas byang chub skyon med pa'o/_/sha yang bza' bar bya ba'i phyir/_/sha chen po ni rab tu brtag_/gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/_/de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha/_/zas kyi phyir ni 
[\[99b.4\]]bza' bar bya/_/gzhan zas bza' bar yang mi bya/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo can yang /_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/_/'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten du/_/go 'phang 
[\[99b.5\]]las ni byed par 'gyur/_/stobs ldan gtso bo gzi brjid can/_/mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong /_/mthong ba tsam gyis bskul med par/_/'jig rten 'di dag dbang byed 'gyur/_/'di ni thams cad sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste/_/
[\[99b.6\]]yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/_/lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[99b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa mchog rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa/_/bsten pas ji ltar 'dod pa 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]las/_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/nges par sangs rgyas myur thob 'gyur/_/'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bsten bya zhing /_/rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/_/bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/_/dka' thub nges pa mi bzad 
[\[100a.2\]]pas/_/bstan pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/_/'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pas/_/bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/slongs mo za zhing mi bzlas te/_/slong la dga' bar yang mi bya/_/'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing /_/sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams 
[\[100a.3\]]bzlas/_/lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/_/bder gnas thob na byang chub 'thob/_/gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang /_/dmyal bar nges par bsreg par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas/_/chos dang 
[\[100a.4\]]mi 'gyur mchog brnyes rnams/_/'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so/_/chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis/_/'dod yon lnga rnams rtag tu brten/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya/_/byang chub nyi ma chags par bya/_/gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas 
[\[100a.5\]]nas/_/mchod pa'i bdag nyid can mchod bya/_/de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/_/sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung 
[\[100a.6\]]gnas gtso/_/dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya/_/de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/_/ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/de nyid sangs rgyas sna 
[\[100a.7\]]tshogs pa/_/sangs rgyas don yod rdo rje 'dzin/_/reg bya rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya/_/de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes rnams/_/gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la/_/rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/_/'di 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o/_/gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis/_/lha rnams nyid du rtag tu bsgom/_/yang na de la rigs kyi ni/_/dbye ba rnam par bsgoms pas bsgom/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor/_/chos 
[\[100b.2\]]ni rjes su dran sgom pa/_/lus dang ngag dang sems ni bsgom/_/rdo rje rjes su dran sgom pa/_/rigs ni rjes dran sbyor ba las/_/khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa/_/dam tshig rjes dran sbyor ba las/_/bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bud med gzugs ldan mdangs 
[\[100b.3\]]bzang ba/_/lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas/_/byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas gsum gyis/_/dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo che/_/spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[100b.4\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/yi ge hU~M dang oM dag dang /_/phaT kyang rnam par brtag par bya/_/'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi/_/rdo rje pad mo bsgom par bya/_/de ni 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin/_/yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs/_/
[\[100b.5\]]byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya/_/de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_/b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/_/mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro/_/de la chos rjes su 
[\[100b.6\]]dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/_/rdo rje chos ni rab bsgom bya/_/ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/_/mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/_/de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[100b.7\]]dpa' rnam par bsgom/_/ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/_/rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya/_/de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu bsgom/_/ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse bar nas/_/mkhas 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro/_/de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/_/khro bo'i dbang po rab tu bsgom/_/ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/_/mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro/_/de la dam tshig rjes su dran 
[\[101a.2\]]pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/_/rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod/_/de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag 
[\[101a.3\]]ste/_/mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag_/rnal 'byor pa ni chen pos dbyung /_/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya/_/de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang zhig_/phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas/_/sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis/_/
[\[101a.4\]]bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig_/de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang zhig_/nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs/_/bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar/_/chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig_/de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar 
[\[101a.5\]]bsgom zhe na/_kun du bzang po'i thugs gang zhig_/gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa/_/bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang 'drar gyur cig_/de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/_/sku dang gsung dang 
[\[101a.6\]]thugs kyi mtshan/_/bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra zhing /_/mkha' dang mtshungs par dpa' bo rnams/_/de la sngags kyi gzugs dang sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin/_/gsung gi sku ni rnam 
[\[101a.7\]]bsgom pa/_/bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sku/_/rtag tu sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam/_/de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_dam tshig khu chu cho ga bzhin/_/'bras bu 'dod pas btung bya zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs gsad bya/_/dngos 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/_/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/skye ba med cing zag pa med/_/byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/_/khams kyang med cing 'byung ba med/_/
[\[101b.2\]]de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_rang bzhin 'od gsal de nas ni/_/nam mkha' mtshan med mi 'gyur des/_/gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi/_/shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin/_/de la zhe sdang gi rigs kyi mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar 
[\[101b.3\]]bsgom zhe na/_bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/_/lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed nas/_/rigs kyi sbyor ba'i rab dbye bas/_/rang gi khu bas mchod par bya/_/'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dag dang /_/chos 'dzin mchog 
[\[101b.4\]]gi gsung dag ni/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub/_/dman skyes gang gzhan bshad pa rnams/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/bzlas pas de la 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[101b.5\]]gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dam pa'i dbang 
[\[101b.6\]]phyug rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/rdo rje rgyal po theg pa che/_/nam mkha'i spyod pas rnam sbyong ba/_/kun du bzang po'i spyod pa mchog_/rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/_/
[\[101b.7\]]rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog_/rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol/_/thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa/_/theg pa gsum gyi lam 'jug mdzad/_/sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag_/mi mchog mchod 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa bshad du gsol/_/byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/_/sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag_/rdo rje theg pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/_/thams 
[\[102a.2\]]cad dbang bskur kun gyi don/_/kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog_/rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed gnas/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog_/rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad/_/na chung yangs pa'i mig can 
[\[102a.3\]]ni/_/gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan rnyed nas/_/lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon gzung /_/byol song las kyang rab tu brtag_/sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am/_/rgyal ba nyid skyes zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas/_/bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa yang /_/rgyal 
[\[102a.4\]]ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya/_/nu ma'i dbus gang spyi gtsug mtha' dbus su/_/cho ga shes pas rkang pa'i bar du yang /_/lte ba ro smad gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras/_/rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/
[\[102a.5\]]ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom/_/mkhas pas zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin/_/snying gar gang zhig 'dod pa ni/_/bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya/_/mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/_/'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/_/ye shes 
[\[102a.6\]]rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi/_/gnas su gyur par rnam par bsam/_/rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas/_/mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro/_/mkhas pas ut+pa la dag dang /_/pad ma rnam pa lnga shes bya/_/dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/lha rnams la ni dbul 
[\[102a.7\]]bar bya/_/me tog kar ni ka ra dang /_/mal+li ka dang ya thi ka/_/me tog ka ra bI ra yang /_/bsams nas mchod pa rab tu brtag_/dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya zhing /_/rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni/_/rigs rnams 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rab tu dgod par bya/_/de bzhin pad ma rdo rje dang /_/ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas bsgom/_/dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la/_/gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi/_/mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/_/gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/rigs rnams gnas ni mchod 
[\[102b.2\]]pa'i phyir/_/shes rab can gyis bsgom par bya/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/_/de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam/_/rin chen na bza' la sogs pas/_/byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/_/mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis/_/rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya/_/
[\[102b.3\]]rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog_/rin chen sna tshogs la sogs brgyan/_/bsgrub cing rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/rin chen bdun gyis yongs bkang ba'i/_/zhing 'di rnam par mkhas pas ni/_/ye shes 'dod pas dngos grub 
[\[102b.4\]]'dod/_/nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul/_/bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag la/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/_/'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la/_/reg bya'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/dkyil 
[\[102b.5\]]'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya/_/rang lus de bzhin gshegs rang bzhin/_/bshang ba gci bas bla ma mchod/_/bzhin bzang yid du 'ong ba yi/_/na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa/_/byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te/_/de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag_/
[\[102b.6\]]mig yangs khu ba blangs nas ni/_/brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pas bza'/_/'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/_/ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang /_/sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[102b.7\]]kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/_/thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog_/kun don dbang 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]phyug dam pa yis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod pa/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/_/sangs rgyas theg pa can la gsang /_/nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 
[\[103a.2\]]'khor bsgom par bya/_/mi bskyod rdo rje rab bsgoms nas/_/lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang /_/'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang /_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag_/sku gsung 
[\[103a.3\]]thugs kyi longs spyod ni/_/rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa/_/bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni/_/thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsang ba 'di yis ni/_/sems can thams cad bsad na ni/_/mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing du ni/_/
[\[103a.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/_/'di ni rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho nar shes par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa/_/ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med/_/byang chub spyod pa rab ston 
[\[103a.5\]]pas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa yi/_/yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/_/rin 
[\[103a.6\]]chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag_/nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su/_/rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par bsgom/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yis/_/nor gyi rgya mtshos rab gang 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang /_/thub 
[\[103a.7\]]pa'i skyes bu rnams su 'gyur/_/'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las gti mug gi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig tu shes par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa/_/gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]rab tu bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/'od dpag med ni rab bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad ni/_/dgang zhing de ru thams cad ni/_/btsun mo'i rnam pa'i 
[\[103b.2\]]sbyor bar bsgom/_/dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/_/'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog go/_/dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/_/de dag thams cad nye bar spyad/_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/mi phyed sku gsum sgrub pa'o/_/'di ni 'dod chags 
[\[103b.3\]]kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/_sngags pas bsgom par bya ba nyid do/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa/_/ye shes las byung bdag med pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus 
[\[103b.4\]]gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje don yod rab bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi ngag ni rdo rje'i gnas/_/thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/_/rgyal ba'i gnas ni thams cad dang /_/rgyal ba 
[\[103b.5\]]thams cad bslu bar bya/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa/_/ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang /_/sngags kyi dngos grub byed par bshad/_/'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/_don ji lta ba 
[\[103b.6\]]bzhin du spro bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje gsum mi phyed rgyal gnas/_/dngos grub rdo rje rab ston pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/rin chen 
[\[103b.7\]]tog tu rab bsgoms te/_/gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang /_/rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa yis/_/bsten na ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung bar gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[104a.2\]]bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las 'das pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu rmad du byung ba'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i 
[\[104a.3\]]slad du gsung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad 
[\[104a.4\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang /_smad pa'i 'du shes 'di lta bu ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni mchog gi spyod pa'o/_/gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[104a.5\]]kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad la rjes su song ba ste/_chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o/_/de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/_gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/_gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/_
[\[104a.6\]]'byung ba chen po bzhi la mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o/_/'di lta bu'i don gyi dbang mkhyen nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta 
[\[104a.7\]]bu nyid kyi nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsub shing dang /_gtsub stan dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba rab tu 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/_
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/_gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/_mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig rjes su rig par bya ste/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pas zhes pa'o/_/
[\[104b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur pas ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang /_/rnam par mi rtog dag pa la/_/kun rdzob yang ni 
[\[104b.3\]]bshad pa mtshar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/_don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[104b.4\]]cad yang 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa/_/sku dang gsung thugs 
[\[104b.5\]]gsang bar bsgrags/_/dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/_/'bar ba gtum po spyan yangs pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/lus 
[\[104b.6\]]dang ngag dang sems rnams bsgom/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/_/rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/_/mnyam nyid gar yang mi gnas pa/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya 
[\[104b.7\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa du ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]stong dang thabs cig tu sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i gar gyi rol ba ston par mdzad de/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing dgyes par yongs su spyod
