[\[105a.2\]]pa yod kyang de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/_de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na/_kye ma 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos thos pas so/_/de'i phyir skyes bu dam pa chen po de rnams kyi spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir de bzhin 
[\[105a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba sngags thams cad kyi thugs kun du skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/_rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad 
[\[105a.4\]]kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/_chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/_nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM hU~M AHswA hA/_de nas 'di ni 
[\[105a.5\]]gsungs tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/_/rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus 
[\[105a.6\]]gnas par/_/bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/de yi dbus gnas yi ge hU~M/_/rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag_/rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba/_/rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/_/drangs par de yis rnam par 
[\[105a.7\]]bsgom/_/de ma thag nyid der 'gyur ba/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog_/rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes/_/skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/snying po rdo rje 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]bsdus pa'o/_/rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/_/gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul/_/zhal gsum rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/kha dog gsum gyis rab tu bsgom/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de la 'di ni mchog 
[\[105b.2\]]rdo rje'i gsang ba'o/_/dkyil 'khor rnams kyi thugs ka yi/_/dbus chud phra mo rnam bsgom bya/_/de yi dbus su chud par ni/_/yi ge mchog gi tshig bsam mo/_/sbyor ba rdo rje chen po ni/_/rtse mo lnga pa rtag tu bsgom/_/rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje 
[\[105b.3\]]gsum rnams bsgom par bya/_/de yis thugs ni gzir bya ste/_/lha yang rab tu bskul bar bya/_/'di de rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgom pa/_/rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs/_/thugs ni bskul ba rab bshad pa/_/
[\[105b.4\]]'di de rol mo 'byung ba ste/_/rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di/_/zhag bdun bar du byas na ni/_/gsang chen sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/ye shes rdo rje can grub 'gyur/_/'jigs shing yid ni skrag gyur nas/_/mchog stsol ba ni rnam par gzigs/_/yid ni mgu bas dga' ba 
[\[105b.5\]]yi/_/dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog 'dzin rnams/_/gal te rmongs bdag nyid 'das na/_/de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje gsum mchog ston pa po/_/'jig 
[\[105b.6\]]rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/dngos po thams cad brtag par bya/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sngags kyi dam tshig sgrub 
[\[105b.7\]]pa'o/_/rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la/_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab bsgom zhing /_/chags shing chags pa'i lta bas blta/_/'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid skyes/_/thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gtsos/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/_/ji snyed bud med brjod pa kun/_/phyag rgya chen po'i sngon sbyor bas/_/de dag thams cad nye bar spyad/_/bye ba grangs med rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro 
[\[106a.2\]]bya/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang chub 'di yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho/_/rdo rje sems dpa' tshe des 'thob/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[106a.3\]]gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje skyes bu mchog ces bya 
[\[106a.4\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u 'di gsungs so/_/rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog_/phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgom pa/_/byang chub thams cad 'thob pa ni/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis 
[\[106a.5\]]bya/_/oM yig ye shes snying po ste/_/rdo rje sku ni 'thob byed pa'o/_/AHyig byang chub sprul pa'i bdag_/rdo rje gsung ni 'thob byed pa'o/_/hU~M yig sku gsung thugs yin te/_/rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed 'thob/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 
[\[106a.6\]]kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje kun skyes dkyil 'khor bsam/_/de ru yi ge b+h+ru~M bsam ste/_/rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyed pa'o/_/de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o/_/b+h+ru~M_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/yi 
[\[106a.7\]]ge hU~M ni rab tu bsgom/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/yi ge AHni rab tu bsgom/_/yi ge b+h+ru~M gyis gnas bsgoms te/_/rdo rje gsum byung bsgom par bya/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]dam tshig gsum gyi gsang bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/_/sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa/_/oM yig sangs rgyas sku yi mchog_/oM AHyig sangs rgyas gsung gi lam/_/AHhU~M yig ye shes 'jing ni thugs/_/hU~M 'di 
[\[106b.2\]]ni byang chub tshul mchog yin/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/_/ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste/_/sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung /_/'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu nyid/_/sngags dang rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/_/bskyed pa la sogs 
[\[106b.3\]]dam tshig dag_/rdo rje gsum mi phyed bsgoms pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig de kho na nyid ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rnam par dben zhing nyams dga' bar/_/sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu brtsams/_/rdo 
[\[106b.4\]]rje'i sku dang gsung thugs 'grub/_/phyogs gcig gis ni the tshom med/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed/_/yi ge oM ni thugs kar dgod/_/'od zer lnga pa sprin chen po/_/rnam 
[\[106b.5\]]par snang mdzad mchog sgom pa/_/'di yis sangs rgyas kyi ni sku/_/rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje gsum gyi kalpa ni/_/ye shes lnga ldan bsten cing gnas/_/phyogs tsam gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje 
[\[106b.6\]]gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas pa'i/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed/_/AHyig ngag gi lam 
[\[106b.7\]]la dgod/_/kha dog lnga pa rdo rje che/_/'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms pas/_/dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te/_/tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog_/chos kyi tshig gi lam gnas pa/_/rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsum gyi kalpa ni/_/ye 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]shes lnga ldan bsten cing gnas/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa 
[\[107a.2\]]bsam/_/rang sngags skyes bu bskyed nas ni/_/thugs la gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M/_/dam tshig chen po de nyid ni/_/kha dog lnga pa rnam bsgom bya/_/rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/ston pa rdo rje thugs las byung /_/ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur/_/
[\[107a.3\]]rdo rje gsum gyi kalpa ni/_/ye shes lnga ldan bsten gnas shing /_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje chen 
[\[107a.4\]]po bsgom par bya/_/lus rnams kun la yi ge kha~M/_/rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur/_/kha~M/_sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/yang dang yang du mchod pa dang /_/kalpa gsum ni dam tshig ga gnas/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das nam 
[\[107a.5\]]mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus las ni/_/rang sngags skyes bu rab bsgoms la/_/snying gar rdo rje ha~M zhes pa/_/bzhag ste 'od zer rnam 
[\[107a.6\]]par bsgom/_/ha~M/_'jam dpal dam tshig rdzogs longs spyod/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid du/_/sa bcu dag la gnas de 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam tshig zla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi 
[\[107a.7\]]dbus gnas par/_/'od zer rab 'bar yi ge/_/mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus su ni/_/bsgoms na rdo rje'i sku mnyam 'gyur/_/th+lIM/_nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/mngon shes lnga dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mngon shes dam 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]tshig mchog_/'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la/_/ye shes oM yig bsgom par bya/_/oM/_rdo rje dam tshig gsum 
[\[107b.2\]]bsgoms pas/_/mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang /_/gsung dang thugs mchog rtag tu 'dzin/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/_/mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 
[\[107b.3\]]'das mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig mngon par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/_/nam mkha' rdo rje rab bsgoms la/_/rin chen oM yig bsgom par bya/_/oM/_rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms 
[\[107b.4\]]pas/_/rdo rje gsum gyi tog 'drar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis/_/rin chen tog gi 'od dang 'dra/_/de ni bdag med byang chub dang /_/ye shes gsang ba mnyam gnas 'gyur/_/rin po che dam tshig 
[\[107b.5\]]longs spyod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la/_/chos kyi oM yig bsgom par bya/_/oM/_rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/_/rdo rje gsum 
[\[107b.6\]]dpag med 'drar 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/_/'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/theg chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yon tan dpag tu med pa'i 
[\[107b.7\]]'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/rdo rje ut+pal rab bsgoms nas/_/dam tshig oM yig rab tu bsgom/_/oM/_rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/_/rdo rje don yod gsum 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]'drar 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje don yod 'dra ba'i 'od/_/de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho/_/sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje don yod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/don yod pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba 'od 
[\[108a.2\]]zer ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/_/rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la/_/sku gsum oM yig rab tu bsgom/_/oM/_rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/_/
[\[108a.3\]]rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yis/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/_/de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub/_/sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs 
[\[108a.4\]]pa rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/ri bo rnam par dben pa dang /_/chu klung 'bab pa rnams dang ni/_/dur khrod la sogs rnams su yang /_/bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bya/_/mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje sogs/_/rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil gnas bsam/_/mngon 
[\[108a.5\]]shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis/_/gnas su sangs rgyas mchog rnams bsgom/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po dam tshig rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/_/'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje mngon 
[\[108a.6\]]shes 'dra bar 'gyur/_/me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi/_/rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje lnga ni sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil gnas par/_/'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra/_/bsgoms nas sangs rgyas 'jug pa yis/_/
[\[108a.7\]]sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/rang gi lus la snang mdzad bzhag_/snying gar yi ge oM bsam la/_/sngags la rnam par shes pa bsgom/_/de'i sems 'gog pa'i rdo rjer tshud/_/gang tshe skye bar 'gyur ba de/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]kun gyi mchog sgrub pa/_/yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/_/snying gar yi ge hU~M bsgoms nas/_/sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/tshe dpag med par 
[\[108b.2\]]rab tu bsgom/_/snying gar yi ge AHbsams te/_/rdo rje thig ler gtogs pa bzhag_/'di de dam tshig mchog gi mchog_/rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed bsgom/_/'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob 'gyur ba'i/_/nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/_/bsgom bya 
[\[108b.3\]]gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/lus ngag sems la yi ge oM/_/bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/_/nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/_/bsgom bya chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/lus ngag sems la yi ge AH/_/bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/_/nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/_/
[\[108b.4\]]bsgom bya rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni/_/lus ngag sems la yi ge hU~M/_/bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/rnal 'byor 'di gang nas bzung ste/_/klog gam yang na sems kyang 
[\[108b.5\]]rung /_/de yang rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas ston pa rdo 
[\[108b.6\]]rje 'dzin/_/bskyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pas/_/dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid/_/rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa/_/mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa/_/rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/_/chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la/_/rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/_/dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs 
[\[108b.7\]]mchog_/me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan/_/ri bo skye bos dben pa ru/_/dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsgrub/_/ma~M/_lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu bsgom/_/lus dang ngag sems la spro ba/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dpag tshad brgyar ni rgya che ba/_/
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od des ni/_/snang 'gyur dag pa'i bdag nyid de/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni/_/tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas/_/nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig mi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum 
[\[109a.2\]]las byung /_/bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni/_/lcags gsum dang ni ldan byas nas/_/khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa'i/_/thugs ni de ru rab tu bsgom/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/rang gi sngags las 'khor 
[\[109a.3\]]lo ni/_/'od 'phro mdangs mchog can bsgoms nas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/bsgoms na sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/_/de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_/thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra/_/'di 
[\[109a.4\]]ni 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par/_bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/phra rab rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i/_/de snyed kyi ni bud med 
[\[109a.5\]]rnams/_/yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur/_/drag po dag gis phyag byas pa/_/khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur/_/rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/_/rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su/_/chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin pa/_/rdo rje chos 
[\[109a.6\]]dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/phra rab rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i/_/sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed/_/pad mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/gsum gyi kalpa'i dam tshig ni/_/ye shes lnga ldan bsten cing 
[\[109a.7\]]gnas/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba rnam gsum bsnyen bkur byed/_/'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od/_/rang gi sngags la ral gri bsgom/_/mig yangs lag na thogs nas ni/_/rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur/_/khams gsum chen pos mchod bya dang /_/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa/_/stong gsum na ni gcig pu ba/_/gsang ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/_/sems kyis gang zhig 'dod pa ni/_/rdo rje thugs las rab tu byung /_/de lta bu yi dngos grub ster/_/ral gri thams cad dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[109b.2\]]'dzin to/_/oM yig ril bu tsa na ka'i/_/'bru tshad du ni bsams nas ni/_/dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/_/bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing /_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog_/AH
[\[109b.3\]]yig ril bu tsa na ka'i/_/'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni/_/dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/_/bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing /_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog_/hU~M yig ril bu tsa na 
[\[109b.4\]]ka'i/_/'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni/_/dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/_/bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing /_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/_/mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa'i/_/rnam 
[\[109b.5\]]par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/_/lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na/_/'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rab sbyor bas/_/ye shes mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/
[\[109b.6\]]ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te/_/lag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms na/_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/_/rdo rje'i skur ni rab sbyor bas/_/rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par/_/rin 
[\[109b.7\]]chen rdo rje rab tu bsgom/_/lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na/_/rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rin chen chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas/_/rin chen skur ni rab sbyor bas/_/rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]par/_/tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/_/lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na/_/pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/pad+mo chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas/_/chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor bas/_/pad+mo'i mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/mkha' dbyings dam tshig 
[\[110a.2\]]dbus gnas par/_/don yod ye shes rab tu bsgom/_/lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/_/ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/_/dam tshig skur ni rab sbyor bas/_/dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/rtse gsum 
[\[110a.3\]]ye shes lcags kyu sogs/_/rdo rje'i khyad par gyis bsgrubs na/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis/_/bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung /_/mtshan 
[\[110a.4\]]ma gcig dang zhi gnas su/_/rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis/_/sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/_/rdo rje can gsum sbyor bsams nas/_/sku dang gsung thugs lcags kyu ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyi/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/_/
[\[110a.5\]]sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin/_/dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa/_/rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyod/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dam tshig rdo rje dgug pa'o/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/_/rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni/_/rdo rje pad+ma la sogs pas/_/dam tshig dgug 
[\[110a.6\]]pa'i mchog ni bya/_/khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/_/lag tu sku dang gsung thugs ni/_/kyo ba la sogs rab tu bsgom/_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur/_/rnam pa kun gyi 
[\[110a.7\]]mchog ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje sku ni rnam bsgoms shing /_/lce yi rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom/_/rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la/_/lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni/_/rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur/_/gsang 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog_/mchod pas mchod nas rab bsgrub 'di/_/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni/_/rdo rje gsum mchod 
[\[110b.2\]]bsgrub par bya/_/bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/_/glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis/_/mngon shes lnga nyid thob par bya/_/rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis/_/mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/_/khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis/_/dngos grub 
[\[110b.3\]]thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/ba glang sha yi dam tshig gis/_/rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/sha rnams thams cad ma rnyed na/_/thams cad bsams pas rnam par brtag_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di byas na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/_/rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa 
[\[110b.4\]]yi/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/_/snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang /_/dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur la/_/'di ni dam tshig tshul gyi mchog_/dam tshig mchog gi bya ba ni/_/dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog_/dam tshig thams cad 
[\[110b.5\]]kyi ye shes rdo rje'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/lce ni dam tshig rdo rje mchog_/hU~M yig rdo rje can bsgoms te/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis/_/zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/_/'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste/_/AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang /_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[110b.6\]]dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje dam tshig bdud rtsi'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rdo rje dam tshig gsum 'grub mchog_/sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtshor 'gyur/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/_/rdo 
[\[110b.7\]]rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed/_/'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa mchog_/sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed thams cad du/_/kun nas grub pa rnam par spyod/_/thams cad dam tshig mchog gis ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/_/thams cad dam 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]tshig gzugs mchog ni/_/rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas/_/mi snang gyur pa thams cad la/_/stong gsum gcig pus snang byed pas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrog pa dang /_/lha mchog bu mo dag la spyod/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje gsum gyi gnas 
[\[111a.2\]]bzhugs pa/_/rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/_/rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na/_/sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa/_/rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin/_/mngon shes khyu mchog gis thos 'gyur/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi_/sems can kun gyi 
[\[111a.3\]]sems rnams ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid can/_/rol mo ltar byung sems rig 'gyur/_/bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/_/'khor bar gnas par 'byung ba yi/_/sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams/_/zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran/_/gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sku/_/
[\[111a.4\]]sangs rgyas sprin la sogs brgyan pas/_/bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/_/rdzu 'phrul mchog gi rdo rjes 'gengs/_/bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni rdo rje'i spyan dang /_rdo rje'i snyan dang rdo rje'i thugs dang /_rdo rje'i 
[\[111a.5\]]gnas dang rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo/_/sangs rgyas mngon shes don grub cing /_/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i/_/'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su/_/rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/'jig rten khams kun rnam par bkrod/_/bsnyen pa'i dam 
[\[111a.6\]]tshig sbyor ba dang /_/nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang /_/sgrub pa'i don du dam tshig dang /_/sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi/_/shes byas rdo rje'i bye brag gis/_/de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/_/bsnyen pa ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba/_/byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/nye bar sgrub pa grub 
[\[111a.7\]]mchog la/_/rdo rje'i skye mched rnam dpyad pa/_/sgrub pa bskul ba rab brjod pa/_/sngags dang bdag po rnam bsgom pa/_/sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe/_/rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs/_/dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam/_/ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur/_/bsnyen pa ye shes 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bdud rtsis bya/_/thams cad du ni rtag tu nyid/_/'di gang sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/sngags dang de nyid don sgrub pa'o/_/dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang /_/rab tu skye bos dben pa dang /_/ri bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su/_/rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.2\]]rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis/_/brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen par bya/_/rdo rje sku gsum mnyam de yis/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/thun bzhi rnams dang rab sbyor bas/_/gnas lngar blo dang ldan pa yis/_/oM gyi yi ge 
[\[111b.3\]]bsgoms nas ni/_/ye shes rdo rjes sdom pa bstan/_/zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang /_/zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis/_/rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/zhag grangs bye brag rab dbye bas/_/nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan/_/phyogs kyi nang 
[\[111b.4\]]las dngos grub gsungs/_/gsang ba mchog las byung rnams kyis/_/de la 'di ni nye bar bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/_/sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/_/bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng /_/sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/_/phyogs bcur 
[\[111b.5\]]bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/_/bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng /_/sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/_/de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/_/chos nyid gsung lam dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/_/bdag la byin gyis brlab 
[\[111b.6\]]gnas deng /_/gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/_/bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng /_/gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/_/de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul lo/_/rdo rje thugs 'dzin dpal 
[\[111b.7\]]dang ldan/_/rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/_/bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng /_/thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/_/bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng /_/thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]gsol/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/_/yang na chos kyi sems dpa'ang rung /_/gal te rmongs bdag nyid 'da' na/_/tshal bar 'gas 'dir gdon mi za/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus 
[\[112a.2\]]pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba dam tshig sgrub pa mchog nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun/_/ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang /_/sems can kun don yang dag 'byung /_/byang chub 
[\[112a.3\]]sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/_/thub pa don kun rdo rje can/_/ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas/_/dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la/_/mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang /_/e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog_/e ma'o chos kyi tshul re zhi/_/
[\[112a.4\]]e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re bstan/_/ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni/_/ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can/_/rnam par mi rtog yang dag la/_/ye shes 'byung bar rab tu gsungs/_/yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa/_/rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che/_/sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 
[\[112a.5\]]'khor ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/bzlas pa rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis rlob/_/rigs ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs mtshan nyid/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa de ring gsungs/_/ye 
[\[112a.6\]]shes rgya mtsho gsan pa dang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas dus gsum byung ba rnams/_/rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas/_/ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/nam mkha' rdo rje ye 
[\[112a.7\]]shes byung /_/byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos/_/rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so/_/sngags kun don gyi bzlas pa ni/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum mtshan nyid/_/dbye ba gsum gyi rdo rje'i mthar/_/bkod pa rdo rje gsum brjod bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su/_/spro ba rnam pa 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]gsum dag bya/_/rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/_/bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/_/ye shes rdo rjes byas na ni/_/rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/_/
[\[112b.2\]]bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/_/ye shes rdo rjes rab tu bya/_/'di ni byang chub mchog 'thob pa'o/_/yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis/_/so so so sor spro bar bya/_/sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa/_/ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro/_/brjod nas rdo rje spro bya 
[\[112b.3\]]zhing /_/rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya/_/'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yin/_/sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa/_/sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar gsungs/_/de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad/_/gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs 
[\[112b.4\]]byang chub/_/sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa/_/gsung gi rdo rje zhes gsungs te/_/de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad/_/thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub/_/gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa/_/thugs kyi rdo rje zhes gsungs te/_/de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad/_/don gyi rjes 
[\[112b.5\]]rtogs bzlas pa ni/_/ngo bo nyid byung bzang po yis/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams dpyad pa/_/de ni rin chen bzlas par bshad/_/sangs rgyas zhing las thams cad du/_/sku yi sprin rnams spro ba ni/_/bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don/_/de ni don yod bzlas par bshad/_/khro 
[\[112b.6\]]bo'i dam tshig shes pa yis/_/rang gi rdo rjes bsgrags dkyil 'khor/_/sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa/_/de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad/_/'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa/_/sems can kun la phan dga' med/_/sems can gti mug gnas la 'jog_/de ni gti 
[\[112b.7\]]mug bzlas par bshad/_/'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig_/lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa/_/sems can 'dod chags mtshor gnas bzhag_/de ni 'dod chags bzlas par bshad/_/zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems/_/lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa/_/sems can zhe 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]sdang gnas la bzhag_/de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad/_/dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid/_/dam tshig rdo rje can dbu ma/_/de nyid dam tshig rdo rje yi/_/ma ning bzlas pa zhes bshad do/_/'dod chags de nyid don bsgom pa/_/rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni/_/sems 
[\[113a.2\]]can kun la phan 'dod pa'i/_/'dod chags las skyes byang chub mdzad/_/rig pa chen po spyan la sogs/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub/_/gti mug dam tshig las byung ba/_/rig pa'i rgyal po 
[\[113a.3\]]rdo rje can/_/ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa/_/dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster/_/khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes/_/rtag tu gsod la brtson pa rnams/_/gsod pa'i don gyis sgrub pa po/_/mchog gi chos can gyis 'grub 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam 
[\[113a.4\]]tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ye shes 'khor lo can gyis ni/_/snying ga'i dbus su 'khor lo bsgom/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/_/dbus su 'khor lo'i don bsgom mo/_/ye shes rdo rje can gyis ni/_/snying ga'i dbus su rdo rje bsgom/_/rdo 
[\[113a.5\]]rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/_/rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya/_/rin chen ye shes can gyis ni/_/snying ga'i dbus su rin chen bsgom/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/_/rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya/_/pad+ma ye shes can gyis ni/_/snying ga'i 
[\[113a.6\]]dbus su pad+ma bsgom/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/_/pad+ma'i sngags don bsgom par bya/_/ral gri ye shes can gyis ni/_/snying ga'i dbus su ral gri bsgom/_/dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/_/ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[113a.7\]]kun gyi ngos rnams su/_/sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya/_/'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis/_/spros na byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni/_/bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags/_/sku gsum rdo rje'i bye brag gis/_/spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya/_/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]lus ni sku yi ngo bo nyid/_/sems ni thugs kyi ngo bo nyid/_/ngag ni gsung gi rang bzhin gyis/_/mchod na mchod pa'i gnas thob 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis/_/rdo rje lnga ni bsgom par bya/_/sku gsung rdo rje'i dbus su ni/_/rang gi bdag po'i gzugs bsams 
[\[113b.2\]]nas/_/rang gi sngags kyi rdo rje'i gzugs/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag ni/_/kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la/_/snying gar sngags kyi don bsgom pa/_/rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las/_/bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed/_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/mchog 
[\[113b.3\]]tu rtag pa gsang chen no/_/zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul/_/rgyas pa pad+mo rdo rje can/_/dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/_/rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/_/'di de rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba sku gsum las byung bas/_/sprul pa sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/bya ba'i rol mos mtshan 
[\[113b.4\]]pa'o/_/ma dad smra ba'i sems can dang /_/slob dpon rdo rje can smod pa/_/gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang /_/rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/
[\[113b.5\]]sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la/_/dgra bo bsad par bsams nas su/_/de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa/_/rdo rje rtse lnga zhal bzhi pa/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/_/rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgom/_/dus gsum dam 
[\[113b.6\]]tshig las byung ba'i/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che/_/lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o/_/phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams/_/sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis/_/bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su/_/de dag rang gi lus 
[\[113b.7\]]la gzhug_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can/_/slar yang spro bar rab tu bya/_/khros pas 'khrugs pa'i khro bo bsam/_/mi sdug rab gsal 'jigs su rung /_/mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa/_/gsod pa'i don gyi mchog sems pa/_/gdug pa chen po gsod 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]par byed/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang /_/sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol bas/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas/_/dngos grub ster 'gyur rmongs bdag nyid/_/'di la the tshom mi bya'o/_/'di ni nyin zhag bdun bya ste/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi 
[\[114a.2\]]'grub bo/_/rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/_/rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/_/dus gsum dam tshig las 
[\[114a.3\]]byung ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po/_/rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can/_/de yi phyag na bsnams par bsgom/_/phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams/_/rdo rje'i sku yi khyad par gyis/_/'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni/_/de dag bdag gi lus la gzud/_/rdo rje 
[\[114a.4\]]thams cad spro ba ni/_/ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/_/bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/_/gal te dam tshig las 'das na/_/rdo rje kun nas 
[\[114a.5\]]'bar gzugs kyis/_/sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi/_/zhig par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi 'tshal/_/'khor lo'i dam tshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam/_/gshin rje gshed ni 
[\[114a.6\]]'khor lo che/_/rang gi rdo rje rab tu brtag_/dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams/_/sku gsum dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/_/slar yang sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed/_/rnam pa 'dra bar spro bar bya/_/sems can dus gsum la bzhugs pa/_/gdug sems 
[\[114a.7\]]can dang dgra bo rnams/_/khros pas thams cad gsod par bsgom/_/'di ni rdo rje bka' dkyil 'khor/_/dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'am/_/rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam/_/
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis/_/bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/_/sngags kun bsrung phyir ye shes mchog_/rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/_/'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/byang chub bsrung ba'i don zhes bya/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[114b.2\]]nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/rnam par snang mdzad sku mchog las/_/'byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig chos/_/bsams nas gdan de rab tu brtag_/mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/_/rang sngags yi ge gnas 
[\[114b.3\]]ye shes/_/thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya/_/slar yang sangs rgyas sems tsam du/_/bsgoms pa rnams ni rab tu bsdu/_/thugs kyi rdo rjer byas nas su/_/sku gsum la ni de dag gzud/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[114b.4\]]sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/_/sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni/_/chu yi steng du bcag par bya/_/rkang pa mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis/_/spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa 
[\[114b.5\]]bsgom/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje chu gter rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/dbus su dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni/_/bsams te khro bo'i rigs bzhag la/_/las kyi rdo rje gnas gnon pa/_/de yi spyi bor bsgom par 
[\[114b.6\]]bya/_/mu stegs thams cad dang /_phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/khro bo'i gzugs gsum rdo rje mchog_/ge sar ser po'i mdog 'dra ba/_/thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar/_/spyi bor bsams nas rab tu bsgom/_/sangs 
[\[114b.7\]]rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na/_/mi dbang la 'dir the tshom med/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]la/_/bsam gtan 'di ni rab tu brtag_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang gal te bgrod/_/gsal bar 'gyur 'di gdon mi za/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces gsungs te/_yi ge hU~M las phur bu yi/_/tshad ni rtse mo lnga pa ste/_/
[\[115a.2\]]rdo rje phur bur byas bsgom la/_/snying gar de yis 'di rab bsgom/_/sangs rgyas dpung ni khros pa yang /_/'jig par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/dgra rmongs pa gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/grong khyer ram ni yang na grong /_/ljongs su yang 
[\[115a.3\]]ni rab sbyar bya/_/nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang /_/'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/_/bar snang la gnas rdo rje ni/_/rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsgom/_/bskal pa sreg pa ltar bsams la/_/slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya/_/spro ba dag kyang slar bya'o/_/rin chen yid bzhin nor 
[\[115a.4\]]bu'i 'od/_/chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang /_/dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya/_/rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni/_/dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs/_/sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab snang byed/_/yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur/_/der ni sangs rgyas chos chen dang /_/rdo rje 
[\[115a.5\]]sems dpa'i sprin spro bya/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum yang gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/skyon med sku yi gsang ba'o/_/nad thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/bsam gtan 
[\[115a.6\]]las byung dam bcas pa/_/gnas gang du ni brtsam par bya/_/'di yis bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/_/gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/_/rdo rje phur bur rab bsgoms la/_/phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mchog rnams la/_/me stag 'bar 
[\[115a.7\]]ba 'dra bas gdab/_/ces kyang gsungs so/_/'gro ba 'dul ba zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/_/zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas/_/rang gi thugs kar don gnyer 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]bzhag_/mkha' dbyings spyan gyi mchog rnams kyis/_/yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/_/bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis/_/nad pa la ni phab nas su/_/spu khung rtse bar nas sangs rgyas/_/sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro/_/sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe/_/
[\[115b.2\]]de la dbang bskur rab tu stsol/_/dam tshig rdo rje nad pa yis/_/skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/chos 'dzin 
[\[115b.3\]]pa yi gzugs bsam mo/_/thugs kar don gnyer gzhag par bya/_/mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar/_/dkar mo zhes byas rab tu dgang /_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od/_/'od kyi gong bu bsdu bar bya/_/'di dag 'dod pa'i lus dang ngag_/
[\[115b.4\]]sems kyi gnas la dbab par bya/_/spu khung rtse bar nas rin chen/_/sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro/_/chos kyi sprin ni bsgom bya zhing /_/dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya/_/rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/_/dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs/_/de ni 
[\[115b.5\]]yid bzhin nor dpal ldan/_/sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab snang ba'o/_/chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje zla gam dkyil 'khor bsam/_/rdo rje nam mkha' chos mdun gzugs/_/thugs kar 
[\[115b.6\]]'dod pa gzhag par bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang /_/'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis/_/gzi brjid de la dbab par bya/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon/_/'jam dpal 
[\[115b.7\]]dang ni mnyam zhing gsal/_/gnas las byed par der 'gyur ro/_/dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can dbang bskur/_/dga' ston chen po stsol bar mdzad/_/mthong ba nyid kyis byung ba yi/_/'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rjer srin po ni/_/drag cing khro la rab gtum dang /_/wa dang sna tshogs bya rog dang /_/bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom/_/me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/_/dgra bo rnams ni rtag par bsgom/_/
[\[116a.2\]]sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa/_/bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya/_/rgyu ma rus bcud khrag la sogs/_/kun gyis drangs par rnam par bsgom/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas mnan/_/bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin 
[\[116a.3\]]pas kyang /_/gal te 'di ltar rab bsgoms na/_/zla phyed nang du rdzogs pa la/_/'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/rdo rje sprin dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa/_/ston ka'i chu sgong mdog 'dra bsam/_/
[\[116a.4\]]dkar po nag po rab tu dmar/_/thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/_/rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam/_/nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal/_/'bar ba'i thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/_/'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o/_/'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam/_/
[\[116a.5\]]dmar po nag po dkar bo'i zhal/_/thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can/_/bsgoms na nges par 'grub par 'gyur/_/'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo che/_/g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje phyag drug bzang po ni/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par bsgom/_/sems 
[\[116a.6\]]can kun la phan bzhed ma/_/spyan ma zhal gsum dag tu bsam/_/dkar po nag po dmar po che/_/mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgom/_/mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che/_/dri ma med cing zhal gsum pa/_/gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i tshul/_/mdzes pa'i 
[\[116a.7\]]gzugs su rtag tu bsgom/_/gsung rdo rje spyan rgyal mo che/_/dmar gnag dkar po'i rnam pa yi/_/zhal gsum pa ni myur du 'grub/_/kha dog mdzes par rab tu bsgom/_/rig ma rdo rje ut+pal bsnams/_/zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs/_/ser gnag 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]dkar ba'i rnam pa ni/_/bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/_/zhal gsum drag po'i 'od bzang ba/_/rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed/_/kha dog nag po rab tu bsgom/_/gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che/_/drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 
[\[116b.2\]]'byin pa/_/zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag_/rab tu 'phro bar rnam par bsam/_/khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni/_/bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar/_/zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan/_/sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu bsgom/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo che/_/
[\[116b.3\]]'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug_/drag po rdo rje 'bar ba 'dra/_/'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/_/'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che/_/zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed/_/phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog_/Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab tu bsgom/_/stobs 
[\[116b.4\]]po che ni rdo rje che/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba/_/gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed/_/zhal gsum pa ni rtag tu bsgom/_/khro bo chen po dbyug sngon can/_/khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed/_/zhal gsum rdo rje las byung ba/_/'bar ba rnon po can 
[\[116b.5\]]du bsgom/_/rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo che/_/rdo rje las byung zur gyis blta/_/zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsnams/_/brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsgom/_/gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig_/'od zer dag ni kun tu 'phro/_/zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'khor lo 
[\[116b.6\]]can/_/bsam gtan 'od bzang bsgom par bya/_/gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa/_/'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed/_/zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro sku/_/bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal/_/
[\[116b.7\]]gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can/_/dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyis/_/so so so sor bsgom par bya/_/sngags rnams kyi ni ting nge 'dzin/_/dpag tu med pa bshad pa yin/_/khro bo dag ni re re yang /_/nam mkha'i steng bas shin tu 'phags/_/nam 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam/_/gsal zhing zla ba bzhin zhi ba/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od/_/me long lta 
[\[117a.2\]]bur yang dag byung /_/khams gsum dag ni rgyan gyur pa/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag_/bsams na byang chub de yis mthong /_/bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgom pa/_/de yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag_/'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa/_/tshe 'di nyid la 
[\[117a.3\]]thob par 'gyur/_/rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam/_/
[\[117a.4\]]khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra/_/'bar ba sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na/_/rdo rje nyid ni myur du 'thob/_/bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba/_/'dis ni 
[\[117a.5\]]rdo rje'i bdag nyid che/_/sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[117a.6\]]gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/_/gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/'od zer sprin ni 'khor lo che/_/rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom/_/'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che/_/sku gsum mi 
[\[117a.7\]]phyed las byung ba/_/ye shes rgya mtshos rnam brgyan pas/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/chos kyi sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/spyan ma mchog ni rnam par bsgom/_/zhal mdzes spyan ni rab tu yangs/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/_/bud med sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa/_/khams gsum dag ni dbang byed pa/_/ye shes 
[\[117b.2\]]dngos grub thams cad byed/_/'khor lo'i yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od/_/phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya/_/spyan gyi dam tshig phyag gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'od mchog bsam/_/sangs 
[\[117b.3\]]rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas/_/nam mkha' rdo rje mchog rab bsgom/_/zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs/_/ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba/_/mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/_/nam mkha' dam tshig mchog rab bsgom/_/phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar 
[\[117b.4\]]bsnams/_/khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog_/dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang /_/nam mkha' yum rin po che'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/
[\[117b.5\]]chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje chos ma rab tu bsgom/_/zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs/_/pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/_/sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung /_/'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa/_/mtshan 
[\[117b.6\]]nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/_/phyag na ut+pal dmar mdzes bsnams/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa/_/chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog_/dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang /_/chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid 
[\[117b.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/sgrol ma mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/zhal bzang 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]spyan ni rab tu yangs/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od/_/bud med sgyu mas rab tu myos/_/rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung /_/sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa/_/ut+pal ljang ser dmar ba'i mdangs/_/phyag na 
[\[118a.2\]]bsnams pa rab tu bsgom/_/dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par bsgom/_/'bar 
[\[118a.3\]]ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/_/'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros/_/spyan dmar mche ba rnam par gtsigs/_/phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgom/_/dbu rgyan snang mdzad bzhugs bsgoms na/_/rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur/_/'di ni ye shes rdo rje can/_/
[\[118a.4\]]thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig yin/_/gshin rje gshed spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/gzhan gyis mi thub rab tu 
[\[118a.5\]]bsgom/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can/_/sbrul gyis brgyan cing ske rags can/_/zhal ni rnam par gtsigs shing bgrad/_/kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsams na rdo rje can dag dgyes/_/'di ni ye shes rdo rje can/_/
[\[118a.6\]]thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig go/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje rta mgrin rab tu bsgom/_/khro bo'i 
[\[118a.7\]]'od zer mang po dag_/thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro/_/gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan/_/kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam/_/rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na rdo rje can dag mnyes/_/'di ni rdo rje ye shes can/_/thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]yin/_/rta mgrin skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi rab sgom pa/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[118b.2\]]sprin ni kun tu 'khrug_/khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang /_/mche ba rnon po rab tu bsgom/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/_/bdud rtsi'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya 
[\[118b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab bsgom bya/_/khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum/_/'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/_/rgyan 
[\[118b.4\]]rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/_/bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[118b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/stobs po che ni rab tu bsgom/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/_/rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor/_/khro zhing drag po 
[\[118b.6\]]zhags pa 'dzin/_/rdo rje stobs can bsgom par bya/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/_/rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i 
[\[118b.7\]]dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje sngon po rnam par bsgom/_/khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/_/'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/_/gzugs ni rab tu gnag la rno/_/nag 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]po'i rgya mtsho skyed par byed/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/_/rdo rje dbyug thogs bsgom par bya/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go_/rdo rje dbyug 
[\[119a.2\]]pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par bsgom/_/khros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis lta/_/
[\[119a.3\]]ral gri zhags pa bsnams pa 'khrug_/'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/_/mi g.yo rdo rje can bsgom bya/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig yin/_/rdo rje nam 
[\[119a.4\]]mkha' dbyings kyi gnas/_gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rig pa'i 'khor lor rab tu 'byung /_/mtshan rnams thams cad yongs 
[\[119a.5\]]su rdzogs/_/'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor/_/gtsug tor 'khor lo dam tshig ni/_/rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/_/
[\[119a.6\]]gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/_/rdo rje sum+b+ha rab tu bsgom/_/me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku/_/rdo rje'i sprin ni 
[\[119a.7\]]rab tu 'phro/_/phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/_/bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/_/'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/_/rdo rje dam tshig sum+b+ha rab tu 'byung 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/'gog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo bsten pa yis/_/ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las 
[\[119b.2\]]rdo rje'i dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya 
[\[119b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/phun sum tshogs kun yid bzhes pa/_/
[\[119b.4\]]mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su dran/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi skyed ma/_/las rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing /_/rdo rje'i dam tshig skul mdzad ma/_/shi ba sos par byed par gsungs/_/rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs 
[\[119b.5\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig khro bo rdo rjes dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo /_/oM shaM ka ri shAn+ti ka 
[\[119b.6\]]re g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni/_g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+huT+Ti ni swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed pa/_/rdo rje can mnyes spyan gdangs nas/_/rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran/_/srung ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba la/_/rtag tu las ni rab bsgrub pa/_/rdo rje chen po 
[\[119b.7\]]'jigs nyen la/_/rtag tu stobs ni byed par bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_chos kyi dam tshig gi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams/_/rdo rje chos ni rjes su dran/_/mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur pas/_/rtag tu chos rgyas stobs dang ldan/_/rtag tu mdzad po che mdzad 
[\[120a.2\]]pa/_/rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 
[\[120a.3\]]phyung ngo /_/oM tA re tu t+t+wa re tu re swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun bdag cher skyes mnyes/_/rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran/_/bsam gtan ye shes thob gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang /_/sems can khams ni kun nas su/_/
[\[120a.4\]]skad cig gis ni bran bzhin du/_/thams cad g.yo med dbang du byed/_/ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i 
[\[120a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje gshin rje gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_sarba duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka/_a si mu sa la par+Shu pA sha hasta/_tsa turmu kha/_tsa tur+b+hu 
[\[120a.6\]]dza/_Sha Ta tsa ra Na/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_sarba duSh+Ta pra NA a pa hA ri Ne/_ma hA bi g+hA g+hA ta ka/_bi krI tA na na/_/sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka ra/_aT+TAT+Ta ha sa nA di ne/_byA g+h+ra tsarma ni ba sa na/_ku ru ku ru/_sarba karmA ni/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha sarba man trA na/_bin+d+ha bin+d+ha pa ra mu drA na/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_
[\[120a.7\]]sarba b+hU tAn/_ma tha ma tha/_ni rma tha ni rma tha/_sarba duSh+TA na/_pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/_maN+Da la ma d+h+ye bai ba swa ta/_dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/_ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kA r+yaM/_da ha da ha/_pa ca pa tsa/_mA bi lam+ba/_mA bi lam+ba/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_bi s+pho Ta ya pi s+pho Ta ya/_sarbA na nA 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]sha yaM ka ra ka ra/_bis+h+wA nAM sarbA shA ba ri pU ra ka/_he he b+ha ga bAn/_kiny+tsi ra ya si/_ma ma sarba ar+thAM sA d+ha ya swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun ni grags chen po/_/'jigs shing kun du skrag gyur nas/_/rdo rje sems ni rjes su dran/_/thod pa 
[\[120b.2\]]ma chag ma gas pa/_/gzugs mdzes yid 'ong rnyed pa la/_/rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas/_/sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya/_/mA ma kI'am spyan yang rung /_/rdo rje chen po rigs mthon po/_/lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni/_/de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs/_/
[\[120b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dam tshig 'od zer 'thug po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung 
[\[120b.4\]]thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/_na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/_ma hA daM Sh+T+rot+ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/_a si/_mu sa la/_pa r+shu pA sha hastA ya/_oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/_bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/_sarba 
[\[120b.5\]]big+h+nA bi nA ya kAn/_ma hA ga Na pa ti/_dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA/_/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun ni grags chen po/_/brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas/_/rdo rje sku ni rjes su dran/_/sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba la/_/rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams ni/_/cho 
[\[120b.6\]]gas sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang /_/rang nyid kyis ni skrod par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje 
[\[120b.7\]]las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM hU~M dzi na ri TiT+Ta hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun/_/'jigs shing kun du skrag gyur pas/_/byang chub sems ni rjes su dran/_/srin po ma rungs gtum po dang /_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa la/_/rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar bas/_/las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[121a.2\]]zhugs nas/_pad+mo 'byung ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ta rU la/_bi rU la/_sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/_dz+wa li ta bi s+phu ling+ga/_aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/_ke sa ris TA a To pa TaM kA ra/_badzra khu ra ni r+g+hA tan/_tsa li ta 
[\[121a.3\]]ba su d+hA ta la ni shwA sa mA ru to ng+k+shaMp+tA d+hA ra Ni d+ha ra/_b+hI Sha Na aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/_a ba ri mi tA ba la ba rA krA ma/_Ar+ya ga NA b+hI ta b+hU ta ga NA d+h+ya Shi ta/_bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/_ha ya grI ba/_khA da khA da/_ba ra man+t+rAn/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/_bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/_pa ra mu drAn/_sid+d+him+le disha_/A be sha ya/_sarba dzra ra pi shA tsA dI na/_sarba gra 
[\[121a.4\]]he Sh+wa pra ti ha to b+ha ba/_badzra da~MSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/_i daM duSh+Ta gra ha na/_duSh+Ta sarbaM bA/_d+hu na d+hu na/_ma tha ma tha/_marda marda/_pA Ta ya/_pA Ta ya/_ma Ta ma Ta/_b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/_bud+d+ha d+harma sang+g+ha a nu dz+nyA ta~M karma ku ru shI g+h+raM ha ya grI bA ya phaT/_badzra ye phaT/_badzra gA trA ya phaT/_badzra ne trA ya phaT/_
[\[121a.5\]]badzra rda~MSh+T+rA ya phaT/_badzra khu rA ya phaT/_badzra khu ra ni r+g+hA ta nA ya phaT/_pa ra man+t+ra bi nA sha nA ya phaT/_sarba trai lo kya b+ha ya~M ka rA ya phaT/_sarba kar+m+meSh+wa pra ti ha tA ya phaT/_badzra ku la san+tA sa nA ya phaT/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/chos kyi rdo rje 
[\[121a.6\]]mchog skyes rnams/_/'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur/_/ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran/_/mkha' dbyings dug gis yongs gang ba/_/rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis/_/dug rnams thams cad med par byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[121a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i tog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM e 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]h+ye hi/_b+ha ga bAn/_nI la badzra daN+Da/_tu ru tu ru/_hu lu hu lu/_hA hA/_gu lu gu lu/_gu lA pa ya/_gu lA pa ya/_kra ma kra ma/_b+ha ga bAn bA yu be ge na/_b+hU tAn shI g+h+ra~M/_da ha da ha/_da ra da ra/_ba ha ba ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tha ma tha/_pA ta ya/_pA ta ya/_ma Ta ma Ta/_mo TA pa ya/_mo 
[\[121b.2\]]TA pa ya/_sarba karmA Ni/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/_b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/_as+thi me da ma s+ya/_ru d+hi ra madz+dza me da/_pa sha madz+dza/_ru d+hi ra/_pri ya e h+ye hi/_b+ha ga bAn/_sarba big+h+na ni/_sarba bid+yA ni/_sarba man trA Ni/_sarba mU la karmA Ni/_kr-i tri ma Ni ShA dI ni/_sarba gra hA na/_ha na ha na/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_marda 
[\[121b.3\]]marda i daM me kAr+yaM sA d+ha ya/_hU~M ni lA ya ni lA ya/_nI la badzra daN+DA ya/_tu ru tu ru/_big+h+nan bi nA ya kA/_nA sha ya nA sha ya/_hu ru hu ru/_dIp+ta tsaN+DA ya/_sarba sha trU NA~M hr-i da yA ni pI Da ya/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/_ba ra bid+yA nAM ts+tshe da ka_/hUM bid+yA nAM shiSh+Ta ka_/sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_badzra d+ha ra ba tsa naM tsa/_marmA 
[\[121b.4\]]Ni ni krin+ta/_hU~M ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ku ru ku ru/_tu ru tu ru/_hu ru hu ru/_phaT phaT hU~M hU~M kr-i tan+tA ya/_de ba r-i Shi pi drA pa kA ya/_ha na ha na/_badzra da N+De na swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun/_/yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag 
[\[121b.5\]]nas/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dran/_/grags chen khro bo'i rgyal po 'di/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni/_/cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis/_/gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas kun nas sprin gyi dpal zhes 
[\[121b.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzA NA+oM/_oM hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/_u gra shU la pA Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/_a dz+yo ti ni rnA da hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/_oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/_de nas 'di ni 
[\[121b.7\]]gsungs tsam gyis/_/stobs po che yi klu rnams kun/_/yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas/_/sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran/_/bzlas pa tsam dang sbyor ba yis/_/las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/than pa byung ba'i dus su yang /_/chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed/_
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi Tak+ki'i rgyal po chen po khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_Tak+ki 
[\[122a.2\]]hU~M dzaH/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun bdag che skyes rnams/_/'jigs shing rdo rje sku gsum ni/_/rjes dran dam tshig ldan gyur nas/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rkang pa g.yas pas ling+ga mnan/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sngags bzlas 
[\[122a.3\]]pas/_/sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phreng ba chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_mi g.yo ba rdo rje gtum po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya 
[\[122a.4\]]bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_a ca la kA Na tsaN+Da/_naT+Ta naT+Ta/_maT+Ta maT+Ta/_moT+Ta moT+Ta/_saT+Ta saT+Ta/_taT+Ta taT+Ta/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_mo ha mo ha/_mo ha ka ra/_ha sa ha sa/_badzra ha sa ku ru/_ha sa ha sa/_mardar Ta mardar Ta/_gadz+dza gadz+dza/_ha na ha na/_b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_A bi sha A bi sha_/
[\[122a.5\]]ma hA man+t+ra bA la ka/_d+hu na d+hu na/_ti Ni ti Ni/_khA da khA da/_bi g+hAn/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_duSh+TAn/_b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/_sarbA na ku ru ku ru/_ki ri ki ri/_ma hA bi Sha ma badzra/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M tri ba li ta rang+ga na rta ka/_/A~M A~M A~M/_hA~M hA~M hA~M/_a tsa la tse Ta/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_hU~M hU~M 
[\[122a.6\]]a sa man+ti ka trAT/_ma hA ba la shA ta ya/_sa ma ya ni/_g+ha ta ya/_ba ra sa ma ya man+t+rA na/_A~M A~M/_hA~M hA~M/_mA~M shud d+h+yaM tu lo ka/_tu Sh+yaM tu badzrI/_na maHstu a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yo/_dzrA la ya/_trAT a sa ha na na maHswA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/lha kun 'khor dang 
[\[122a.7\]]bcas pa rnams/_/brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas/_/rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran/_/khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis/_/lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha/_/mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur nas/_/kha sbyar lus kyis 'gugs par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]tshig rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig khro bo chen po gnod mdzes 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/_gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hU~M/_A na ya hoH_b+ha ga bA na/_bid+yA 
[\[122b.2\]]rA dza hU~M phaT/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni/_/skra bshig gos dang bral bdag nyid/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan/_/de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni/_/rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/_/
[\[122b.3\]]bcings na bu mo dgug pa'i mchog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_dam tshig chen po rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje 
[\[122b.4\]]las phyung ngo /_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku gsum la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa/_/zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o/_/sangs rgyas gsung sku'i sbyor ba yis/_/'khor lo chen po sbyor ba las/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/_/rtag 
[\[122b.5\]]tu nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/_/'khor lo pad+mo rdo rje ches/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas/_/rdo rje kyo ba'i dbye ba yis/_/sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog_/rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/_/thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhi ba/_/mi yi bu mo 
[\[122b.6\]]mchog rnams kyi/_/snying gar rdo rje kyo ba sbyar/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/_/nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur/_/rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/sha tsi der ni gnas par bsam/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba 
[\[122b.7\]]yis/_/lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni/_/nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur/_/rdo rje lcags kyu gzugs po che/_/'bar ba rnon po 'dra ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms la/_/nam mkha'i pad+mo dgug pa'i mchog_/khro bo rdo rje'i dam tshig rang /_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa la/_/shU la rdo rje kyo zhags pas/_/lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog_/btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung /_/rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/_/khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya/_/tshangs dbang drag po la 
[\[123a.2\]]sogs lha/_/rang gi ming rnams bris na ni/_/rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du/_/'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu bsgom/_/khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rnam par bsam/_/bskal 
[\[123a.3\]]pa sreg pa'i 'khor lo che/_/bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dang spyad/_/phyag rgya'i dbye bas thams cad kyi/_/sngags kyi dbye bas thams cad du/_/dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs/_/gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/yang dang yang 
[\[123a.4\]]du bskul bar bya/_/de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_rgyal po mchog tu rtag pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun du rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje ral pa gcig ma dam tshig chen po'i gsung rdo 
[\[123a.5\]]rje'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM shU li ni swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams/_/tshig par gyur cing gos dang bral/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran/_/sngags kyi rig pa 'di yis ni/_/klu rnams 
[\[123a.6\]]thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/_/klu yi bu mo mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag_/bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_chos chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro gnyer can 'di nyid kyi sku gsung 
[\[123a.7\]]thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM sar+b+ba b+ha ya/_nA sha ni/_trA sa ni trA se/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_bai ra Ta b+h+r-i ku TI ta Ti/_bai ra Ti bai ra Ti/_shwe te shwe ta/_dza Ti ni swA hA/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/rig 'dzin bdag nyid skyes ma kun/_/'dar zhing 'jigs par gyur pas ni/_/ye shes 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]rdo rje rjes su dran/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog_/gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba rnams/_/sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni/_/dam tshig mchog gis dgug par bya/_/'gog pa rdo rje rgyal po ni/_/yongs su rdzogs pas mdzes mchog gis/_/ye shes rdo rje gsum las byung /_/
[\[123b.2\]]kun nas de ma thag tu 'gugs/_/yang na khro bo thams cad ni/_/dben pa'i gnas dang chen po ru/_/sngags pas 'bum du bzlas pa yis/_/las rnams thams cad byed par bshad/_/rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gzhan/_/theg pa che mchog smod pa dag_/rab tu 'bad pas 
[\[123b.3\]]gsad par bya/_/yang na gnas nas spo bar bya/_/'di yis byang chub mchog gi ni/_/sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/_/yang gsungs pa/_phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/_/lus dang ngag sems 
[\[123b.4\]]gsod pa ni/_/cho ga bzhin du bsgom byas pa/_/gdug sems can gyi dgra rnams ni/_/khrag dang chu yis gsher ba'am/_/bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/_/bgos nas ling+ga rkang pas mnan/_/khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya/_/brgya rtsa brgyad ni yongs bzlas 
[\[123b.5\]]na/_/sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig_/yang gsungs pa/_chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas/_/khro bo mchog gi bcings pa yis/_/ling+ga rkang pas mnan na ni/_/sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig_/bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/_/ngan pa rul 
[\[123b.6\]]pa'i dri mnam pa/_/bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na/_/skad cig gis skams 'chi bar 'gyur/_/thal ba'i skyo mas gsher ba'i gos/_/bgos nas khro bas 'khrugs bzhin du/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'jig par 'gyur/_/yang gsungs 
[\[123b.7\]]pa/_gcer bur phud de skra bshig la/_/'jigs pa'i tshul can gtsigs shing bsgyur/_/ling+ga rkang pas mnan na ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur/_/ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/_/khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang /_/mtshan ma gcig dang shing gcig 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]drung /_/mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya/_/mi rus las byas phur bu ni/_/sor brgyad pa yi tshad dag la/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te/_/dgra yi sgo khar sbas na ni/_/sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/_/shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa/_/zla 
[\[124a.2\]]ba phyed nang rdzogs pa yis/_/nyams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/yang na thod pa gang ba dag_/khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal/_/der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te/_/rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya/_/dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu/_/sbas na nges par skrod par 'gyur/_/
[\[124a.3\]]ta la'i lo ma'am gzhan dag la/_/khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la/_/dgra yi khyim mam sgo dag tu/_/sbas na skams shing 'chi bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rgyu'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[124a.4\]]cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_khams gsum pa thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid phur bus gdab pa'i sngags rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM g+ha g+ha/_s+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/_sarba duSh+T+ran 
[\[124a.5\]]phaT phaT/_kI la ya kI la ya/_sarba pA pa~M phaT phaT/_hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la/_badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/_kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra/_kI la ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/rdo rje rdzu 'phrul chen po kun/_/brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas/_/nam mkha' rdo rje 
[\[124a.6\]]thugs dran gyur/_/mi rus las byas phur bu 'am/_/yang na seng ldeng mchog las skyes/_/lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag_/rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gzhag la/_/'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba/_/rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi 
[\[124a.7\]]mthar/_/gzugs ni bsams nas sbyar bar bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che/_/yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can/_/gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya che/_/bsams na rdo rje gsum phur bu/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis/_/gdug pa'i khro bo tshar gcod pa/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]sbyor bas bya ba yin/_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po'i yang /_/snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar/_/rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/_/de nyid gong du dam tshig bya/_/phur bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/_/bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang nges par 'debs/_/
[\[124b.2\]]rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/phur bus btab na myur du 'chi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam gyi rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje 
[\[124b.3\]]las phyung ngo /_/oM ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_dIp+ta badzra tsakra hU~M phaT/_phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul dang ni/_/mthe bong bzhi ni rab tu bsdam/_/rnam par snang mdzad gnas mnan te/_/rdo rje phur bu nges par gdab/_/btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che/_/rdo rje sku gsum 
[\[124b.4\]]las byung ba/_/dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/_/nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung gi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_gsung gi dam tshig tsham ngam gyi 
[\[124b.5\]]rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM hrIHb+hUr b+hu baH/_ye shes pad+mo kha phye ba/_/rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag_/'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas mnan te/_/rdo rje phur bu nges par gdab/_/btab ma thag tu rdo rje che/_/sku gsum dri med las byung ba/_/
[\[124b.6\]]dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/_/nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thugs kyi dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di 
[\[124b.7\]]nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM badzra rA dza hU~M/_rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni/_/'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par bsgom/_/sems kyi rdo rje'i gnas mnan te/_/rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab/_/btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che/_/rdo rje dri med gsum las 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]byung /_/dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/_/nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/cho ga yang dag byas tsam gyis/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje mtha' klas par/_/phur bus 'debs 'dir gdon mi za/_/bcom ldan 
[\[125a.2\]]'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog_/sems can khams la phan mdzad pa/_/mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog_/e ma'o snying po 
[\[125a.3\]]kun btus pa/_/e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba/_/e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms/_/phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/_/phur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad/_/'di ni sngags 
[\[125a.4\]]rnams thams cad kyi/_/phur gdab de nyid las byung ba/_/sku gsung thugs las mchog sbyin pa/_/sngags kyi de nyid bsdus pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung dang thugs rmad du 
[\[125a.5\]]byung ba sngags kyis 'gugs pa rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/_/thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas/_/rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa/_/sme 
[\[125a.6\]]sha can gyi bdag nyid che/_/bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/_/dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/_/sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas/_/gru bzhi pa ni cho ga yis/_/dkyil 'khor bya'o de ru ni/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa
