[\[125a.7\]]yis/_/mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag_/bzhin yang mdzes la rab tu bzang /_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/_
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang /_/mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/_/rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po/_/bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/btso blag mkhan ni bdag nyid che/_/bu mo 
[\[125b.2\]]ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog_/'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/_/byas nas las ni brtsam par bya/_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/rdo rje 
[\[125b.3\]]sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/chos rnams kun 'dzin rgyal po mtshungs/_/'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa/_/rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas/_/gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing /_/bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba/_/sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/de ni rdo rje 
[\[125b.4\]]chos bdag nyid/_/sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin/_/kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o/_/bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni/_/rdo rje chos bdag nyid 'di ni/_/gsang ba thob par byed 
[\[125b.5\]]pa bsgrub/_/rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni/_/sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya/_/skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni/_/bsgom pa mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/dri dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/_/bsgoms na rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[125b.6\]]mchog_/grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur/_/'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/_/sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur/_/dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/_/de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed/_/dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/_/sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par 
[\[125b.7\]]bya/_/'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/gal te rdo rje can grub 'dod/_/bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya/_/'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]pas/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba/_/de nyid bla na med pa 'grub/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo 
[\[126a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun du skrag par byed pa'i khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM hrIHSh+TIHbi kritA na na sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_dug ni khrag dang kun du 
[\[126a.3\]]sbyar/_/lan tshwa ske tshe yungs mar te/_/tsher ma'i me las khros pas bsreg_/bu mo'i ming gi tshig dang bcas/_/nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na/_/'di ni rnam pa kun du shis/_/shes rab can gyis gru gsum du/_/stong phrag brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg_/bu mo dag 
[\[126a.4\]]gi don gyi phyir/_/'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya/_/bskal pa gsum dang grangs med ni/_/des ni rtag tu gnon par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos 'dzin pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan yang rung /_/gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni/_/de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur/_/
[\[126a.5\]]bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la/_/dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni/_/cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na/_/de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur/_/sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i/_/dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/bsam yas dag gis bris na ni/_/'chi bar 
[\[126a.6\]]'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/_/de ltar byas na nges par ltung /_/hU~M yig rab tu 'bar dang bcas/_/rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom/_/gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed/_/phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te/_/rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas/_/
[\[126a.7\]]skyes pa'am bud med gzugs bris la/_/lag par sta re bsams nas su/_/mgrin pa bcad par rnam par bsgom/_/sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog_/sems can kun la phan 'dod pa/_/'di yis snad par 'gyur ba'am/_/shi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/las 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]kyi rdo rje rab 'bar che/_/me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can/_/dbus su rdo rje rnam bsgoms la/_/chu rnams gnon pa'i mchog yin no/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na/_/rlung la sogs pa byung na ni/_/mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/_/gdug pa'i dgra ni rjes dran bya/_/
[\[126b.2\]]sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang /_/sprul par gang zhing gyur pa ni/_/mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te/_/gzhan du byas na 'jigs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang /_/sngags 'dis skrag par 
[\[126b.3\]]byas na ni/_/'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o/_/phaT/_ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/_/dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru/_/btsun mo rtag tu gzhag par bya/_/
[\[126b.4\]]rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa/_/pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas/_/sngags 'di rab tu bsgom par bya/_/hU~M/_'od zer lnga 'od rab 'bar ba/_/rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba bsgom/_/rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/_/phab na byang 
[\[126b.5\]]chub thob par 'gyur/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin/_/sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phan par 'dod pa yi/_/bud med 
[\[126b.6\]]rnyed na cho ga bzhin/_/dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya/_/gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam/_/mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan/_/'dzam bu'i gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur/_/bshad pa'am 
[\[126b.7\]]yang na bza' ba'am/_/sha yang cho ga bzhin du ni/_/mngon par bsngags nas gzhug par bya/_/zos na mkhas rnams kyis mi mthong /_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas/_/kham phor sbyar mar gzhag 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]par bya/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni/_/sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo /_/khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang /_/sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin/_/blangs nas kha sbyar sbyor ba yis/_/zos na de yis mi mthong ngo /_/bshang dang lhan cig ldan pa yis/_/ril bu lcags 
[\[127a.2\]]gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/sha chen dang ni sbyor ba yi/_/ril 
[\[127a.3\]]bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/ba glang sha dang sbyor ba yi/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/bshang ba 
[\[127a.4\]]las byung srog chags las/_/brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/ga pur tsan+dan sbyar ba yi/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun 
[\[127a.5\]]gyis mi mthong ngo /_/gi wang a ga ru sbyar ba'i/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro/_/ga pur gur gum sbyar ba yi/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor 
[\[127a.6\]]ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/zhes gsungs so/_/rdo rje can rnams gang yang rung /_/phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs na/_/de 'drar 'gyur te dpal dang ldan/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/_/dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi/_/steng du rdo rje 
[\[127a.7\]]'gro bar 'gyur/_/stong gsum bgrod pa dpal dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang /_/lha yi longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs/_/yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la/_/stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]spyod/_/bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag_/sems 'khrugs yid la dbang ba dag_/ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar 
[\[127b.2\]]che/_/e ma'o gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba/_/e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag_/e ma'o shin tu dri med chos/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/skyed po byed po mi 'gyur che/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos/_/rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa/_/sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[127b.3\]]rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye bas/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/_/rdo rje spyan dang gzugs sogs kyis/_/gtsug tor mnyes par byed par dran/_/khro bo rnams la'ang de mchog ste/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'o/_/rig 
[\[127b.4\]]pa'i rgyal po chos mchog rnams/_/rin chen tog ni rnam par bsgom/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sbyor ba la/_/tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/_/thams cad las byed sngags rnams la/_/gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom/_/sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[127b.5\]]dpa' rnam par bsgom/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la/_/gshin rje gshed nyid brtag par bya/_/thams cad sbyor ba'i sngags rnams la/_/spyi bo ru ni bskul ba shis/_/bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bsam gtan 
[\[127b.6\]]'khor lo 'di yis ni/_/sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag_/dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa/_/sgrub po rnams la phan pa gsungs/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug_/sku dang gsung thugs yang dag pas/_/ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal te/_/ri rtse nyams 
[\[127b.7\]]ni dga' ba dang /_/nags tshal rab tu dben par yang /_/bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba/_/sngags dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun/_/sngags dang bsam gtan gyis bskul bas/_/gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du/_/las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po/_/pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go/_/dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni/_/byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub/_/bskul dang rengs pa lha chen po/_/'phags pa'i sa ni bzhi po dag_/
[\[128a.2\]]rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya/_/de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub/_/bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'am/_/khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/_/mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag_/cho ga thams cad byas nas ni/_/las rnams rab tu bsgrub 
[\[128a.3\]]par bya/_/rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni/_/khams gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur/_/de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig ni 'di rnams so/_/hU~M hAHAHdz+haiH/_nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing /_/rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang /_/
[\[128a.4\]]'bab par 'gyur ro cho ga yis/_/hU~M yig rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag_/hAHyig sku yi rdo rje can/_/AHyig chos 'dzin rgyal po ste/_/'di ni sngags tshig bstan pa'o/_/yi ge dz+haiHyis bskul bar bshad/_/'khor ba dang ni g.yo ba yin/_/'di ni bskul ba thams cad kyi/_/
[\[128a.5\]]gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad/_/khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am/_/ji srid khru brgyad lnga tsam du/_/rdo rje rgyal po rab bskul na/_/'jigs shing skrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin thams cad sngar ji ltar/_/'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/de 
[\[128a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag_/sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang /_/brtul zhugs brtan pas bya ba 'di/_/sbyor ba gzhan min pa yis bya/_/gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o/_/dur khrod sol dang 
[\[128a.7\]]phub sogs las/_/dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/skra bshig gcer bur byung ba yis/_/khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed/_/dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis/_/dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas kyang /_/'chi bar 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la/_/ba lang sha dang rta yi sha_/khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyis/_/rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig_/sha chen po yis 'jig pa ni/_/thams cad rdo rje las byung dran/_/'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi/_/'jigs pa shin tu mi bzad 
[\[128b.2\]]dran/_/chos mchog can gyi bshang gci yis/_/dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs/_/sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig_/ces gsungs so/_/chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang /_/dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/dug las byung ba'i 
[\[128b.3\]]tsher ma ni/_/til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun/_/dgang zhing skul ba'i tshig dang bcas/_/sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig_/ces gsungs so/_/ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang /_/dug dang d+ha du ra dag ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gsad pa la/_/'di dag rab mchog gyur par 
[\[128b.4\]]bshad/_/sol khus gsher ba'i gos dag ni/_/gyon te sems ni khros nas su/_/ling+ga rkang pas mnan nas ni/_/srin pos 'dzin par gdon mi za/_/rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis/_/gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang /_/myur ba dag 
[\[128b.5\]]tu 'dzin par 'gyur/_/ske tshe dang ni yang dag ldan/_/bshang gci dag gis rdzogs pa yi/_/ling+ga rkang pas mnan na ni/_/tsha ba chen pos 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA 
[\[128b.6\]]Na~M/_oM hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_gardza gardza/_bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/_sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kAn/_ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_sbyin sreg slar yang bsam gtan dag_/lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste/_/ma yengs 
[\[128b.7\]]pa yi sems kyis ni/_/gsod pa yin na mchog 'di bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/_/rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/_/sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams/_/bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu brtag_/de la 'di ni drag po chen po khro bo'i dam tshig go/_/mkha' 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/yongs su gang bar rab bsgoms la/_/gdug pa de yis bsad par ni/_/bsams nas de ma thag tu 'chi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni/_/gdug pa'i sems dpas bsad 
[\[129a.2\]]na ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi/_/sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra bo rnams/_/skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni/_/sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na/_/'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa/_/gtum zhing khro bo mi bzad pas/_/skrag par 
[\[129a.3\]]gyur par bsams des ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi/_/'ug pa khra dang bya rgod dang /_/mchu rings pa dang wa rnams kyis/_/zos par bsams na de yis ni/_/sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig_/sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni/_/'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa/_/dug gi 
[\[129a.4\]]mchog gi dam tshig ni/_/dpral bar bsams na 'di khyad 'phags/_/sbrul des zos par gyur pa yis/_/bsgrub bya dag kyang nges par 'jig_/phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/_/yams sam nye bar 'tshe ba rnams/_/'jigs pa dgra la dbab pa'i mchog_/'di ni 
[\[129a.5\]]bskul ba'i mchog yin no/_/tho ba rab tu drag po yis/_/brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar brdeg_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/_/dgra yi srog ni med par 'gyur/_/rdo rje can gyis sta re sogs/_/gsheg cing gtub par bsams na ni/_/sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin 
[\[129a.6\]]pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi/_/bsrung ba la sogs dang po sngags/_/lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab/_/'di ni gsod byed mchog gi mchog_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/phung po rdo rjes dkyil 'khor du/_/sems can ji snyed gnas pa la/_/gsang bdag 
[\[129a.7\]]nyid gtogs bsams na ni/_/'di ltas mnyes 'gyur gzhan du min/_/ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can/_/bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje thugs kyi bka' ji bzhin/_/bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro bos de skad ces bka' 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]stsal to/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po/_/thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_/e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar 
[\[129b.2\]]bstan/_/de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o/_/sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa/_/nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro/_/lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng ba can/_/rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bris/_/de la 'di ni klu khro bo skul ba'i snying po'o/_/kha~M/_kha yi nang du de bsam zhing /_/
[\[129b.3\]]dug ni ha la ha la 'dra/_/sreg pa me yi kha dog dang /_/bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon mi za/_/de la 'di ni dug thams cad dgug pa'i snying po'o/_/hrIH/_rnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug_/khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun/_/de yis khyer bar bsgoms nas ni/_/bab par 
[\[129b.4\]]gyur par rnam par bsam/_/de ni de ma thag nyid du/_/dug gi rgya mtsho mi bzad 'gyur/_/reg ma thag tu 'gro ba kun/_/'jig pa 'di la the tshom med/_/sdig pa sbal pa la sogs dang /_/sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag la'ang /_/cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya/_/sbyor ba 
[\[129b.5\]]'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/_/de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o/_/oM/_lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs/_/gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/_/ye shes rdo rjes bkug nas 'jug_/bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig 
[\[129b.6\]]chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje'i snying po'o/_/hU~M/_snying po 'di ni rdo rje che/_/kha dog dkar por rnam par bsgom/_/'od kyi sprin ni cher 'bar ba/_/zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil/_/gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[129b.7\]]de ma thag tu sdud pas ldang /_/lan gnyis lan gsum rab bsgoms nas/_/skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na/_/nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang /_/skad cig gis ni dug med byed/_/zhes de skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]drang ba'i snying po'o/_/AH/_'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang /_/gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams/_/phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/_/bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur/_/pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad/_/ri bong can bzhin dri med pa/_/de yi dbus na 
[\[130a.2\]]'dug bsam pa/_/'od zer lnga ni rab rdzogs pa'o/_/sdug pa na ni dam tshig gnag_/bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dra/_/bsam gtan gnas 'di gsang ba ste/_/gsang chen ye shes dri ma med/_/de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams 
[\[130a.3\]]so/_/dzi na dzika/_A ro lika_/badzra d+h+r-ika/_yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa/_/dad pas yon tan thob par 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis/_/dam tshig spre'u'i rnam pa'am/_/yang na khyer ni byung ba'ang rung /_/rang gi lus ngag sems 
[\[130a.4\]]gnas las/_/byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam/_/'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung /_/rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas bsgom la/_/lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams/_/des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom/_/de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[130a.5\]]grags chen rnams/_/byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag_/dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol/_/'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/_/sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam/_/rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po/_/nad las thar bar bsgom par bya/_/
[\[130a.6\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan rnams/_/khros pa de la bsam par bya/_/'chi bar byed pa dam pa'i don/_/bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis/_/las skyes su yang gang grags pa/_/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis/_/nyi 
[\[130a.7\]]ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur/_/yang na rang gi sngags rgyal gyis/_/rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam/_/'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/ye shes kyo ba 'od chen po/_/'dod pa thar pa rdo rje ches/_/
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ni/_/ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing /_/rang bzhin dag pa'i de nyid la/_/'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs/_/bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don brtson pa'i/_/sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong /_/sangs rgyas byang chub 
[\[130b.2\]]sems dpa' rnams/_/dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong /_/de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te/_/byang chub ye shes mchog thob pa/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong /_/sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa yi/_/skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong /_/
[\[130b.3\]]sems can chen po khams gsum pas/_/mchod pa byed par de yis mthong /_/rang gzugs ye shes che 'od mnyam/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/_/nges par mchod pa byed par mthong /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs 
[\[130b.4\]]chen dang /_/grags pa chen po rdo rje chos/_/gsang ba rdo rje grags pa che/_/rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/_/rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong bar 'gyur/_/rgyan rnams 
[\[130b.5\]]thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/_/lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang /_/khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na/_/de ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong /_/thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang /_/chos 
[\[130b.6\]]mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol/_/chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i lus/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba/_/bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i/_/dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur/_/kun dga' skyed tshal sna tshogs pa/_/lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyan/_/sangs 
[\[130b.7\]]rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/_/bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong /_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong /_/rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis/_/mchod pa byed par nges mthong ngo /_/zhes kyang gsungs so/_/rdo 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i/_/rmi lam dri ma med mthong des/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur/_/gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs/_/gal te rdo rje blos mthong na/_/blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 
[\[131a.2\]]'gyur/_/de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o/_/rang sems sems ni dmigs pa la/_/chos rnams thams cad rab gnas pa/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i sems gnas 'di/_/chos med chos nyid med pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[131a.3\]]pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/_ngo bo nyid med chos rnams la/_/chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa/_
[\[131a.4\]]nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar yang dag byung /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[131a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/nam mkha' deng ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/_thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du yang mi sems so/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[131a.6\]]cad rmi lam dang /_rmi lam las byung bar rjes su rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/_gzhan yang nam mkha' ni brtag tu med pa/_bltar med pa thogs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[131a.7\]]cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/_gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad dang rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni thams cad la rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste/_'di lta ste/_sems kyi 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]ngo bo nyid do/_/lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/_gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams su gnas te/_nam 
[\[131b.2\]]mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams na yang gnas pa ma yin te/_chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med pa'o/_/gang la skye ba med pa de ni chos gang gis kyang brtag 
[\[131b.3\]]par mi nus so/_/de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o/_/kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/_gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed 
[\[131b.4\]]pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rnam pa ste/_byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/_ngag la mi gnas/_sems la mi gnas so/_/chos gang yang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas 
[\[131b.5\]]yin no/_/kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam gyi gnas mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/_khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta 
[\[131b.6\]]bu/_rmi lam dang 'dra ba rmi lam las byung ba'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams dang /_sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 
[\[131b.7\]]kyang rmi lam la bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/_dper na/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/_rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la sems can gang dag gis gser ram/_rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/_gang gsol ba btab pa de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam nyid kyis 'byor par byed de/_rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la mi 
[\[132a.2\]]gnas/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu la gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu 
[\[132a.3\]]dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro 
[\[132a.4\]]zhes pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 
[\[132a.5\]]dngos grub kun nas btus te gsungs pa/_sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas pa lags/_gang nas byung ba lags/_de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 
[\[132a.6\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub ni sngags thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs la mi gnas 
[\[132a.7\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos grub thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so/_/lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]mi gnas/_gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/_gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/_sems ni lus la mi gnas/_lus kyang sems la mi gnas/_ngag ni sems la mi gnas/_sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid 
[\[132b.2\]]dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas pa lags/_gang nas byung ba lags/_rdo rje 
[\[132b.3\]]'chang gis bka' stsal pa/_rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas so/_/rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/_sems gang la gnas/_bka' stsal pa nam mkha' la gnas 
[\[132b.4\]]so/_/gsol pa nam mkha' gang la gnas/_bka' stsal pa gang la yang mi gnas so/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur nas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 
[\[132b.5\]]'khod par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[132b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin 
[\[132b.7\]]chen gyi mchod pa'i bkod pas mchod pa byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rgyas thams cad nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/de nas de phyir sku'i dkyil 'khor/_/mchog thugs dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba/_/dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog_/legs par rab tu bshad par bya/_/khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya/_/gru 
[\[133a.2\]]bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/_/sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas/_/de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/_/cho ga rdo rjes bri bar bya/_/sngags rnams kyi ni gsang ba mchog_/dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas/_/phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas bya'o/_/
[\[133a.3\]]mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog_/grwa rnams kun du dgod par bya/_/khro bo dang po rnams sgor bri/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams/_/rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgom pa'i/_/mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bya/_/'di ni sngags rnams 
[\[133a.4\]]thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa/_/bye brag tu ni nges par dbu la/_/'di ni sku yi rdo rje can/_/sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig go/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[133a.5\]]ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/de nas de phyir gsung dkyil 'khor/_/mchog thugs 
[\[133a.6\]]dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dra/_/dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog_/legs par rab tu bshad par bya/_/khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya/_/gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin/_/grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par/_/rdo rje bsgoms pas thig gdab bo/_/nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas/_/rdo 
[\[133a.7\]]rje'i gsung gi yon tan bskyed/_/rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos/_/rig pa'i dbang po 'jug par bya/_/de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni/_/kun du zlum po bri bar bya/_/mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/_/cho ga brtson pas bri bar bya/_/tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che/_/de yi dbus su 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]dgod par bya/_/rdo rje'i gnas ni nyams dga' nyid/_/de dag thams cad yongs su brtag_/yongs su gsal bar cho ga yis/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni/_/de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya/_/de ltas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/_/bshang gci khu ba'i dam 
[\[133b.2\]]tshig gis/_/mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas 
[\[133b.3\]]sprin gyi bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang chen 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i/_/gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa/_/de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su 
[\[133b.4\]]'gyur/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung /_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas shes pa'i gsang chen rab tu gsang ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khor lo 'byung ba 
[\[133b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gi yi ge'i gnas rnams te/_o~M AHhU~M/_rdo rje'i thig 
[\[133b.6\]]ni gdab pa dang /_/tshon rtsi rnams kyang dgye ba dag_/sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste/_/byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'/_/de bas dam tshig cho ga shes/_/sngags kyi lha rnams bcug nas su/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms la/_/dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par 
[\[133b.7\]]brtag_/rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang /_/spyan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/_/sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong /_/rdo rje'i sku yi yon tan 'thob/_/rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/_/rang gi chos mas 'jug par bya/_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/mchog 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]tu rtag pa'i gsang ba'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/mA ma kI yang 'jug par bya/_/'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/mchog tu rmad byung gsang chen no/_/de ltar byas pas myur du rang /_/rab dang yid dbang rnams byon nas/_/rab tu 
[\[134a.2\]]dgyes par gyur pa rnams/_/gsang ba mchog ni 'dri bar byed/_/'di skad kyang gsungs so/_/sngags grub pa yis bya ba ni/_/rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung che/_/khro bo'i rgyal po yis sangs rgyas/_/thams cad bkug nas mchod par bya/_/rdo rje gsum dang 
[\[134a.3\]]gnas dag la/_/dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya/_/sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed/_/'di skad kyang gsungs so/_/sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang /_/rmad byung chen po'i gtor ma dbul/_/bshang gci sha dang 
[\[134a.4\]]'bru mar dang /_/lnga pa sems las byung ba dang /_/khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun/_/tshim par 'gyur bar kun du bshad/_/'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o/_/thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di/_/rang nyid gang tshe spyod pa na/_/
[\[134a.5\]]rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms nas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/_/yang na rdo rje bdud rtsir grags/_/slob ma rdo rje 'od po cher/_/bsgom bya las kyi go 'phang ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis nges sten pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[134a.6\]]thig skud gshegs rnams dgod/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye brag gis/_/tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par dgye/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/gsang chen byang chub dam pa'o/_/sngags rnams thams cad 
[\[134a.7\]]nyid la yang /_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom par bya/_/mchog gi sku gsung thugs dam tshig_/gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/_/de ltar byas na nye mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes/_/rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa/_/'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad/_/rdo rje 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bum pa rnams dgod pa/_/sngags rgyud bdag pos shes byas pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya/_/dngos grub kun 'bras 'dod pa yi/_/sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya/_/bshang gci 'bru mar sha la sogs/_/bsreg rdzas 
[\[134b.2\]]dag ni dbul bar bya/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'khor lo/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/_/bsams te zhal du dbab par bya/_/'di skad kyang gsungs so/_/dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/_/brgya rtsa brgyad ni sbyin sreg bya/_/
[\[134b.3\]]'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis/_/slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung /_/AHyig lus dang ngag sems la/_/bsgoms nas rdo rje 'dzin par byed/_/rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/grags chen 
[\[134b.4\]]rnam par snang mdzad ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu/_/byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu stsol/_/de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go/_/AHkha~M bI ra hU~M/_'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi snying po'i sngags kyi rgyal 
[\[134b.5\]]po'o/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang chen no/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/_/yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom/_/rdo rje'i blo yis sil snyan dang /_/dri sogs dam tshig sprin tshogs bsgom/_/'di skad kyang gsungs so/_/
[\[134b.6\]]rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni/_/yungs kar brtul zhugs can gyis brdeg_/de la de yi tshe na ni/_/rang nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol/_/yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas bsgom/_/bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis/_/bzung bar 
[\[134b.7\]]mkhas pas bsgom par bya/_/rtag tu slob ma blo brtan pa/_/rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can/_/sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya/_/de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang chen te/_slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu smra 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni/_/khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/_/rdo rje gsang ba gsum byung ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/_/de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga gsang chen no/_/byang chub 
[\[135a.2\]]rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/_/mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin/_/bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/_/de tshe de la dbang bskur ba/_/rab dga'i sems kyis sbyin par bya/_/lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/snying gar bdag po gzhag 
[\[135a.3\]]par bya/_/rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la/_/sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la/_/de la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i/_/dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya/_/khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/_/ma byin pa 
[\[135a.4\]]yang khyod kyis blang /_/pha rol bud med bsten par bya/_/rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis/_/sems can thams cad rab bskul bya/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o/_/zhes kyang gsungs so/_/sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yi/_/de la 
[\[135a.5\]]sngags kyang sbyin par bya/_/sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin ni/_/byin nas gsang ba yang dag brtsam/_/khu ba'am yang na bshang ba'ang rung /_/mngon par bsngags nas cho ga bzhin/_/rdo rje'i blos ni zar gzhug bya/_/'di ltas dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/_/rnam pa 'di bzhi 
[\[135a.6\]]gsang chen te/_/rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang /_/sngags kyi 'khor los bud med gzugs/_/sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sngags thams cad kyis mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o/_/glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/_/sha chen dag kyang bza' 
[\[135a.7\]]bar bya/_/sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya/_/de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes/_/nyin re rdo rje slob ma la/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/_/bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang /_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas kyis kyang /_/sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge oM/_/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar/_/bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa ste/_/dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa'o/_/rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub bya ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rang nyid kyang /_/mi snang 
[\[135b.2\]]stobs dang brtson 'grus dang /_/rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag ni/_/rdo rje sku yi bka' ji bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor du ni thams cad 'grub/_/bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams/_/cha ni mnyam par byas nas su/_/kham phor sbyar mar bzhag nas ni/_/sangs rgyas kun dang 
[\[135b.3\]]lhan cig 'khod/_/'di skad ces kyang gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gi mchog go/_/hrIHyig 'bar ba 'od bzang po/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i 
[\[135b.4\]]khams/_/yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/_/de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas/_/der ni sngags la dbab par bya/_/de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje'i byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas so/_/a~MHkhaM d+hIH/_phyag na rdo rje gzugs chen po/_/phyag na pad+mo 'od 
[\[135b.5\]]chen dang /_/gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag_/bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas gzhag go/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag_/tshe dpag med pa'i rdo rje che/_/rdo rje snang mdzad de 
[\[135b.6\]]bzhin te/_/thams cad 'od chen sdug bsngal ni/_/chen po snying pos bskul bar bya/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba'o/_/AH/_mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che/_/lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis/_/rdo rje cho ga bzhin du bskul/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab 
[\[135b.7\]]tu 'grub/_/'di skad ces kyang gsungs so/_/nyams dga' ba dang ri dbang dang /_/chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su/_/zla phyed nang dang rdzogs pa yis/_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/_/'khor gyi tshogs 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]rnams de dag ni/_/byang chub rdo rje can grub 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje 
[\[136a.2\]]bzhad pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rdo rje gsang chen no/_/rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che/_/de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches/_/mngag gzhug pa rnams rtag tu bskul/_/
[\[136a.3\]]de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas rnam pa bzhi ste/_dam tshig bskul ba dang /_dam tshig gtong ba dang /_dam tshig bod pa dang /_dam tshig 'ching ba'o/_/mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/gong 
[\[136a.4\]]bu'i tshul gyis rdo rje ni/_/rmad byung gzugs can byed par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung /_/gal te dbang du bya 'dod na/_/rdo rje mchog 
[\[136a.5\]]gsum 'dzin pa che/_/gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje stobs po che/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam/_/mda' lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis/_/dbu rgyan rtse mor yang dag spro/_/gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas/_/rdo rje khro bo dbab 
[\[136a.6\]]par bya/_/byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis/_/sngangs shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya/_/bsam gtan 'di ni gsang ba yi/_/skul ba dag gis phyogs gcig bsgom/_/sngags rnams kun gyi rab tu gsang /_/rdo rje'i don gyi blo yis gsungs/_/nam mkha' 
[\[136a.7\]]rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'i/_/hU~M yig sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog_/bsam bya rdo rje'i sngags sogs kyis/_/rdo rje gsum la sogs pa bsgom/_/mig gnas yi ge oM bsams nas/_/'di dag cho gas bstan par bya/_/sngags rnams kun gyi 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]gzugs dag ni/_/sku gsung rdo rje can rnams mthong /_/bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che/_/sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na/_/rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_/rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po/_/don rnams 
[\[136b.2\]]thams cad 'byor bsam la/_/yi ge ba~M khar gnas pa bsgom/_/oM yig lce la 'dug par bsam/_/bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas/_/yid bzhin nor bus rnam brgyan pa/_/zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel/_/ye shes rdo rje rab bskul ba'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[136b.3\]]'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshig gi mchog rdo rje gsung las phyung ngo /_/bIH/_nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[136b.4\]]dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/_/rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis/_/bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/ser po rdo rje rnam par 'gying /_/zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/_/bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya/_/dpa' bo rdo rje'i 
[\[136b.5\]]rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang kun nas nges par bsgrags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/tsu~M/_nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su 
[\[136b.6\]]ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/cho ga dag gis sangs rgyas sprin/_/rdo rje gsum mchog grags chen ni/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis ltung /_/skul byed rdo rje ma bsgom mo/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/kha dog dkar mor rab tu bsgom/_/rdo rje 
[\[136b.7\]]sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/bsams la sngags kyi gnas dgod do/_/rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad rdo rje'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dza~M/_nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis/_/rdo rje bsgoms pas dbab par bya/_/dza~M b+ha 
[\[137a.2\]]la ni nor bsgrub pa/_/gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya/_/zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa/_/thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni cho ga yis/_/gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/_/de yi rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/_/bsam gtan gnas la 'dug pas 
[\[137a.3\]]dbul/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis/_/de yi dbu rgyan rnam par bsam/_/de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang /_/'brog gnas dbang po 'od chen mnyes/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdzas sgrub pa'i rtog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[137a.4\]]phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa nye bar spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/k+ShiM/_mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/gru bzhi lham pa 
[\[137a.5\]]rab tu mdzes/_/thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas/_/me tog spos kyis kun du 'khrigs/_/gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis/_/mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam/_/gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsams nas/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab/_/gzugs 
[\[137a.6\]]ni gcig tu bsam par bya/_/rdo rje gsum las bye brag gis/_/de yi bsam gtan bsam par bya/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/dbu rgyan la ni khro bo bsgom/_/snying gar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la/_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[137a.7\]]mo thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas pa bsgom pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje'i sngags thams cad dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phra mo'i dngos 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]grub 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub/_/sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po/_/'dzam bu chu yi gser 'od 'dra/_/dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas/_/mi snang la sogs kun grub ni/_/gtso bo rdo rje 'chang du 
[\[137b.2\]]'gyur/_/gnod sbyin rgyal mo grub pa che/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba sngags kyi dngos grub rnams so/_/sngags kyi dngos grub yid 'ong ba'i/_/mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni/_/'jig 
[\[137b.3\]]rten khams ni thams cad du/_/mthong ba nyid kyi dga' bar 'gyur/_/gtsug tor thams cad grub pa yi/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang rab bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams 
[\[137b.4\]]cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid 
[\[137b.5\]]kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/_/lus dang ngag sems dmigs pa ni/_/rang gzugs nyid kyis de bya ste/_/de ltas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so/_/
[\[137b.6\]]gzugs ni thor tshugs dbu rgyan 'chang /_/chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra/_/cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/_/sngags kyi sdom pas kun du bsdams/_/lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba/_/rnyed 
[\[137b.7\]]nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/_/spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing /_/rdo rje'i mtshan ma yis ni bya/_/phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes/_/sngags dang rgyud ni legs par bslabs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas/_/brtul 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]zhugs chen pos thun bzhir ni/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya/_/sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu rnams/_/bza' dang bca' ba thams cad spyad/_/'di yis myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che/_/zla ba drug gis de dag kun/_/gdon 
[\[138a.2\]]mi za bar 'dir thob 'gyur/_/rtag tu gzhan gyi nor brku zhing /_/gsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba che/_/'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa/_/sdom pa 'dis ni kun du bsdams/_/'dod chags rdo rje'i lcags kyu yum/_/yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kIr/_/gsung gi rdo rje 
[\[138a.3\]]mchog thugs kyis/_/'di ni rnam pa kun du rigs/_/rang gi phyag rgya'am sems kyis bsam/_/bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can/_/de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen yang /_/mnyes par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/_/sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas/_/nags tshal 
[\[138a.4\]]dag tu bsod snyoms tshol/_/kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag_/'jigs shing skrag nas ster bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsum bdag nyid 'das na/_/'jig cing rdo rje'i yi ger 'gyur/_/lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin ma/_/lha ma yin mo mi mo'ang rung /_/rnyed nas rig pa'i 
[\[138a.5\]]brtul zhugs bya/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bstan/_/'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba'i de nyid tshul chen te/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[138a.6\]]rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[138a.7\]]le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/_mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/_/
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che/_/rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/_/gsang ba gsungs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/_/rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal chos rnams ni/_/ston mdzod rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen 
[\[138b.2\]]rgyal po rab tu zab/_/rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha'/_/rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/_/gsang ba gsungs shig khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/_/mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje can/_/'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/_/rdo rje gsungs khyod phyag 
[\[138b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad/_/dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung /_/rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi/_/bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis/_/rdo rje longs spyod bstod 
[\[138b.4\]]na ni/_/de yang sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse bas/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas dag pa/_/rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal to/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge che/_/rang 
[\[138b.5\]]bzhin 'od gsal dag pa ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sangs rgyas ye shes mtsho 'od kyis/_/dam tshig 
[\[138b.6\]]bzhi ni bsrung bya ste/_/sha chen rtag tu bza' bya'o/_/'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste/_/gsung 
[\[138b.7\]]gi rdo rje yi ge ches/_/bshang gci rtag tu bza' bya nyid/_/'di ni gsang ba rmad byung ba'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rdo rje sems 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/_/dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste/_/khrag dang khu ba sbyar ba dag_/brtul zhugs brtan pas rtag tu bza'/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/dam tshig de ni rmad byung che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rtag pa ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin phyir yang 
[\[139a.2\]]dag bsrung /_/gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/_/de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa/_/de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di nyid 
[\[139a.3\]]kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/ston pa lus kyis de rnams ni/_/rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas/_/sems can 'jug pa'i ngang tshul te/_/mchog tu rtag pa'i dam tshig go/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nyan thos kyi bslab 
[\[139a.4\]]pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam/_/byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams/_/dman par mos pa thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig de ni rmad byung che/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 
[\[139a.5\]]tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/gti mug lam gyis las gang rnams/_/byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste/_/sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag 
[\[139a.6\]]pos drag po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/khams gsum par ni gnas pa yi/_/bud med rdo rje las byung kun/_/sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni/_/dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag 
[\[139a.7\]]pos khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sems can skyes pa ji snyed pa/_/sku gsum dbyer med la gnas rnams/_/bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya/_/rdo rje mkha' khams bdag nyid kyang /_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gi rdo rje 'di nyid kyi/_sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur/_/gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che/_/thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin 
[\[139b.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sha dang khrag ni za ba dang /_/rtag tu bud med 'dod mchog gzhol/_/rdo rje chen po 'di rnams kyi/_/dam tshig bsten dkas mnyes par bya/_/de nas 
[\[139b.3\]]phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos klu'i dbang po'i rgyal mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/phra ma dang ni 'o ma 'thung /_/'dod dang dri ma rtag tu 'bad/_/dam tshig 'di rnams kyis bsgrub bya/_/gzhan du 
[\[139b.4\]]nges par nyon mongs 'gyur/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/khro zhing nga rgyal khur gyis non/_/spos dang me tog spyod pa skyes/_/dam tshig rdo rje sa 'og tu/_/
[\[139b.5\]]gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed de/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/thod rus bdug pa'i 'bru mar dang /_/zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/'byung po kun gyi dam 
[\[139b.6\]]tshig 'di/_/dag byed rdo rje don chen byed/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/bshang ba gci ba khrag bza' zhing /_/chang la sogs pa rtag tu btung /_/
[\[139b.7\]]rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor bas/_/gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsang bya/_/ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba/_/khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod/_/dam tshig ma lus dngos grub kun/_/phan par 'dod pas spyad par bya/_/khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni/_/rdo rje yang dag 'byung bar 
[\[140a.2\]]bya/_/sems can khams ni rnam kun du/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ngag gi dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/ngag gi las lam ma lus par/_/khams 
[\[140a.3\]]gsum dri med dkyil 'khor du/_/ngag gi grub gnas nyams dga' 'di/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sems rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/
[\[140a.4\]]yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun/_/brtan pa rdo rje'i blo yis bsgom/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi/_/dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[140a.5\]]bdag pos sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rang rgyal nyan thos de bzhin te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/phyag 'tshal na ni nyams par 'gyur/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs 
[\[140a.6\]]pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/kun du sku dang gsung thugs kyi/_/dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/_/bsam gtan 
[\[140a.7\]]sngags zlos pas bsgom bya/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags rdo rje thams cad kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sems can khams rnams bsdus nas ni/_/bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya/_/rdo rje gsum 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]phyag mchog gi mchog_/dam tshig rdo rje 'byung ba'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bsnyen pa dang /_/bsgrub pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rdo rje bshang gcis nam mkha'i 
[\[140b.2\]]dbyings/_/yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam/_/dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul/_/dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje thams cad mi snang ba'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/thun 
[\[140b.3\]]bzhi po ni gang zhig mchog_/rdo rje mo ni nyin re spyad/_/slar yang rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog_/rdo rje rdzogs byed dam tshig go/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sku 
[\[140b.4\]]gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/_/dbu rgyan gyi ni bsam gtan bsam/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig kun/_/khros pa rnams kyis rgyal mi nus/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid 
[\[140b.5\]]kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/kha zas la ni sku'i rdo rje/_/phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_/rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya/_/mdo 'don cho ga'i bya ba la/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[140b.6\]]thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying po rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang 
[\[140b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_cha_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[141a.2\]]cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i gnas la gang ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba'i gnas rnam par dpyad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di 
[\[141a.3\]]ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_sku yi yi ge ma skyes pa/_/gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan nyid med/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i rtog par byung /_/log par bzung bas gzung ba yin/_/de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin 
[\[141a.4\]]gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsung rdo rje'i tshig la log pa kun 'byung bas ma brtag tu gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyangs kyi ngo bo nyid spyod pa 
[\[141a.5\]]gshegs pa dang byon pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di yin no/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_tshangs pa la sogs pa'i byang chub chen po sems dpa' mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes pas 'di snyam 
[\[141a.6\]]du yongs su rtog par byed de/_ci rdo rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par ma mkhyen nas gsang ba'i yi ge 'chad dam snyam pa yang mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang 
[\[141a.7\]]chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/re zhig byang chub chen po sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i yi ge rnyed pa nged kyis kyang sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub mi shes so/_/de ci'i 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid med pa/_mi 'gyur ba las byung ba/_skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas so/_/rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o/_/de 
[\[141b.2\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_yong ye sems can 'di dag ni sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid nye bar bzung nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub 
[\[141b.3\]]sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa/_/chos kyi dbyings ni ma lus gnas/_/rtog pa rdo rje yang dag byung /_/smra bya smra bya yang ma yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[141b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub gang nas yang dag par 'byung /_gang du gnas gang du med par 
[\[141b.5\]]'gyur ba lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud la rdo rje rab tu gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[141b.6\]]ye shes dang /_khams gsum ji snyed pa dag kyang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsungs pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad gang na gnas/_ye shes rdo 
[\[141b.7\]]rje'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams la gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]'das nam mkha' gang na gnas/_rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/_gang na yang ma yin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur nas dbyangs 'di dag brjod do/_/e ma'o 
[\[142a.2\]]rdo rje e rdo rje/_/e ma'o rdo rje'i bstan pa ni/_/gang du lus dang ngag sems med/_/de ru sku ni rnam sgom pa/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/_/rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog_/rdo rje gsum mchog dbang 
[\[142a.3\]]phyug gis/_/dngos grub dag ni thams cad kyi/_/rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa gsungs/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/sku yi rdo rje rab bsgoms nas/_/spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom/_/
[\[142a.4\]]zhal gsum sku gsum yang dag byung /_/rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/_/rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na/_/myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis/_/gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam/_/gzhan du rnam par bsgom pa 
[\[142a.5\]]ni/_/de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che/_/mnyes par byed pa rnam par bsam/_/'di ltas mnyes 'gyur khyu mchog ni/_/rdo rje sku gsum mtshan 
[\[142a.6\]]pa rnams/_/gang zhig la la 'di sgom pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/_/'od chen pos ni zhag bdun gyis/_/sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung 
[\[142a.7\]]thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/_/phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa/_/kun mtshan nyid kyis cho ga bzhin/_/bsgoms na sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]thams cad kyi bdag pos yang sgrub po thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo /_/sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di/_/rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da'o/_/de nas 
[\[142b.2\]]yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/_/smad pa nyid du yong mi bya/_/cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'/_/gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin/_/
[\[142b.3\]]de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/_/bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad/_/gsung gi rdo 
[\[142b.4\]]rje mi smad do/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa'i/_/dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis/_/mgu bya thugs 
[\[142b.5\]]rdo rje mi smad/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig chen po ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/mdor na phung 
[\[142b.6\]]po lnga rnams ni/_/sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags/_/rdo rje'i skye mched rnams nyid ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khams gsum bsags pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung 
[\[142b.7\]]ngo /_/sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin/_/chu'i khams mA ma kI zhes bya/_/dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba/_/me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dam tshig ni/_/de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms 
[\[143a.2\]]par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[143a.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang chen gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[143a.4\]]cad kyis bka' stsal ba/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang slob dpon 'di ni gnyis su med cing 
[\[143a.5\]]gnyis su dbyer med do/_/rigs kyi bu ji snyed mdor bsdus te bstan na ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams bzhugs pa dang 'tsho ba dang skyong ba de rnams thams cad kyang dus gsum du byon nas/_rdo rje slob dpon de la 
[\[143a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnams kyis/_yang dag par mchod nas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_ngag rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di skad du yang 'byin to/_/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o/_/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[143a.7\]]thams cad kyi ma'o/_/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'di lta ste gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na/_ji snyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang gsung 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de bas kyang /_slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa bskyed pa 
[\[143b.2\]]gnas par gyur pa nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[143b.3\]]chen tog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_byang 
[\[143b.4\]]chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes yang dag par byung ba de rnams kyang byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon 
[\[143b.5\]]la mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[143b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rnams gang la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal 
[\[143b.7\]]pa/_sku gsum gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gang la yang mi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur nas cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/_de 
[\[144a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[144a.3\]]chen po nyon cig_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[144a.4\]]bshad du gsol/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam/_/gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/_/bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/_/'khor lo can kun gdan du bya/_/mchod 
[\[144a.5\]]pa cho ga de nyid kyis/_/blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya/_/slob dpon snying gar rab bsgoms nas/_/dbang bskur ba ni yang dag spyad/_/mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la/_/thams cad dbang bskur gnas gsum gyis/_/cho ga 
[\[144a.6\]]bzhin du dbab par bya/_/'di yis sems can thams cad la/_/phan bzhed byang chub thob 'gyur zhing /_/dngos grub thams cad rmad byung che/_/sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba bsam gtan 
[\[144a.7\]]gyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/hU~M hrIHkha~M/_sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam/_/sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/_/drag po mi sdug kun du khros/_/ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra/_/phyag bzhi pa ni cho ga yis/_phyag na thod pa bsnams par bsgom/_/lnga yi 'od 
[\[144b.2\]]zer rab gsal ba'i/_/rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/_/bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/_/khrag drang ba yi mchog yin no/_/rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang /_/phur bu drag po mchog dag gis/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang /_/rdo rje'i sbyor bas 
[\[144b.3\]]gzir bar bya/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos slar yang rdo rje kha zas kyi dam tshig gis bya ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/bza' ba'am btung ba gang cung zad/_/brtul zhugs can gyis gang za ba/_/bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba 
[\[144b.4\]]yis/_/cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/nyer spyod lnga yi mchod mchog 
[\[144b.5\]]gis/_/mchod bya de dag kyang mchod bya/_/'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba nyid kyi sku 
[\[144b.6\]]gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rang gi khu ba sogs bzung bas/_/cho ga bzhin du kun mchod bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs 
[\[144b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi/_/ma rnams dam tshig 'dzin pa ni/_/dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rjes spyad/_/sdom pa 'di ni rmad byung che/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/lus dang ngag sems longs spyod rdzogs/_/gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes/_/bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya/_/min na thams cad 
[\[145a.2\]]'jig par 'gyur/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/mtho gang tsam gyis dpags par ni/_/mgo bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/_/oM yig 
[\[145a.3\]]dbus su gnas bsams nas/_/bdud rtsi lnga bo dbab par bya/_/rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par/_/'gyur bar 'dir ni the tshom med/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[145a.4\]]bdag pos sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/_/glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing /_/dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya/_/rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi bya/_/de nas 
[\[145a.5\]]yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad bsal ba gnon pa 'dren pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM/_'od zer dkar 'bar phreng ba can/_/'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag_/'od zer ser po 'khrigs 
[\[145a.6\]]pa yis/_/ser po lta bur bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje gsum 'od dam tshig gis/_/sa bon 'di ni gsang gsum byung /_/de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus dang ngag dang sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa nyid kyi 
[\[145a.7\]]sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_gro ga sogs la 'khor lo ni/_/las kyi rdo rje la gnas par/_/hU~M yig dbus su bzhag nas su/_/ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/_/sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]kyis/_/yang dag brgyan te rtag tu bzhag_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o/_/de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje any+dza na'i gnas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/lam gyi bzhi 
[\[145b.2\]]mdo'am shing gcig drung /_/ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/_/de ru rdo rje any+dza na/_/thod par rtag tu dbab par bya/_/mar khu chen po dang /_khrag dang bshang ba dang pad+ma'i skud pa dang /_arga'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i nam phyed na/_rdo rje any+dza na mkhas 
[\[145b.3\]]pas dbab par bya'o/_/sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[145b.4\]]bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du rtogs pa dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gis spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur/_de nas de bzhin 
[\[145b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum rtogs pa dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[145b.6\]]kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/_gsum po gang zhig lags/_rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 
[\[145b.7\]]rdo rje dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum po 'di dag go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra 
[\[146a.2\]]rab dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa 'das nas/_gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyang 'das nas/_thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so/_/de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom
