[\[146a.3\]]ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don ma bshad pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do/_/gang zhig 
[\[146a.4\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/
[\[146a.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma ngu shig_/sdug bsngal gsum ma 
[\[146a.6\]]skyed cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/_ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi bskyed par bgyi/_de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[146a.7\]]'das gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge'i skal ba ma mchis te/_tha na ming thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig_/yi ge ni thun mong ba ste/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyed rnams kyis mi shes pa dang ma thos 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]pa de bzhin du/_nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rigs kyi bu gang gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge 'di dag yang dag par ma thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/_/de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge rnam par 
[\[146b.2\]]dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/_/de 
[\[146b.3\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi btsun mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/_sems can khams ni gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/_/dga' ba yid 'ong don can 'dod pas 
[\[146b.4\]]bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_/mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gsan par mchis bzhed na/_/sems can yab gnyen mchog chen bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi btsun mo mA ma kIs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[146b.5\]]thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la rdo rje 'dod pa dga' ba mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/_rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can mang por phan/_/sangs rgyas rnams don byang chub mchog don phan pa rjes ston pa/_/mgon pos gal te de ring 
[\[146b.6\]]bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/_/chags pas 'dod chags dam tshig bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_/de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi btsun mo sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dod pa nye bar 
[\[146b.7\]]longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/_khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/_/'jig rten dag ni dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/_/mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/_/rab dga'i spyod pa kun du bzang pos 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do/_/khyod ni rdo rje 'dod 
[\[147a.2\]]pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid rjes su thugs brtse ba/_/mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/_/yon tan rin chen dam pa'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo 
[\[147a.3\]]rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[147a.4\]]'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/_bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum yang dag par 'byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal 
[\[147a.5\]]gyis yang dag par rig pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to/_/de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun nas bzang po/_kun du bzang po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 
[\[147a.6\]]dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong 
[\[147a.7\]]ngam/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mnyam pa nyid dang /_rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so/_/bde bar 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang gi phyir 'dod chags kyi 
[\[147b.2\]]yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[147b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma gsungs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/_tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/_'du shes kyi phung po ma yin/_'du byed kyi phung po ma yin/_
[\[147b.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin/_khams ma yin skye mched ma yin/_de bzhin du 'dod chags ma yin zhe sdang ma yin gti mug ma yin/_chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[147b.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsang ba 'di 
[\[147b.6\]]bsgom par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[147b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung shig_/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas 
[\[148a.2\]]shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar 
[\[148a.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 
[\[148a.4\]]dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa 
[\[148a.5\]]zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad d+hA ka ra warma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_slad kyis paN+Di ta bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas chag lo ts+tsha ba dge slong 
[\[148a.6\]]chos rje dpal gyis gus pas zhus shing dag par bcos te gtan la phab pa//[ {D443}]@##/_/rgyud phyi ma/_/de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang sku dang gsung 
[\[148a.7\]]dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang /_dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o kun du bzang po yi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi nges par 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]dag_/rdo rje gsum gyis kun du ni/_/rdo rje gsum la kun du bzhugs/_/sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi/_/rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung /_/sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/_/byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o/_/e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che/_/e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das/_/e 
[\[148b.2\]]ma'o 'khor bdag gi rgyun/_/e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no/_/sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no/_/
[\[148b.3\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang /_phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o shin tu 
[\[148b.4\]]rnyed dga' ba/_/byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin/_/rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa/_/gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud/_/sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang /_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa/_/mgon po khyed la gsol bar 
[\[148b.5\]]'tshal/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de/_/de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa/_/sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/_/yon tan 'byung gnas legs so 
[\[148b.6\]]legs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/_/'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur/_/gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyi/_/'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod/_/rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[148b.7\]]rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi/_/de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad/_/de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du/_/gsang chen zhes ni gang la bgyi/_/dam pa rnam pa du zhig mchis/_/byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi/_/de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu ci/_/badzra d+h+r-ika ces ci la bgyi/_/de bzhin dzi na 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dzi ka ni gang /_/de la rad+na d+h+r-ika ni gang /_/de bzhin A ro li ka ni ci/_/pradz+nyA d+h+ri ka ces gang la bgyi/_/rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags/_/mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi/_/dwe Sha zhes bya 'dir gang lags/_/rA ga zhes ni ci la bgyi/_/badzra sngags ni gang la bgyi/_/ra ti 
[\[149a.2\]]zhes 'dir gang la bgyi/_/phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags/_/ya mAn+t+wa kr-i ta don ni gang /_/de bzhin pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta ci/_/pad mAn+ta kr-i ta ming ci lta/_/de bzhin big+h+nAt+na kr-i ta ci/_/kun du spyod pa gang ci lags/_/de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang /_/'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags/_
[\[149a.3\]]rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi/_/chos 'byung ba ni ji ltar bsgom/_/de bzhin sdom pa ji lta bu/_/zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags chos/_/sems can don mdzad ji lta bu/_/dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi/_/phyag rgya'i dgod pa ji ltar lags/_/'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags/_
[\[149a.4\]]mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad/_/ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar zhes/_/'dir ni gnas shes gang la bshad/_/mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu/_/gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu/_/ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi/_/bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu/_/dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar stsal/_/de bzhin 
[\[149a.5\]]rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang /_/bdud rtsi lnga rnams ci ltar bza'/_/de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags/_/dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu/_/de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu/_/de la thabs ni rnam pa du/_/de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu/_/rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi/_/bka' ni ji ltar 
[\[149a.6\]]bsgo bar bgyi/_/las kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni/_/sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la 
[\[149a.7\]]dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs/_/mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la/_/bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po/_/zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[149b.2\]]de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/_rang rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang gsung 
[\[149b.3\]]dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/_sku gsung thugs ni 
[\[149b.4\]]rnam pa gsum/_/gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba/_/tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad/_/lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang /_/bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/_/bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin/_/bzhi pa dang ni bcu 
[\[149b.5\]]drug pa/_/brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa/_/slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni/_/dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin/_/drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang /_/bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa/_/drag spyod rjes su chags pa dang /_/nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o/_/bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang /_/bcu gcig pa dang 
[\[149b.6\]]bco lnga pa/_/dngos grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni/_/bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las/_/tshar gcod phan 'dogs spyod pa dag_/dul dang gdul dka' zhi ba yi/_/sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o/_/bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel pa yi/_/bsnyen pa rdo rje'i 
[\[149b.7\]]cho ga bzhi/_/thun mong dngos grub 'brel pa yin/_/mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do/_/dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel pa yi/_/gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o/_/bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni/_/slob ma yongs su smin bya ba/_/brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba/_/rang gi 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]slob ma bdag nyid che/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/_/ston pas yongs su grol ba yin/_/thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa/_/rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste/_/thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do/_/rgyud ni rgyun zhes 
[\[150a.2\]]bya bar grags/_/rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te/_/gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang /_/mi 'phrog pa yis rab phye ba/_/rnam pa rang bzhin rgyu yin te/_/de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o/_/gzhi ni thabs shes bya ba ste/_/gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus 
[\[150a.3\]]ba'o/_/rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang /_/ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o/_/byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa/_/de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod/_/de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad/_/gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/_/lhag ma'i lha ni gsang chen te/_/dam 
[\[150a.4\]]pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya/_/thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/_/dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso/_/stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa/_/byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/mi phyed dbye ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/rigs dang lhan cig 
[\[150a.5\]]ldan pas na/_/rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do/_/rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga/_/rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/'chang ba 'dzin pa zhes grags te/_/rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod/_/badzra d+h+r-ika ni rnam shes yin/_/yod dang med dang dbus las 'das/_/
[\[150a.6\]]'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung /_/sems can kun gyi lus yin te/_/skye las rgyal ba dzi ni dzi ka_/don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na/_/sems ni rin po che zhes bya/_/tshor ba po yis nges tshor bas/_/tshor ba rat+na d+h+r-ika tu 'dod/_/mtshan gzhi 
[\[150a.7\]]mtshan nyid dngos po yis/_/kun la kun gyis thams cad du/_/dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni/_/A ro li ka ces bshad pa yin/_/rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa/_/gang yin de ni shes rab ste/_/'du byed sems pa 'dzin pas na/_/pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bar bshad/_/rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad/_/rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de/_/mi 'jigs skye ba med gang yin/_/mgon po de ni yin par bshad/_/rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas na/_/rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad/_/bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[150b.2\]]pas/_/gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad/_/bdag tu rlom pa'i ngo bo bas/_/tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad/_/dngos la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid/_/rgyan gyis drang ba'i bdag nyid can/_/'du byed 
[\[150b.3\]]rtag tu phrag dog yin/_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/_/srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du/_/'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i/_/sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad/_/dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yin/_/mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu/_/
[\[150b.4\]]gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la/_/nga rgyal byed pa rmongs zhes bshad/_/de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni/_/zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/mtshan nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin/_/ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad/_/dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog_/bud 
[\[150b.5\]]med bde mchog phun sum tshogs/_/gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang /_/rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas/_/des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs/_/rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do/_/mi 'jig bdag nyid chos rnams ni/_/ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid/_/dngos po 
[\[150b.6\]]kun gyi dam tshig ste/_/de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do/_/rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni/_/don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur te/_/sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste/_/da nas rgyal ba shes mthar byed/_/brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni/_/ming dang gzugs blo 
[\[150b.7\]]dngos po med/_/chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste/_/des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed/_/mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni/_/rang bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dngos/_/rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste/_/des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed/_/mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa/_
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]brjod du med dang rtog bral ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/_/shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas/_/gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed/_/des na lus mthar byed pa ste/_/des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur/_/
[\[151a.2\]]nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas/_/nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed/_/des na sems ni mthar byed de/_/des na nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur/_/'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/_/'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed/_/des na chags pa mthar byed 
[\[151a.3\]]de/_/de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur/_/nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang /_/de bzhin las ni thams cad zad/_/sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni/_/bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad/_/nyon mongs rdo rje'i sgrib dag na/_/las rnams thams cad rnam 
[\[151a.4\]]par dag_/las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas/_/las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur/_/gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni/_/rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang /_/rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste/_/drug las thugs ni kun du 'byung /_/'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug_/
[\[151a.5\]]khro bo'i dbang por rnam par grags/_/dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug_/sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga/_/'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags/_/rig pa'i rgyal por zhes bshad do/_/gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug_/rdo rje'i bdag po zhes bshad do/_/
[\[151a.6\]]sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/bdag nyid chen po kun du 'byung /_/thabs dang shes rab las byang ba'i/_/phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la/_/thams cad dag par mos pa 
[\[151a.7\]]yis/_/'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su/_/dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod/_/'di la mi bya ci yang med/_/de bzhin mi bza'ang yod ma yin/_/smra bar mi bya cung zad med/_/rtag tu mi 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]bsam ci yang med/_/mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/_/rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog_/gang gis sems kun la spyod pa/_/kun du spyod pa zhes bshad do/_/dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi/_/rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid/_/yid de man zhes bya bar bshad/_/
[\[151b.2\]]tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don/_/'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar/_/gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste/_/rdo rje kun gyis bsrungs pa ni/_/sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do/_/rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid/_/snying po yid kyis rnam bsams te/_/gsang sngags 
[\[151b.3\]]zlos pa'i dbye ba yis/_/zlos par byed cing spro zhing bsdu/_/sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag_/ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu/_/byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis/_/brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med gzung /_/sna tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spro/_/dus 
[\[151b.4\]]gsum sa bon dag gis bzla/_/bzlas pa smra bar grags bas na/_/ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la/_/sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de/_/de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o/_/ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa/_/ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no/_/de rnams 
[\[151b.5\]]spyi bor dbang bskur dang /_/de bzhin kun du mchod pa'o/_/rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i/_/rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/bdag byin brlab sogs de bzhin te/_/de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya/_/dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi/_/spyi bor dbang bskur re re 
[\[151b.6\]]ste/_/snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dang /_nga rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab pa'o/_/'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing /_/rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par/_/bsgom gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni/_/bskal pa bye bar 'byung mi 'gyur/_/longs spyod bzhi dang yang 
[\[151b.7\]]dag ldan/_/rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/gru gsum du ni rnam par bsgom/_/kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni/_/rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par bsgom/_/rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu/_/ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung /_/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing /_/mchog tu mdzes pas bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas/_/mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor/_/de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni/_/rang bzhin dri ma med zhi ba/_/bsgoms pas skad cig 
[\[152a.2\]]nyid kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung /_/rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa/_/rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten/_/bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang /_/de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang /_/dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams/_/
[\[152a.3\]]sngar ni de kun rgyas par ni/_/rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni/_/bde sdug gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs/_/rtag tu snying la skye bar 'gyur/_/chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can/_/
[\[152a.4\]]rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung /_/rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes/_/'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs/_/rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med/_/kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid/_/bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang /_/spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o/_/
[\[152a.5\]]de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag_/sa gsum du ni bskyed par bya/_/gsang ba'i bdag pos rgyas btab cing /_/rdo rje can gyi don byed do/_/zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su/_/rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni/_/
[\[152a.6\]]ye shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu/_/de ni spro bas rtogs byas la/_/de bzhin spar yang bsdu bar bya'o/_/'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na/_/zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/_/khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/_/bsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang /_/skad cig tsam gyis 
[\[152a.7\]]byed par ni/_/mngon du nus par the tshom med/_/gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/_/rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung /_/de dag thams cad rtag tu brku/_/gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho bsgom/_/rin chen 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]kun gyis rab tu dgang /_/gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis/_/sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_/rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par/_/rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid/_/sems kyi rdo rje brtan po yis/_/skad cig tsam gyis dbye bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags 
[\[152b.2\]]sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/'dod chags 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/_/lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su/_/'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod/_/dga' sdug bde bas rangs pa yis/_/'dod pa'i rtsed mos rnam par 'phrul/_/de nas 'khor lo can kun la/_/
[\[152b.3\]]lha mo rab tu dbul bar bya/_/khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi/_/lha dang lha min chung ma yang /_/skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na/_/mi yi bud med smos ci dgos/_/dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang /_/las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag_/nyams su 
[\[152b.4\]]len cing byin rlob pa/_/grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yin no/_/b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang /_/byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_/lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa/_/gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs/_/phung po skye mched khams 
[\[152b.5\]]rnams ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o/_/des ni rtag par rgya dgod pa/_/dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/lcags kyu dbyig to rtse gsum dang /_/ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod/_/'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo/_/steng du 
[\[152b.6\]]'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes/_/rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi/_/'khor los sgyur ba drug gi rgya/_/sa la sogs pa sems dpa' yi/_/phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor ba/_/me long pi wang dung dang ni/_/de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs ras/_/chos 'byung ba yi 
[\[152b.7\]]phyag rgya drug_/rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo/_/de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig_/rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag_/lha mo dgu dang nam mkha'i khams/_/me tog ces ni 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]bshad pa yin/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya/_/mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad/_/ye shes sems dpas gang reg pa/_/ye shes 'khor lo zhes 
[\[153a.2\]]bshad do/_/mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/_/sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad/_/sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni/_/sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o/_/rdo rje can 
[\[153a.3\]]kun spyan 'dren pas/_/rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o/_/rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi/_/'od zer gyis ni rdo rje kun/_/bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su/_/bcings pa bcing ba yin par bshad/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 
[\[153a.4\]]'khor du/_/sku gsung thugs ni rgyas btab ste/_/ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/_/dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du/_/rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag_/bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/_/gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/_/shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste/_
[\[153a.5\]]bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/_/mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung /_/me tog bcas shing sa bon byung /_/blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/_/sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i 
[\[153a.6\]]sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/de dag thams cad snying gang bsdu/_/rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su/_/slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya/_/'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi/_/dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog_/las 
[\[153a.7\]]mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang /_/gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchog tu dad cing shes rab che/_/gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/_/sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms/_/dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can/_/bla ma la ni slob ma yis/_/yon rnams 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]rab tu phul nas ni/_/bla mas de ni byin brlabs te/_/sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya/_/rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor/_/gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan/_/gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/_/zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid 
[\[153b.2\]]sbyor/_/zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan/_/zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/_/chags pas 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor/_/'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan/_/'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/'dod chags rdo rjer 
[\[153b.3\]]bdag nyid 'gyur/_/shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor/_/rdo rje dga' ba yang dag ldan/_/ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/_/shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur/_/rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni/_/rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang /_/lag par lag pa bzhag nas ni/_/
[\[153b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas la/_/slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste/_/bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo/_/thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya/_/de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin/_/chos kun gnyis su med pa la/_/dngos po gnyis su btags pa yin/_/de bas 
[\[153b.5\]]'khor ba rnam bral bar/_/rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o/_/rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na/_/de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur/_/tha mal lus kyi chos la ni/_/dri ma lnga rnams snang ba 
[\[153b.6\]]ni/_/ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas/_/bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad/_/sbar dang de bzhin sreg pa dang /_/snang bar byed dang gzugs snang ba/_/sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje hU~M las byung ba ni/_/bar snang la 
[\[153b.7\]]gnas bsam par bya/_/AHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni/_/de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya/_/oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni/_/de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje'i pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/_/'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya/_/shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]cing /_/ye shes nyi ma gnyis par gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/_/mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni/_/bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang /_/bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya/_/bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis/_/de bzhin dpa' 
[\[154a.2\]]bo lnga rnams bza'/_/yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya/_/gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni/_/tha mal pa zhes bshad pa yin/_/sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub sangs rgyas kyis/_/dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin/_/thabs 
[\[154a.3\]]ni rnam pa bzhi po dag_/byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du/_/rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsngags/_/bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste/_/nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin/_/sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa ste/_/sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[154a.4\]]thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis/_/bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/_/rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste/_/ye shes bdud rtsi mchog yin no/_/dang po stong nyid byang chub ste/_/gnyis pa sa bon bsdu ba yin/_/gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste/_/bzhi pa yi ge dgod 
[\[154a.5\]]pa'o/_/rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis/_/tha mal sgrub la bsnyen pa bya/_/mchog gi ye shes bdud rtsi nyid/_/sbyor ba drug gi bya ba yi/_/bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni/_/byas pas sgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur/_/gzhan du bsgrubs par gyur na ni/_/dngos grub mchog 
[\[154a.6\]]ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang /_/srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang /_/rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te/_/sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad/_/dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang /_/rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du/_/'dod pa so sor sdud pas na/_/so 
[\[154a.7\]]sor sdud pa zhes bshad do/_/'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas/_/sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis/_/brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de/_/bsam gtan de ni rnam lngar 'gyur/_/rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang /_/de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang /_/sems kyi rtse 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gcig nyid dag ste/_/lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu/_/gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du/_/rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa/_/gsang ba gsum 'byung rtog pa ste/_/de yi longs spyod byed pa'o/_/dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste/_/bde ba bsdus pa bzhi pa'o/_/shes 
[\[154b.2\]]dang shes bya byung zad pa'i/_/rang sems lnga par shes par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni/_/'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs/_/'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid/_/gong bu'i gzugs kyi phyung nas ni/_/sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag_/rin chen 
[\[154b.3\]]kha dog sna lnga pa/_/srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad/_/rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni/_/srog ni thig ler gyur par bzhag_/rang dbang rin chen dag pa yin/_/gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad/_/sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur/_/mtshan mar nyer 'dzin 'byung 
[\[154b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar/_/byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/_/smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste/_/du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin/_/mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste/_/mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o/_/sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni/_/rtag tu snang 
[\[154b.5\]]ba lnga pa'o/_/brtan gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni/_/nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya/_/rjes dran gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/_/de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya/_/rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de/_/so sor snang ba de la skye/_/thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas/_/dngos po 
[\[154b.6\]]thams cad mdor bsdus pa/_/gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni/_/dbus su gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/_/yud kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa/_/ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas/_/so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na/_/sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob/_/bsam 
[\[154b.7\]]gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na/_/mngon shes lnga po 'thob par 'gyur/_/srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs/_/rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung /_/rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni/_/sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/_/snying po de ni thugs ka ru/_/zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta/_/mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni/_/sems ni sngags kyi dngos byas te/_/sngags kyi gzugs 
[\[155a.2\]]kyi tshul gyis ni/_/byang chub tshigs bcad brjod par bya/_/cho ga yang dag sbyor bsgom pas/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/_/sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni/_/bsgom pa nye bar bsgrub pa'o/_/ji srid mthong ba de srid du/_/rnam gnyis zla ba drug tu bsgom/_/'dod 
[\[155a.3\]]pa kun la longs spyod pas/_/thams cad du ni rtag tu bya/_/gal te zla ba drug gis ni/_/ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na/_/ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang /_/sdom pa lan gsum brtsam par bya/_/de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos/_/mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing /_/gang tshe bya ba ma 
[\[155a.4\]]grub na/_/drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/_/de tshe de yi ye shes ni/_/'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung /_/rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni/_/rdo rje phur bus phur bu gdab/_/de nas dbang du bya ba dang /_/srung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya/_/'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyis/_/ye 
[\[155a.5\]]shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu/_/lha mo dgu ni spros nas su/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod/_/yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi/_/dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par bya/_/bdag nyid dbus su gnas byas la/_/'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya/_/thams cad rdo rje'i dngos 
[\[155a.6\]]byas la/_/de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya/_/bskul ba'i glu dbyangs bzhi yis ni/_/lha mos snying po bskul ba yis/_/dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems/_/ye shes lta bur lus sgom mo/_/dregs pas kha dog rnam par dbye/_/de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste/_/dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu/_/
[\[155a.7\]]gzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin/_/sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la/_/rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po drug_/gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags/_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos longs spyod bzhi/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags/_/de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]rnams/_/'dod pa thams cad ces byar bshad/_/bsam gtan rdo rje thams cad la/_/dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngags/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa/_/sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni/_/rig pa'i 
[\[155b.2\]]skyes bu rdo rje can/_/bdag dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bskyed/_/sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do/_/bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che/_/sbyor ba nyid kyis gzugs su dmigs/_/nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs kyi bar/_/sngags pa cho ga shes pa yis/_/sgrub pa rang lha'i 
[\[155b.3\]]sbyor bas bya/_/sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni/_/gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku/_/'di ni rdo rje can kun dang /_/rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che/_/de lta'i rnam phyes shes byas nas/_/dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyis 
[\[155b.4\]]kyang /_/dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag_/nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bsgrub bya bsgrub par yang dag sbyor/_/gang yin de ni bsnyen par bshad/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/_/nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do/_/yi ge hU~M dang phaT ldan pa/_/bskyed pa sgrub pa zhes bshad pa/_/ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba/_/
[\[155b.5\]]sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag_/rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung /_/de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do/_/las dang rjes mthun gang gang gis/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs/_/dkyil 'khor de dang de 
[\[155b.6\]]bskyed nas/_/dam tshig mi zad bsgom par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya/_/de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni/_/cho ga ji skad gsungs las byung /_/las dang gang gang rjes mthun pas/_/rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo/_/bsgrub bya'i lus gang 
[\[155b.7\]]yin pa la'ang /_/dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su/_/de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la/_/de yi nyes pa bsgrag par bya/_/de nas de rnams des bcom nas/_/byung bar gyur pa rnam par bsgom/_/dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas/_/dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni/_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]de ni rang gi 'khor lor gzhug_/ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/_/de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni/_/rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya/_/de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni/_/sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams/_/sgrub pa rdo rje 
[\[156a.2\]]can gyis ni/_/bsgrub bya gsang phyir gtang bar bya/_/khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas/_/de ni bcing zhing brdeg pa dang /_/de nas gdungs shing skrag gyur pa/_/sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni/_/de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas/_/sngags pas rdo rje 
[\[156a.3\]]dag gis ni/_/spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru/_/phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gdab/_/yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun/_/sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams/_/gzugs de la ni phab nas su/_/de rnams kyis ni phur bus gdab/_/de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis/_/cho ga ji skad gsungs pa 
[\[156a.4\]]bzhin/_/'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs/_/las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya/_/mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa'am/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam/_/bsgom pas gdug pa'i sems can ni/_/zos par gyur par rab tu brtag_/zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya/_/rgyas la 
[\[156a.5\]]dga' ba'i yid kyis te/_/dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya/_/khro la gtum pas rab tu bsgrub/_/ces pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tshom thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/_the tshom thams 
[\[156a.6\]]cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs te/_rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur te/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[156a.7\]]de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do/_/thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/_/sku gsung thugs ni 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]thob 'gyur bas/_/sems can sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam/_/bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang /_/sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis/_/ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/_/gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[156b.2\]]dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/_/bdag nyid chen po legs so legs/_/gsung dbyangs chen po legs so legs/_/mchod pa chen po legs so legs/_/slob dpon 
[\[156b.3\]]byang chub rdo rje can/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag_/dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin/_/skyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po/_/des na de yi sdig mi 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin no/_/gang la sdig dang bsod nams med/_/de ni byang chub yin par gsungs/_/mgon po de 
[\[156b.4\]]yi slu ba yis/_/lus can thams cad 'jig mdzad cing /_/ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'/_/sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas/_/gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni/_/skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi/_/dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che/_/byang chub rdo rjes bsgrub 
[\[156b.5\]]bya 'di/_/ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas/_/sems can rnams la sbyor ba des/_/mchog tu phan btags shes par bya/_/tshar gcod pa dang rjes bzung las/_/bdag nyid chen po de yis bya/_/sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par/_/byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[156b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mgu ba'i yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_mgon po chen po legs so legs/_/thub pa chen po legs so legs/_/chos rnams chen po legs so legs/_/thugs 
[\[156b.7\]]rje chen po legs so legs/_/e ma'o kun du bzang po yi/_/thugs rje chen po dri ma med/_/gdug pa'i mi bzad las kyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing /_skrag par mi bya/_dngang bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/byang chub rdo rje las 
[\[157a.2\]]byung ba/_/zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs/_/sngags kyi rgyun ni bsdus pa dag_/yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis 
[\[157a.3\]]mngon par bstod do/_/dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang /_/zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can/_/de la lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig gzugs 
[\[157a.4\]]dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang /_/rnam par shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug_/sa chu me dang rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni/_/byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang /_/
[\[157a.5\]]rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur ba/_/byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/spro dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems 
[\[157a.6\]]su rjes gtogs chos/_/rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste/_/byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa/_/thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral/_/
[\[157a.7\]]gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba brtag_/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/_/gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sgom zhing /_/bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang /_/sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]ba'i sgrub dbang po/_/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/_/gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa/_/mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman grub cing /_/bla ma'i drin gyis 'di na ma nor lam rtogs pa/_/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la 
[\[157b.2\]]rtag phyag 'tshal/_/gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang /_/'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems pa dang /_/mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri 'am 'drir 'jug pa/_/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/_/gang du zhi sogs las tshogs shin tu 
[\[157b.3\]]brtags pa yis/_/'khrul 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i/_/bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni/_/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/_/gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa po mthong reg pa dang /_/legs par dran dang ming tsam 
[\[157b.4\]]nges par thos pa dang /_/dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag_/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/_/bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis/_/'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la/_/mgon po de dag rjes yi rang /_/'dus pa gsang ba 
[\[157b.5\]]las byung ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yis/_/rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 
[\[157b.6\]]la bzhugs te/_sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i ye 
[\[157b.7\]]shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad d+hA ka ra war+m+ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing bcos te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]{D444}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_san d+hibyA ka ra Na nA ma tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos/_/shin tu gsal ba'i dus gcig na/_/gsang gtso 
[\[158a.2\]]rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/_/dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum/_/de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/_/yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi khyab/_/yod med gnyi ga las 'das pas/_/gnas med pa la gnas zhes bya/_/nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir/_/kun mkhyen ye shes rnam 
[\[158a.3\]]bsgom pa/_/'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la/_/thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang /_/rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/_/skye mched drug dang reg pa dang /_/tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang /_/nyer len srid pa skye ba dang /_/rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin/_/nga rgyal 
[\[158a.4\]]che ba'i nga rgyal dang /_/nga'o snyam rgyal mngon nga rgyal/_/gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal/_/cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas/_/'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs/_/brjod kyis mi lang nyid du gyur/_/
[\[158a.5\]]sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i/_/ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang /_/nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar snang /_/de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/_/sku gsung 
[\[158a.6\]]thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/_/de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang /_/'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung /_/tshangs lha de bzhin zla ba ste/_/phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam/_/sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang /_/
[\[158a.7\]]skya bseng skem byed thub pa dang /_/sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum/_/de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid/_/de tshe phyung ba gsol ba yi/_/gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid/_/thub chen byang chub sems tshul du/_/mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad/_/rnam lnga mngon par byang 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]chub pa'i/_/phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin/_/dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi/_/gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa/_/bsrung ba'i bslab gzhi rnam bzhi dang /_/spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste/_/drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi/_/ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro/_/bdun pa de 
[\[158b.2\]]nyid mchod par bshad/_/gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad/_/phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan/_/dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin/_/rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog_/bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin/_/bcu gcig ming du byung ba na/_/phyag rgya gcig par bshad 
[\[158b.3\]]dkyil 'khor/_/bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku/_/nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad/_/de bzhin rig pa spyod grub ba/_/mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa/_/bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang /_/phreng sngags bla ma ston par mdzad/_/phyogs dang skya bseng nyid gyur ba/_/dngos grub dkyil 
[\[158b.4\]]'khor bla med pa'o/_/sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan/_/dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o/_/slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag_/chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur ba/_/sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda/_/sna tshogs ming can ming gcig bu/_/de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/so 
[\[158b.5\]]sor sdud pa rab tu bstan/_/gcig dang du ma las grol ba/_/yang dag mthong nas yongs su bsgom/_/yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag_/rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya/_/de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la/_/thub pa rnam par snang mdzad che/_/rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis 
[\[158b.6\]]pa'i/_/ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad/_/'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs/_/gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs/_/'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi/_/rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad/_/
[\[158b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang /_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir/_/de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur ba/_/srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang /_/mnyam 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]gnas khyab byed ces bya dang /_/klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang /_/lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba/_/'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad/_/bud med gzugs su slar sprul te/_/rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du/_/de sku'i sku las byung bar gyur/_/de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor 
[\[159a.2\]]las/_/rang gi gsang sngags de dag bsgom/_/yan lag kun las nges grol zhing /_/shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur/_/dbu dgos ming las byung ba ni/_/zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste/_/dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas/_/rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so/_/'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la/_/
[\[159a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs/_/bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa/_/chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol/_/khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams/_/dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud/_/'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pas/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes/_/gang 
[\[159a.4\]]zhig yang dag shes gyur na/_/'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing /_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang /_/'jig rten shin tu 'das de bzhin/_/gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos/_/zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba/_/byang chub sems dpas thos na yang /_/de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed/_/de nas sa snying 
[\[159a.5\]]la sogs pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/mgon po rnam snang chen po la/_/de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/_/gang shes bla med byang chub ni/_/ma 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i/_/gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba/_/rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/lan 
[\[159a.6\]]gnyis gsol kyang mgon po ni/_/mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs/_/rdo rje can gyis de shes nas/_/de nas slar yang zhus par gyur/_/gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i/_/rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa/_/de ni 'di ltar sngags pas bsngags/_/'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos 
[\[159a.7\]]gsungs/_/bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang /_/rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang /_/lung ni yang dag gang yin pa/_/de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs/_/zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di/_/
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya/_/'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che/_/gsang sngags kun don sngags ster ba'o/_/der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing /_/sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag_/lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni/_/gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar/_/rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor 
[\[159b.2\]]bshad pa/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/_/bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i/_/gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas/_/sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag_/de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur/_/don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni/_/sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang /_/'gro 
[\[159b.3\]]ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/_/gsang sngags rig ba mchog rnams byed/_/bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar/_/yi ge a ni steng du gnas/_/phyi ma zhes bya gnas byas la/_/sngags pas sems can don rnams bya/_/yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang /_/a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur/_/steng 
[\[159b.4\]]'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid/_/bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba/_/thogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so/_/ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas/_/phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med/_/kun rdzob 
[\[159b.5\]]dus gsum sbyor gcig pa/_/sngags pa rnams kyi thos de 'gyur/_/shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na/_/skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob/_/kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa/_/gsang sngags 
[\[159b.6\]]ston pa'i chos can te/_/de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog_/sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes/_/mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin te/_/gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra/_/sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni/_/'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/_/thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin/_/de de stong 
[\[159b.7\]]pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas/_/kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs/_/de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa/_/de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur/_/'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung /_/mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur/_/nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang /_/bsam mi khyab par spro 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bdag nyid/_/de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la/_/thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag byung /_/sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/_/nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste/_/de yang de ru kun gnas pas/_/bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten 
[\[160a.2\]]pa/_/sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa/_/de ni bud med ces bshad de/_/de bas chos de b+ha ga yin/_/bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad/_/dam tshig chen po gcig tu gyur/_/dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru/_/'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur/_/dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni/_/ting 
[\[160a.3\]]'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang /_/sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang /_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/_/reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings/_/'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/de ltar brjod mi lang zhes pa/_/brjod mi 
[\[160a.4\]]lang ba nyid gyur rnams/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi/_/rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang /_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs/_/mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen/_/dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za/_/'di dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam 
[\[160a.5\]]pa'i/_/rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs/_/dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khebs pa/_/de rnams der ni yang dag snang /_/de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur/_/gang yang dam 
[\[160a.6\]]tshig sngon 'gro dang /_/sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang /_/don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs/_/'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags/_/zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung /_/ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni/_/'dod chags chen po'i tshul 
[\[160a.7\]]du gyur/_/'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs/_/de ni nyid kyi sku la bcug_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/de ni rnam par snang mdzad che/_/'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/_/nyid sku bud med 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]nyid du mdzad/_/de nas mgon po bsam yas las/_/bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur/_/de ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang /_/mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang /_/gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni/_/sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/_/sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang /_/dri yi 
[\[160b.2\]]ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni/_/de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs/_/reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang /_/la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs/_/de nas tshul gsum don gcig dang /_/mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang /_/'jig rten rgyang pa na gdul don 
[\[160b.3\]]du/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo /_/gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor/_/rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog_/dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/_/de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri/_/zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_sbyor gzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid/_/dri ma med par byin brlabs pa/_/kun 
[\[160b.4\]]nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab/_/'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrug_/gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/_/dkyil 
[\[160b.5\]]'khor chen po'i dbus su yang /_/rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par gyur/_/mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang /_/don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/_/de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i/_/thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur/_/de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/_/de 
[\[160b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems/_/dngos med ngo bor gcig par ni/_/mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs/_/shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu/_/de ni grib ma ltar thugs chud/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas/_/'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad/_/ji ltar mtshams 
[\[160b.7\]]gnas nyi ma yis/_/'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed/_/de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/byang chub sems kyis sad par byed/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig_/de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yi/_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis/_/rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur/_/rig 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni/_/sngags kyis byin brlabs bla na med/_/der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs/_/de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyi/_/thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste/_/byang chub sems ni rab bskor la/_/lan 
[\[161a.2\]]gsum ched du brjod pa mdzad/_/bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las/_/spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin/_/de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang /_/de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/_/khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[161a.3\]]la/_/ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus/_/phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos/_/'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams/_/rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni/_/khyad chos ston par mdzad pas khums/_/dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/_/zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan/_/'di dag 
[\[161a.4\]]ji ltar bde gshegs dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de/_/lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur/_/gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis/_/'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/'od chen ldan bas bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[161a.5\]]ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni/_/gang zhig khyod kyis nga dris pa/_/legs so legs so sems dpa' che/_/gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so/_/smra ba don ji lta ji lta bar/_/de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya/_/ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni/_/'jig rten rgyang ba na mchog gzhol 'gyur/_/log 
[\[161a.6\]]par lta ba la gnas te/_/ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed/_/la la glu dang gar la dga'/_/dgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol/_/dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing /_/de bzhin 'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur/_/rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang /_/de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol/_/la la de 
[\[161a.7\]]bzhin 'dod chags zhen/_/shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur/_/nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang /_/bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/_/skyes bu glen pa za byed cing /_/med par smra ba chos su sgrogs/_/ma dang sring mo la sogs pa/_/bgrod min la ni 'gro ba dang /_/pha dang ma yang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gsod pa dang /_/de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang /_/khyad par du yang brku ba dang /_/gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing /_/smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur/_/la la dam chos spong ba dang /_/de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste/_/sna tshogs 
[\[161b.2\]]sdig pa byas nas kyang /_/sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur/_/gzer nad dug dang sbyar ba'i dug_/sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad par/_/'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas/_/zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur/_/'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa de/_/mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang /_/log 
[\[161b.3\]]par lta la mchog gzhol rnams/_/ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin/_/gang zhig yang dag thob pa nyid/_/'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis/_/tshul mchog 
[\[161b.4\]]'di ni rnyed gyur nas/_/don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang /_/de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung /_/de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang /_/shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring /_/rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis/_/rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'/_/sgyu dang bcos 
[\[161b.5\]]ma'i chos dang ldan/_/mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba/_/phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin/_/gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas/_/gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur/_/de rnams bdud kyi byin brlabs kyis/_/gal te dngos grub phra thob na/_/des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas/_/
[\[161b.6\]]mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur/_/tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang /_/khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod 'gyur/_/rang las 'bras las byung ba yi/_/phan pa la ni gnod pa byed/_/de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams/_/bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer/_/mngon sum sangs rgyas 
[\[161b.7\]]'dra ba yi/_/slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bkur med/_/skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing /_/de la skad cig gis rjes chags/_/khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi/_/spyod pa dag ni ston par byed/_/de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar/_/mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/_/gsang 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ba 'dus pa mi shes par/_/dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur/_/gsang ba srung bar mi byed par/_/thams cad du ni ston par byed/_/'jig rten la ni smad byas nas/_/gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed/_/bdag nyid rtsa ba med par ni/_/dam tshig 'das par byed 
[\[162a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskul bas/_/rang la rang gi glags rnyed med/_/de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi/_/ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur/_/nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/_/mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman ba yi/_/sngags pa rnams 
[\[162a.3\]]ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'/_/de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas/_/rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas/_/lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/_/de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur/_/gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar/_/
[\[162a.4\]]dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed/_/de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i/_/gsang ba dgongs pas bshad pa yin/_/dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams/_/'di yis thams cad dgug par bya/_/rang gi rjes rig mi shes na/_/de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur/_/de nas rjes su gzung don 
[\[162a.5\]]du/_/tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/_/gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su/_/de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/_/rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin/_/yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de/_/phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol/_/de 
[\[162a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa/_/'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i/_/nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di/_/de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog_/de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la/_/bcom 
[\[162a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/_/gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so legs/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang /_/the tshom skye bar byed yin na/_/byang chub sems gzhan ci smos zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs de rnams la gsungs/_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas/_/the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i/_/bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/_/bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus/_/bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/_/yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang /_/gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par/_/ji ltar spro ba mnga' 
[\[162b.2\]]ma gyur/_/byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de/_/de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs/_/ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir/_/de ni yang dag bshad du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni/_/de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su/_/ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[162b.3\]]zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba/_/gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni/_/sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas/_/de nas yang dag phyung ba ni/_/badzra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags/_/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/_/zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa/_/de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur/_/mi bskyod rgya chen 
[\[162b.4\]]thabs kyis sbyor/_/zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar/_/bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin/_/rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs/_/bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/_/dam tshig 'byung rdo rje zhes bya/_/ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni/_/
[\[162b.5\]]snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod/_/de nas dzi na dzika ces pa'i/_/snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung /_/de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang /_/gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa/_/rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/_/dkar dang gnag dang 
[\[162b.6\]]dmar bcas pa'i/_/zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur/_/de nas rin chen byung ba yi/_/dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/_/snyoms par zhugs nas bder gshegs kun/_/bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs/_/de bzhin gshegs kun 
[\[162b.7\]]bdag po 'di/_/de nas rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya'i/_/snying po dpal ldan de tshe byung /_/de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/_/rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/_/ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi/_/zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni/_/rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi/_/lho phyogs logs su 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]bzhugs par gyur/_/de yang byang du gzigs gyur te/_/mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan bdag po de/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag_/'dod chags chen po las byung ba/_/rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs 
[\[163a.2\]]te/_/'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung /_/A ro lika ces bya snying po/_/rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung /_/de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/_/de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni/_/rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/_/'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs/_/dmar dang dkar dang 
[\[163a.3\]]gnag pa'i zhal/_/dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/_/nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i/_/ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag byung /_/rdo rje de la snyoms zhugs nas/_/
[\[163a.4\]]snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o/_/dam tshig rnams ni dgud pa'i rigs/_/snying po pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces pa/_/rdo rje gsum zhes bya las byung /_/de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/_/don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi/_/de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/rig 
[\[163a.5\]]dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/_/ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/_/byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/_/zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni/_/de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang /_/'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba/_/'dod dang thar 
[\[163a.6\]]pa rab bsgrubs pa'o/_/de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin/_/'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/dam pa dag ni phyung bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pu/_/
[\[163a.7\]]yum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po/_/gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog_/sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba/_/dwe Sha ra ti zhes byar grags/_/rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/_/de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin ma/_/zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]kyis ni/_/me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/_/de nas rjes mnyes rdo rje grags/_/sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung /_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni/_/de ni mo ha ra ti ste/_/gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang /_/rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste/_/
[\[163b.2\]]zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma/_/gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong gcig_/gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/_/de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes/_/bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes/_/ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[163b.3\]]snyoms zhugs nas/_/bde ba chen po phyung ba ni/_/'di ltar rA ga ra ti phyung /_/zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can te/_/gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa/_/de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur/_/gos med ye shes las byung ba/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[163b.4\]]pa'i btsun mo ste/_/rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can/_/bslu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs kun btsun mo mchog_/zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs 
[\[163b.5\]]can ma/_/badzra ra ti zhes bya ba/_/rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur/_/de ni phyung ma thag tu yang /_/gtso bo rig ma skyes bur gyur/_/bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te/_/dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/_/de nas bcom ldan mgon po de/_/rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i/_/
[\[163b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje'i gshed/_/khro bo chen po phyung ba dang /_/phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs/_/de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin 
[\[163b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/mngon byang rdo rje zhes bya yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/khro bo chen po phyung ba ni/_/pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita rdo rje can/_/de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni/_/rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung /_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las/_/'od chen phur bu'i 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]gzugs lta bu/_/rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa/_/lho yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/_/de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor/_/rdo rje gsum las khro bo che/_/pad mAn+ta kr-iT 'od po 
[\[164a.2\]]che/_/bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur/_/de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir/_/gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang /_/gsung gi tshul du rnam sprul zhing /_/gos med ye shes bla med pa/_/nub kyi sgor ni bzhugs par gyur/_/bcom ldan de nyid 
[\[164a.3\]]sna tshogs pa/_/thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la/_/kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni/_/de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur/_/khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba/_/kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/_/byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/_/de nas 
[\[164a.4\]]dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang /_/mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/_/de la slar yang zhus gyur pa/_/mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing /_/dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni/_/ji ltar 
[\[164a.5\]]de rnams zhus par gyur/_/'di dag thog mtha' yod min na/_/'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur/_/phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la/_/'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang /_/gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces/_/theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang /_/so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang /_/spang 
[\[164a.6\]]pa dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni/_/de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i/_/zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams sten mdzad pa/_/rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i/_/bya ba de dag phyin ci log_/dga' mtha'i spyod pa 
[\[164a.7\]]de rnams ni/_/de bzhin gshegs de rnam mdzad pa/_/tshig gcig la ni dpag med don/_/gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni/_/mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i/_/skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/_/phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni/_/dgongs 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]pa gsang ba bla med pa/_/dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya/_/zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/_/lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga/_/'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas/_/pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya/_/ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad/_/
[\[164b.2\]]de bzhin nyid shes lus su 'gyur/_/zhi ba rnal 'byor ba yi zas/_/ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi/_/sku yi gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar/_/gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku/_/de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung /_/thugs kyi rnam pas thugs su ni/_/zhi gnas la sogs pa las 
[\[164b.3\]]byung /_/phung po la sogs chos rnams ni/_/stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong /_/ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs/_/zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed/_/de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/_/grib ma lta bur byung ba yin/_/de bzhin phung po khams la sogs/_/dam tshig gcig 
[\[164b.4\]]la rnam par gnas/_/de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa/_/zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung /_/de bas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong /_/gsang ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis/_/stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar/_/rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor 
[\[164b.5\]]ni/_/phung po la sogs chos 'byung ba/_/lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni/_/phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur/_/'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar/_/de las ting 'dzin skyes par gyur/_/'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor/_/mi phyed rdo rje nyid du gyur/_/zab dang rgya chen 
[\[164b.6\]]rtogs byang chub/_/de rtogs pas ni sems dpar gyur/_/'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa/_/chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o/_/de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa/_/rdo rje theg par ston pa yin/_/ting nge 'dzin ni de nyid las/_/rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin/_/'di las 'jig 
[\[164b.7\]]rten 'das 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/_/dngos don de bzhin nyid gcig pu/_/gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad/_/ma skyes pa las byung ba ni/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin/_/bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de/_/phung po nyon mongs 'chi 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bdag bcas/_/'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas/_/rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad/_/lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad/_/'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa gang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur/_/
[\[165a.2\]]dngos po gang dang gang dag gis/_/phung po lnga po brtags gyur pa/_/de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/_/ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba/_/dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can/_/der ni bdag gis bdag mthong ba/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[165a.3\]]mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/_/phung po de bzhin gshegs grags pa/_/de bzhin nyid las spros bya ba/_/chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi/_/mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/_/'di ni spros dang bsdus pa dag_/de ni dga' bar yongs su bsgrags/_/sems can gang zhig longs spyod 
[\[165a.4\]]cig_/de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad do/_/yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis med/_/mkha' dbyings dbyer med rab sbyor ba/_/de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o/_/rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor che/_/bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba gang /_/dngos 
[\[165a.5\]]po thams cad bde skyed pa'i/_/yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur/_/zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang /_/mthong zhing de las phung po sogs/_/lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ba/_/de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin/_/dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog_/mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 
[\[165a.6\]]'jug/_/'on kyang so sor gyur pa de/_/chos kyi sku las zhe sdang gyur/_/bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung zhing /_/mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can/_/de nyid dbang po kun byed pa'o/_/dam tshig la sogs 'byung ba'i chos/_/rang gis rig par 
[\[165a.7\]]ma gyur kyang /_/der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad/_/de ni gti mug de bzhin sems/_/gang gis ji ltar brtags chos kyis/_/longs spyod rdzogs zhes bya byed pa/_/de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung /_/rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso/_/de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]ni/_/kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba/_/gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa/_/'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog_/ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma ni/_/de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog_/'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/_/'gro ba gcig tu 
[\[165b.2\]]'dod pa khyab/_/de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/_/gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'o/_/zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/_/rdo rje dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso/_/ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud med/_/gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur/_/
[\[165b.3\]]gsum po yang dag 'dug gyur pa/_/gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin/_/pad+ma bgegs gyur khro bo ste/_/mthar 'byed mtha' yi ming can no/_/'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la/_/phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs/_/skrag byed gshin rje'i gshed kyis kyang /_/thams 
[\[165b.4\]]cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/rdo rje dam tshig skrag byed pa/_/de bzhin gshegs rab mthar byed gtso/_/pad+mo'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur/_/'chi bral rnal 'byor grub pa yin/_/bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso/_/rigs pa'i bdag nyid can bdag po/_/
[\[165b.5\]]'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa/_/gsang ba'i lus kyis rnam par spyod/_/dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par/_/gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa/_/des 'di de bzhin bya ba dang /_/de nas gsang ba yang dag bsrung /_/nu zho zas kyis bu gso bzhin/_/srid pa gsum na bcom ldan 
[\[165b.6\]]gtso/_/sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du/_/chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi/_/sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las/_/bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa/_/bden pa ma yin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'ang min/_/zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang /_/
[\[165b.7\]]'dod chags sna tshogs rigs byung ba/_/dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas/_/gleng gzhi yin te dang po'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la/_/slar yang de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/_/lhag par mchod pa byas nas ni/_/thub chen de la 'di skad 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gsol/_/dgongs pa rdo rje dam pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis/_/zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing /_/byang chub sems 
[\[166a.2\]]dpa' yongs rtog pa/_/thub nyid kyis ni rnam mkhyen pa/_/de nas byang chub sems kun la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs/_/lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang /_/de bzhin ngag ni tshig brjod lta'i/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya/_/de 
[\[166a.3\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' la/_/ston pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/sku dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung /_/de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la/_/ched du brjod pa ched 
[\[166a.4\]]du brjod/_/e ma kun du bzang po yi/_/rten cing 'bral 'byung las skyes pa/_/skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/mngon 
[\[166a.5\]]rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/dpal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs/_/dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na/_/dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka min/_/de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/_/sgom pa dngos por yod ma yin/_/de nas dpal 
[\[166a.6\]]ldan rnam snang mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog_/gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can/_/byang chub sems ni thams cad nas/_/de ni yang dag 
[\[166a.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/_/phung po khams sogs rnam spangs shing /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/_/chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can/_/byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung ming can te/_/thog ma med nas 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]ma skyes brda/_/rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/_/de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/_/kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i/_/ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te/_/byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/_/dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/_/phung por grags pa'i chos nyid 
[\[166b.2\]]med/_/nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i/_/bdag med byang chub ces bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal/_/bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos med 
[\[166b.3\]]cing /_/chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa/_/bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung /_/byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/_/de nas 'od dpag med mtshan can/_/ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/_/ma skyes 
[\[166b.4\]]pa yi chos rnams la/_/dngos po med cing bsgom pa'ang med/_/nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis/_/dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad/_/de nas de bzhin gdon mi za/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[166b.5\]]chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing /_/gzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs/_/byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/_/byang chub sems ni yin par bshad/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/byang chub sems ni thos pa dang /_/dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par/_/rnam par
