[\[166b.6\]]snang mdzad che la gsungs/_/dngos po med cing dmigs med pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs/_/gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas/_/dngos po yi ni rtog pa skye/_/lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas/_/sems ni de rnams skyed par byed/_/yang dag byang chub 
[\[166b.7\]]du ma'i mthar/_/'di la so so skye bo smra/_/thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams la/_/rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed/_/bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du/_/'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'di/_/rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che/_/legs 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]zhes lan gsum gsungs nas ni/_/lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs/_/rnam par mi rtog don de nyid/_/rab tu phye ste bshad bar bya/_/tshig tu brjod dang dmigs par bshad/_/brda dang don dam pa yin no/_/rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyi dang /_/mdo dang gsang sngags spyod 
[\[167a.2\]]rnams kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi/_/byang chub sems ni bla na med/_/de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di/_/dngos po'i gsang ba bla na med/_/gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje dang /_/pad+ma de las skyed par byed/_/tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste/_/sangs rgyas sku ni 
[\[167a.3\]]dmigs can yin/_/gsang sngags de nyid ces bya brda/_/de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o/_/dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na/_/gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa/_/de ni bcings med shes bya ste/_/de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas/_/dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste/_/grangs 
[\[167a.4\]]dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa/_/as bcings phan tshun sbyor ba las/_/gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla/_/gang zhig shes pa rnam grol ba/_/'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa/_/de ni de nyid grub 'dod de/_/gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa/_/'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag 
[\[167a.5\]]ldan/_/cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas/_/lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar/_/yi ge oM bcas ring por bcas/_/yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs/_/thung du ma lus ngag tu 'gyur/_/gcig min du ma ma yin no/_/ya yi don gyis gang 
[\[167a.6\]]yang rung /_/bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/_/ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis/_/'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug_/yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang /_/gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams/_/bud med skyes pa ma ning ste/_/khams la sogs par rab tu brtag_/'og nas steng du 
[\[167a.7\]]bcas par ni/_/shes rab blos ni nges par sbyar/_/drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig_/dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung /_/de ni ya sogs don sbyar na/_/dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin/_/'gro ba rnams ni sgyu mthar bya/_/
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag_/dngos med ngo bo las byung ba/_/de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs/_/lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang /_/brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa/_/rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/ming med brjod du med pa ste/_/byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/_/
[\[167b.2\]]gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa/_/'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/_/'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste/_/rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa/_/dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i/_/rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan/_/de nyid kho na don dam ste/_/so so rang rig mtshan nyid do/_/de 
[\[167b.3\]]'di sems can kun zhes bya'i/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid/_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'byung yang /_/rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can/_/gang 'di byang chub sems bdag nyid/_/rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur/_/'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang /_/rigs 
[\[167b.4\]]kun la ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/sreg dang skems dang bde can dang /_/kun zar 'gyur ba'i me bzhin no/_/'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar/_/sems can la la rnam par gnas/_/byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de/_/'gro ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing /_/gang zhig bdag 
[\[167b.5\]]dang mnyam gnas pa/_/byams pa chen po de bskyed bya/_/phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas/_/byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung /_/des ni snying rje cher gyur nas/_/des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms/_/sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag_/byang chub sems la ma mthong na/_/'on 
[\[167b.6\]]kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa/_/de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/'khor ba dngos po yod min la/_/sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra/_/byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni/_/btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/thos pa'i byang chub sems dran 
[\[167b.7\]]zhing /_/slar yang de don mtshan nyid ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad che la zhus/_/'khor dang cig shos zhes bya ba/_/'di kun byang chub sems yin na/_/ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni/_/phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la/_/gnyis su 'gog 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]byed gang yang med/_/gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung /_/mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang /_/dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog_/'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pas/_/sems can kha cig gzir ba dang /_/byang chub sems la'ang sbyar bar gyur/_/de 
[\[168a.2\]]lta'i rnam rtog kun rtog par/_/ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba/_/'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/_/byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur/_/de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir/_/dgongs pa bshad par mdzad 
[\[168a.3\]]du gsol/_/de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa/_/shin tu rnyed dka' byang chub sems/_/de ni yang dag bka' stsal to/_/phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig_/sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te/_/sems de mngon du byas nas ni/_/ci dga' bar ni bya ba 
[\[168a.4\]]yin/_/sems ni de yis ma mthong bas/_/lta ba so sor gyur pa yin/_/de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru/_/'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur/_/des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang /_/dbang phyug che la kun du sten/_/zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi/_/kun du spyod pa de rnams byed/_/sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[168a.5\]]par bshad dang /_/dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang /_/de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang /_/lta bas skad cig dag gis 'gro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su yang 'gro ba dang /_/'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro/_/gang tshe ma rig kun bsten pas/_/bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so/_/'du 
[\[168a.6\]]shes can dang 'du shes med/_/sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa/_/de rnams rlung las byung ba ste/_/rlung las slar yang 'gag pa yin/_/nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang /_/rang gi rnam par rtog par lhung /_/de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du/_/sna tshogs 'gro bar de 
[\[168a.7\]]dag 'gro/_/mi rtog pa yi sems de ni/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang /_/de ni phyin ci log gyur pas/_/khyi dang ce spyang glang po dang /_/sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni pha nyid dang /_/ma yi rigs ni smyig mkhan dang /_/sme sha can dang rigs ngan 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dang /_/bza' dang mi bza' bya kun dang /_/byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur/_/bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes/_/byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phung sogs dngos po med gyur las/_/rang gis myong bar shes par gyur/_/de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad/_/
[\[168b.2\]]kun mkhyen pa ni byang chub sems/_/nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid/_/tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa/_/'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la/_/phyag 
[\[168b.3\]]'tshal nas ni slar gsol pa/_/'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni/_/byang chub sems ni rab gsungs na/_/ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa/_/ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs/_/lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir/_/khyed kyis chos rnams ston mdzad na/_/ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid/_/lta ba 
[\[168b.4\]]de ni rab brtan 'gyur/_/dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams/_/gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas/_/gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes/_/de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/_/lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/_/khyed gsung dgongs pa ma rtogs pa/_/
[\[168b.5\]]dri bar byed pa legs so legs/_/byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing /_/nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa/_/sems can kun gyi srog gyur gang /_/lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can/_/rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa/_/ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du gyur/_/rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub 
[\[168b.6\]]sems/_/dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin/_/ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las/_/rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin/_/'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa/_/'dir ni de la rten pa yin/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams/_/de nyid gsum gnas la 
[\[168b.7\]]rten nas/_/de kun byang chub sems kyis byed/_/ji srid 'jig rten gdags pa dang /_/de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams/_/rnam rtog byang chub sems shes pa'i/_/rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin/_/bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi/_/sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin/_/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di/_/phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam/_/shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis/_/byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par/_/bdag por rang nyid zlos pa de/_/nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba 
[\[169a.2\]]yis/_/nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis/_/dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa/_/byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu/_/dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/_/'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang /_/ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya/_/dbyangs kyi thung ngu nyin mor 
[\[169a.3\]]bshad/_/ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad/_/dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las/_/de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya/_/e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung /_/de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal/_/de las 'jig rten pa yi brda/_/myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 
[\[169a.4\]]ni/_/byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang /_/gtso bo rnam snang chen po las/_/khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa/_/sems can thams cad skyed pa po/_/sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/_/de bas dngos po med gyur kyang /_/srid pa dag tu rab tu grags/_/byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam 
[\[169a.5\]]pa/_/legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa/_/'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po/_/skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol/_/sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig_/shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs/_/'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes/_/ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi tshig ni 'di 
[\[169a.6\]]nyid dag_/yin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig_/des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/_/ji bzhin don du mi shes so/_/de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni/_/skal med chos kun rnam spangs la/_/rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas/_/de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur/_/de bas byang chub 
[\[169a.7\]]sems bdud rtsi/_/de ni smra bar rigs pa yin/_/'brel pa'i nyi ma thob pa ni/_/ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/_/grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa la/_/byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don/_/slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa/_/nang na ma yin phyi rol 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]min/_/gnyi ga ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin/_/rtag pa ma yin skad cig min/_/de ni so so rang rig yin/_/mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du/_/byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'byung /_/'das dang ma 'ongs pa 
[\[169b.2\]]nyid dang /_/da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang /_/sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba/_/don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin/_/rig byed dus dang me yi brda/_/nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te/_/bzhi phyed gsum pa dag las byung /_/byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid/_/de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel/_/
[\[169b.3\]]de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang /_/ha ni so la gnas pa yi/_/gnas skabs ji snyed de bzhin du/_/ming ni yod pa ma yin pa/_/de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur/_/rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa/_/bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin/_/lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni/_/tsheg drag bcas pa'i 
[\[169b.4\]]rlung yin no/_/rang nyid ldog par byed pa'i mchog_/de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin/_/nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo/_/de dang ldan pa byang chub sems/_/bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung /_/yod med rab tu zhi ba can/_/dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni/_/rang rig gcig bu'i yul 
[\[169b.5\]]yin no/_/de nyid don ni rig byed pa/_/dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin/_/de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di/_/chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas/_/byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas/_/ched du 
[\[169b.6\]]brjod pa ched du brjod/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/_/e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa/_/dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu/_/dag pa de nyid don dag ster/_/rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag med chos las yang 
[\[169b.7\]]dag byung /_/byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa/_/ngo bo med cing dmigs su med/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung /_/dgongs don byang chub ster ba bo/_/byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dag 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/_/rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgongs pa lung ston la dad bar/_/gang gang yid ni bzod gyur pa/_/dam tshig gsum gyis rdo rje las/_/des ni 
[\[170a.2\]]de bzhin bya ba yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/_/yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa/_/le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad//_//de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje/_/gsum dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog_/rnam thar 
[\[170a.3\]]gsum dang dkon mchog gsum/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa/_/'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje can/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs/_/rdo rje bkod pa mchog 'di yi/_/le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon/_/
[\[170a.4\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/phra mo rnal 'byor dag la bzhugs/_/oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan/_/shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste/_/dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin/_/badzra zhes bya bzhi pa'o/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/_/a ha~M zhes pa drug par brjod/_/de ltar bde gshegs drug po ni/_/
[\[170a.5\]]skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin/_/o~M shU n+ya tA zung dang po/_/dz+nyA na badzra gnyis pa yin/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M gyur/_/de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o/_/de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par/_/mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no/_/mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni/_/'od 
[\[170a.6\]]zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po/_/yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab/_/kun nas yongs su zlum po'o/_/'dod yon lnga yis kun du khyab/_/mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/_/mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su/_/dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya mchog_/
[\[170a.7\]]de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan/_/yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi/_/phyag rgya yang ni rnam par bsgom/_/mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che/_/tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang /_/dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang /_/tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang /_/de bzhin don yod gzugs 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]can rgya/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/_/rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can/_/in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/_/rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/_/rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta'i/_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 
[\[170b.2\]]'khrigs/_/de yi phyag na rdo rje che/_/rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgom/_/shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/_/thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/_/rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/mar ka ta yi 'od 'dra ba/_/rdo rje 'bar bas rnam 
[\[170b.3\]]par brgyan/_/'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab/_/rin chen de la rnam par bsgom/_/'dod chags chen po rdo rje can/_/pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing /_/thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/_/phyag na pad+ma bsnams par bsgom/_/sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za/_/'od chen 
[\[170b.4\]]sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba/_/zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/_/phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgom/_/de ltar rnal 'byor bshad pa dag_/gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni/_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa/_/phung po khams sogs 
[\[170b.5\]]sbyor ba yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na/_/mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bu/_/de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/cig shos phyi rol du bsgom pa/_/dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni/_/dngos po med pa'i dngos po la/_/sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag_/
[\[170b.6\]]mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di/_/dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol zhes/_/gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni/_/'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal/_/lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa/_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes/_/'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/_/phra ba dgongs 
[\[170b.7\]]pas gsungs pa yin/_/rnam lnga mngon par byang chub 'di/_/ma 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur pa/_/chos ni yang dag sdud gyur gang /_/ji lta ji ltar ston par byed/_/phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur/_/byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung /_/de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa/_/de nyid gnyis 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]med sbyor bas so/_/ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni/_/blo yi dngos grub ston pa po/_/thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni/_/phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag_/mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor/_/dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o/_/gzod ma nyid nas rab grub pa/_/
[\[171a.2\]]gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa/_/rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste/_/dngos po thams cad gcig tu byung /_/bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/_/dmar dang nag dang de bzhin ser/_/dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste/_/bzhi bzhi gcig 
[\[171a.3\]]tu sbyor ba yang /_/gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri/_/de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas/_/zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min can/_/steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og_/ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs/_/me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang /_/chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la/_/
[\[171a.4\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad/_/de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad/_/ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni/_/mar sar gnas par gyur pa yin/_/de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la/_/zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so/_/gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos/_/mthong ba de ni lhag mthong 
[\[171a.5\]]yin/_/mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin/_/rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin/_/'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag_/de bzhin nyid ni zhi zhes bya/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya/_/rnal 'byor ba yi dbugs rngub dbyung /_/
[\[171a.6\]]sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid/_/shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni/_/sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/_/bya ba thams cad nyid du yang /_/rnal 'byor rig bas nyal sogs la/_/ming mang brjod du med pa dang /_/dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla/_/gos dkar la sogs 
[\[171a.7\]]bzlas bshad pa/_/brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/_/bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yis/_/sbyor bzhis bsdus pa brgya phrag dgu/_/dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni/_/de ni so sor 'byung ba las/_/nyi khri gcig stong drug brgya'o/_/de 'dir gsang 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ba dgongs pa yis/_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin/_/klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi/_/'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad/_/de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/_/'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas/_/de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/_/rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus/_/
[\[171b.2\]]gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro/_/thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba/_/rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog_/snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de nyid gsum nyid med sbyor ba/_/de ni phra mo'i rdo rje bsgom/_/myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i/_/rnal 'byor par yang 
[\[171b.3\]]bdag cag 'gyur/_/de ni bdag rig yid ches shing /_/zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur/_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te/_/log pa'i rnal 'byor kun du bsten/_/ston pa po yi sbyor smra zhing /_/phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni/_/ma 'ongs dus na spong 'gyur ba/_/de nyid de ni nges par 
[\[171b.4\]]byed/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/_/lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/_/chos dbyings ngo bo nyid ces bya'i/_/ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni/_/snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad/_/dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas/_/gsang sngags 
[\[171b.5\]]'di ni bka' stsal to/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad/_/khyad par du ni byin rlob pa/_/gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/_/de ni yang dag bshad par bya/_/oM ni dang por shes par bya/_/d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o/_/d+hA tu zhes bya gsum par bshad/_/swa b+hA bar 
[\[171b.6\]]grags bzhi pa'o/_/At+ma kaHni lnga pa yin/_/a ha~M du gyur drug par 'dod/_/sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu/_/bsgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/_/rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/_/yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/_/nyams dga' ri rab rtse mo ru/_/rnal 'byor pa yi 
[\[171b.7\]]rtag par bsgom/_/rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro/_/mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya/_/sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba/_/mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya/_/'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang /_/pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnams/_/
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/_/phra mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yang /_/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/_/rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du/_/dngos la brtson pas rin chen 
[\[172a.2\]]bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba/_/nam mkha'i dkyil du bri bar bya/_/'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/_/phra mo rdo rje gsum bsgrub pa'o/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o/_/dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi/_/lung ston dam 
[\[172a.3\]]pa 'di la ni/_/gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa/_/de ni de bzhin byed pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/rdo rje phra mo de nyid las/_/'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog_/le'u gsum pa nyid yin no//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad/_/gnyis 
[\[172a.4\]]su med par gyur nas ni/_/slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la/_/bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa/_/chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa/_/dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol/_/
[\[172a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o/_/kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/ye shes spyod pa'i don las byung /_/zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba bo/_/kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog_/dngos mchog dkyil 
[\[172a.6\]]'khor bshad du gsol/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag_/sems ni kun du bzang po nyid/_/sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog_/dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/_/khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po/_/'jig rten gsum mchog 
[\[172a.7\]]rdo rje mchog_/'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po/_/nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la/_/thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bka' stsal to/_/de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/rdo rje ye shes 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]rab 'dra ba/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi/_/dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya'o/_/'di ni gsang ba'i bdag nyid mchog_/legs bsgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o/_/sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni/_/tshad ma bzang por de bshad do/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag_/
[\[172b.2\]]gnyis su med pa mdzes pa yin/_/shes rab 'di ni thig yin te/_/thabs ni de yi rjes 'jug pa'o/_/shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/_/rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[172b.3\]]bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yin/_/bsdu ba'i dngos grags sgo yin te/_/re re'ang bzhi bzhi ming can no/_/chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda/_/'khor lo nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/_/mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma de/_/rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgya/_/rnam pa lnga yis 
[\[172b.4\]]rab bye ba'i/_/rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o/_/shar nas me long ngo bo ni/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/_/lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin/_/gcig gi ming can rin po che/_/nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma/_/pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/_/byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin/_/
[\[172b.5\]]'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa/_/bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur/_/'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog_/shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te/_/sprin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od/_/lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba/_/mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje/_/nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba/_/dga' ba 
[\[172b.6\]]legs par gnas pa bzhin/_/byang shar ut+pal ltar snang ba'i/_/btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra/_/de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni/_/tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas/_/de bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa/_/dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar/_/nub tu don spyod ces bya ba/_/
[\[172b.7\]]rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o/_/don mthun pa ni rdo rje ste/_/rdo rje 'khyil pa'i rdo rje can/_/phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/'di ni legs par bshad pa yin/_/ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni/_/rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin/_/dang por chen po yod pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/_/de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang /_/shes nas 'gro la phan par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung /_/de tshe zla zer phreng ba yi/_/skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas/_/lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming /_/ma skyes par 'byung 
[\[173a.2\]]zhi ba ni/_/bud med ces ni nges par bshad/_/zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa/_/mdangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od ni yin par gsungs/_/rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te/_/ye shes kha bye me tog go/_/dngos po med pa rigs yin te/_/kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do/_/chos 
[\[173a.3\]]dbyings nyid kyi bud med ni/_/shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par bya/_/nang na ma yin phyi ma yin/_/gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min/_/gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur/_/de bas mA ma kIr bshad do/_/de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa/_/byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do/_/
[\[173a.4\]]nam mkha' dang ni gcig tu mtshungs/_/sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/_/de bas yul du rnam brtags pa/_/bsdu ba dag ni bshang ba yin/_/ye shes dbang po stong pa gci/_/rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag_/rang bzhin chos 
[\[173a.5\]]su yongs brtags pa/_/de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste/_/dngos med pa ni dbul ba yi/_/de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/_/khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur/_/gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa/_/de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa/_/
[\[173a.6\]]sar pa nyid du bkal legs dang /_/shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi/_/thig gis mkhas pas thig gdab bo/_/blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba/_/khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la/_/ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan/_/rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya/_/de yi dbus su 
[\[173a.7\]]'khor lo ni/_/dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste/_/de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/'di na 'jig rten pa rnams rtog_/gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas/_/de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba/_/dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag_/yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs/_/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das/_/'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs/_/len pa ma yin gtong ba min/_/med pa ma yin gnas ma yin/_/blo ldan kun du 'di shes pa/_/rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni/_/nges pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[173b.2\]]pa zhes bshad/_/dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/_/gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur na/_/de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni/_/ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed/_/gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las/_/de las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/_/le'u bzhi pa 
[\[173b.3\]]nyid yin no//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog_/rdo rje gsung gtso 'gro ba'i bla/_/slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la/_/sngags spyod don gyi de nyid zhus/_/sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa gcig_/khyad par du ni bsrung bslab pa/_/de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung /_/
[\[173b.4\]]spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig_/gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu/_/gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to/_/mi rtog don las yang dag byung /_/zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin/_/dngos med la 
[\[173b.5\]]gnas gti mug ste/_/'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba/_/'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin/_/theg pa mchog ni bla med pa/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/_/'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad/_/dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub bo/_/rigs ngan myur bar shes 
[\[173b.6\]]par bya/_/smyig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin/_/mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste/_/gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po/_/theg pa chen po bla med pa'i/_/theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par 'gyur/_/sems can sdig chen byas pa dang /_/gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po/_/
[\[173b.7\]]gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis/_/bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di nyid dad pas myur du ni/_/zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas/_/gang gis phung sogs dngos med par/_/zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas/_/de ni srog gcod byed pa ste/_/theg pa 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]mchog la gnas pa yin/_/nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag_/rten 'byung gnyis su ston pa ni/_/de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra dga' ba ste/_/gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang /_/de ni rdzas su shes bya ste/_/de 'phrog ngang tshul gang yin 
[\[174a.2\]]pa/_/gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod/_/gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa/_/de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba/_/sems can de de 'dod la dga'/_/bsgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur/_/de yi stong nyid gti mug la/_/yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te/_/dbang po 
[\[174a.3\]]gci ba zhes bya la/_/de dag zhi ba za ba yin/_/theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir/_/de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/_/de dag tshe [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]'dod pa dang /_/bshang gci zas su byed pa po/_/shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab/_/chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu/_/gnyis med de 
[\[174a.4\]]bzhin nyid sbyor ba/_/dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa/_/longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin/_/de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod/_/rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/_/gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya/_/bshang gci zas su byed pa yi/_/sprul sku'i gzugs can bu 
[\[174a.5\]]mo de/_/sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya/_/ma dang sring mo bu mo ni/_/'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas/_/theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la/_/dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo/_/ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni/_/kun du khyab par gnas gyur ba/_/'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de/_/ting 
[\[174a.6\]]'dzin bsam khyab ces bya ba/_/de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba/_/rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no/_/sangs rgyas yum gyi ye shes la/_/'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te/_/rnam par mi rtog sbyor gcig gis/_/myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[174a.7\]]'das gsung ni/_/sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/_/thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur/_/'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag_/ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]'khor nang du gsung /_/'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang /_/gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang /_/zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i/_/rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing /_/gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang /_/'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa/_/'dir ni de 
[\[174b.2\]]byed sems can rnams/_/snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam/_/de nas mgon po thugs rje can/_/sems can kun la phan dgyes pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa/_/'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa/_/sems can 
[\[174b.3\]]kun 'dzin gcig pu pa/_/chu khams rtog dang bral ba po/_/sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/_/bdag po me yi gzugs can te/_/thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor/_/de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog_/'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu/_/bcom ldan sna tshogs nam 
[\[174b.4\]]mkha' mtshungs/_/thams cad snang zhing zab pa po/_/de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par/_/bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/_/snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing /_/sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi/_/byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin/_/
[\[174b.5\]]de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa/_/brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de/_/sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad/_/gcig 
[\[174b.6\]]tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to/_/de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung /_/gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru/_/gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol/_/mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[174b.7\]]che/_/rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar/_/'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol/_/mi g.yo ba ni gsang ba ste/_/zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa/_/'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/_/dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med/_/
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis/_/bye brag mang por gyur ba yin/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/_/gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[175a.2\]]nyid du gyur/_/de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang /_/zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas/_/ye shes lus can ye shes can/_/brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni/_/yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang /_/'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag pa/_/de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[175a.3\]]mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa/_/de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu/_/'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur/_/des ni bden 'di ma shes pas/_/dbyangs bcas rgyal la bskul ba ni/_/byang chub 
[\[175a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/brgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/de nas gsung ba rdo rje gsum/_/dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas/_/ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad/_/gnyis su med par mnyam rdo rje/_/'gro 
[\[175a.5\]]la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i/_/'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yis/_/'od gang chen por gyur pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges reg pas/_/rang gi stan la gnas par gyur/_/de 
[\[175a.6\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang /_/dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas/_/chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs/_/e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/_/e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba/_/bdag med chos ni yang dag dag_/chos kyi rgyal po phyag 
[\[175a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don/_/dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/_/mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung /_/rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs/_/dus gsum dag gi lam du byung /_/rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]spyod/_/nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste/_/spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan/_/de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa/_/spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/_/gang zhig 
[\[175b.2\]]spyod mchog 'di ston pa/_/gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag_/de ni ci dga' bar yang byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog_/sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi/_/spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin//_//de nas dpal 
[\[175b.3\]]chen mi bskyod pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i/_/gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin/_/oM zhes bya ba dang por yin/_/sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/_/tsit+ta gsum par yongs 
[\[175b.4\]]su brtag_/badzra bzhi pa'i gong mar ldan/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/_/a ha~M dus kyi ming can yin/_/sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no/_/de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/_/rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/sku ni byin gyis brlab 
[\[175b.5\]]pa gsung /_/oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad/_/sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/_/kA ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste/_/badzra rig byed yin par bsgrags/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma kaH'dod lha/_/a ha~M skem byed ces brjod de/_/dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags/_/shes 
[\[175b.6\]]rab dbye bas dbye bar bya/_/de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i/_/kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsungs/_/oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin/_/sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/_/wA ka ces bya ba gsum 
[\[175b.7\]]pa yin/_/badzra dus kyi ming du 'gyur/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/_/a ha~M zhes pa drug pa ste/_/gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams/_/re re zhing drug gsum du bshad/_/thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung /_/rim ni rim pa min pas gsungs/_/bdag 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]po las ni gcig pu las/_/rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung /_/yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung /_/de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog_/de bas 'di ni bsgom pa mchog_/g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya/_/'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa/_/rab 
[\[176a.2\]]mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas/_/bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing /_/sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya/_/de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang /_/sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[176a.3\]]oM ni zung gi dang por ldan/_/sarba ta thA ga ta zung /_/de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs/_/thams cad me long ming can no/_/a nu rA ga skye med de/_/de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs/_/rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i/_/badzra yang ni bzhi bar gyur/_/dngos 
[\[176a.4\]]med bdag nyid can ye shes/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/_/ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/_/a ha~M so so rdzogs longs spyod/_/dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa/_/mtshon pa drug pa'i ming can no/_/dngos 
[\[176a.5\]]med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can/_/de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog_/de lta'i chags pas de bzhin gshegs/_/mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya/_/de nas dpal chen gdon mi za/_/don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/_/des ni gsang 
[\[176a.6\]]sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan/_/sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/_/pU dza rnam par thar pa'i ming /_/badzra sems ni rnam bsgom pa/_/swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/_/a ha~M pha rol phyin zhes bya/_/lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad/_/gzugs dang sgra dang 
[\[176a.7\]]dri dang ro/_/reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings/_/de dag dngos med gyur byas pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin/_/mig sogs shes las yang dag byung /_/mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes/_/mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]thob 'gyur/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa/_/rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po/_/thub pa chen pos yang gsungs pa/_/sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la/_/gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa/_/de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba/_/dngos 
[\[176b.2\]]grub rab mchog des thob 'gyur/_/bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing /_/lus dang ngag kyang rnam par bsgom/_/mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas bsgom zhing /_/sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya/_/rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na/_/shin tu phra ba'ang 
[\[176b.3\]]yod ma yin/_/sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis/_/bsgom pa med cing byang chub med/_/rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du/_/mdor na rnam par brtags nas su/_/sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_/gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[176b.4\]]gshegs dbang po'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/_/kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis/_/bsgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[176b.5\]]gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/_/yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/_/sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can/_/rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan/_/de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam/_/blo ldan ye shes kyis brtags pa'i/_/gsang ba'i ye 
[\[176b.6\]]shes gnas bsgom mo/_/gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste/_/de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te/_/de yi steng du gnas gzhag go/_/
[\[176b.7\]]dbang phyug chen po skem byed de/_/gzhi phyed nam mkhas mtshon pa dag_/bdud rtsi zhes ni btags pa gang /_/de ni hU~M zhes bya bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsgom/_/spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor/_/rdo 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]rje pad+mo gnyis bsgom pa'o/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis/_/de yi steng du rnam par bsgom/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/'od kyi dkyil 
[\[177a.2\]]'khor 'di nyid bsgom/_/sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dgod pa/_/'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor/_/ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba/_/rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che/_/nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis/_/ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam/_/tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad 
[\[177a.3\]]tsam/_/'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/_/sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse/_/byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya/_/'khor lo la sogs bsgom pa ni/_/de yi khyad par dag tu brtags/_/yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas/_/byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o/_/
[\[177a.4\]]sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs/_/mdor na de ni spro bar bya/_/gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa/_/rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po/_/dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog_/'gro kun don du ston pa po/_/gsung bas 
[\[177a.5\]]mchog ni bka' stsal to/_/skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang /_/zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni/_/skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad/_/zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin/_/dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o/_/skad cig 
[\[177a.6\]]gcig tu bsngags pa ste/_/dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs/_/gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa/_/rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug bsgom/_/mchod chen de ni byas nas su/_/gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par bsgom/_/yul dang dbang po sems dpa' ni/_/bshang 
[\[177a.7\]]gci zas su byed pa po/_/byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni/_/bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o/_/de nyid 'di ni bla med pa/_/byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o/_/rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing /_/mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o/_/bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa/_/sha zhes bya bar de bshad do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/_/sha chen de ni yin par bshad/_/gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog_/rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub/_/dam tshig chen 
[\[177b.2\]]po glang chen rta/_/de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha/_/phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas/_/gang gsungs mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so/_/gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas/_/bsam gtan dga' ba'i mid gcig bu/_/'jig rten rgyang pa na 'jig rten pa/_/
[\[177b.3\]]bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag pa dang /_/de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/'di dag zas su kun du bshad/_/de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa/_/bcom ldan 'das las thos pa 
[\[177b.4\]]dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/_/lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol ba/_/nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang /_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing /_/mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni/_/'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs/_/chu dang 'o ma gcig 
[\[177b.5\]]'gyur bzhin/_/khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/_/'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa/_/ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len/_/ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yi/_/skyes bu la la de bsres 'thung /_/de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/_/chos kyi bdud rtsi 
[\[177b.6\]]de rnams 'thung /_/dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du/_/gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di/_/ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/_/mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis/_/grags ldan lag na rdo rje la/_/bu 
[\[177b.7\]]khyod legs so cher legs te/_/bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya/_/rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang /_/de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams/_/'di dag 'jig rten ba rnams te/_/bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas/_/rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas/_/'jig 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]rten 'das par gyur pa yin/_/de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang /_/de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin/_/gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das/_/rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa/_/de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig_/'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs/_/
[\[178a.2\]]brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing /_/blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis/_/byang chub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/_/'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang /_/rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzi 
[\[178a.3\]]ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang /_/mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang /_/mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis/_/'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed/_/gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin/_/de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/_/
[\[178a.4\]]rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog_/dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/_/skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa/_/gsang ba yang dag srung ba po/_/de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste/_/dam tshig las ni dam tshig 
[\[178a.5\]]mchog_/rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab pa'i/_/le'u drug pa yin par bshad//_//de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang /_/dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig_/ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog_/mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so/_/de 
[\[178a.6\]]nyid dam tshig bzhi po gang /_/'dod pa thams cad ces de bshad/_/de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis/_/ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya/_/rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas/_/bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya/_/de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten 
[\[178a.7\]]'das pa zhi ba nyid/_/dka' thub myur ba de yin la/_/sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod/_/mi zad pa ni gnyi ga ste/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang /_/gzugs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod/_/de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sgrub pa po rnams myur 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]du 'grub/_/tha dad yi ge slong mo yin/_/de 'don pa ni za ba ste/_/gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de/_/de dag slong mo za bar 'dod/_/dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing /_/sdom pa mi bzad nyid kyang min/_/'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod cing /_/sngags kyi de nyid ma 
[\[178b.2\]]nyams bzlas/_/rdo rje gsum dbye bde gnas na/_/sngags rig byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang /_/shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang /_/
[\[178b.3\]]mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing /_/byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya/_/de ltar gzugs 
[\[178b.4\]]la gsum shes nas/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/_/sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che/_/sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/sangs rgyas rin 
[\[178b.5\]]chen 'byung gnas gtso/_/dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso/_/ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/de nyid don 
[\[178b.6\]]yod rdo rje grags/_/sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/_/reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas/_/rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya/_/de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/mi bskyod me long gzugs can no/_/nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang /_/gnyi ga rjes su mi dmigs 
[\[178b.7\]]pa/_/gzugs la sogs gsum de yin te/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la/_/sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/_/gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa 'di/_/snying po sangs rgyas kun bskyed de/_/mkhas pas gzugs sgra la sogs 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]pa/_/lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/_/de bzhin rigs su bsgom pa ni/_/bsgom pas der ni bsgom par bya/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor bas kyang /_/chos ni rjes su dran pa 
[\[179a.2\]]bsgom/_/rdo rje gsum bsgom rnal 'byor pas/_/rdo rje rjes dran bsgom pa'o/_/rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang /_/chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung /_/rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur ba/_/de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o/_/de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa 
[\[179a.3\]]gcig_/rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid/_/lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste/_/de bsgom byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi/_/ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs/_/de nyid lo yi grangs yin te/_/bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag_/
[\[179a.4\]]sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi/_/bud med lo grangs bcu drug pa/_/gzugs bzang phra dang mchod pa ni/_/dben pa zhes bya brtsam par bya/_/byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba/_/khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo 
[\[179a.5\]]che/_/spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya/_/bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/yi ge hU~M dang de bzhin oM/_/phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya/_/
[\[179a.6\]]de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid/_/ci rigs par ni rnam par spro/_/'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste/_/gsang dang snying ga sna rtse ru/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya/_/'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar/_/shes rab 
[\[179a.7\]]de ni rtag tu bsgom/_/gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas/_/de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o/_/gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bas/_/bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rig_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs/_/byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya/_/
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan/_/b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming /_/rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung /_/rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste/_/b+ha ga ling+ga yin par bsgrags/_/gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[179b.2\]]gzugs su bsgom pa'o/_/de las blo ldan gyis spro ba/_/ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas/_/mnyam pa med pas khyad par du/_/sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o/_/chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang /_/rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas/_/rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyar/_/
[\[179b.3\]]b+ha ga'i ling+gar brtag pa'o/_/de nas ba spu'i bu ga las/_/'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/_/de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i/_/'di ni chos kyi bdag po yin/_/rdo rje rjes su dran pa bsgom/_/dngos med gcig pu la sbyor ba/_/stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 
[\[179b.4\]]'gyur/_/b+ha ga ling+ga zhes bshad do/_/de nas ba spu'i bu gnas/_/rdo rje sprin rnams kun du spro/_/rdo rje byang chub sems bsgom nyid/_/myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/_/rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las/_/de bzhin rnal 
[\[179b.5\]]'byor pas spros na/_/rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/khro bo rjes dran sbyor ba la'ang /_/stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i/_/khro bo'i ba spu'i bu gnas/_/khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen 
[\[179b.6\]]la/_/rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni/_/thub pa che la slar zhus pa/_/thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa/_/b+ha ga'i ling+ga'i sbyor ba ni/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las/_/sangs rgyas la sogs spro gyur pa/_/tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la/_/phyi dus kun 
[\[179b.7\]]rmongs bskyed pa sto/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni/_/ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra/_/'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan ma can/_/rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing /_/de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas/_/ji bzhin par ni rtog par byed/_/mgon khyod 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]bde ba chen po ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu/_/sku med srid gsum bdag nyid can/_/dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan/_/de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi/_/yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum/_/dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum/_/sangs 
[\[180a.2\]]rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung /_/khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste/_/ling+ga drag po'i ming can nyid/_/khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtag_/khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung /_/dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che/_/dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid/_/shes dang shes bya rnam par 
[\[180a.3\]]grol/_/de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas/_/dam tshig rjes su dran bsgom pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad/_/rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan/_/dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las/_/rang gi khu 
[\[180a.4\]]ba'i thigs skyes pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid/_/dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las/_/rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te/_/rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya/_/sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[180a.5\]]rnams kyi phung po lnga/_/sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa/_/bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig_/gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga/_/rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs/_/de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur/_/bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin/_/thugs rjes dran 
[\[180a.6\]]pa'i sbyor ba gang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni/_/kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin/_/bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang /_/sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid/_/spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du/_/bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/
[\[180a.7\]]sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa/_/de sbyor dran pa bsgom pa ni/_/rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin/_/gsung dang sku ni rnam sgom pa/_/de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid/_/rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi/_/sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba/_/bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dam tshig 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]rjes dran rnams kyis ni/_/de bas tshangs pa shin tu dbyung /_/dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung /_/de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni/_/dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste/_/blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na/_/dngos grub sngags mchog 'thob par 'gyur/_/shes 
[\[180b.2\]]rab dam tshig sbyor gyur ba/_/rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do/_/pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa/_/yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o/_/thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med/_/ma skyes pa dang zad pa med/_/byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/_/khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o/_/ma skyes rjes 
[\[180b.3\]]su sbyor ba gang /_/der ni ci yang brjod min zhing /_/ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa/_/dran pa de ni yin par bshad/_/ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba/_/mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med/_/rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing /_/gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing /_/yan lag 
[\[180b.4\]]bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang /_/zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing /_/de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya/_/rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te/_/bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/_/brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las/_/rang gi khu bas 
[\[180b.5\]]mchod par bya/_/dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang /_/de ni dag par bshad pa yin/_/de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro/_/'di yis lus la mchod pa dang /_/khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs/_/chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung 
[\[180b.6\]]thugs/_/sku gsung thugs ni yang dag grub/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa/_/de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur/_/de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid/_/de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag_/mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang /_/gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal/_/
[\[180b.7\]]dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/_/gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa/_/mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin/_/de ni ci dgar spyod par byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste/_/sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa/_/le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan//_//
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs/_/dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag_/mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po/_/dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la/_/bstod pa 'di yis 
[\[181a.2\]]gsol ba btab/_/nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che/_/theg pa chen po rnam snang ba/_/kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang /_/dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog_/rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung /_/rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog_/mchod pa 
[\[181a.3\]]kun mchog bshad du gsol/_/'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che/_/gti mug chen po blo gros che/_/theg pa gsum po rab ston cing /_/rdo rje theg pa ston pa po/_/nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog_/ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che/_/rdo rje gsum po chags med pa/_/rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad 
[\[181a.4\]]du gsol/_/rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog_/thar lam gcig pu ston pa po/_/sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag_/mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/_/dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag_/byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho che/_/chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba/_/rten 'brel ye 
[\[181a.5\]]shes las byung ba/_/rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don/_/sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad/_/bdag med chos ni shin tu dag_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/_/thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/_/thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po/_/kun don rin 
[\[181a.6\]]chen mchog 'dzin pa/_/na chung mig yangs btsal nas ni/_/gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan/_/lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa/_/rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag_/rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi/_/sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid/_/zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong /_/bshang gci chu yis 
[\[181a.7\]]byugs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o/_/rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi/_/phung po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes/_/rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams/_/rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste/_/len pa mi gsal la sbyor la/_/de nyid 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]na chung yin par brtag_/'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya/_/'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa/_/gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa/_/mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin/_/gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te/_/rnam par dben pa dngos med pa/_/sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin/_/sa phyogs rgyal ba 
[\[181b.2\]]'byung ba yin/_/zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba/_/zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs/_/bshang gci yul dang dbang por grags/_/chu ni shes rab la sogs drug_/'di dag gis gang byugs gyur ba/_/rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba/_/de rtag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa/_/dgongs pa sbyor ba 
[\[181b.3\]]chos nyid do/_/mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yi/_/bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad/_/'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi bo/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i snying ga ru/_/rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang /_/rked ba gsang ba 'jig rten pa/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni/_/rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin/_/
[\[181b.4\]]nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/_/ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par bsgom/_/bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par/_/brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar bsgom/_/chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni/_/mA ma kI ra ni yongs su brtag_/zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas/_/bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya/_/rin chen rang bzhin 
[\[181b.5\]]mchod rten ni/_/'od zer sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa/_/gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba/_/blo ldan ba spu'i bu ga las/_/ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas/_/mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya/_/gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod/_/
[\[181b.6\]]rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma/_/me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni/_/de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas/_/sgrol mar ut+pal nyid gyur pa/_/rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o/_/'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang /_/de bzhin ldang ba'i ming can no/_/de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/_/
[\[181b.7\]]de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba/_/lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog_/khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las/_/me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni/_/rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus/_/me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang /_/chu ru yongs su brtags pa yin/_/re re'ang dang 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]po sbyor zhes bya/_/me tog de lnga gsum du bshad/_/bya rgod me tog za ba dang /_/bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing /_/me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni/_/ma 'ongs skye bos mi shes so/_/ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi/_/dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur/_/'di ltar bdag ni skal min 
[\[182a.2\]]zhes/_/smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod/_/de ltar bdag nyid smad pas na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas/_/mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro/_/gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min/_/phyi rol na min gnyis gar min/_/tshogs pa las 
[\[182a.3\]]kyang ma yin te/_/rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la gnas/_/de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas/_/lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las/_/gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus/_/des ni bdag dang de dag smod/_/de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/dgongs pa de ni bshad du gsol/_/
[\[182a.4\]]rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na/_/mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/_/gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa/_/nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/_/me tog don ni bshad par bya/_/pad+ma ut+pal nyin mor bshad/_/dzA ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad/_/
[\[182a.5\]]lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig_/gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur/_/de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad/_/mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do/_/nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/_/mjug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang /_/dgongs pas yongs su 
[\[182a.6\]]brtags pa yin/_/de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur/_/de bas lha tshogs kyis de min/_/rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams/_/dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya/_/dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni/_/de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa/_/de ni pad+ma 
[\[182a.7\]]ut+pal ming /_/de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum/_/dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod/_/kar+Ni ka dang ma li ka/_/yuka ti ka ra bI ra ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du spyan sogs te/_/sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro/_/dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas/_/lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas/_/gcig tu 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i/_/mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/_/lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag_/lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur bya/_/de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni/_/dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro/_/der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni/_/rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya/_/pad+ma 
[\[182b.2\]]'khor lo rdo rje dang /_/de bzhin ut+pal rtag tu bsgom/_/dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa/_/dpag tshad brgya khyon de nyid gsum/_/byams pa la sogs gru bzhir gyur/_/mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin/_/gru bzhi de ni rigs su gyur/_/zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can/_/mchod rten 
[\[182b.3\]]ye shes sems rang bzhin/_/gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni/_/shes rab can gyis gnas bsgom mo/_/mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams/_/de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal/_/rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid/_/gos ni bsdu pa zhes bya'o/_/mchod 
[\[182b.4\]]pa mchog rnams de dag gis/_/byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya/_/shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las/_/lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya/_/sbyor gcig de las yang dag byung /_/rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin/_/dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yi/_/dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir/_/
[\[182b.5\]]nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya/_/rin chen thams cad dbul bar bya/_/chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung /_/rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni/_/des bkang pa yi zhing 'di ni/_/shes rab thabs cig las byung ba'i/_/dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir/_/zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni/_/
[\[182b.6\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de/_/phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste/_/'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la/_/reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/
[\[182b.7\]]bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom/_/bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa/_/dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung /_/yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i/_/bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar/_/de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/_/skal bzang zhing ni 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]mdzes pa yi/_/bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang /_/gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'byung bas/_/rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la/_/byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu/_/rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug_/spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar/_/byin gyis brlabs 
[\[183a.2\]]pa'i gnas bkod de/_/mig bzang dag ba'i bya ba yi/_/rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod/_/gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de/_/blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur/_/sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang /_/spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa/_/de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang /_/de ni 
[\[183a.3\]]khu ba za bar 'gyur/_/'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/_/rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/_/gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog_/rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog_/dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/_/gang zhig sems ni bzod 
[\[183a.4\]]gyur pa/_/de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las/_/bshang gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/_/le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso/_/thams cad nam mkha' 
[\[183a.5\]]mi 'gyur che/_/sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog_/gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin/_/rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/_/sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o/_/gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[183a.6\]]kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang /_/bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/_/'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang /_/'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang /_/dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag byung /_/bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag_/
[\[183a.7\]]rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni/_/rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa'i/_/thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan/_/bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi/_/rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu/_/rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/_/sems can thams cad bsad na ni/_/
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i/_/rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/_/zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis/_/zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur/_/de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu/_/gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig_/dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi/_/mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/_/
[\[183b.2\]]'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa/_/khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa/_/'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis/_/mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad/_/gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa/_/ji ltar rdo 
[\[183b.3\]]rjes phye mar brlag_/de ni phyer brlags gyur pa las/_/ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur/_/chos sku gcig pu las byung las/_/lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas su/_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus/_/phyer brlag byed pas dngos med pas/_/
[\[183b.4\]]phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du/_/sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa/_/nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la/_/de 'dra bar ni phyer brlag par/_/sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so/_/sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlags pas/_/'di gnyis khyad par med do 
[\[183b.5\]]zhes/_/ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa/_/min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing /_/gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin/_/rab tu spang bar byed par 'gyur/_/theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba/_/dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog_/de ni bcom 
[\[183b.6\]]ldan myur sbyor bas/_/mi bskyod zhing du skye 'gyur ram/_/sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa/_/de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am/_/snying rjes gsad par bya'o zhes/_/sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong /_/'das tshe ston par gyur pa dang /_/da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang /_/mnyes bya ma 'ongs 
[\[183b.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams/_/sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o/_/mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis/_/de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi/_/de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig_/de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs/_/gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras rnams/_/dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]'gyur/_/ma 'ongs skye bo'i don du ni/_/de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/_/'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas/_/de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang /_/khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa/_/legs so bu khyod cher legs te/_/kun du bzang po khyod legs 
[\[184a.2\]]so/_/dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni/_/khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa/_/gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar/_/de ni nga yi bshad par bya/_/phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing /_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang /_/dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu brtan/_/'khor 
[\[184a.3\]]ba mi bskyod ming can te/_/de sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba/_/mi gsal rdo rje zhes bshad de/_/dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid/_/des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste/_/sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du/_/sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi/_/kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo/_/rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa/_/
[\[184a.4\]]'gro ba rlung gi ming can no/_/mi bskyod rdo rje'i spyod pa nyid/_/lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni/_/de tshe myur la sogs bya ba/_/klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid/_/phung sogs brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung /_/de yi yan lag phung por bshad/_/de 
[\[184a.5\]]ni phyer gyur bsad pa yin/_/'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong /_/mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid/_/de bzhin skye ba dam pa yin/_/dngos grub chen po des thob 'gyur/_/de nas dpal ldan bde chen po/_/ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa/_/rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa/_/byang chub spyod pa 
[\[184a.6\]]rab bsgrubs pas/_/phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po/_/gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la/_/bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la/_/rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing /_/
[\[184a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/_/rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/_/rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya/_/shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur/_/rnam smin dngos po med pa yi/_/de nyid 'phrog pa'i rdo rje 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/_/rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba/_/rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang /_/nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/_/'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid/_/dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags/_/rigs kun rgya 
[\[184b.2\]]mtsho shes bya ste/_/de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur/_/de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa/_/gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor 
[\[184b.3\]]bsgom par bya/_/dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang /_/bud med lta bur sbyor ba yang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad de ru bsgom par bya/_/'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin/_/dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/gsal mi gsal la yang 
[\[184b.4\]]dag sbyor/_/chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba/_/gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis/_/sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/_/dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor ba'i/_/snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni/_/de dag thams cad nye bar spyod/_/sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi/_/'di ni bsgom pa 
[\[184b.5\]]mchog de yin/_/de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di/_/'dod chags rig gcig bsgom pa'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste/_/sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing /_/rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/_/de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum/_/rdo rje sngags don 
[\[184b.6\]]sgrub pa po/_/bdag med ye shes las byung bas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje tshig gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba/_/rgyal ba 
[\[184b.7\]]thams cad slu ba ste/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o/_/gang zhig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bshad pa/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]de nyid ni dam pa ste/_/dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa/_/de ni rgyal ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i ye she dam pa ste/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub byed 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa'i mchog_/dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i/_/rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o/_/kun du kun nas 'bad pa yi/_/ji bzhin don du 'dra byas te/_/so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de ni dngos grub rgya chen thob/_/de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum 
[\[185a.2\]]rgyal bdag_/rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'i/_/dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad/_/dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms 
[\[185a.3\]]te/_/gzugs rnams kun gyi sa 'di gang /_/phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du/_/rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni/_/sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes/_/bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs/_/de bzhin 
[\[185a.4\]]gshegs pa kun bkod pa/_/sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che/_/bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid/_/dpag tu med par gyur pa yin/_/de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs/_/chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/dam tshig rdo rje dpal la 
[\[185a.5\]]sogs/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni/_/tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di/_/de ni de rnams rjod par byed/_/ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag_/gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing /_/'jig rten thams 
[\[185a.6\]]cad las 'das pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam/_/gtso bos yang dag rdo rje'i tshig_/dgongs pas ci slad gang gsungs zhes/_/brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang /_/
[\[185a.7\]]brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/_/brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang /_/brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyis ni/_/ri rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_/dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]sems chen la/_/dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs/_/dman dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig_/ci phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs/_/'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin/_/'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di/_/rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu/_/
[\[185b.2\]]sangs rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di/_/gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid/_/'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/_/nam mkha' kun bu song ba ste/_/chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing /_/rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid/_/'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing /_/de ni gzugs kyi khams 
[\[185b.3\]]mi gnas/_/de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min/_/'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang /_/de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas/_/dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis/_/chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin/_/
[\[185b.4\]]de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis/_/mdor na khong du chud par bya/_/yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis/_/nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor byung ba'i/_/dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/_/'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/_/gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang /_/
[\[185b.5\]]skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi/_/rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi/_/gtsub shing la sogs re re nas/_/'di ltar so sor brtags na go/_/me de gang na'ang mi gnas so/_/brag ca dang ni gzugs brnyan dang /_/sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang /_/de bzhin chu zla rmi 
[\[185b.6\]]lam ste/_/chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra/_/mgon po pi bang sgra lta bu/_/rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung /_/de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams/_/cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/_/gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin/_/des 
[\[185b.7\]]na khyed kyis rdo rje yi/_/dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/_/de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces/_/gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas/_/rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir/_/phung po de bzhin gshegs par shes/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ni/_/dam pa yis ni mig gdangs te/_/tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to/_/chos 'di ngo mtshar rmad byung ste/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi/_/mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang /_/kun rdzob tu ni bshad par mdzad/_/dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas/_/dgongs pa lung 
[\[186a.2\]]ston mchog la ni/_/gang zhig yid 'ong bzod gyur pa/_/de ni de bzhin spyod pa yin/_/mchog du dag pa'i de nyid don/_/gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba/_/dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad/_/le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/rdo rje 
[\[186a.3\]]gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das/_/slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni/_/bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas/_/mngon par byang chub ded dpon nyid/_/sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtso la/_/btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol/_/snying po sngags ni kun 
[\[186a.4\]]bsdus pa/_/gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum/_/dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog_/de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol/_/gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog_/yang dag bsdus don de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[186a.5\]]de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/_/'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum/_/sku dang gsung thugs bsgom pa ni/_/mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa/_/dmigs pa med cing gnas med 
[\[186a.6\]]pa'o/_/de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs/_/pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi/_/rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la/_/dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te/_/de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[186a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na/_/mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang /_/rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/_/brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang /_/sems can don bya la rol dang /_/mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]rten khams mchog tu/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas/_/rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang /_/yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni/_/sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams la/_/kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs/_/rang gtso gsang sngags spyod tshul mchog_/chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[186b.2\]]can/_/'di dag rdzogs par gyur snyam nas/_/spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho mi mdzad/_/de ltar rnam par dpyad pa'i don/_/gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la/_/yang dag par ni byin brlabs phyir/_/de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog_/thub la 
[\[186b.3\]]phyag na rdo rjes gsol/_/mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams/_/so so skye bor gyur pa la/_/dngos po med cing dmigs su med/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas/_/ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad/_/de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[186b.4\]]rten du/_/nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang /_/sems can don gyi bya ba kun/_/'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin/_/mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams/_/sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung /_/thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'gyur/_/pha rol phyin par 
[\[186b.5\]]mnyam bzhag nyid/_/de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/_/'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang /_/'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad/_/'di rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di/_/mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams/_/rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa 
[\[186b.6\]]dang /_/'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur cing /_/'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams/_/de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa/_/dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di/_/de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/phyag byar 'os pa'i rig pa ni/_/nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod/_/yod med la 
[\[186b.7\]]sogs byed pa ni/_/gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa/_/gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga/_/khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang /_/gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin/_/'di ni yan lag thams cad ni/_/bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o/_/
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste/_/tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di/_/gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas/_/de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/_/nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po/_/chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa/_/mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa/_/
[\[187a.2\]]gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis/_/'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa/_/zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon/_/'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs/_/sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de/_/mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams/_/dngos med gnas la gnas pas na/_/sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 
[\[187a.3\]]'gyur/_/gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis/_/de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur/_/bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di/_/don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas/_/rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las/_/chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur/_/ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas/_/phyi dus skye bo 
[\[187a.4\]]la la smra/_/'jig rten pa rnams drang bya'i phyir/_/gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/_/lag na rdo rje grags pa che/_/dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa/_/bu khyod shes rab chen po legs/_/gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i/_/skye bo rnam par 
[\[187a.5\]]mi rtog 'gyur/_/tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don/_/yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad/_/de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das/_/bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig_/skyes bu dam pa de dag la/_/spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir/_/rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/_/de bzhin 
[\[187a.6\]]gshegs pa kun gyi mchog_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas/_/snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba/_/de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu/_/mchog las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag 
[\[187a.7\]]rtogs/_/dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs/_/dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang /_/chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs/_/dam tshig la dmigs de bzhin no/_/nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/_/tshig la nges par brjod pa ni/_/de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu/_/yi ge hU~M ni gcig gsungs la/_/de nas yi ge oM gsungs te/_/de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AH/_/swA ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin/_/hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste/_/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga/_/hU~M oM AHswA de bzhin hA/_/'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis 
[\[187b.2\]]ni/_/sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/_/rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur/_/de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/_/zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i/_/rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de yang /_/de bzhin gshegs kun 
[\[187b.3\]]bdag po yis/_/de yi byin brlab sbyor don du/_/dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba/_/re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya/_/bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang /_/
[\[187b.4\]]bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do/_/zla ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hU~M/_/rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag_/rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba/_/rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/_/snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas/_/dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der/_/
