[\[187b.5\]]rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso/_/'di ni kun mchog chen por skye/_/rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba/_/sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o/_/snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags/_/rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do/_/rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o/_/skyes bu'i gzugs su 
[\[187b.6\]]bsgom par bya/_/sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus/_/gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do/_/kha dog gsum po zhal gsum lta'i/_/de nyid gsum gcig rnam bsgom zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni/_/rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos gsungs/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[187b.7\]]mchog_/zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che/_/gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis/_/gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa/_/hU~M oM AHdang swA hA~M zhes/_/de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/_/de nas rab 'dar brgyal gyur cing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa/_/thub chen 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]de 'dir ji lta bur/_/mgon po de ni phyi dus na/_/ji skad gsungs pa mi rtog pa/_/gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams/_/rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal gyur ces/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/_/lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi/_/grangs 
[\[188a.2\]]dag tu ni ston mdzad cing /_/ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang /_/'dar zhing brgyal bar de ma gyur/_/ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba/_/mi mkhas pa yi nga rgyal can/_/bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su/_/rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed/_/de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi/_/mtshan nyid gsang 'di 
[\[188a.3\]]mi shes par/_/sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yi/_/gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan sgrogs/_/'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong na/_/bzhad gad dag ni byed par 'gyur/_/reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi/_/mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i/_/'gro la phan pa'i 
[\[188a.4\]]sngags pa rnams/_/'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang /_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/_/skad cig rjes gsung grub don du/_/sbyor bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can/_/bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/_/'gro 
[\[188a.5\]]phan phyag na rdo rje la/_/de ltar sbyor ba yang dag sbyor/_/bsgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa/_/dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid/_/gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams/_/sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur/_/phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/_/
[\[188a.6\]]lus las skyes te yod pa 'di/_/stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las/_/sangs rgyas sras dang bcas 'gyur 'dod/_/sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de/_/bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor/_/zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/_/zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam/_/bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis 
[\[188a.7\]]dag cing /_/rang bzhin dri ma med byas la/_/dal dang myur dang gnas pa yi/_/sna tshogs de gcig dag la bzhugs/_/yid dman rim la sogs pas kyang /_/sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas/_/de nas dbang po med gyur pa/_/gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]de yi chos ni lta ba po/_/de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung /_/gang phyir dang ni zlo gyur pa/_/yi ge hU~M gi gsang sngags lnga/_/de tshe snying las rab 'dar zhing /_/dbang po thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/_/gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni/_/
[\[188b.2\]]sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de/_/de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/_/rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar/_/nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni/_/phung po la sogs bshad pa gang /_/sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te/_/des ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur/_/de gnyis la ni snyoms 
[\[188b.3\]]'jug pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te/_/de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung /_/de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin/_/rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba/_/phra mo'i snying gang dbus gnas pa/_/dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o/_/de yi 
[\[188b.4\]]dbus gnas zhi ba yi/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya/_/de hU~M zhes bya'i 'od po che/_/de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni/_/'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa/_/rnal 'byor pa yi rtag tu bsgom/_/rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya/_/de yi snying gar bsdams nas 
[\[188b.5\]]ni/_/lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/_/'khor lo pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang /_/rol mo 'di ni dam pa ste/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas/_/snying ga ru ni bskul bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 
[\[188b.6\]]'di/_/zhag bdun bar du byas nas ni/_/ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang /_/rdo rje gsum po yang dag bsgrub/_/phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang /_/de ni dngos po med lta ba/_/de nyid mchog gi gsang sngags kyis/_/skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la/_/skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag 
[\[188b.7\]]ste/_/gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung /_/mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing /_/'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin/_/zhi ba gcig bu'i sbyor ba las/_/sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas/_/yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i/_/dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur/_/
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]phung po la brtags sangs rgyas dang /_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don bsgrub pas/_/rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni/_/de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/_/zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog_/de las 
[\[189a.2\]]bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o/_/de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po/_/'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs/_/de ni dbang po gnyis sbyor 
[\[189a.3\]]pa'i/_/gcig par bsgom pa rtag tu byed/_/bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i/_/sngags kyi dbang po rnam bsgom pa/_/dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste/_/dngos po thams cad rnam brtags pa'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sngags kyi dam tshig mchog bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[189a.4\]]rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor/_/rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang bsgom/_/gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/_/lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/_/gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba/_/de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do/_/de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/_/thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni/_/
[\[189a.5\]]mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa/_/gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/_/phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa/_/chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim/_/bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur/_/rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba/_/gsang 
[\[189a.6\]]sngags de nyid don gsang nyid/_/de ni gsang bas nye bar spyod/_/der ni yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnams/_/bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/_/sngags rig dam pa spro 'o zhes/_/der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig ni/_/ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher/_/
[\[189a.7\]]'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de/_/'jig rten 'das pa zlog pa'o/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni/_/'di yis shin tu thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob/_/dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la/_/gang zhig sems 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]ni dad gyur pa/_/gsang ba 'bad de yang dag bsrung /_/de ni rtag tu legs par byed/_/rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang /_/de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba/_/le'u bcu pa yin par bshad//_//de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/_/rdo 
[\[189b.2\]]rje gsum mchog mchog gsol pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig_/nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces bya'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yi/_/sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/_/le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to/_/sngags mchog de ni phyag 
[\[189b.3\]]rgya che/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsgom/_/rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang /_/tshangs pa la sogs yang dag bshad/_/ye shes snying po dam pa ste/_/rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa/_/sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o/_/a dang zung ni gsung rdo rje/_/byang 
[\[189b.4\]]chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o/_/hU~M ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid/_/sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o/_/de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang /_/ldang pa dag tu rab tu bshad/_/nyi shu lnga sogs ming can gyi/_/skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro/_/de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de/_/rdo rje 
[\[189b.5\]]gsang sngags nyid du 'gyur/_/brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las/_/de ni nam mkha' las brgyar 'gyur/_/brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la/_/de las nges par nyi shu lnga/_/skyes bu nyid du byung ba na/_/mgrin bcu zhes bya'i ming can dang /_/sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[189b.6\]]tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste/_/'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad/_/'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu/_/de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid/_/de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung /_/longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o/_/de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las/_/'gro ba'i 
[\[189b.7\]]don gyi bya bar 'gyur/_/mtshams dang skye mched nor lha'o/_/zla ba zung gcig rig byed de/_/de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams/_/de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas/_/'di rnams las gcig bzung nas ni/_/sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di/_/nam 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam/_/dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa/_/yi ge hU~M ni des bsam mo/_/rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku/_/de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor par/_/bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/_/sngags rnams kun 
[\[190a.2\]]gyi gtsug tor ni/_/sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa/_/gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur/_/sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa po/_/chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog_/rgyal dang rmad byung che gtsug tor/_/lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin/_/bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad/_/sbyor dang bya ba 
[\[190a.3\]]gnyis med bzhin/_/sbyor ba 'ba' zhig nyid la 'di/_/b+hU~M ni gtsug tor yin par bstan/_/ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di/_/dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan/_/sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/o~M 
[\[190a.4\]]zhes bya ba de ru bsgom/_/phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/yi ge AHni rnam par bsgom/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang /_/yi ge hU~M ni de ru bsgom/_/yi ge bru~M ni gnas ming can/_/rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya/_/gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de/_/rdo rje gsum 
[\[190a.5\]]'byung bka' stsal to/_/snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/_/rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog_/sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'/_/o~M AHhU~M gi grangs dang mnyam/_/sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam/_/thugs kyi ye shes 'jings su bya/_/rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni/_/
[\[190a.6\]]re re zhing ni yang dag bshad/_/sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang /_/rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin/_/byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o/_/rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste/_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o/_/sngags kyi rig pa zhes 
[\[190a.7\]]bsgrags pa/_/'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin/_/rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed pa/_/rdzogs pa la sogs bsgom pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni/_/gsum po ye shes rdo rje stsol/_/byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i/_/dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin/_/rnam 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]par dben dang ci rigs pa'i/_/stan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi/_/rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor/_/brtul zhugs can gyis kun du brtsam/_/thabs dang shes rab nyi zla phyed/_/thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag_/de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis/_/rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub/_/'jig rten 
[\[190b.2\]]'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log_/rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub/_/grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus/_/bskyed pa yi ge o~M bsgom bya/_/sbyor ba 
[\[190b.3\]]bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang /_/snying por yongs su brtags pa yin/_/sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid/_/spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas/_/gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur/_/dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba/_/phyed pos gsum gyi ming can ni/_/rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum/_/
[\[190b.4\]]sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can/_/mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/_/sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan/_/'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po/_/rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas/_/rdo rje rnam snang de las ni/_/dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur/_/
[\[190b.5\]]sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba/_/skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa/_/ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni/_/rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/_/ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum/_/de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa/_/grangs med ces bya de nyid do/_/sku yi 
[\[190b.6\]]gsang ba de nyid 'di/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs/_/zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba/_/rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de/_/sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/_/rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa yi/_/ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to/_/a dang 
[\[190b.7\]]u ni lkog ma'i dbus/_/rkan gyi steng gi ming can no/_/i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid/_/u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag_/ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod/_/li ti rkang pa cig shos la/_/dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid do/_/dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa/_/ha ni lus skyes 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gtsug tor dang /_/gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can/_/yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de/_/lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor/_/de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen po de nyid 'di/_/cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags/_/dus can bdag 
[\[191a.2\]]nyid sbyor dbang po/_/de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig_/a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni/_/dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa/_/rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni/_/AHni ngag gi lam du bzhag_/kha 
[\[191a.3\]]dog lnga yi kun nas ni/_/brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag_/'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms pas/_/dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya/_/gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad/_/khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste/_/thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa/_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya/_/
[\[191a.4\]]chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang /_/rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/_/rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas/_/gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/_/dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_/ting nge 'dzin du yongs su 
[\[191a.5\]]bsgrags/_/nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/de ni rang sngags skyes bu dag_/hU~M ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya/_/dam tshig chen po de nyid can/_/kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis 
[\[191a.6\]]bya/_/ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba/_/yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho/_/ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/_/rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/_/lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu/_/spyi bo sa yi ming can te/_/rdo rje gsum thugs gsang ba gcig_/de ni ha~M la zhugs pa yin/_/de bzhin 
[\[191a.7\]]gshegs kun ye shes ni/_/dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba/_/rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung /_/ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni/_/lus kun la ni kha~M dmigs na/_/rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur/_/dngos 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]po med don gsal byed pa/_/kha~M nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad/_/rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las/_/kha~M du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/yang dang yang du mchod pa dang /_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/_/gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid/_/sangs rgyas de 
[\[191b.2\]]bzhin nyid sbyor ba/_/so so ru ni yang dag gnas/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig che/_/chos rnams des ni mi gzigs so/_/sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med dang /_/mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin/_/dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so/_/sku gsung thugs 
[\[191b.3\]]las yang dag byung /_/mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin/_/de yi bkod phreng zhes bya ba/_/ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs/_/ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid/_/sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/rang sngags skyes bur bsam par bya/_/ha~M ni rdo rje bzhir 
[\[191b.4\]]bshad pa/_/snying ga ru ni yang mdzes pa/_/rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni/_/'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni/_/'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can/_/sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni/_/dgongs don de tshe kun du byung /_/ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di/_/byang chub 
[\[191b.5\]]sems dpa' rdo rje can/_/snang ba can zhes bya ba yi/_/ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/th+l+h-IM ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba/_/mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor/_/dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas 
[\[191b.6\]]gyur pa/_/ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i/_/th+l+h-IM ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad/_/sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa/_/dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad/_/mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di/_/de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa/_/'di ni dam pa 
[\[191b.7\]]yin par bshad/_/de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi/_/dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i mchog_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la/_/yi ge o~M ni bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje gsum gyi 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]gsang ba 'di/_/yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso/_/'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis/_/bsgoms pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur/_/mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog_/de sku byang chub rdo rje can/_/ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/_/de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/_/mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang 
[\[192a.2\]]ni/_/gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa las/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/_/rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa bsam/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te/_/de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom/_/
[\[192a.3\]]rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/_/dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing /_/dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi/_/bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing /_/sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis/_/ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin dpag med las byung 
[\[192a.4\]]pa/_/rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur/_/longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba/_/rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung /_/de nyid gsum gsang dgongs pa las/_/rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/'jig rten dbang 
[\[192a.5\]]phyug rab bsgoms la/_/der ni chos kyi o~M bsgom mo/_/chos kyi o~M ni de tshe yang /_/rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje dpag med 'dra ba ni/_/bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/_/dpag med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog_/
[\[192a.6\]]'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/_/ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan/_/'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog_/sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa/_/'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i/_/ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/_/sems can khams ni ma lus 
[\[192a.7\]]pa'i/_/longs spyod kun du 'gyur ba yi/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/_/de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad/_/'od zer der ni rab tu bsgom/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM/_/'od chen der ni rab tu bsgom/_/de nas 'di ni rdo 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]rje gsum/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad/_/rnam snang rdo rje can de yin/_/rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/_/de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub/_/rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po/_/sku dang gsung 
[\[192b.2\]]thugs rdzogs byang chub/_/de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba/_/'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/_/tsheg gcig la ni sna tshogs don/_/sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni/_/gsang 
[\[192b.3\]]dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba/_/thub pa che la slar yang zhus/_/o~M AHhU~M ni gsum la sogs/_/b+h+rU~M sogs thog mar gnas pa yis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur ro/_/o~M ni rnam snang rdo rjer 'gyur/_/AHni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso/_/hU~M ni rdo rje sems 
[\[192b.4\]]dpar bshad/_/skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur/_/b+h+rU~M ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/kha~M ni nges par mi snang ba/_/ha~M ni 'jam dpal yang dag bshad/_/k+Sha~M ni rdo rje bkod ces bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol/_/de bzhin mgon po rnam snang 
[\[192b.5\]]mdzad/_/o~M la sogs pa A las skyes/_/o~M AHhU~M ni de nyid gsum/_/rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags/_/shin tu rnam par nges par bshad/_/gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa/_/lnga pa bco lngar yang dag bshad/_/khrag gi sbyor ba las byung 
[\[192b.6\]]ba/_/gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba/_/gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang /_/ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin/_/sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur/_/phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te/_/de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni/_/dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung /_/dga' 
[\[192b.7\]]ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming /_/de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/_/mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi/_/pi wang sgra ni mchis ma lags/_/de bzhin phyag rgya med par ni/_/gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo /_/brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di/_/gang gi don du rab gsungs pa/_/
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]lag pa'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub pa'i/_/phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad/_/sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni/_/phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang /_/gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces/_/khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/_/'di ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las/_/
[\[193a.2\]]phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na/_/gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni/_/'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar bsgrub/_/sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur dang /_/lha rnams kyi yang sbyor las byung /_/'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub pa/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur/_/'jig rten 
[\[193a.3\]]'das pa zhes bya dang /_/yang na shin tu 'jig rten 'das/_/mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/_/ji ltar 'gro la de phan 'gyur/_/spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/_/'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod/_/gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub/_/lha rnams mngon phyogs 
[\[193a.4\]]ji lta bu/_/'di dag ma 'ongs skye bo yis/_/gang zhig shes na yang dag par/_/nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba/_/mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs/_/de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/_/dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste/_/phyag rgya'i nges pa 'jig rten pa'i/_/phyag na rdo rje 
[\[193a.5\]]la gsungs so/_/rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya/_/nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las/_/gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/_/de ni mi mchog ngag tu 'gyur/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis/_/lcags ni gser du byed pa yin/_/de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis/_/
[\[193a.6\]]mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin/_/nges byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni/_/zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus/_/sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin/_/dngos med pa las yang dag skyes/_/sngags kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste/_/'di ni phyag rgya chen po 
[\[193a.7\]]ste/_/'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/_/spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis/_/myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/_/gnas pa yis ni de bsgrub pa'o/_/yid rton dngos grub dam pa yin/_/de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgya che dang gcig bsgrub las/_/myur ba la sogs 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]gsum ldan pa/_/de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/'bad de bla mas slob ma yi/_/rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya/_/myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang /_/gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams/_/spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/_/'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur/_/sgrub pa la ni myur la 
[\[193b.2\]]sogs/_/ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar/_/phung po la sogs chos rnams kun/_/stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba/_/mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las/_/chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur/_/'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor 'gyur med/_/phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin/_/de lta 
[\[193b.3\]]na yang 'gro ba'i don/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed/_/'on te rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig_/sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi/_/spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/_/de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o/_/nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba/_/ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor/_/de bzhin gsang 
[\[193b.4\]]sngags de nyid kyang /_/gnyi ga la ni yang dag sbyor/_/rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad/_/sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni/_/'jig rten par ni rab tu brtag_/rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor/_/rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgyas sa 
[\[193b.5\]]gsum la gnas pa/_/sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang /_/brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug_/gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/_/de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid/_/dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis/_/'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/_/gzhan yang gsang ba po yi mchog_/
[\[193b.6\]]sems kyi rgyan ni nyid ltos dang /_/dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la/_/gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med/_/'jig rten na ni rtog ci snyed/_/dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba/_/de ni dngos med sems gcig las/_/rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtogs/_/byang chub kun rdzob ma yin 
[\[193b.7\]]la/_/de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur/_/gnyi ga las min gzhan las min/_/mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur/_/sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis sngags/_/gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te/_/de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang /_/rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o/_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]sems can kun gyi longs spyod du/_/sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/rnam par dben par rab tu brtag_/gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan/_/klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba/_/dur khrod 
[\[194a.2\]]la sogs pa yi ming /_/'di ni sngags rig mchog rnams kyi/_/bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o/_/'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir/_/'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o/_/mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa/_/rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam/_/mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[194a.3\]]sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom/_/rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che/_/dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa/_/rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'khor/_/rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis/_/mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin/_/mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la/_/gnas 
[\[194a.4\]]nas bla na med pa brtag_/gtso bo me stag mang po 'khrug_/rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje la ni rab dgod pas/_/rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra/_/sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na/_/
[\[194a.5\]]sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/lus la rnam par snang mdzad gzhag_/snying gar yi ge o~M bsams na/_/sngags la mngon shes bsgom par 'gyur/_/'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems/_/nam zhig bdag nyid bdag 
[\[194a.6\]]las skyes/_/sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi/_/dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/der ni mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/_/hU~M ni snying ga'i zla gnas par/_/bsams la sems ni de ru bzhag_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 
[\[194a.7\]]dbus gnas par/_/tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor/_/AHni snying ga'i thig ler gnas/_/bsams la rdo rje'i yang dag bzhag_/'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes/_/'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ba'o/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge o~M/_/bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/lus dang ngag sems yi ge 
[\[194b.2\]]AH/_/bsams na bskal pa dag tu gnas/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/lus dang ngag sems yi ge hU~M/_/bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/_/bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsum/_/dam tshig rtogs pas de skad gsungs/_/
[\[194b.3\]]dgu mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di/_/sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/_/brjod du med cing ming med la/_/shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang /_/kun rdzob la ni legs gnas nas/_/tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do/_/rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can/_/rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin 
[\[194b.4\]]cad ni/_/gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung /_/rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur/_/ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/_/dgongs pa lung ston 'di gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan/_/khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob/_/klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni/_/bris nas gang du 
[\[194b.5\]]'jog gyur pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rigs skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur/_/khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni/_/myur bar de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i bu bzhin du/_/byang chub myur du des 'thob bo/_/khams gsum sku dang gsung 
[\[194b.6\]]thugs kyi/_/sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni/_/sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis/_/de ni dngos po med par 'joms/_/dngos med gcig tu rdzogs longs spyod/_/phung sogs yan lag don las byung /_/bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni/_/sngags pa sngags las 
[\[194b.7\]]gyur pa yin/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rang mtshan nyid/_/skad cig kyang ni 'dor mi bya/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/rigs las skyes pa byin gyis rlob/_/dgongs la lung ston la gnas nas/_/gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag bsrung /_/mig gzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/_/gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te/_/sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang /_/gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung /_/de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog_/bcu gcig par ni yang dag bshad/_/ras ni 
[\[195a.2\]]bris dang mtshungs par 'byung /_/'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur gyur/_/de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/_/bskyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso/_/de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa/_/rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to/_/mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can/_/
[\[195a.3\]]dngos med shin tu dri med la/_/dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni/_/gar dang glu dang rol mo dang /_/dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyis/_/rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/_/gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems can ni/_/ji lta ji ltar ston pa 
[\[195a.4\]]bzhin/_/gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni/_/myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pa/_/de yi ming ni yid ldan pa/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gnas/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang /_/
[\[195a.5\]]thos shing rig par gyur pa ni/_/de ni u dum wA ra yi/_/me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin/_/sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di/_/gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes/_/gcig dang du ma las grol ba/_/rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de/_/chos kyi 
[\[195a.6\]]de nyid rab ston pa/_/thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus/_/mgon po de nyid bsdus pa las/_/rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang /_/'jig rten pa de gar byed pa/_/gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni/_/chos dbyings de ni gar min na/_/gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid 
[\[195a.7\]]lags/_/rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar/_/gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin/_/chos dbyings de ni glu min na/_/gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur/_/rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan glu/_/gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/_/chos dbyings de ni rol mo min/_/
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur/_/'jig rten rgyang phan rmongs rol mo/_/gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/_/chos dbyings de rgod ma lags na/_/gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur/_/rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan rgod/_/gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/_/
[\[195b.2\]]chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na/_/gtso bo ji ltar sgeg par 'gyur/_/rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan sgeg_/gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/_/de ltar rnam pa mang po la/_/gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing /_/bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[195b.3\]]rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam/_/rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di/_/yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid/_/de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag_/yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog_/de nas de nyid yang dag gzung /_/rnal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa/_/de nyid gsum 
[\[195b.4\]]mnyam nyid sbyor ba/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston/_/sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas/_/nor can ming ni nyams la sogs/_/gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos bshad pa'i/_/gar gyis skye dgu dga' bar byed/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub/_/sna tshogs khyed kyis 
[\[195b.5\]]gsungs pa rnams/_/sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa/_/de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/_/mgon po shes rab 'di srid du/_/thabs kyis mchil par nye bar sbyor/_/sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis/_/khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin/_/bshad du zin kyang mi 
[\[195b.6\]]rig pa/_/dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni/_/gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa/_/ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o/_/phyi rol sngags don dngos grub ni/_/de nyid du ni tshol mod kyi/_/'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can/_/der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/_/de 
[\[195b.7\]]rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing /_/sred pa yis ni sten par byed/_/bcom ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni/_/gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed/_/khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams/_/sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa/_/'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]zhing /_/de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/_/sred pa'am dad pa dag gis kyang /_/rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams/_/gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin/_/rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur/_/mgon po de ni der gnas shing /_/nyams shing blo gros dman par 
[\[196a.2\]]gnas/_/de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung /_/tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las/_/chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang /_/phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhung 'gyur par/_/bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang /_/sngags 
[\[196a.3\]]pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags/_/shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/_/gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba/_/gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa/_/gsang sngags la sogs chos rnams la/_/dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed/_/log pas mkhas pa'i nga 
[\[196a.4\]]rgyal ni/_/byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur/_/a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni/_/sbyor bshes rnams kyi 'di ma yin/_/de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa/_/gtam dag kyang ni byed par 'gyur/_/sgyu ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na/_/rgyal po rnams ni slu bar byed/_/steng du g.yogs 
[\[196a.5\]]pa dag gis ni/_/brgyad gnyis pa yi tshul du byed/_/de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag_/ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni/_/AHyi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i/_/yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i mchog_/dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na/_/de ni longs spyod lam skyed min/_/de bas skye bo med 
[\[196a.6\]]gcig pu/_/bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug_/der ni mche ba can ming 'gro/_/de la btsal ba 'ba' zhig yin/_/rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras/_/bar chad shin tu mang po pa/_/bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can/_/des ni tshig de 
[\[196a.7\]]thos pa dang /_/rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing /_/dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las/_/su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed/_/ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag_/de la chad pas gcad par bya/_/'di la 'jigs pa'i sems 'or la/_/skye bo med par khyed kyis ni/_/
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]rgyal rigs dag gam rigs [{]bzangs sam[,]bzang ngam[}]/_/gang zhig mi srun rigs can rnams/_/dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa/_/de dag thams cad brlag par bya/_/de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni/_/rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid che/_/rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs/_/bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o/_/
[\[196b.2\]]'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nas su/_/rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig_/AHyi dog pa ras de byin/_/ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas/_/rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams/_/'di ni ji ltar bzhag nas su/_/de nas de ni mi snang ba/_/rgyun can gyis ni de tshe byas/_/de la 
[\[196b.3\]]sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig_/rigs skyes pa la de rnams smra/_/rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan rnams kyang /_/skrag par byed cing the tshom med/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/_/'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso/_/phyag na rdo rje go byed pa/_/snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' 
[\[196b.4\]]stsal pa/_/rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs/_/rdo rje thal mos ston par byed/_/rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa/_/de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o/_/rdo rje thal mo de nyid 'di/_/lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig_/de nyid gsum du gyur pa de/_/rdo rje thal mor yongs su brtag_/de nyid gsum ni lha 
[\[196b.5\]]gsum ste/_/tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/de ru nga ni lha gsum 'gyur/_/oM AHhU~M dang grangs mnyam pa'i/_/gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni/_/sna tshogs lus can gcig ming can/_/zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston/_/der ni nga yang gnas pa yin/_/
[\[196b.6\]]dpral yon de la bzhin mi sdug_/de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming /_/de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni/_/thim sogs ji bzhin grangs su bshad/_/lag pa g.yon ni drag por gyur/_/g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/_/gnyis pa sbyor bar tshangs pa yin/_/de bas 
[\[196b.7\]]yon tan gsum bdag dang /_/rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste/_/rig byed der gyur gsum du bshad/_/srid srung zhi ba nga yin te/_/mthar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin/_/lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni/_/bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa/_/phyed po'i tsham gyi hU~M mchog ni/_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags/_/nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der/_/so sor yongs su bsgrags pa yin/_/yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur pa/_/shis pa zhi ba skyon med pa/_/yon tan o~M dang yi ge phyed/_/o~M zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin/_/sna yi rtse mor yang dag 
[\[197a.2\]]ldan/_/gtsug mtha' dang ni lag pa gnas/_/nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las/_/ye shes me ni nges par skye/_/lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni/_/sbyor las thar bar de bshad de/_/AH/_'og tu AHdang yang dag ldan/_/de steng yi ge AHnyid de/_/thad ka ru ni ma bshad de/_/khyod 
[\[197a.3\]]ni yig phyed zhi ba nyid/_/yi ge o~M ni tshangs pa ste/_/AHni khyab 'jug yin par bshad/_/hU~M ni rlung du gyur pa yin/_/de nyid drag po zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba'i phyed phyed zhes bya ba/_/der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin/_/gnas dang 'pho dang skye ba dang /_/gzhan gyi lus las 
[\[197a.4\]]yang dag 'pho/_/ye shes rang nyid med yin te/_/khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no/_/ral gri la sogs dngos grub der/_/byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur/_/gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi/_/rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag_/tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der/_/
[\[197a.5\]]ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur/_/de ni mtho ris sogs 'gags pas/_/de bzhin 'gyur ba sel ba yin/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas/_/gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas/_/shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas/_/'jug 'gyur ba ni drag po yin/_/nam 
[\[197a.6\]]mkha' dgag pa'i sbyor ba yang /_/tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can/_/mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste/_/de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba/_/spu yi cha ni stong las gcig_/zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid/_/thar pa gcig pur de ston bya/_/thar pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[197a.7\]]ma yin/_/de lta bas na 'di log bya/_/zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o/_/ston pa de rnams phye nas ni/_/zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur/_/thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag_/'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun/_/khyod kyi thal 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]mo dag la gnas/_/de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing /_/sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/_/'di nyid du ni nyi zla dang /_/sbyin sreg las can me dang ni/_/lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang /_/rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang /_/de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di/_/de nyid gcig pu rnam 
[\[197b.2\]]par gnas/_/zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la/_/de yang gcig dang du ma spangs/_/khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba/_/de bas de ni 'da' mi bya/_/de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur bas/_/de ni spang bar mi bya zhing /_/'di dag dngos med la ltos pas/_/rnal 'byor pa ni 
[\[197b.3\]]mchog tu 'dod/_/gzhan du rnam rtog nyid las ni/_/dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur/_/de bas thal mo sbyar ba 'di/_/sems can rjes bzung dam pa yin/_/ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams/_/bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya/_/smad bya 'on pa lkugs pa dang /_/
[\[197b.4\]]de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang /_/gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur/_/de rnams la ni phan phyir bya/_/de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa/_/de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas/_/de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur/_/de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can no/_/de ni nang min phyi ma yin/_/gnyis 
[\[197b.5\]]min gzhan gyi rgyu las min/_/phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min/_/'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min/_/rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na/_/ming ni rdo rje thal mor gyur/_/sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i/_/snying po rtogs par bya ba'i mchog_/phyag rgya 'di lta bu 
[\[197b.6\]]'di yin/_/phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no/_/mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de/_/dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/_/'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi/_/mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas/_/gnyis por gcig 'gyur dge 'dun te/_/de 'di skyabs ni 
[\[197b.7\]]gsum yin te/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/_/gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin/_/phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid/_/shes rab thabs kyi gnas mthong yin/_/thal mo bcings pa tsam gyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur/_/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum/_/rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum/_/zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang /_/lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang /_/dus gsum dam tshig mchog gsum dang /_/tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur/_/sbyor ba 
[\[198a.2\]]gsum dang lam gsum ste/_/ji srid rtogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams/_/de ni thal mor sbyor 'di yin/_/'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog_/rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag_/ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur/_/de nyid du ni der 'gyur na/_/gcig dang du ma rnam par spangs/_/
[\[198a.3\]]chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa/_/'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud/_/'di ni mkhar ltar rang bzhin gcig_/gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba/_/bsdu bar byas par gyur pas kyang /_/sku gsum don gyi chos nyid do/_/'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste/_/dngos po med cing 
[\[198a.4\]]gnas med pa/_/mtha' med zad pa med par 'gyur/_/sku gsum dag ni rkyen las ni/_/rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te/_/de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur/_/hU~M gis sems can yang dag 'byin/_/sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag_/oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste/_/
[\[198a.5\]]AHni gnas pa por 'gyur ro/_/gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga/_/gsal dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni/_/rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te/_/de nyid kyi ni sngags bshad pa'o/_/zlos dang bsam gtan rnam bral bar/_/de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster/_/rang bzhin 
[\[198a.6\]]grub pa 'di yin te/_/'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad do/_/rnal 'byor pa la de gsal te/_/byis rnams de la phyin ci log_/rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum/_/dngos po med par de bshad do/_/de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni/_/yid min pa yi bzlas par gyur/_/yid rton 
[\[198a.7\]]gcig ni mdor bsdus las/_/[{]rings [,]ring [}]dang ngal dang gnas pa rnams/_/zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim/_/dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di/_/rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus de gyur/_/sprul pa bsam 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mi khyab ces dben/_/sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa/_/de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming /_/rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar/_/sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed/_/dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni/_/de nyid kyis ni rdo rjer sbyar/_/sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de yi chos rnams 
[\[198b.2\]]ston par byed/_/rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can/_/sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin/_/gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas/_/sems can rnams ni der 'jog ste/_/gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang /_/'jig rten rnams la gsol ba deng /_/rdzogs sangs 
[\[198b.3\]]rgyas rnams mnyes byed de/_/khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin/_/gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur/_/de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can/_/gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so/_/sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do/_/
[\[198b.4\]]mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin/_/de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa/_/chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so/_/rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di/_/khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung /_/gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i/_/dngos grub des ni thob par gyur/_/AHnyid der ni mi gsal 
[\[198b.5\]]ba'i/_/rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin/_/dog par de ni yongs bshad de/_/dngos po med par ras kyi ming /_/'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya/_/dog pa de yi ras don las/_/mi snang ba la sogs 
[\[198b.6\]]grub cing /_/yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog_/'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung /_/AHyi dog ras mtshon pas ni/_/'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad/_/'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod/_/sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur/_/byis pa rtog par bya ba'i 
[\[198b.7\]]phyir/_/de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur/_/tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang /_/rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/de yang shin tu ldan sems can/_/sems can sogs la rnam par gnas/_/rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang /_/'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]skye ba med las skyes pas na/_/gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o/_/shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni/_/'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod/_/de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur ba/_/rnam par mi rtog cig shos nyid/_/ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te/_/sngags ni na 
[\[199a.2\]]ri bri bar bya/_/rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni/_/yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba/_/so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni/_/i u dang ni ring por bcas/_/a ai au u ya ste mtha'/_/bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i/_/'gro ba mnyam 
[\[199a.3\]]bzhag bskyed pa yin/_/'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi/_/chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur/_/de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang /_/rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur/_/cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni/_/bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[199a.4\]]nA ga yi ni grangs bzhin du/_/skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa/_/nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang /_/de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin/_/sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni/_/khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod/_/'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa'am/_/mnyam nyid ye shes 
[\[199a.5\]]de nyid las/_/yon tan gsum ni brda byas pa/_/yon tan med pa'i yon tan ming /_/gzhon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming /_/lta ba 'di ni bar skyes/_/de ni sgo glegs mtha' yin te/_/i u dang ni ring por bcas/_/yi ge gsum bcas thig ler ldan/_/tsheg 
[\[199a.6\]]drag mtha' yi ring sde can/_/yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang /_/bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin/_/de nyid ring po ring ba'i mthas/_/bcu gnyis pa yi grangs su 'gyur/_/de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las/_/yi ge o~M zhes brjod pa yin/_/snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yin/_/
[\[199a.7\]]ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste a las sngags pas ni/_/AHnyid du ni blta bar bya/_/de bzhin a yi sbyor ba las/_/yi ge a ni ci 'dod par/_/ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta/_/re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo/_/i r-i l-i u'i tshogs las kyang /_/
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]sngags pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs/_/lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni/_/rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa/_/gang tshe A ka'i sde grangs las/_/a yi kha yi rgyab na gnas/_/i tshan phrag pa lag pa dang /_/tshigs rnams la ni de bzhin no/_/dpung pa dang ni lag pa 
[\[199b.2\]]dang /_/lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag_/dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang /_/rkang pa g.yas g.yon de bzhin no/_/gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas/_/ta tshan shin tu dngos grub ster/_/u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni/_/lag pa ru ni yongs su bshad/_/
[\[199b.3\]]rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshan/_/'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin/_/de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i/_/sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub pa/_/me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin/_/rang rgyud kyis ni nang nyid du/_/lha mchog 
[\[199b.4\]]dag ni bya ba yin/_/dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun/_/de nyid las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur/_/tsha ba'i gzhi bzhi sde sbyor bas/_/mkhas pa yis ni sgo rnams bya/_/ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang /_/dbus dang shar la sogs sngon 'gro/_/'gro la phan pa'i 'dod 
[\[199b.5\]]pa yang /_/ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin/_/thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/_/yi ge hA yis mchod par bya/_/sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing /_/'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos/_/yi ge a ni lus su bya/_/lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas pa/_/mtshams med lnga 
[\[199b.6\]]yi sbyor ba las/_/sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston/_/sha thog mthar gnas sngags las skye/_/dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skye/_/gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni/_/skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur/_/de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pa/_/'jig rten 
[\[199b.7\]]pa yi chos dgar 'gyur/_/a ku ha gnas byang phyogs gnas/_/yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das/_/gang dang gang nas byung ba yi/_/gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs/_/de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa/_/rang gi mtshan ma cig shos nyid/_/gzugs 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]med 'di la gnas yod pa/_/cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur/_/steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su/_/dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas/_/dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang /_/'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las/_/
[\[200a.2\]]smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o/_/'gro don gtogs 'dod pa yi yon tan gyur bdag la/_/dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod/_/sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni/_/thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol/_/nor 
[\[200a.3\]]bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog_/'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag la brten par mdzad/_/lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku/_/bdag ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod/_/sring mos kyang ni khyad par du/_/de ltar bskul ba 
[\[200a.4\]]tsam gyis ni/_/de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de/_/rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du mdzad/_/shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni/_/phan bas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur/_/bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na/_/dga' ba las byung chos dga' 
[\[200a.5\]]bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni/_/nam yang ltos par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags/_/kun du song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston/_/'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod/_/dgongs pa'i ye shes 
[\[200a.6\]]rdo rje yis/_/sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs/_/bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhin khrus/_/dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags pa mdzad/_/'dod pa med cing chags la zhi/_/de yang don dam dag gyur yin/_/spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[200a.7\]]dngos po med pa yin/_/bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan/_/mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang /_/zung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhag par bya/_/ha yi sde tshan ka sde dang /_/bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu sbyar/_/gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzugs 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]'di ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod/_/de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste/_/dgongs pa'i don gyis brtag par bya/_/phung po khams la sogs blta ba/_/brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin/_/ma byin len pa byang chub sems/_/kun rdzob bstan pa rdzun smra 
[\[200b.2\]]ba/_/phung po srog chags gyur pa ste/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin/_/mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste/_/de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni/_/dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru/_/sngags pa yis ni de bya'o/_/bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad/_/gci ba zhes ni 
[\[200b.3\]]dbang po yin/_/de dag za bar bshad pa ni/_/ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o/_/khrag gi pags par yang dag bshad/_/sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin/_/rkang ni sems kyi kun rtog pa/_/za ba dngos med gyur pa'o/_/smon lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni/_/
[\[200b.4\]]bi mu ra shu pa sa 'di/_/lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du/_/bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la/_/byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog_/rdo rje theg la gnas khyod kyang /_/chos nyid de yang mi shes so/_/rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas/_/
[\[200b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs/_/de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa/_/mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed/_/yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig_/'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa/_/'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las/_/de nyid kyi ni de nyid mthong /_/gang 
[\[200b.6\]]zhig rnam smin smin pa yi/_/sems ni dngos grub la gzhol ba/_/rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las/_/dngos po med pa nyid du byung /_/bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs/_/kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung /_/sprul pa'i lus las sngags pas ni/_/sgyu ma 
[\[200b.7\]]bzhin du ston par byed/_/gsang ba'i dngos po de nyid 'di/_/'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o/_/rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis/_/bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/_/nam mkhar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod/_/gnas 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsam shing /_/dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan/_/sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri/_/dngos med 
[\[201a.2\]]dben pa nyams dga' ba/_/rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya/_/phung sogs yan lag thams cad de/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur/_/sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa/_/bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa/_/lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[201a.3\]]'jam pa bsgom par bya/_/lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum/_/de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya/_/rdo rje gsum dang lus sbyor las/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog_/sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin/_/lnga bcu 
[\[201a.4\]]gnyis gyur gang yin pa/_/brgya brgya pa nas mngon phyogs la/_/ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs/_/sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar gcig stsol/_/dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/_/'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis/_/sa la sogs pa brgyan pa ni/_/
[\[201a.5\]]de ni snang ba zhes bshad do/_/tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha/_/dad pas de la phyag kyang byed/_/'di ni mi snang byed pa ste/_/ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/_/rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing /_/ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/phung po la 
[\[201a.6\]]sogs grangs mnyam par/_/mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag_/bshang gci sbyangs las de gyur pa/_/gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o/_/dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas/_/dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te/_/
[\[201a.7\]]bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya/_/dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin/_/bdag med ces bya kha yin te/_/gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du/_/bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi byed pa'i/_/sgom pa sems kyi 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]dam pa'o/_/de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms na/_/skad cig gis rnam rdo rjer 'gyur/_/'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par gyur/_/rang gi sngags kyis rnam bsgoms nas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/_/sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad/_/
[\[201b.2\]]sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/_/ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams/_/de snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams/_/dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o/_/gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste/_/sna ni ri rab ces bya'o/_/bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun/_/nam mkhar spro ba bsam mi 
[\[201b.3\]]khyab/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste/_/'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin/_/'jig rten pa yi rang ngo bo/_/phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin/_/dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/_/'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya/_/'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba/_/skad cig 
[\[201b.4\]]sbyor bas bsgrub pa'o/_/rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms na/_/rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste/_/thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/_/de snyed bud med de yi 
[\[201b.5\]]ni/_/gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin/_/khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che/_/drug po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur/_/rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad/_/pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/_/rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba/_/
[\[201b.6\]]chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/_/rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/_/ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni/_/dkyil 'khor la bdag bdag nyid 'jog_/gos med mnyam nyid ye shes 
[\[201b.7\]]kyi/_/rdo rje pad+mo grub bcas sbyin/_/so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/_/shin tu grangs med bskal par ni/_/grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni/_/gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin/_/de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa/_/sangs 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/_/'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i/_/yon tan gsum ni yongs su bsten/_/'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i/_/rang sngags las byung ral gri ni/_/blo can 
[\[202a.2\]]lag pa de bzhag na/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rang gi sngags kyi khong chud 'di/_/ho ho hU~M de khams gsum pa/_/pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher/_/rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin/_/khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing /_/tshangs pa lha 
[\[202a.3\]]min phyag byas pa/_/stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu/_/dpag chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur/_/thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas/_/dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/de ni de ma thag tu 'thob/_/rang gi rdo rje ting 
[\[202a.4\]]'dzin 'di/_/dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung /_/byang grol la yang de mi gnas/_/ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/o~M ni ri la bu tsa na ka'i/_/'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni/_/dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/_/bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms 
[\[202a.5\]]na/_/byang chub ye shes 'od po cher/_/blo ldan de ma thag de 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog gam/_/nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i/_/tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/_/yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo/_/de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs/_/khar 
[\[202a.6\]]bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na/_/byang chub ye shes 'od po che/_/de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog dang /_/nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/_/nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi/_/tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/_/yi ge hU~M ni 
[\[202a.7\]]rnam bsams te/_/dbus su rang gi lha bsams na/_/khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/_/dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog dang /_/nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/_/rnam par snang 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la/_/lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/_/'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang /_/'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o/_/'khor lo chen po'i rigs 
[\[202b.2\]]bsgoms te/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog gam/_/nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te/_/lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni/_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin 
[\[202b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/rdo rje mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/_/rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las/_/rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/_/rin chen la ni rin chen bsgom/_/de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na/_/
[\[202b.4\]]rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rin chen mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/_/rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las/_/rin chen rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms 
[\[202b.5\]]la/_/lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni/_/pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/pad+ma mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/_/pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las/_/pad+ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/don 
[\[202b.6\]]yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la/_/lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/_/ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/dam tshig mchog ni 'di bsgrub pa/_/sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las/_/dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis byas/_/
[\[202b.7\]]bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis/_/mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub pa yis/_/bsam gtan nyid kyis bsgrub par 'gyur/_/dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yi/_/dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug_/
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/_/sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid/_/'gog dang lam ni bzhi po ni/_/lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad/_/sgrub pa po ni gnas ming can/_/shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog_/chos 
[\[203a.2\]]dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can/_/sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod/_/mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no/_/'byin dang rngub pa nyid dang ni/_/gnas pa yis ni nyer mdzes pa/_/yid rton pa yi mnyam sbyor la/_/rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su/_/
[\[203a.3\]]dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das/_/rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par du/_/sgrub pa po ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/_/sbyor gsum rdo rje can bsam pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o/_/sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi/_/mi gsal 
[\[203a.4\]]gsal bar yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las/_/'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/_/sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin/_/gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[203a.5\]]'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang /_/mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed/_/gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni/_/mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams/_/de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni/_/sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya/_/nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 
[\[203a.6\]]'di/_/dam tshig chen po rdo rje can/_/sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las/_/lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog_/rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/_/
[\[203a.7\]]rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya/_/me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/_/lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi/_/lcags kyu la sogs rab tu bsgom/_/de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/_/de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod/_/de ni 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]de ma thag tu yang /_/dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur/_/sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni/_/mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya/_/lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis/_/gsung gi rdo rje de mnyam bsgom/_/brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis/_
[\[203b.2\]]gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do/_/dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis/_/ji lta ji ltar rab bsgrub pa/_/dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i/_/de ni yang dag yin par bshad/_/gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi/_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod/_/
[\[203b.3\]]bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi/_/rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje ni/_/go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs/_/gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i/_/mnyam gzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i/_/gsang dbang de nyid 
[\[203b.4\]]dam pa yi/_/de ni de yis yang dag bshad/_/rnal 'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid/_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/_/byas na dam tshig yang dag pa/_/sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar/_/dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi/_/dam tshig 
[\[203b.5\]]mchog la gnas nas ni/_/blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni/_/rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod ster/_/rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin/_/de nyid ye shes dbang po gci/_/dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso 
[\[203b.6\]]bor 'gyur/_/longs spyod rdzogs phung las byung ba/_/glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag_/dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las/_/mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur/_/dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste/_/dngos med de nyid las sbyor las/_/
[\[203b.7\]]dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na/_/mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/_/dngos med de ni khyi sha yin/_/dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/_/dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/_/rdzogs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]sangs rgyas spyan ba lang sha/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/_/dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/_/rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las/_/dgongs pas cig shos bzlog pa yin/_/sha 
[\[204a.2\]]chen dang ni bshang gci dang /_/glang po rta khyi ba lang dag_/mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis/_/dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur/_/bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni/_/sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis/_/sgrub pa 
[\[204a.3\]]'di dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing /_/rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang /_/snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang /_/dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i/_/'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o/_/dngos 
[\[204a.4\]]grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog_/dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya/_/dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste/_/rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin to/_/de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon/_/gtso bo rnam snang chen po la/_/gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[204a.5\]]'dzin pas slar yang zhus/_/gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni/_/gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des/_/ri rab sum cu rtsa drug tu/_/mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur/_/rang gi bstan bcos brda yis ni/_/phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la/_/ting 'dzin brtags 
[\[204a.6\]]pa 'di dag kyang /_/'di la rang gi ngo bo med/_/tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud las ni/_/ri rab gcig dang bcas par bshad/_/byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa/_/gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis/_/rdo 
[\[204a.7\]]rje can la slar gsungs pa/_/legs so rdo rje legs pa che/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa/_/rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang /_/'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag_/theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo /_/tshad 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]yod pa dang yongs chad pa'i/_/rang gi lus la gang bshad de/_/ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod/_/khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes/_/rdo rje theg pa bla med pa/_/mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du/_/rgya chen de yis mi 
[\[204b.2\]]mthong ngo /_/rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste/_/de yis yang dag ma mthong bas/_/rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis/_/gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra/_/theg pa chen la gsang ba rnams/_/srang la bcal te de smra ba/_/de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes/_/
[\[204b.3\]]nga yi tshig las bltas te smra/_/de nyid rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bsgom pa rnams/_/gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur/_/gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/_/sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub/_/sna tshogs dngos grub 
[\[204b.4\]]'bras bu ste/_/dgongs na ji lta ji lta bar/_/de ni nga yis yang dag bshad/_/dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni/_/rdo rje can gyis hU~M bsams te/_/rnal 'byor pas ni bdud rtsi lnga/_/zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/_/AHdang o~M gyi gsang ba dag_/'di 
[\[204b.5\]]ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste/_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur/_/'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi yi/_/phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung /_/ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin/_/rdo rje gsum 
[\[204b.6\]]gyi dam tshig mchog_/sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur/_/de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog_/
[\[204b.7\]]rdo rje bdag nyid de snang byed/_/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du/_/grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i/_/rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro/_/sku yi rdo rje bsgom bdag nyid/_/grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa/_/mi snang gyur 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pa kun gyi mchog_/stong khams dag ni snang bar byed/_/lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma legs sbyor/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun/_/dpe de dang ni 
[\[205a.2\]]grangs gcig pa/_/sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa/_/lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/_/rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu/_/sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa/_/rna ba la gnas ma nor bar/_/skad cig gis ni 
[\[205a.3\]]de kun thos/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag na/_/sku la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan/_/sems zhes bshad pa'i sgom pa mchog_/sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig_/bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i mchog gis 'gengs/_/
[\[205a.4\]]rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro/_/rang gi rna ba sems bcas pas/_/gang+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi/_/gnas kyi dngos grub bshad pa yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes nas/_/'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to/_/mngon shes drug ni don 
[\[205a.5\]]grub pa'i/_/de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur/_/gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas/_/sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni/_/'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spyod/_/yid rton bde gcig bsten pa ste/_/de 
[\[205a.6\]]nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa/_/bsten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa/_/ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o/_/yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/_/sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur/_/'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba/_/sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[205a.7\]]rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa/_/'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags/_/sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba/_/skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur/_/bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang /_/nye bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang /_/sgrub pa'i dam tshig 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]nyid dang ni/_/sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin/_/'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur pa/_/ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/_/sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs/_/lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag_/chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya/_/rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po/_/bsten 
[\[205b.2\]]pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor/_/byang chub mchog ni rnam par bsgom/_/gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/_/ro dang reg bya chos rnams la/_/dngos grub mchog ni rnam dpyad pa/_/de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur/_/sngags pa gang yin bsgoms nas ni/_/
[\[205b.3\]]bskul bar sgrub par byed pa yin/_/rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs/_/de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod/_/bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi gang /_/sngags pas kun du brtag par bya/_/dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni/_/dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam/_/
[\[205b.4\]]'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/_/de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung /_/sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i/_/sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsten/_/sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog_/sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod/_/de yi dpag bsam 
[\[205b.5\]]shing longs spyod/_/sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/_/mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/rnam par dben pa chen por bshad/_/ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o/_/de 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru/_/
[\[205b.6\]]der ni 'od chen rnams gnas te/_/gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/rtag tu dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan rdo rje sgrub pa ni/_/chen pos de skad bka' stsal to/_/dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/_/'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal/_/bsnyen 
[\[205b.7\]]pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchog_/blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis/_/rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor bas/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/me long zhes bya dgon pa che/_/rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o/_/chen po zhes bya 'od dpag med/_/don yod par ni 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ri 'or yin/_/chu ngogs dag pa'i chos kyi cha/_/gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag_/ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis/_/yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed/_/de bzhin de nyid 
[\[206a.2\]]gsum bzhi'i phyed/_/yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o/_/gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i/_/oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab/_/de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po/_/gtso bo rang nyid bzlog pa yin/_/la la glang po spangs nas ni/_/rjes la dbyibs ni tshol 
[\[206a.3\]]bar byed/_/de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni/_/oM las sdom pa gzhan du 'dod/_/gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/_/dus thub de bzhin nor can dang /_/phan tshun sbyor nas brjod pa las/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur/_/bcom ldan gcig 
[\[206a.4\]]kyang du ma ste/_/tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs/_/brda tsam du ni oM zhes bya/_/dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/_/sku gsum du ma yang dag bshad/_/gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni/_/des na oM ni sdom pa yin/_
[\[206a.5\]]dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod/_/de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin/_/brda ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa/_/bsams nas sdom pa kun du bshad/_/mi phyed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yin/_/bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral/_/rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung /_/rjes bcas zhes bya de 
[\[206a.6\]]bsgom bya/_/rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes zhig_/mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la/_/g.yas dang cig shos zla phyed de/_/shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste/_/rdo rje ming can phyed dang gnyis/_/de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/_/dngos grub myur du 'thob par 
[\[206a.7\]]'gyur/_/zhag ni mi thub zla phyed dang /_/zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis min/_/'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas/_/rgya cher ngas ni bshad pa yin/_/gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni/_/zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs/_/de nyid nye bar 'gyur bshad pa'i/_/sdom pa'i yul ni dam 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]pa yin/_/gang tshe shes rab thabs ye shes/_/de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba/_/sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje mi phyed 'od po che/_/byang chub skad cig gis sbyor ba/_/rdo rje sku ni byed par 'gyur/_/srog la sogs dang grangs mnyam pa'i/_/bdag med phyogs 
[\[206b.2\]]bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/_/rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang /_/gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams/_/chos sku mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/_/sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob/_/
[\[206b.3\]]'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs/_/sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/_/sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni/_/cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/_/'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i/_/
[\[206b.4\]]sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la/_/sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa/_/de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad/_/rig dang ma rig yang dag ldan/_/srog la sogs te bcu gnyis bshad/_/dus kyi nyis 
[\[206b.5\]]'gyur lam la sogs/_/de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur/_/zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas/_/nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin/_/khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis/_/lam rtsom pa ni brtags pa yis/_/de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog_/sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin/_/sngags dang 
[\[206b.6\]]dngos med de byed pa/_/mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs/_/rtog pa las byung de 'di ni/_/dngos med pa ni bsgom pas so/_/ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni/_/lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed/_/mig dang de bzhin rna ba sna/_/lce dang de bzhin lus ngag dang /_/pags pa rkang par yang 
[\[206b.7\]]dag ldan/_/'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa/_/lta dang nyan dang dri dang ro/_/reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa/_/rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi/_/'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te/_/'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku/_/sangs rgyas byin gyi byin rlabs kyis/_/de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]nyid can/_/dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin/_/shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs/_/rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la/_/rang gi chos ni spangs nas su/_/tshig gi lam de ston par byed/_/sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog_/cho 'phrul de 'dra ga las byung /_/de 
[\[207a.2\]]nas dad sogs yang dag pas/_/slar yang de la gsol 'debs kyang /_/gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis ni/_/de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur/_/phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'/_/lha rnams thams cad spong ba yin/_/de ltar sku las sku byung ba/_/dpal ldan chos 'di'ang 
[\[207a.3\]]gsum gyi lam/_/byin rlabs pa dag longs spyod na/_/gsung gi rdo rje can du byed/_/'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/_/phyogs bcu na ni gang bzhugs pa/_/byung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni/_/mi phyed gsum gyi lam du 'gyur/_/yid rton bde ba zhi bdag 
[\[207a.4\]]nyid/_/de bzhin nyid shes lam byung ba/_/yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di/_/rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar brjod do/_/de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/_/rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can/_/gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang /_/'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di gyur te/_/dus gsum bzhugs 
[\[207a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum rnal 'byor/_/gsung gi rdo rje mi phyed pa/_/rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob/_/'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan/_/gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/_/ji ltar 'khor los sgyur 
[\[207a.6\]]rgyal ni/_/tshig gi lam gyis las byed 'jug_/gsung byin brlabs pas sngags pa ni/_/de bzhin don yod nyid du byed/_/der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di/_/sgrub pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas de rnams byin rlob pa/_/sdom pa yul gyi dam pa'o/_/rdo rje thugs ni 
[\[207a.7\]]'dzin rgyal po/_/de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas/_/gang zhig byung dang 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/_/lam 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gsum las ni byung ba mdzad/_/sku yis ston par mdzad pa mchog_/rang sangs rgyas ni bsgom pa yin/_/mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi'ang /_/smra ba sgrub pa por gyur yin/_/sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gi/_/'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/_/'gro 'ong gnas dang bral ba 
[\[207b.2\]]ni/_/rdo dang sa ni dbyig byed pa/_/lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis/_/'on kyang de ni gsung du 'gyur/_/sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i/_/de bzhin nyid ni 'gro don can/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gcig_/gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje chos 
[\[207b.3\]]dag gam/_/de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung /_/sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas sogs/_/rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag_/de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can/_/so sor rtog pa 'gag par 'gyur/_/sku la sogs pa'i grangs mnyam pa/_/sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog 
[\[207b.4\]]gyur/_/stong pa nyid du sbyor ba yang /_/de ni gsal bar the tshom med/_/sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni/_/gang zhig stong par mngon du byed/_/'das pa dag ni de thams cad/_/rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur/_/nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi/_/byang chub 
[\[207b.5\]]bsdus nas bshad pa yin/_/'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa/_/mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos/_/yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung /_/rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni/_/de ni 'gas par the tshom med/_/dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas 
[\[207b.6\]]nas/_/gsang ba dam pa yang dag bsrungs/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog_/rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i/_/dam tshig bsgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i/_/le'u bcu gnyis gsungs 
[\[207b.7\]]pa yin//_//dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA pa dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]{D445}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI badzra mA la a b+hid+hA na ma hA yo ga tan+t+ra sarba tan+t+ra hr-i da ya ra ha s+ya bi b+ha da kaM i ti/_bod skad du/_rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam 
[\[208a.2\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[208a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas bzhugs te/_dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu 
[\[208a.4\]]thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon pas rtogs pa mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa/_gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas dgyes pas mchog tu pad+ma dgyes pa/_chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon 
[\[208a.5\]]du phyogs pa/_/rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa 
[\[208a.6\]]rdo rje dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[208a.7\]]dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang /_de lta bu rnams gtso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i rigs dang 'brel ba byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /_gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i zla ba dang /_byang 
[\[208b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i gtsug tor dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams rnams kyis nges par grol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[208b.3\]]po rdo rje snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig 
[\[208b.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_
[\[208b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i spyi gtsug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med 
[\[208b.6\]]pa'i dam tshig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[208b.7\]]chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang /_gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas lhag par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]yongs su mthar byin/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams
