[\[229b.5\]]pa/_/ster bar 'di la the tshom med/_/de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya/_/rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni/_/'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed/_/lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis/_/rtsa rnams rang bzhin bsgom par bya/_/gnyis 
[\[229b.6\]]phrad pa las reg bya gnyis/_/gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na/_/de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar/_/de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus/_/'khor lo'i ming can pad+ma rnams/_/rim gyis rim gyis bye bar 'gyur/_/'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las/_/byang chub sems ni bde 
[\[229b.7\]]ba che/_/sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob/_/ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni/_/'bab pa'i nyi ma zla ba'o/_/mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang /_/gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas/_/rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni/_/de nyid 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang /_/g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung /_/gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni/_/de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o/_/gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal/_/bde ba kun kyang de lta bu'o/_/de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me/_/yan lag bdun 
[\[230a.2\]]nyid yang dag gnas/_/sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni/_/brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul gyur na/_/pha yi mkha' la mtshungs par gnas/_/de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur/_/gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa/_/me dang nyi ma 'char ba na/_/de tshe lhag par chags 
[\[230a.3\]]pas non/_/chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong /_/'jug pa pha yi kha yi rlung /_/de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur/_/sa bon las ni sems can 'byung /_/de phyir rtsa las yang dag 'char/_/'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye/_/de nyid byang 
[\[230a.4\]]chub sems kyang ni/_/'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o/_/ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog_/mchog tu bde ba rmad byung che/_/ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis/_/mchog tu bde ba bla na med/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa'i 'khor lo'i 
[\[230a.5\]]gnas kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin/_/rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni/_/rgyud pa yi ni rigs kyis skye/_/gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa/_/dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs 
[\[230a.6\]]pa/_/skye bo skal ba med don du/_/gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa/_/snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus/_/sems can myur du dngos grub don/_/snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis/_/rang byung ye shes rmad byung ba/_/rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i/_/'khor lo'i 
[\[230a.7\]]rtsa ni sum cu gnyis/_/byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i/_/rtsa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya/_/de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas/_/de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya/_/ka tsa Ta ta pa'i sde tshan/_/ya ral wa Sha sha sa/_/de dag rim par shes par bya/_/slar yang de 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]dag bsdus nas ni/_/sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro/_/de yang zhi ba'i ye shes mchog_/byang chub sems la thim nas 'gro/_/kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog_/shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag 
[\[230b.2\]]tu bzhugs/_/de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas/_/rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni/_/gsum phye bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal/_/de ni stong du rab phye ba/_/so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis/_/rtsa 
[\[230b.3\]]rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan ni/_/khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/_/stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni/_/'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni/_/nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brangs nas/_/phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid 
[\[230b.4\]]mchog_/lha yi rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis/_/bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/_/de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar/_/song nas phan tshun kun nas brten/_/slar yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro/_/bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas/_/rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[230b.5\]]las/_/de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur/_/'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa/_/brgyad brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gsal/_/rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces/_/rmad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob/_/
[\[230b.6\]]phung po khams dang don yul nyid/_/dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid/_/gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog_/lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang /_/de nyid kyi ni nang bzhugs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang /_/gzugs 
[\[230b.7\]]la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams/_/khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi/_/de nyid mchog ni yang dag bzhugs/_/slar yang khro bo rgyal sras la/_/nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro/_/rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs/_/lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni/_/de rnams kyang ni 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]sa sogs 'gro/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs lnga la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/_/de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro/_/de kho na nyid bde gcig pu/_/de la yang ni thim nas 'gro/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol/_/bde ba kun rten pa yi 
[\[231a.2\]]mchog_/de yang nyams myong tsam las slar/_/de ni yi ge tsam la thim/_/yi ge tsam ni thig ler thim/_/thig le yang ni sgra la thim/_/sgra yang sgra tsam la ni thim/_/sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o/_/'od gsal go 'phang yang dag par/_/spro dang bsdu ba'i mtshan 
[\[231a.3\]]nyid do/_/rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang /_/don dam pa dang bde ba che/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/_/byang chub sems ni dri ma med/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che/_/gnyis med ye shes rmad du byung /_/dbang bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang /_/bzhi ba'i 
[\[231a.4\]]dga' ba go 'phang mchog_/de la sogs ming bye brag gis/_/go 'phang mchog ni gsungs pa yin/_/spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis/_/rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_/de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi/_/rim don bla ma brgyud las shes/_/zhi ba gnyis med 
[\[231a.5\]]mtshan nyid can/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag_/yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan 
[\[231a.6\]]nyid ni/_/de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin/_/rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral/_/skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs/_/rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod/_/de yi skad cig dbye bar bya/_/a lid 
[\[231a.7\]]ga na dang /_tsum+ba na dang /_tsu ma sha na dang /_ku tsa gra ha dang /_bu la tra tra ha na dang /_da sha na dang /_kha da na dang /_do la dang /_pu tsi tsi dang /_kur pa la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go/_/na li stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/_/lus ni bde ba rgyas 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]pa na/_mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa/_/rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go/_/lhan cig skyes ba'i ye shes ni/_/rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can/_/thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i/_/rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go/_/na li las byung shu kra 'das/_/rnam pa dang bral skad cig go/_/ye shes 
[\[231b.2\]]bzhi dang stong ba bzhi/_/skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/_lugs 
[\[231b.3\]]'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi/_/ji lta ba yi rim pa yi/_/dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste/_/mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang /_/dga' bral zhes pa gsum pa dang /_/bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par bshad/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang /_/mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor 
[\[231b.4\]]lor gnas/_/longs spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang /_/lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che/_/lugs bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs/_/de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste/_/bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la/_/de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin/_/longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' 
[\[231b.5\]]dang /_/dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes/_/dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed/_/blta dang dgug dang de bzhin brda/_/kha la tsum+ba byed pa yi/_/dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do/_/rnal 
[\[231b.6\]]'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog tu/_/de bzhin skra la 'dzin pa dang /_/rdo rje pad+mar bzhag nas ni/_/nyams myong sa ni skad cig mchog_/rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid/_/de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes/_/rtsa yi dbus na rab gsal gnas/_/gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 
[\[231b.7\]]'joms/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/_/mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed/_/bral dga'i gnas su myong ba ni/_/rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid do/_/de la ro gcig rang bzhin ni/_/rtsa ni gcig gi rgyun la rten/_/bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi/_/lhan cig 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs/_/stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog_/chos kyi 'khor lo de las steng /_/rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba/_/nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ste/_/rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid do/_/
[\[232a.2\]]longs spyod 'khor lo de las ni/_/steng du byed pa'i skad cig la/_/nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni/_/rnam 'joms mtshan nyid skad cig go/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/_/de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma/_/lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba/_/mtshan nyid dang 
[\[232a.3\]]bral skad cig go/_/rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che/_/rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs/_/de las rab sad nyams myong ba/_/mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs pa/_/rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong /_/slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro/_/rab tu 
[\[232a.4\]]sad pa nyams su myong /_/stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do/_/bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa/_/gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/_/de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba/_/gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis/_/bla ma brgyud 
[\[232a.5\]]pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/thig le gsum ni bla na med/_/gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/
[\[232a.6\]]rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/_/rtsa rnams kun du 'bab pa dang /_/byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa/_/rdo rje 'am ni pad+ma'i rtse/_/rlung ni bzung ba'i skad cig la/_/rkan dgug pa yi sbyor ba dang /_/k+Sh+mi gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 
[\[232a.7\]]byed/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog_/chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog_/snying ga'i pad+ma'i lte ba la/_/dbus su hU~M ni bkod nas ni/_/thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/_/de kho na nyid lus skyob pa/_/phyogs yul 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]dus dang rnam par grol/_/steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs/_/sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas/_/ngag gi dra ba yongs su spangs/_/rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing /_/rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral/_/gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol/_/mchog tu rtag cing zhi 
[\[232b.2\]]ba'o/_/rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog_/kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che/_/sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya/_/yi ge o~M ni sngags kyi mchog_/rnal 'byor ba yis bzla bar bya/_/snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga/_/zhi ba la sogs 
[\[232b.3\]]de bzhin bsgrub/_/bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog_/bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni/_/phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro/_/rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa/_/thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung /_/sngags kyi 
[\[232b.4\]]thig le de nyid mchog_/thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas/_/slar yang rlung gi thig le yang /_/thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro/_/sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can/_/rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes/_/zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa/_/gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/
[\[232b.5\]]la la nA dang ra sa nA/_/a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang /_/de nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid/_/so sor lu gu rgyud tshul du/_/rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni/_/yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas/_/de ltar 
[\[232b.6\]]rnal 'byor mchog tu phra/_/shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/_/dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad byung che/_/gso sbyong gis min bzlas pas min/_/phreng bas ma yin 'gog pas min/_/grangs min dus min sbyin sreg min/_/'byin byed 
[\[232b.7\]]'gogs byed kyis ni min/_/ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi/_/rnal 'byor gcig bus rtogs par byed/_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ni/_/de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog_/thig le gsum ni rnam sgom pa/_/zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni/_/ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems/_/dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs/_/gnas dang grangs kyi dbye ba yis/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i 
[\[233a.2\]]rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/_/de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni/_/yi ge gsum 
[\[233a.3\]]ni sku gsung thugs/_/snying po yang ni bshad par bya/_/de ni rnam phye khyod nyon cig_/de ni ji lta ba bzhin bshad/_/o~M ni sku yi rdo rje yi/_/snying po ru ni yang dag bshad/_/yi ge a dang yi ge u/_/yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum/_/AHni chos 'khor pad+ma la/_/rlung gi 
[\[233a.4\]]'khor lo la ni khyab/_/sgrib med pa yi rlung chen po/_/srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus/_/cha med cha dang bral ba dang /_/dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas/_/thig le 'khor lo'i cha la khyab/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog_/sngags rnams 
[\[233a.5\]]kun gyi don gyi gnas/_/sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed/_/sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing /_/ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed/_/dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi/_/'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed/_/zad med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas/_/byang chub 
[\[233a.6\]]sa bon bde ba che/_/gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad/_/'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa'o/_/u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/_/me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi/_/mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'/_/khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus/_/gzugs kyi khams 
[\[233a.7\]]zhes bya bar shes/_/gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can/_/bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad/_/yi ge ma ni thig le tsam/_/gdong tshad mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam/_/dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas/_/zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi/_/bde ba chen 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bo'i go 'phang zhi/_/rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po/_/mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni/_/'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin/_/bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o/_/de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi/_/rtsa gsum gyi ni gnas su 'dus/_/yi ge o~M gyi brda shes na/_/khams gsum 
[\[233b.2\]]rnam par sad par byed/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs/_/spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu/_/rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/_/sna yi bu ga nas ni byung /_/yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis/_/sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed/_/me ni 'bar ba rtse mo la/_/smin ma'i 
[\[233b.3\]]dbus su srog gi rlung /_/de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad/_/gtan la phab ste de nyid gsum/_/zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa/_/skye ba'i sa bon rgyas pa'o/_/yi ge a ni ye shes mchog_/gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog_/a ni gnyis dang yi ge ha~M/_/
[\[233b.4\]]ring por byas te dbye ba gsum/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa/_/yi ge AHni sngar bshad zin/_/gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung /_/stong nyid ye shes ming can te/_/srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs/_/yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o/_/kun gzhi dang ni nyon 
[\[233b.5\]]mongs yid/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni/_/gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog_/AHni chos 'khor pad+ma las/_/mgrin par yi ge AHnyid 'gyur/_/srog nyid dang ni thur sel dang /_/yi ge ha yis kun nas ni/_/mgrin pa'i 
[\[233b.6\]]dbus na gnas pa bcings/_/a ha~M kha nas gsal bar brjod/_/ro 'bab pa yi khrung khrung ni/_/ro skyur pa zhes bya bar gsungs/_/bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed/_/gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o/_/ha dang de bzhin yi ge U/_/de ni yi ge ma dang gsum/_/rkang 
[\[233b.7\]]pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar/_/'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa/_/ha ni thur sel ming can rlung /_/bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas/_/yi ge u ni khyab byed rlung /_/mgrin pa pad+ma'i dbus na gnas/_/yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin/_/dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]la/_/de dag gcig gyur snying ga nas/_/thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod/_/mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag_/gzugs med khams kyi ming can no/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/snying po gsum du rab tu bshad/_/lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas/_/
[\[234a.2\]]slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang /_/gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na/_/'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang /_/ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs/_/gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/_/gsang 
[\[234a.3\]]ba'i mchog tu gsungs pa yi/_/sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba/_/rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa/_/rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/_/thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste/_/kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med/_/gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni/_/sgrib dang de bzhin 'phrog 
[\[234a.4\]]pa dang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/_/lus kun la ni khyab par byed/_/sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu/_/lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed/_/'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam/_/gang gi stobs kyis khyab par byed/_/gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs/_/rnam 
[\[234a.5\]]rtog med par rmad byung che/_/rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na/_/skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o/_/rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang /_/yang dag rigs par nga yis bshad/_/sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus/_/rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyis su gsungs/_/drug cu rtsa 
[\[234a.6\]]bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis/_/steng dang 'og tu kha bltas nas/_/slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas/_/srog dang thur sel rgyu bar byed/_/de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa/_/rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs/_/sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis/_/la la nA dang ra sa nA/_/a ba d+hU 
[\[234a.7\]]tI mchog gi gnas/_/de gnyis dbus na mchog gi mchog_/rnam rtog med ba rlung gi rlung /_/rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab/_/rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni/_/las kun byed cing mkhas par 'gyur/_/rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni/_/brgya dang brgyad las gang rgyal ba/_/
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dus kun du ni 'phel bar rigs/_/rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa/_/skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/_/de yis thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs/_/de ni gang tshe skad cig thob/_/de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs/_/de yang ji ltar thob par byed/_/de la 
[\[234b.2\]]rigs pa ru ni brjod/_/thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po/_/blo bzang gis ni zhi gnas bsgom/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang /_/dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la/_/thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa/_/hU~M bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med/_/mchog tu rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[234b.3\]]par ni/_/zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na/_/de rjes skad cig de la thob/_/gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na/_/snying ga'i pad+ma'ang steng bltas 'gro/_/de nas gsang ba'i pad+ma las/_/kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/_/de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro/_/rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po/_/
[\[234b.4\]]sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni/_/rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ster/_/sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob/_/a ba d+hU tI'i rgyun la gnas/_/smin dbus rlung ni bcad byas pa/_/de thob thob byas dga' ba ni/_/rgyun du 'chang zhing mi bzad pa/_/chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang /_/rang 
[\[234b.5\]]rig bde ba chen po'o/_/'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya/_/sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas/_/'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs/_/rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang /_/gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong /_/kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang /_/grangs lhag chad pa la 
[\[234b.6\]]sogs dang /_/'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas/_/rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni/_/gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[234b.7\]]bshad kyis nyon/_/de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan bya/_/bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis/_/ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams/_/bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig bu/_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed/_/rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed/_/rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang /_/de ni phung po'i mtshan nyid do/_/phra rags la sogs dbye ba yis/_/thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang /_/'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos/_/
[\[235a.2\]]'di ni gzugs kyi phung bor gsungs/_/der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang /_/thams cad spro bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/bde dang sdug bsngal mchog tu zhi/_/grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog_/gang gis shin tu rig pa ni/_/de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad/_/rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi 
[\[235a.3\]]mtshan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid/_/glang po bong bu ce spyang dang /_/rta dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang ni phag_/pha dang ma dang pha yi spun/_/mdza' po snag gi gnyen tshan sogs/_/gang gis yang dag shes pa ni/_/'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni/_/de bzhin 
[\[235a.4\]]gshegs pa 'od dpag med/_/de ni spros pa kun nas gsal/_/'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes/_/dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu/_/gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min/_/de yi 'du byed du ni bshad/_/don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can/_/'khor ba dngos dang 
[\[235a.5\]]dngos med sogs/_/kun rtog 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can/_/rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes/_/mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can/_/de ltar phung po yongs shes na/_/lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye/_/dzi na dzika dang rat+na d+h+r-ika_/A ro lika dang pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika_/badzra 
[\[235a.6\]]d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags/_/ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes/_/spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang /_/de ni khams gsum yongs su brtag_/sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas/_/sa yi khams su yongs su brtag_/gti mug dga' bar mngon par brjod/_/de yi 
[\[235a.7\]]spyan du yongs su grags/_/zhu ba ci mchi khu ba sogs/_/rdzas kyi bye brag yang dag bsten/_/chu yi khams su rnam par shes/_/mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can/_/dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang /_/gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad/_/me yi khams su shes par bya/_/
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can/_/'byung ba rngub pa rab tu 'phel/_/rlung rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog_/brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang /_/steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag_/de ni rlung gi khams su shes/_/sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can/_/de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang /_/rnal 
[\[235b.2\]]'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes/_/mo har ti dwe Sha ra ti/_/rA ga ra ti badzra ra ti/_/de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni/_/de dag mngon sum cho ga yis/_/gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi tshogs/_/lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du/_/rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam 
[\[235b.3\]]par shes/_/stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig pu/_/sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang /_/ring dang thung ba'i rnam pa yis/_/lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma/_/phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can/_/'khar rnga sil snyan sbubs rol mo/_/de bzhin rnga snyan pi bang dang /_/bstod dang 
[\[235b.4\]]smad sogs sgra dag ni/_/sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya/_/gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog_/rnam par shes pa sad par byed/_/dri nga ba dang dri bzang dang /_/sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams ni/_/dri rdo rje mar de shes bya/_/gzung ba'i rnam par cher dmar ba/_/ro drug mchog tu ldan 
[\[235b.5\]]pa ni/_/lan tshwa skyur la sogs dbye yis/_/rdo rje ro mar de shes bya/_/kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o/_/mig sogs dbang po la brten pa/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni/_/rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes/_/byang chub 
[\[235b.6\]]sems dpa'i bdag nyid che/_/mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs/_/gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par/_/rang gi ngo bo spro bar byed/_/sgra yi rnam pa thams cad nas/_/bye brag so so ci rigs par/_/sgra yi rnam par shes pa ni/_/phyag na rdo rjer yang dag bshad/_/dri 
[\[235b.7\]]yi bye brag la spyod pa/_/so sor ji ltar rigs par ni/_/sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/_/nam mkha'i snying po rnam par shes/_/ro yi bye brag la spyod pa/_/dbye ba so so'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/lce yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/_/'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes/_/reg bya'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bye brag la spyod pa/_/bye brag so so'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/_/sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes/_/yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa/_/dbye ba so so'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa/_/'jam dpal zhes 
[\[236a.2\]]bya'i ming can no/_/rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor/_/dbye ba so so'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can/_/byams pa ru ni rnam par shes/_/rtsa rnams so so'i mtshan nyid can/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 
[\[236a.3\]]can/_/'di ni kun du bzang por bshad/_/de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog_/yang dag de nyid bla na med/_/mig sogs dbang po'i rnam shes ni/_/gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no/_/rje ngar dpung pa brla thal gong /_/sgo gnyis dang ni thams cad kyi/_/
[\[236a.4\]]shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni/_/khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes/_/gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed/_/pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/_/'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba/_/dbyig sngon dang ni stobs po che/_/gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur/_/de ltar 
[\[236a.5\]]de rnams gnas dbye bas/_/ye shes gsum gyis yongs su gsal/_/ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni/_/yang dag de kho na nyid rten/_/gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog_/ye shes chen po legs rgyas 
[\[236a.6\]]pa/_/skye med zad med mi gsal dang /_/'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med/_/gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang /_/bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog_/sbrul dang btus dang mtha' med dang /_/mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis/_/oM dang hU~M phaT swA hA'i mtha'/_/
[\[236a.7\]]sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod/_/rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs/_/btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no/_/o~M la sogs pa zhabs med pa/_/mtha' med ces bya'i ming can no/_/swA yi mtha' can o~M med pa/_/mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin/_/
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]thams cad yod la o~M med pa/_/mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin/_/de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni/_/sngags kyi de nyid bla na med/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/'di yi rgya chen don shes bya/_/ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[236b.2\]]spangs/_/dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor/_/dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus/_/ngag gi rnam rtog kun spangs pa/_/snang ba thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/bdag byin brlab pa'i rang bzhin can/_/kun la khyab pa rmad du byung /_/rang rig pa yi rnal 
[\[236b.3\]]'byor mchog_/skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/_/cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang /_/rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing /_/kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa/_/don dam rang gi ngo bo ni/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbye ba dang /_/sngags kyi de nyid rab tu gsal/_/
[\[236b.4\]]a ni de nyid mtha' thig ler/_/yang dag thim pa rnam par bsgom/_/thig le yi ge a la thim/_/a ni mtha' yi ha tsam la'o/_/ha yang yi ge hU~M la'o/_/yi ge U ni ha~M la'o/_/yi ge ha~M yang o~M la thim/_/yi ge a ni thig le tsam/_/thig le yang ni sgra la 
[\[236b.5\]]thim/_/sgra yang sgra tsam la ni'o/_/sgra tsam mchog ni nam mkha' la'o/_/de yang 'od gsal ba la thim/_/'od gsal go 'phang gsal ba ni/_/shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te/_/gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog_/rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char/_/ngag gi spyod 
[\[236b.6\]]pa rnams dang bral/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi/_/'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bsten/_/rnam shes brgyad kyi tshogs dben pa/_/phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni/_/rlung bcus shes pa bcu bsdus pa/_/de ltar mtshan nyid kun bsdus 
[\[236b.7\]]pa'o/_/kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum/_/dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan/_/skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba/_/rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang /_/he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo/_/dang 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che/_/kun du bzang po 'jam dpal dang /_/sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can/_/sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi/_/kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med/_/ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni/_/rtog 
[\[237a.2\]]pa med cing gnas pa med/_/chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag_/skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong 'dra/_/shin tu gsal zhing 'od gsal ba/_/lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis/_/bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes/_/de ltar de nyid gsum 
[\[237a.3\]]de mchog_/zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa skye/_/gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog_/bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig mchog_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste/_nyi shu gsum 
[\[237a.4\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon/_/sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni/_/gsang ba snying ga gdong sna'i ming /_/gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni/_/'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom pa'i rim/_/shin tu chags 
[\[237a.5\]]pa'i dbang song ba'i/_/sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed/_/rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo sad par byed/_/bde ba chen po kun nas skye/_/khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni/_/dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya/_/byang chub sems ni bde ba che/_/lhan 
[\[237a.6\]]skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni/_/rdo rje rtse mor gzung bar bya/_/de nyid bde ba chen po ste/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/_/kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/_/gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le/_/yang dag gzung ba'i bdag nyid can/_/chags chen 
[\[237a.7\]]sems ni gcig pu yis/_/rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya/_/pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char/_/de yi lte ba snar ni bshad/_/gsang ba bde ba thams cad ster/_/snying ga'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/_/de yang lte ba snar ni brjod/_/
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom/_/gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems/_/yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/ngag gi rtog pa kun spangs pa/_/rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog_/rtag tu sngags ni nA da 'byung /_/rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/_/bsam gtan la 
[\[237b.2\]]sbyor bde ba'i mchog_/man ngag thob pas bde ba rgyal/_/zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas/_/zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni/_/zla ba nyi ma me dang gsum/_/lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab/_/gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad/_/rlung rnams gnas kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[237b.3\]]dang /_/de la gnas pa'i ye shes che/_/thig le gti mug gis gnon yis/_/bsam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal/_/dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs/_/ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal/_/de kho na nyid lnga brten mchog_/de yi 'od zer thig le tsam/_/
[\[237b.4\]]gdong gi sna rtser yang dag brten/_/rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal/_/de nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi/_/ming can du ni yang dag bshad/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/_/ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[237b.5\]]mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/_/gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms pa/_/kun mkhyen rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na/_/sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing /_/rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu/_/lus la rtag tu spyod par 'gyur/_/kun rdzob snar ni rgyu ba 
[\[237b.6\]]yi/_/sgo de las ni rnam par byung /_/g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang /_/dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi/_/g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams/_/me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/_/kha dog dmar po bzang po 'di/_/pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba'o/_/g.yon 
[\[237b.7\]]pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa/_/ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste/_/las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o/_/gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams/_/gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste/_/dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/_/rin chen mgon po rgyu 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ba'o/_/dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/_/dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/_/'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te/_/rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o/_/khams gsum las ni yang dag byung /_/rten dang brten par bzung ba ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te/_/'chi 
[\[238a.2\]]ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni/_/rnam par bzhag pas rtag tu zlos/_/sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni/_/nyin mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin/_/de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni/_/kha dog lnga par rnam par bsgom/_/gnyis med 
[\[238a.3\]]mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis/_/'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med/_/de yis zhi sogs bya ba ni/_/rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro mgon la/_/de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus/_/thig le gsum gyi 
[\[238a.4\]]gzhung lugs ni/_/khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na/_/'di la cung zad the tshom mchis/_/srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad/_/rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung /_/thig le gsum ni bsgoms pa na/_/rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni/_/yang 
[\[238a.5\]]na rnal 'byor so sor bsgom/_/de la the tshom kun gcod gtso/_/bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]chags chen dbang song bas/_/srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams/_/de dag dgrol ba'i don du ni/_/rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa yin/_/
[\[238a.6\]]zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba/_/mi gang mi srun pa yi lus/_/de rnams myur du grol don du/_/sngags kyi thig ler gsungs pa yin/_/gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang /_/de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu/_/thob phyir 
[\[238a.7\]]ye shes rgya mtsho ni/_/rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin/_/yang dag de nyid spros pa ni/_/de ltar yang dag thig le gsum/_/bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin/_/tshe 'di nyid la grub don du/_/sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir/_/rtse gcig pa yi 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]sems kyis ni/_/ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba/_/me tog 'bras bu chu yis brgyan/_/skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser/_/dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/_/'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs 
[\[238b.2\]]pa las sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon/_/stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni/_/lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/chos rnams thams cad snang 
[\[238b.3\]]bar byed/_/mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod/_/de las ye shes bde ba che/_/'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa/_/gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr zhugs/_/yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod/_/chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched/_/kun rtog thams cad gcod par byed/_/rnam 
[\[238b.4\]]rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba/_/de ni stong pa nyid du bshad/_/gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i/_/'jig rten khams ni de nyid do/_/der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa/_/srog gi ye shes ming can te/_/gzugs med drag po chen po yi/_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan 
[\[238b.5\]]nyid can/_/de la ye shes bde ba che/_/byang chub sems kyis gang ba nyid/_/de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas/_/ye shes yang dag byang chub sems/_/de la sogs pa ming gi sgras/_/brjod bya gcig pu bde ba che/_/dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid/_/stong 
[\[238b.6\]]nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/_/bde ba can zhes de la bshad/_/bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid/_/gang de bde bar gnas pa ni/_/de ni bde ba can zhes brjod/_/tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog_/byang chub sems ni tshe 
[\[238b.7\]]dpag med/_/de las byung zhing skye ba'i 'od/_/de phyir 'od dpag med du shes/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog_/stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug_/ye shes rdo rje'i dbang phyug dang /_/de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni/_/stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/_/shes 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]rab pad+ma la la nA/_/zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na/_/de yang stong par rnam par shes/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa nA/_/zla ba shu kra rab tu 'bab/_/de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs/_/bde ba chen po'i go 
[\[239a.2\]]'phang mchog_/de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu shes/_/stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa/_/zla ba nya dang de nyid yin/_/rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las shes/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste/_nyi shu lnga 
[\[239a.3\]]pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas/_/lus ni gang gis shes pa ni/_/lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog_/longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang /_/bde ba chen po yi ni rten/_/'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa/_/rim 
[\[239a.4\]]pa ji bzhin ma lus pa/_/de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs/_/thim dang longs spyod bdag po ni/_/lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su med/_/yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten/_/ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir/_/bde ba chen po'i yang dag rten/_/zhe sdang che dang gti mug che/_/phrag 
[\[239a.5\]]dog che dang chags dngos kyis/_/khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog_/'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa/_/sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba yis/_/gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/_/ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/
[\[239a.6\]]rna ba sna dang lce dang ni/_/lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni/_/kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid/_/dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin/_/shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis/_/dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni/_/dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs/_/shes rab 
[\[239a.7\]]stobs ni bla na med/_/ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes/_/lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin/_/sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis/_/sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang /_/sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis/_/lung gis rnam par nges 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]byas pa'i/_/yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang /_/lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas/_/bdag la byin rlabs go 'phang gnas/_/'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing /_/rab tu 'bad de mchod pa bya/_//rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi/_/phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya/_/bdag la byin rlabs rim de 
[\[239b.2\]]nyid/_/gzhan du srid pa gsum na med/_/de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog_/bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs/_/phyi yi dngos po mi bgrang ste/_/de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni/_/'bad pas byin gyis 
[\[239b.3\]]brlab par 'dod/_/bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/_/de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya/_/'khor 
[\[239b.4\]]lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/_/rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs kyis ni/_/las dang rdo rje pad+ma dang /_/'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas/_/rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis/_/rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs/_/'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang /_/de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog_/
[\[239b.5\]]tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi/_/thams cad la ni khyab par gnas/_/sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes/_/lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs/_/mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma/_/las sgrol ma dang yid gcugs ma/_/'khrul 'khor ma dang 'bud ma dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[239b.6\]]rlung rgyu ma dang ni/_/snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma/_/rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma/_/grub ma sprul 'tsho sgra ma dang /_/gter 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma/_/ge sar pad+ma dri med ma/_/rlung gi lu gu rgyud byed ma/_/bzang mo dang ni khwa yi gdong /_/gnyid log ma dang 
[\[239b.7\]]mi 'phel ma/_/'phar ma sngo bsangs dus mtshan ma/_/rtse 'jo ma dang skal bzang 'phel/_/na ra dza na khyi gdong ma/_/chags ma dga' ma rnam sgeg ma/_/brtson 'grus 'phel dang dkar mo dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma/_/dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang /_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]pad+ma rnga dang 'dod ma dang /_/sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang /_/skyur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma/_/mi bzad che dang las skal bzang /_/me tog bzang mo gdug rmongs ma/_/steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan/_/mdzes ma dang ni ljags bskyod 
[\[240a.2\]]ma/_/rtag bam ma dang gar ma dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mig dang chags dga' ma/_/sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa mo/_/dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo/_/ro blan dri med 'gro bstun ma/_/ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs/_/rtag tu brgyad dang brgyad spel grangs/_/zhal 
[\[240a.3\]]gsum phyag drug dri ma med/_/rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis/_/mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag brgyan/_/de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas/_/g.yon pa 'gying bas ut+pal/_/g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang /_/de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni/_/g.yon gyi 
[\[240a.4\]]phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/_/zhal ni ljang khu spyan gsum pa/_/don yod grub pa'i cod pan can/_/zhal rnams bzhad par bsgom pa dang /_/bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed/_/rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis/_/yi 
[\[240a.5\]]ge gsum dang rnam par spel/_/sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod/_/'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus/_/lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs/_/rdor dbyings dbang phyug lA ma dang /_/rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo/_/rdo rje sgeg 
[\[240a.6\]]mo rdo rje gdong /_/rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang /_/rdo rje rol mor shes par bya/_/chos kyi 'khor lor dgu bdag nyid/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang /_/sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang /_/g.yas pa yi ni phyag 
[\[240a.7\]]na 'dzin/_/g.yon na ral gri pad+ma dang /_/dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med/_/sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa/_/zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/_/rang ming yi ge gsum dang spel/_/sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod/_/longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug la/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]dbus na lha rnams bzhugs/_/pad+ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo/_/pad+ma ku mu da 'phel ma/_/pad+ma'i spyan dang pad gtsug phud/_/pad+ma'i phreng ba pad skyes ma/_/pad gdan pad+ma'i dra ba ma/_/de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang ni/_/pad+ma'i spyan dang pad [{]bzangs sam[,]bzang ngam[}]/_/pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma/_/
[\[240b.2\]]pad+ma'i ge sar pad+ma ma/_/de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/_/g.yas na pad+ma 'khor lo dang /_/rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad/_/g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang /_/rin po che yis rnam par sgeg_/
[\[240b.3\]]spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang /_/pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing /_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas/_/'di rnams sngags ni bla na med/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/_/
[\[240b.4\]]pad 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la/_/rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs/_/rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can/_/'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan/_/rin chen sgrol ma pad zhugs ma/_/sna tshogs las ma gti mug dga'/_/zhe sdang rdo rje dga' chags ma/_/rdo rje las chags gzugs 
[\[240b.5\]]rdo rje/_/sgra yi rdo rje ro rdo rje/_/reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma/_/spyan 'od ma dang thod dbyangs ma/_/sna yi snang ba ro dga' ma/_/sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma/_/khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab ma/_/gshin rje 'joms pa'i blo yi ni/_/bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dang /_/
[\[240b.6\]]pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo/_/sbas pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma/_/shin tu brtan ma stobs chen ma/_/rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug_/de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar/_/slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang /_/phyag 
[\[240b.7\]]drug bde ba 'phel ba can/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhugs/_/dri med pad+ma dkar mo'i mdog_/zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/_/g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni/_/'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim/_/de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag gsum la/_/pad+ma 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]zhags pa rin po che/_/'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad/_/pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od/_/spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang /_/rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming /_/'di dag sngags ni [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal/_/
[\[241a.2\]]sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni/_/de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog_/lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog_/rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas/_/'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten/_/mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i bde bas myos/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i 
[\[241a.3\]]go 'phang mchog_/mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed/_/de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang /_/sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni/_/dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni/_/bla ma'i lung las 
[\[241a.4\]]yang dag skyes/_/de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni/_/'bad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo bzhi rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya 
[\[241a.5\]]ba/_/'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rtsa rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor mchog_/dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas/_/mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las/_/yid la byed pas der mi 'gro/_/sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa/_/de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal/_/
[\[241a.6\]]de yis de ni rab tu sad/_/de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas/_/rab sad de yis sad byas nas/_/lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las/_/de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs/_/nub pa yang ni bshad par bya/_/yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med/_/yid la 
[\[241a.7\]]byed nas gzhan du gnas/_/bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad/_/rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/lha rnams yang dag sad par ni/_/de yi phyir ni mi 'gyur te/_/snying gi dbus nas bde ba'i dngos/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'od/_/gzung dang 'dzin 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]pa'i gzugs kyis kyang /_/de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te/_/'od 'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma/_/gsal ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma/_/mig la sogs pa la brten nas/_/phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o/_/mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo/_/gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma 
[\[241b.2\]]gsal/_/phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o/_/drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod/_/lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang /_/ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin/_/de yang yang dag nub pa ni/_/de yang mchog tu nub pa'o/_/'char ba nub pa rnams chad pa/_/go 'phang mchog 
[\[241b.3\]]tu shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o/_/'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog_/'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal 
[\[241b.4\]]rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/dga' ba skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog_/de ni rtsa yi 'khor 
[\[241b.5\]]lo la/_/slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis/_/'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor/_/rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa/_/mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang /_/rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten/_/bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab/_/de rnams dga' ba'i rim pa'o/_/chu khams 
[\[241b.6\]]khong du chud pa can/_/pad+ma'i snal ma lta bu yi/_/de nas de yis khyab byas shing /_/bde ba chen po phan par byed/_/'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis/_/cha bzhi pa yi yi ge ha/_/shin tu phra ba'i cha dag tu/_/khyab pa brten gyi tshul du gnas/_/rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las/_/
[\[241b.7\]]rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thob/_/phreng ba'i bdag nyid rmad byung ba'o/_/ro gcig pa yi go 'phang 'thob/_/rim gyis so sor nyams myong las/_/sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las/_/rim gyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du/_/sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus/_/dga' ba 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bzhi ni de la brjod/_/rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las/_/go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang yang dag 
[\[242a.2\]]nyon/_/rdo rje brtan pa'i lus kyis ni/_/rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun/_/de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya/_/stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/_/rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba/_/byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes/_/bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel/_/rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/_/stong 
[\[242a.3\]]phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/_/khrag 'bab par ni shes par bya/_/nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can/_/rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/_/stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/_/rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni/_/lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis/_/de nyid nyi shu rtsa 
[\[242a.4\]]bzhir brjod/_/thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid/_/grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod/_/re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo /_/thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dod pa/_/gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las/_/gnas rnams kyi ni grangs su 'gyur/_/slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba 
[\[242a.5\]]na/_/gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'ang ni/_/nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang /_/thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis/_/rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni/_/nang du 'gro bar shes par bya/_/g.yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab/_/g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab/_/dbus ni rlung rgyu 
[\[242a.6\]]ba yis ni/_/mi sad byed par shes par bya/_/la la nA dang ra sa nA/_/a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming /_/de rnams spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad/_/gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'gro/_/thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir/_/rim gyis grangs ni 
[\[242a.7\]]bdun cu gnyis/_/slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis/_/re re 'ang stong stong dbye ba yis/_/rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/_/gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni/_/sbyor bas gcig pa nyid du 'gro/_/dang po las ni rnal 'byor phas/_/phra ba 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]de ni shes par dka'/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni/_/thig le nA da rnam par spangs/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi gsang ba/_/srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang /_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang /_/dus kyi rtsa ni rnam par bshad/_/ro gcig go 'phang bdag nyid can/_/rnal 
[\[242b.2\]]'byor ma yi rgyud las shes/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid/_/rtsa rnams sdom pa 
[\[242b.3\]]'char ba ni/_/gang gis shes na rtag tu ni/_/mchog tu dga' ba nyams myong ba/_/lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed/_/lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyor/_/lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa/_/de nyid gsum sbyor dri ma med/_/de gsum cig char bdag nyid sdom/_/
[\[242b.4\]]'jig rten gsum du khyab cing phra/_/lus kun la ni yang dag brten/_/ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems/_/gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde/_/rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya/_/khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung ba/_/mchog rab mchog dang phra ba 
[\[242b.5\]]dang /_/rang byung ye shes mi zad pa/_/byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab/_/rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas/_/cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni/_/de yi dbus su rtsa gsum ste/_/gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad/_/zla ba 
[\[242b.6\]]nyi ma me rgyu ba/_/'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab/_/ji ltar shing rtsa cung zad cig_/sa la brtan par gnas pa na/_/sdong bu yal ga 'dab phre'u/_/sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab/_/de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas/_/phung po khams la sogs tshogs 
[\[242b.7\]]la/_/mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos/_/de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum/_/mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang /_/dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]gsum/_/sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni/_/gsum phye dam tshig mtshan nyid dang /_/stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni/_/rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni/_/rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do/_/rlung dang bad kan mkhris 
[\[243a.2\]]pa ni/_/gsum phye khams ni bsdus pa'o/_/'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams/_/'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nyid do/_/rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig_/rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro/_/de ni sprul pa gsum du gsal/_/sku gsung 
[\[243a.3\]]thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/gang tshe de la de sbyor ba/_/de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do/_/gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na/_/de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do/_/gang phyir srog gi rlung bcom na/_/de tshe 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin/_/rtsa yi gtso bo'ang nyid rnams ni/_/gsum po nges pa 
[\[243a.4\]]zhes ni bya/_/rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis 
[\[243a.5\]]nyon/_/rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni/_/dus kyi glags ni btsal ba na/_/ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes/_/bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid/_/rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong /_/don ni shes par mi shes shing /_/rlung tsam gcig pus rmongs pa'o/_/kun 
[\[243a.6\]]gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni/_/bag chags nang du rnam par spyod/_/bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung /_/bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las/_/nang gi bag chags bsgos pa yis/_/de rnams zla mtshan dus su ni/_/mngal gyi rtsal 'jug pa na/_/rdo rje khu 
[\[243a.7\]]khrag zhu thig le/_/'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang /_/kun gzhi las ni rnam shes skye/_/ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin/_/kun gzhi rnam shes bag chags las/_/rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skye/_/nyon mongs can nyid srog rlung nyid/_/skad cig gcig la yang dag 'gro/_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]thog mar 'pho ba'i dus su ni/_/nya yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur/_/'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su ni/_/slar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni/_/steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis/_/srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro/_/thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la/_/rus sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur/_/
[\[243b.2\]]de nas 'pho ba gsum pa la/_/khrag dang khu ba zos pa na/_/thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs/_/bskams nas kun du rlung ni 'byung /_/steng du kha bltas nas ni gnas/_/phag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur/_/slar yang 'pho ba bzhi pa la/_/khrag dang khu ba 
[\[243b.3\]]bsgos pa ni/_/gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas/_/'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro/_/seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni/_/khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed/_/de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la/_/khrag dang khu ba 'phel nas ni/_/mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas ni/_/me yi gzugs 
[\[243b.4\]]red rim bzhin 'gro/_/mnyam gnas rlung gis khyab byed spro/_/gang gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur/_/phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na/_/de ltar gsungs pa de las slar/_/'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la/_/sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang /_/khyab byed rlung gis 
[\[243b.5\]]klu rlung spro/_/rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed/_/de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la/_/chu yi khams dang sna bug dod/_/klu yi rlung gis rus sbal rlung /_/spros nas gnyis su med par sprod/_/de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la/_/me dang sna yi bu ga 'byung /_/rus sbal rlung 
[\[243b.6\]]gis rtsangs rlung spro/_/rang gi rang bzhin shes par byed/_/de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la/_/rlung gi khams dang ro ni tshor/_/rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos/_/lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed/_/de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la/_/lha sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal spro/_/rlung kun bsdus 
[\[243b.7\]]pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/dgu pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams/_/phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can/_/rtsa dang rgyu ma rgyus pa'i sbubs/_/sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed/_/lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang /_/gcig tu reg pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin/_/rab sad mchog ni 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]nam mkha' la/_/'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa bcu/_/de lta bu nyid bshad par bya/_/'pho ba bcu ni sa bcu ste/_/rim pa yi ni rnam par shes/_/ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por 
[\[244a.2\]]brjod/_/byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/mgo bo'i skra ni bregs pa dang /_/phru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos/_/dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar/_/spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag_/mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[244a.3\]]'chang /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/_/ye shes chen po legs par sad/_/'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas/_/dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med/_/skyed byed sha ni 'jig par byed/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes che/_/rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga myong byed/_/dngos po 
[\[244a.4\]]thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod/_/'di gnyis mchog ni gsang ba ste/_/gang du yang ni ma gsungs so/_/rlung skyes pa yi nges pa ni/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rlung 
[\[244a.5\]]gis bskyed pa skyes bu skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni/_/gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/_/'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni/_/phan tshun du ni yang dag sad/_/skye ba'i rim ltar 
[\[244a.6\]]thim par 'gyur/_/rlung rnams yang dag skye ba ni/_/phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin/_/thog mar lo bcu lon nas ni/_/rgyags pas myos pa'i rlung skyes na/_/gzhu las rgyal ba'i rlung zos te/_/rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin/_/de rjes lo bcu phyin pa ni/_/rgyags chu 
[\[244a.7\]]rlung gis yang dag skye/_/lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni za/_/rlung gi rim pa snga ma bzhin/_/gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa na/_rgyags pa'i chu rlung skye bar 'gyur/_/rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung ni za/_/de nas gzhan yang lo bcu phyin/_/lo las skyes pa'i rim pa yis/_/btang 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bzung rlung ni chen po yis/_/rus sbal rlung ni za bar byed/_/klu yi rlung dang btang bzung rlung /_/stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/dus gzhan lo bcur phyin pa na/_/gnod par byed par mi nus te/_/stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/gang gis gang la 
[\[244b.2\]]gnod pa ni/_/byed pa nyid du mi nus so/_/bcu de gzhan du phyin pa'o/_/long ba btang bzung stobs chen thob/_/klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za/_/de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na/_/khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel/_/rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis/_/btang bzung 
[\[244b.3\]]rlung ni za bar byed/_/de rjes lo bcu lon pa na/_/myos chu rlung ni bkug nas ni/_/tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel/_/de yi btang bzung klu za byed/_/de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa'i/_/lo la btang bzung rlung stobs skyes/_/myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed/_/
[\[244b.4\]]me dang rlung ni 'phel bar byed/_/btang bzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas/_/longs spyod chen po 'phel gyur nas/_/de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas/_/rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur/_/chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa na/_/khyab cing sgrib byas rim pa las/_/de las lo bcu gzhan 
[\[244b.5\]]du phyin/_/chu shing 'bras bu bzhin du med/_/rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur/_/las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni/_/de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis/_/zla ba'am ni nyin zhag gzhan/_/tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni/_/srog zad par ni shes par bya/_/mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i 
[\[244b.6\]]rgyud las ni/_/shin tu rgyas par shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi rim pas srog zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/mtshan nyid chen po ye 
[\[244b.7\]]shes mchog_/bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mchog_/snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa/_/gang phyir mkha' 'gro mas bsdus pa/_/de phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro brjod/_/lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa/_/nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/_/ye shes chen 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]po'i me 'byung ba/_/kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed/_/'char bas phung po rnam rtog ni/_/bsregs byas bar chad med pa'i lus/_/rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni/_/bsdus nas slar yang rang bzhin gyis/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni/_/snying 
[\[245a.2\]]rjes der ni slar yang sdud/_/de ltar gang la phye leb bzhin/_/'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed/_/rlung gi de nyid mngon sbyor bas/_/sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni/_/sreg pa nyid du the tshom med/_/mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud 
[\[245a.3\]]las ni/_/rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na/_/mkha' 'gro ye shes rgyas par ni/_/rnal 'byor bsten pas rig par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[245a.4\]]bshad kyis nyon/_/rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod/_/nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni/_/brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/_/rlung rnams de ni rnam rtog ni/_/gang phyir rnam par gcod par byed/_/rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi/_/thams cad stong pa'i ngo bor byed/_/the 
[\[245a.5\]]tshom thog mar sbyor ba drug_/rnal 'byor rig pas mchog tu bsgrub/_/de nas dbyangs med yi ge ha/_/shin tu rgya che bzlas par bya/_/gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing /_/bde ba skye ba ster bar byed/_/de yis rnam rtog thams cad ni/_/skad cig gis ni gcod par 
[\[245a.6\]]byed/_/rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang /_/shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/_/de yi dbye ba [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis/_/dang po sbyor ba bsgom par bya/_/bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/_/de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni/_/rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga/_/
[\[245a.7\]]de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog_/rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis so/_/de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus pa yis/_/mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/_/de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog_/rdzogs rim rnal 'byor yan lag ni/_/rnam par rtog 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]pa 'joms byed pa/_/phra ba'i de nyid bla na med/_/cho ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa/_/blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin bsgom/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed/_/rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che/_/de nyid chen po rmad 'byung che/_/nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni/_/rnam 
[\[245b.2\]]rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed/_/don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis/_/dngos med ngo bo gcig pa dang /_/stong nyid bsten pa mngon par zhen/_/sgom pa nges par brtan par byed/_/sgrub pos yang dag bsgoms byas na/_/rdo rje bzlas rim bla na med/_/de yi rim bzhin 
[\[245b.3\]]ye shes mchog_/thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/rnam rtog med pa'i 
[\[245b.4\]]rlung shar na/_/gang shes rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/rang dngos go 'phang bzang po 'thob/_/rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag_/sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i 
[\[245b.5\]]ye shes che/_/gnas pa med cing dri ma med/_/phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas/_/thig le nA da rnam par spangs/_/kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang /_/bdag byin brlab pa'i mtshan nyid gcig_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol/_/bag chags rnam rtog 
[\[245b.6\]]rnam par spangs/_/tshigs dang mdud pa'i lam dang ni/_/sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs/_/stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid do/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha/_/rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/_/bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyi/_/rgyud rnams la 
[\[245b.7\]]yang bklag mi bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po/_/bshad par bya ba dam tshig mchog_/man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin/_/thog ma nyid du bshad par rigs/_/de yi rim pa'i rjes 'gro shes/_/bla ma brgyud pa'i go 'phang mchog_/rnal 'byor chen 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni/_/de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon/_/yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor/_/
[\[246a.2\]]rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur/_/shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa bla na med/_/rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir/_/brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim/_/de las skye dang rga dang na/_/'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur/_/yul rnams dngos po 
[\[246a.3\]]med pa yis/_/sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir/_/de nyid 'di la spyod pa'i phyir/_/dngos su yul rnams dngos med phyir/_/dbang po rnams ni skye ba min/_/de las gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor/_/dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid/_/de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur 
[\[246a.4\]]te/_/'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rton/_/de rnams nub pa las ni zhi/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/kun kyang rtsa yi 'khor lor 'gyur/_/de nyid kun chos nang du khyab/_/stong nyid bsgom pa rnal 'byor las/_/yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid/_/nges pa ru ni 
[\[246a.5\]]shes pa zhes/_/rig pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyong ba'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/spyod drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni/_/
[\[246a.6\]]ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten/_/rnam pa drug po de las phyed/_/de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag_/brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni/_/de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal/_/zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu/_/stong nyid rlung gi 
[\[246a.7\]]'khor lor gnas/_/phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min/_/chu yi zla ba lta bur snang /_/sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma/_/thams cad rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min/_/me yi 'khor lo 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]stong nyid khyab/_/dbus na thig le lta bu ni/_/mi 'gyur kun du 'gro ba dang /_/rang byung kun la khyab pa dang /_/bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed/_/dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs/_/'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa/_/gcig tu byas na skyed par 
[\[246b.2\]]byed/_/mi shigs nA da'i go 'phang can/_/rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang /_/tshangs pa la sogs pha mes dang /_/'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ba min/_/yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin/_/'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs/_/
[\[246b.3\]]grangs bral zad med skye ba med/_/lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa/_/sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba/_/chags bral chags pa med pa dang /_/bya ba byed dang gnas med pa/_/dpe med gnas pa med pa dang /_/srog dang 
[\[246b.4\]]rtsol ba rnam par spangs/_/lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog_/de lta bu yang rnyed par dka'/_/longs spyod 'khor lo mchog tu gnas/_/'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog_/mchog tu khong du chud gyur pa/_/rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs/_/rten cing 
[\[246b.5\]]'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyi/_/chang gi ro yis myos pa bzhin/_/mchog ni dang po ma lus pa/_/dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas/_/thog ma tha ma lhag par gnas/_/mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med/_/mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs/_/zhi ba mi 'jigs 
[\[246b.6\]]brjod du med/_/rang bzhin nyams myong rang ngo bo/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas/_/bla ma brgyud pa las ni thob/_/de ltar ye shes bye brag che/_/rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug_/steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor/_/rnal 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags/_/rnal 
[\[246b.7\]]'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom pa ni/_/rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes/_/grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]na med/_/dus ni dus tshod zhes ni bshad/_/bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni/_/dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang /_/rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas/_/sna yi bu ga las byung nas/_/phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char/_/nang du sdud par dus bzang 
[\[247a.2\]]gsungs/_/'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod/_/dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog_/dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni/_/rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang /_/gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po/_/rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste/_/de ltar gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid/_/
[\[247a.3\]]dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /_/lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste/_/dga' dang bral ba ngan dus so/_/dus kyi mtshan nyid de ltar bshad/_/'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus/_/dus bzang por ni yongs su grags/_/ldang ba yang ni dus ngan te/_/de ltar 
[\[247a.4\]]dus kyi mtshan nyid do/_/dus ni khams rnams thams cad de/_/mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog_/ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te/_/dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin/_/dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba/_/bzhi pa'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni/_/brjod bya 
[\[247a.5\]]rjod byed las grol ba/_/dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/chags dang chags bral nges grol ba/_/bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs/_/phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi gzhi/_/dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med/_/grangs ni rnal 
[\[247a.6\]]'byor rnam par spangs/_/de nyid dus su nges bshad de/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dus dang dus tshad rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya 
[\[247a.7\]]ba/_/gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyon cig_/gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/_/phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsten/_/gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad/_/rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing /_/bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming /_/zhal nas brgyud 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pa'i rim pa rnams/_/mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che/_/rnam rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/_/phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa/_/rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslabs pa/_/mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid/_/ye shes 
[\[247b.2\]]chen po'i ro 'bebs pa/_/de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan/_/nam mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo/_/bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed/_/bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das/_/shes dang shes bya rnam par bral/_/sgom dang 
[\[247b.3\]]bsgom bya rnam par spangs/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong /_/kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/_/dngos po kun gyi go 'phang gsal/_/'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi/_/chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/_/dam tshig chen po la gnas pa/_/grangs 
[\[247b.4\]]med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos/_/dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud/_/de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal/_/gzhan ni gang du'ang ma gsungs pa/_/rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog_/rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal 
[\[247b.5\]]rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang mchog_/chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams/_/chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod/_/
[\[247b.6\]]kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang /_/kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang /_/phung po lnga nyid 'byung ba lnga/_/yul dang skye mched rnam shes dang /_/de dag yang dag ldan chos kun/_/bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug ste/_/de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams/_/khyab cing 
[\[247b.7\]]spyod yul ma yin pa/_/ji ltar til gyi til mar dang /_/ji ltar shing la me bzhin du/_/de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la/_/khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no/_/nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/_/chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog_/gzung dang 'dzin 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]pa'i kun rtog gis/_/khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no/_/stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gsal bar mthong /_/chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod/_/b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog_/gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan/_/
[\[248a.2\]]ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod/_/b+ha ga chos rnams su yang bshad/_/dbyings ni byang chub sems su gsungs/_/khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yi/_/rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar bshad/_/dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis/_/chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas/_/don dam 
[\[248a.3\]]gcig pu'i de nyid shes/_/lag mthil skyu ru bzhag pa bzhin/_/mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang /_/rang rig shin tu dri ma med/_/dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni/_/rtag tu de nyid mthong zhing snang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal/_/de ltar shin tu 
[\[248a.4\]]rgyas par bshad/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas/_/sbyor bral shes pa rmad du byung /_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo 
[\[248a.5\]]rjes gsungs/_/rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog_/de yi don du bshad kyis nyon/_/ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya/_/rdo rje mi phyed zhes ni gsungs/_/ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog_/rtsa lnga yi ni nam mkhar rten/_/rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo/_/sa dang chu 
[\[248a.6\]]dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/_/rtsa yi nam mkha'i cha yi gzugs/_/bla ma brgyud las shes par bya/_/a~M ra~M la~M ba~M ya~M sa bon/_/brjod pa rtse ni lnga rnams te/_/'bad pa yis ni shes par bya/_/rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/pad+ma 
[\[248a.7\]]lte ba'i dbus gnas pa/_/thig ler bshad pa 'gro ba med/_/dam tshig gnas ni shes pa dang /_/bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang /_/rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/_/de ni rdo rjer yongs su grags/_/me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang /_/so sor rtog dad 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bya nan tan/_/rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin no/_/de yi ngo bo yongs su shes/_/rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog_/nam mkhar cher gnas zhi ba dang /_/rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi/_/
[\[248b.2\]]bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdus pa/_/de tshe rigs ni rnam 
[\[248b.3\]]pa lnga/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs/_/rnal 'byor spros pa dbye ba yis/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/_/rgyud du grags pa dbye ba yi/_/mthar thug de ni yang dag gsungs/_/de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang /_/rigs kyi dbye ba 
[\[248b.4\]]brgya ru gsungs/_/sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod/_/gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong /_/sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no/_/sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang /_/sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis/_/sna tshogs 
[\[248b.5\]]nyon mongs mnan nas ni/_/'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i phyir/_/gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni/_/sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis/_/dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis/_/don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid/_/rgyud gzhan 
[\[248b.6\]]rnams su gsungs pa yi/_/sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/_/de ni bsdus na dbye bar 'gyur/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rim pa yis/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/_/de la stong phrag sum cu drug_/lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis/_/rim 
[\[248b.7\]]pa'i dbye ba de las kyang /_/stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang /_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi/_/sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa las/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang /_/sum cu dang ni dgu yang ngo /_/de las lnga dang de phyir gsum/_/
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid de/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/gzhan nas gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro/_/de yang 'od gsal go 'phang la'o/_/rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/_/gnyis med ye shes dri ma med/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi 
[\[249a.2\]]bdag nyid mchog_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rigs kyi dbye ba'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med/_/chos dang las dang 
[\[249a.3\]]dam tshig dang /_/phyag rgya chen po mngon par brjod/_/las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis/_/kun nas rgyas btab lta bur gnas/_/gang yang 'di ni las gang gis/_/de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur/_/chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab 
[\[249a.4\]]nas/_/dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyas btab pa/_/stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyong ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ni/_/yongs su dag pa'i mdzad pa yis/_/de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med/_/phyag 
[\[249a.5\]]rgya chen po zhes ni brjod/_/las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na/_/sngags pa las ni thob par skye/_/bla mas shes rab dbang bskur na/_/ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos don/_/snying rje'i bsam pas gsal ba ni/_/de las nges 
[\[249a.6\]]par thob nas ni/_/chos nyid sgo nas nges par byed/_/de ltar de nyid de ye shes/_/de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid/_/dam tshig la zhen mkhas pa dang /_/rlung gis de nyid pha rol son/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i don bslab pa/_/ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang /_/
[\[249a.7\]]mig yangs ma yi bu mo rnyed/_/gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/_/ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la/_/phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed/_/de nas de nyid thob pa na/_/phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do/_/de nyid bde chen go 'phang ni/_/kun du rtog pa 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]thams cad spangs/_/stong nyid ye shes dri ma med/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med/_/rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye bas/_/phyag rgya drug tu yang dag bshad/_/ya~M ra~M la~M ba~M a~M ha~M dang /_/lha mo rnams 
[\[249b.2\]]kyi rim pa las/_/mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig pa/_/rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya/_/gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan mo/_/sme sha can dang gar mkhan ma/_/ro bsregs mo dang bram ze mo/_/grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas/_/bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya/_/
[\[249b.3\]]khrus mkhan rin chen rigs las skyes/_/gdol pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes/_/de bzhin gar mkhan las kyi rigs/_/ro bsregs ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs/_/sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs/_/ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su brjod/_/'di ni 
[\[249b.4\]]rigs ni drug tu 'gyur/_/bram ze mo ni ma yin te/_/khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod/_/gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes/_/sme sha can ni chung mar grags/_/ro bsregs mo ni mna' ma ste/_/sgyug mo gdol ba ma zhes bya/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/rnam rtog 
[\[249b.5\]]med pas brjod par bya/_/gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na/_/dngos grub kun la dus kun du/_/sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni/_/sring mo dag tu yang dag bshad/_/lus ni bu mor shes par bya/_/srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal/_/mna' ma thur du sel ba'i rlung /_/dbu ma'i rlung 
[\[249b.6\]]ni sgyug mor brjod/_/ma ni rgyags pa'i rtsa yi cha/_/sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog_/sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa/_/spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas/_/bu mo khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa/_/de ni phyed phyed lhag par gnas/_/chung ma gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/_/de nyid kyi ni dbus na 
[\[249b.7\]]gnas/_/mna' ma mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa/_/mgrin pa'i gnas su lhag par gnas/_/ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad/_/chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod/_/me ni bu mor shes par bya/_/rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags/_/mna' ma nam mkha' ru ni bshad/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]sgyug mo nam mkha' chen po'o/_/mngar bar gyur pas ma dang ni/_/skyur ba sring mo ru ni brjod/_/kha ba rang gi bu mo dang /_/lan tshwa chung mar yongs su grags/_/bska ba sgyug mor shes par bya/_/tsha ba mna' mar yongs su grags/_/de dag 'bad pas 'dod 
[\[250a.2\]]bya zhing /_/dngos grub 'dod pas bsten par bya/_/las kyi phyag rgya dbye ba 'di/_/de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog_/dam tshig de dang rtog par 'jug_/phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi/_/ye shes mchog ni bla na med/_/de ltar phyag rgya'i go 
[\[250a.3\]]'phang gsal/_/rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yul lo/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad/_/phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid 
[\[250a.4\]]ni/_/rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad/_/rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang /_/rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs/_/'khor ba las brgal 'du shes gsungs/_/shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang /_/de ltar phung por rab tu grags/_/sa ni gti mug dga' mar 
[\[250a.5\]]bshad/_/de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'/_/me ni chags la dga' ba dang /_/de bzhin rlung ni rdo rje dga'/_/nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug_/gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang /_/sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste/_/dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang /_/ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad/_/reg bya'i rdo rje 
[\[250a.6\]]reg byar 'gyur/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_/mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang /_/rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang /_/sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dang /_/lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang /_/lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel brjod/_/yid ni kun du bzang po dang /_/rtsa ni byams pa 
[\[250a.7\]]ru ni brjod/_/ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid/_/khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad/_/de bzhin lus kyi chos rnams ni/_/khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad/_/de ltar lus kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs/_/phung po la sogs skye mched sogs/_/rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]de ni/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid/_/
[\[250b.2\]]rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi/_/ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa/_/bde ba chen po'i skal ba che/_/ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can/_/sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra/_/chen po'i chen po nam mkha' che/_/phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes/_/rnam rtog 
[\[250b.3\]]med pa'i go 'phang ste/_/mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/_/rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/_/nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med/_/rang bzhin med cing gzhi dang bral/_/gnyis med bdag med brjod du med/_/rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa/_/phung po khams dang 
[\[250b.4\]]skye mched cha'i/_/kun rtog chos ni yongs su spangs/_/sgom dang bsgom bya snyoms 'jug dang /_/rim pa gnyis ni rnam par spangs/_/rnam shes ye shes dang bral ba/_/sngags dang bzlas brjod bsnyen pa spangs/_/dngos po kun gyi gnas las brgal/_/ye shes chen po 
[\[250b.5\]]rab gsol ba/_/dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya/_/phyag rgya chen po bla na med/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/
[\[250b.6\]]nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni/_/gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa/_/rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par/_/gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che/_/de nyid rnal 'byor kun las bsgyings/_/'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs/_/dbyangs 'gyur ba dang ldibs pa dang /_/mdog 
[\[250b.7\]]'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang /_/snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams/_/dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi chu/_/rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' ni/_/khong stong 'dar bar skyed par byed/_/rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sad na/_/rab tu rngul byed skyed par byed/_/de bzhin rgyags pas g.yengs 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]pa'i rtsa/_/khong stong ba spu ldang bar byed/_/de bzhin na sa ra yi rtsa/_/khong stong tsheg ni ldib par byed/_/rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/_/kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed/_/mgo bo chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/_/brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par
