[\[251a.2\]]byed/_/'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa bye na/_/ba spu langs pa skyed par byed/_/dga' ba chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/_/khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed/_/myos pa chen po'i rtsa bye na/_/srog gi rlung ni thim par byed/_/brgyal dang sems med bde ba che/_/de nas dran pa nyams 
[\[251a.3\]]par 'gyur/_/sgeg pa la sogs nyams su shes/_/sngar bshad rim pas sad par byed/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHde bzhin du/_/a la la la la ho sngags/_/rab tu bskul bas rgyas nas su/_/nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes/_/de ltar de ni dbye brgyud pa'o/_/rnal 
[\[251a.4\]]'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nyams kyi dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten/_/gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba'i 
[\[251a.5\]]mtshan nyid ni/_/a ha~M 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag_/de ni yongs zad grol ba'o/_/a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog_/lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/_/kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med/_/thogs med snying stobs zhes bya ba/_/
[\[251a.6\]]thabs cig tu ni skye bar byed/_/srid dang srid rtse brtse ba med/_/sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang ni/_/don kun byed pa la mkhas pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o/_/ha~M ni dngos po dang bral ba/_/lus la gnas kyang lus bskyed min/_/dbang po 
[\[251a.7\]]las 'das mi gsal ba/_/rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing /_/gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa/_/dngos po thams cad nub pa dang /_/chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid/_/sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung /_/don kun 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]byed pa dang bral ba/_/stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid/_/rjod dang brjod bya rnam par grol/_/de yang yi ge ha~M du grags/_/thams cad a ha~M kun la khyab/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/a ha~M dngos po thams cad la/_/
[\[251b.2\]]khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas/_/a ha~M dang bral skyes bu ni/_/rtsa ba bcad pa'i shing bzhin no/_/ha~M ni dpral ba'i skra mtshams na/_/a ni lte bar yang dag gnas/_/'dir ni a las zla bar bshad/_/'od zer stong 'gyed pa yi ha~M/_/'dir yang a yi ming la brten/_/rten 
[\[251b.3\]]pa'i ha~M du rab tu grags/_/a ni srog gi rlung du bshad/_/de bzhin thur sel ha~M du brjod/_/de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste/_/des na a ha~M zhes par grags/_/rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni/_/a ha~M gang du gnas pa med/_/gzhan ni 'ga' zhig 'di la 
[\[251b.4\]]yang /_/don dam par ni dmigs su med/_/de ltar a ha~M nga yis bshad/_/rgyud rnams kun du rnyed par dka'/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las a ha~M gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[251b.5\]]bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni/_/rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes/_/stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur/_/mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir/_/stong nyid bsgom par yongs su gsungs/_/nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni/_/kun du rtog 
[\[251b.6\]]pa'i gnyen po dang /_/phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa/_/phyi nas stong pa nyid du 'dod/_/phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba/_/nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang /_/phyi rol du yang mi rtog pa/_/'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni/_/stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad/_/snod kyi 'jig rten dang 
[\[251b.7\]]bral ba/_/chen po stong pa nyid du brjod/_/ye shes gang gis de stong par/_/mthong ba de yang stong par brjod/_/me long ye shes rdzogs pa la/_/rjes su dmigs par byed phyir ro/_/de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa/_/dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid/_/don dam par 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i dngos/_/shes pa don dam stong pa nyid/_/'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyi/_/dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_/rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad/_/yang dag byang chub 'dus ma byas/_/rgyu 
[\[252a.2\]]mtshan yang ni dmigs su med/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/_/'dus ma byas pa'i stong nyid gsungs/_/sems can don du smon lam sogs/_/rang dga' sogs pa dmigs pa med/_/shin tu stong pa nyid du bshad/_/kun rtog thams cad rnam 
[\[252a.3\]]par spangs/_/mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs/_/thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyi/_/'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid/_/rlom sems med par de brjod do/_/thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid/_/mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med/_/dge ba'i 
[\[252a.4\]]bdag nyid mi stong ba/_/rlom sems med pa zhes bshad do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/_/'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni/_/bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i/_/de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal/_/mtshan dang dpe byad 
[\[252a.5\]]la sogs pa/_/skru gzugs de yi yon tan ni/_/gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/_/byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid/_/spyod pa la yang rlom sems med/_/chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad/_/bdag dang skyes 
[\[252a.6\]]ba'i chos rnams ni/_/sgro btags dngos po med pa'i mchog_/'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod/_/dngos med stong pa nyid du gsungs/_/ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid/_/de ltar dngos po med shes pa/_/slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni/_/dngos po med 
[\[252a.7\]]pa stong nyid 'dod/_/de ltar stong nyid dbye ba yang /_/bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir/_/rgyu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs/_/bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]dgu ba'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu/_/rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos/_/lus rnams la ni khyab pa dang /_/phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus/_/'khor lo drug la khyab pa dang /_/chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir/_/ring 
[\[252b.2\]]ba ma yin nye ba min/_/de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med/_/stong pa nyid ni don dam mo/_/rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad/_/srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid ni/_/sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa/_/spyan gsum po la phyag drug mchog_/rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas/_/g.yon pa 
[\[252b.3\]]dril bu pad+ma dang /_/ral gri shin tu rnon po dang /_/phyar ba [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bsnams/_/A li kA li las byung ba/_/zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/sna tshogs pad rgyas gdan la ni/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/hU~M gi sa bon rdzogs pa dang /_/rdo rje 
[\[252b.4\]]chen po'i rigs las byung /_/kun rtog rnams ni bskyed pa'i rlung /_/rnam par gcod cing thim par byed/_/gnod byed de dag sel bar byed/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam par gcod/_/sgyu ma chen mo stong ba che/_/sangs rgyas sa ni rmad du byung /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[252b.5\]]nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o/_/'di yi sngags ni brjod par bya/_/o~M dang badzra mA le dang /_/de bzhin AHdang hU~M dang gnyis/_/phaT dang swA hA yang dag ldan/_/sngags mchog btus pa bla na med/_/rlung 'phrog de kho na nyid kyis/_/yid kyi rnam rtog sel bar byed/_/
[\[252b.6\]]zhi ba'i gnas dang chu 'gram dang /_/shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_/yang na sum mdor 'bum phrag bcu/_/gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya/_/de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/de yi yon tan gsal bar 
[\[252b.7\]]'byung /_/zhi ba la sogs 'bad mi dgos/_/skad cig gcig la mngon par rtogs/_/de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes/_/dpa' bo gcig bu'i cho ga 'di/_/dpa' mo gcig pu nyid bsgrub pa/_/de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang /_/rnam rtog spangs pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pa/_/shin tu rnam dag mkha' yi dngos/_/rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes 
[\[253a.2\]]gsungs/_/mtshan mo nyin mo'i mtshan nyid ni/_/mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya/_/'byung po thams cad thim nas 'gro/_/mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur/_/zla ba mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi/_/shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya/_/kun rdzob 
[\[253a.3\]]shes byar shes par bya/_/don dam reg bya rnam par spangs/_/reg bya dang bral bde ba gang /_/bde ba mchog de thob par dka'/_/nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad/_/thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang /_/gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma/_/rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por 
[\[253a.4\]]'gyur/_/'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur/_/nyi ma las ni zla ba skye/_/de las gnyis med ngo bor bshad/_/'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur/_/rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam dang /_/chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang /_/mi snang ba dang stong pa'i lus/_/'od gsal ba 
[\[253a.5\]]yi go 'phang zhi/_/gang du yang dag mi gnas so/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mtshan mo nyin mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/A li kA li'i dam tshig ni/_/rgyud 
[\[253a.6\]]rnams gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i/_/rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa yi/_/'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa'i/_/snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan/_/kA li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o/_/snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni/_/snang ba 
[\[253a.7\]]las byung zad pa med/_/dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa/_/A li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o/_/de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba las/_/dbus su skyes pa'i bde ba che/_/A li kA li'i dam tshig ces/_/dgongs pa'i tshig gis bye brag byas/_/shin tu phra ba'i ye 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]shes mchog_/bla ma brgyud las shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las A li kA li rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med/_/snang 
[\[253b.2\]]dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams/_/shes rab rdo rje las byung ba/_/gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas/_/'bags shing gos pa rnam par spangs/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'chi med skyes/_/zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres/_/mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro gang /_/mtshams med 
[\[253b.3\]]'khor ba dag par byed/_/rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog_/phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam mi khyab/_/sems can kun gyi mtshams kyi ni/_/rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang /_/'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad/_/dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs/_/mdud 
[\[253b.4\]]pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu zhi/_/tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam/_/mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba/_/gang phyir steng gi go 'phang gnas/_/la la thig le'i rang ngo bor/_/rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas/_/la lar thog ma la sogs spangs/_/la lar de yang 
[\[253b.5\]]dmigs su med/_/gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can/_/de phyir brjod du med pa'o/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/
[\[253b.6\]]rnam pa nyi shu'i ming tsam ni/_/slob dpon las su yongs su bshad/_/sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa/_/sngon du bsnyen pa sa sbyang dang /_/'byung po bskrad pa nyid dang ni/_/sa gzung nyid dang thig skud ni/_/sbyang dang lhag par gnas pa dang /_/bgegs bskrad de bzhin dkyil 'khor 
[\[253b.7\]]gyi/_/thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang /_/phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang /_/bum pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang /_/khrus dang rab tu sbyang ba dang /_/mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang /_/slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /_/
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin/_/dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol/_/de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las/_/gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla/_/dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya/_/bdud las sdigs mdzub de ni mchog_/yi ge gsum zlos pa la zhe na/_/rdo rje 
[\[254a.2\]]theg pa lhag par grol/_/zhi ba la sogs las gang gis/_/rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas/_/de yi yang dag cho ga yis/_/cho ga mchog ni bya ba yin/_/rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/_/cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya/_/bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i 
[\[254a.3\]]sngags/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog_/stong phrag bcu ni yongs su bzla/_/thog mar mkhas pa ji bzhin du/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/_/sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad/_/de 'og yi ge gsum khrir ni/_/bsam pa kun gyis bzlas byas na/_/yid la 
[\[254a.4\]]'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/_/slob ma rnams kyi dngos grub rgyur/_/skye bos dben pa'i phyag dar byas/_/sa bzung chu ni nye bar bcas/_/grong dang ha cang mi nye zhing /_/ring por yang ni brtsam mi bya/_/shin tu 'jam zhing srog chags med/_/rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu ring /_/
[\[254a.5\]]khang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring /_/yang na bde gshegs rten la ni/_/thog mar sor mo rnams la ni/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod bya/_/khru gang sor ni bzhi pa yis/_/seng ldeng phur pa byas nas ni/_/yi ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru/_/yi ge brgya 
[\[254a.6\]]pa lan bdun dang /_/yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko/_/sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa/_/yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum/_/yang na sems kyis sbyang bar bya/_/de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni/_/yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya/_/o~M ma hA kro d+ha dz+wa lArka/_/hU~M phaT 
[\[254a.7\]]mtha' dang yang dag ldan/_/de ltar lag mthil sngags bkod la/_/'byung po rnams ni bskrad par bya/_/sa la thal mo lan gsum du/_/brdab pa byas nas sngags bzlas te/_/ud gats+tshad lan gnyis brjod/_/sarba b+hu ta gra ha u da gats+tsha/_/yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]brjod/_/badzra sa twa be shad de/_/las ni thams cad par gsungs pa'i/_/gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug_/sa ni yongs su bzung rjes la/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya/_/tsha sgo med cing dri ma bsal/_/mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang /_/me long lta bur 'jam pa 
[\[254b.2\]]dang /_/mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya/_/ba yi lci ba la sogs pa/_/rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya/_/byugs nas de rjes khrus byas la/_/slob dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni/_/dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi/_/mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni/_/'jam pa dang 
[\[254b.3\]]ni sum sgril gyis/_/ras sam yang na gso ma yis/_/yi ge gsum gyis rnam par sbyang /_/thig skud gyis ni kun nas mnyam/_/gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang /_/rdo rje can gyis khru gsum gsum/_/gru bzhi par ni gzung bar bya/_/de yi dbus su lte ba'i cha/_/sgrib pa'i skyon 
[\[254b.4\]]ni spang bar bya/_/sku gdung dang ni rin chen gzhug_/legs par bsangs nas byin gyis brlab/_/yi ge gsum yang swA hA'i mtha'/_/phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar/_/sngags 'di yang ni bzlas par bya/_/brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal/_/tshangs pa'i 
[\[254b.5\]]thig ni btab nas ni/_/yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya/_/de rjes de la me tog char/_/sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya/_/o~M dang a mo g+hA pad+mo/_/de bzhin du ni phyi nas su/_/b+ha su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis/_/d+ha ra Ni maN+Da li hU~M/_/yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang ni/_/lan 
[\[254b.6\]]gsum bar du thig skud la/_/zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya/_/yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya/_/zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rdo rje can gyis mtshams bzhi pa/_/thog mar shar dang byang dang ni/_/ji srid lho dang nub dag dang /_/mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang /_/
[\[254b.7\]]slar yang yang dag gdab par bya/_/shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni/_/nub dang byang gi mtshams su ni/_/thig skud gyis ni tshad gzhal bya/_/zur bzhi dang ni thig skud bya/_/skor thig gsum ni sgo bzhi pa/_/rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes/_/tshangs pa'i thig 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]gnyis btab nas ni/_/de las dbang po'i pho brang ni/_/rnam pa kun gyis yang dag thig_/rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas gsal/_/de la rig pa 'dzin pa bri/_/slar yang rin chen phye ma'am/_/tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang /_/rdzas sam las kyi sbyor 
[\[255a.2\]]ba las/_/rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/_/mi bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs/_/rigs ni dbus su dgod par bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang /_/'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang /_/rim bzhin sku mdog dbye ba yis/_/
[\[255a.3\]]shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod/_/gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang /_/rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin/_/me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/_/ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya/_/sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi/_/gdan bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis/_/'khor dga' zhe sdang 
[\[255a.4\]]dga' bar bcas/_/ka yi phreng gis rnam par brgyan/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/_/g.yon na shes rab ral gri bsnams/_/gzugs dang dbyibs rnams ji bzhin du/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/_/phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs/_/mtshams 
[\[255a.5\]]kyi char ni rnam par dgod/_/shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la/_/byams pa sa yi snying po shar/_/'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje lhor/_/mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug ni/_/kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya/_/sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /_/kun du bzang po byang du dgod/_/zhal 
[\[255a.6\]]gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/_/g.yon na ral gri dgod pa dang /_/phyag na rdo rje dri med pa'i/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan/_/lha mo rnams la zla ba'i gdan/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gsal/_/rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung /_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la 
[\[255a.7\]]sogs dgod/_/shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su/_/gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/_/de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin/_/mi g.yo la sogs mtshams rnams su/_/gshin rje gshed kyi rang ngo bo/_/zhal gsum 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]phyag drug rnam pa can/_/g.yon na ral gri rnam par bsam/_/gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon/_/de bzhin g.yon nas ral gri brjod/_/gnod mdzes de bzhin gtsug tor ni/_/'og dang steng du rnam par dgod/_/khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs/_/de bzhin sna tshogs 
[\[255b.2\]]pad+ma'i gdan/_/de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs/_/nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i/_/ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod/_/de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng /_/ra ba yis ni yongs su bskor/_/rin chen dra ba rnga ma dang /_/lha mo rnams kyi 
[\[255b.3\]]snam bu yis/_/ka ba rta babs 'khor lor mtshan/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyi mtshan pas brgyan/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/_/rnga yab me long la sogs kyis/_/brgyan pa ru ni rnam par bshad/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag brten/_/slob dpon 
[\[255b.4\]]mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba/_/bgegs bskrad pa ni sngon song bas/_/sum+b+ha'i sgra dang ni sum+b+ha/_/thog mar o~M dang ngo mtshar che/_/hU~M gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan/_/shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya/_/
[\[255b.5\]]o~M dang gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na zhes/_/hU~M gnyis phaT dang yang dag ldan/_/blo dang ldan pas lho ru dgod/_/o~M dang gr-ih+NA pa ya gnyis/_/hU~M gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan/_/nub tu yang dag spro bar bya/_/o~M A na ya ho b+ha ga_/bAn dang bid+yA rA dza dang /_/hU~M gnyis dang ni phaT mthar 
[\[255b.6\]]dgod/_/de rjes yang ni byang du dgod/_/'di yis gdug pa bkug nas ni/_/de nas sngags pas phur pa gdab/_/seng ldeng las ni byas pa yi/_/phur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad/_/zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan/_/yi ge brgya pa so sor bzlas/_/sngags kyi 
[\[255b.7\]]chu yis bsangs nas ni/_/phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya/_/o~M dang yi ge g+ha lan gnyis/_/de bzhin g+hA ta ya ni gnyis/_/sarba daSh+TAM phaT zhes dang /_/de bzhin kI la ya gnyis dang /_/sarba pA paM phaT dang ni/_/hU~M gsum badzra kI la ya/_/badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]ya ti/_/kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra dang /_/kI la ya hU~M phaT yi ge'i/_/mtha' can gyi ni phur bus gdab/_/o~M dang badzra mut+ga ra/_/badzra kI la ya A ko Ta/_/ya dang hU~M gnyis phaT mtha' dang /_/sngags dang phur bus brdung ba brjod/_/de rjes bgegs ni 
[\[256a.2\]]'jug la sogs/_/bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang /_/steng du mda' yi dra ba dang /_/'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje dang /_/gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni/_/byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis/_/bum pa bcu 'am yang na drug_/rin chen las byas rnam dag pa/_/sman lnga 
[\[256a.3\]]dang ni 'bras bu lnga/_/'bru lnga la sogs kyis gang ba/_/rin chen lnga dang sna ma sogs/_/lo ma lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/gur gum gla rtsi ga pur dang /_/tsan+dan chu yis gang bar bya/_/me tog la sogs kyis mchod bya/_/rang rang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/_/badzra d+h+r-ig dang dzi 
[\[256a.4\]]na dzig_/rat+na d+h+r-ig dang A ro lika//de bzhin pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags dang /_/lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis/_/'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni/_/bum pa rang gis bskur byas pa/_/de nas spyan drangs nas ni gzhug_/de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas/_/de rjes 
[\[256a.5\]]gzhan la dgod par bya/_/o~M dang ru ru s+phu ru dang /_/de nas dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gsal/_/de bzhin sid d+ha lo tsa ni/_/sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne/_/swA hA zhes ni de la bzlas/_/spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni/_/bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/_/o~M dang shaM ka re dang yang /_/de las 
[\[256a.6\]]shAn+tiM ku ru dang /_/de bzhin g+huT+Ti g+huT+Te dang /_/g+huT+Ti ne dang g+huT+Ti ne/_/g+hA ta ya ni lan gnyis brjod/_/swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya/_/mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs/_/bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/_/o~M dang ka Te bi ka Te/_/ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te/_/ka ro Ta 
[\[256a.7\]]bIr+ye swA hA/_/gos dkar rnam par rdzogs nas ni/_/bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/_/o~M dang tA re tut+tA re/_/tu re swA hA dgod par bya/_/sgrol ma'i rnam pa rdzogs nas ni/_/bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/_/gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]la/_/gcig la las ni thams cad pa/_/oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrANAM/_na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/_ma hA daMSh+T+ro ta ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/_a si mu sa la/_/ba ra shu pA sha hastA ya/_/o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_tiSh+tha tiSh+tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_
[\[256b.2\]]gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/_bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/_sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kAn/_ma hA ga Na pa ti/_/dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_sngags 'di lan bdun bar du ni/_/las ni thams cad pa yin te/_/snying po'i sngags ni bzlas byas la/_/rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya/_/yi 
[\[256b.3\]]ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni/_/lan bdun bar du bsgom par bya/_/brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis/_/yi ge gsum yang bzlas pa ni/_/de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/mchod yon snod du mchod par bya/_/de nas du gu la ras ni/_/ga pur a ga rus bdugs pa/_/bkab 
[\[256b.4\]]nas rang rang sngags dang ni/_/de la rim bzhin lhag gnas bya/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/_/sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag_/rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud/_/A li kA li las byung ba/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/
[\[256b.5\]]gzhal yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i/_/'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas par ni/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/_/bsgoms nas de las 'od zer spro/_/kha dog lnga dang lcags kyu yi/_/de yi spyan drangs 
[\[256b.6\]]slob dpon gyis/_/sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya/_/e h+ye hi dang b+ha ga bA na/_/sa ma ya ma nu smra ra/_/tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya/_/de la a nu sma ra gnyis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang /_/swA hA'i mtha' can lan gsum brjod/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje 
[\[256b.7\]]spyan drang bya/_/dkyil 'khor ba dang yang dag ldan/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drang ba/_/rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba la/_/bzhugs shing yang dag mchod par bya/_/rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin/_/lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod/_/'khor lo 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]mchog ni mchod par bya/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dir/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong /_/yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni/_/dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/_/thugs kyis brtse bar nyer dgongs te/_/mgon pos mchod pa 'di bzhes shig_/
[\[257a.2\]]o~M sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_/bU dzo pa sbrA na yA At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_bla mas yi ge gsum ni brjod/_/lha yi rnam par byas nas ni/_/de rjes bdag la mchod par bya/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/_/pU dzA badzra swa b+hA ba/_/At+ma ko\u0f85 haM zhes ni brjod/_/rang lha'i nga rgyal byas nas 
[\[257a.3\]]ni/_/ji ltar bskyed pa'i yul rnams dang /_/gnod byed kha na ma tho med/_/zhe sdang chen po'i rigs las byung /_/dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod bya zhing /_/de nas lha rnams lhag gnas bya/_/yid 'phrog sna tshogs lha yi gos/_/ga pur a ka ru yis bdug_/
[\[257a.4\]]sngags kyis dag byas dgab par bya/_/o~M dang tiSh+Tha badzra hoH/_/brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o/_/o~M dang s+pha ra badzra hoH/_/blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod/_/me tog spar bas gtor nas ni/_/lhag gnas der ni gshegs par bya/_/rnam pa 
[\[257a.5\]]kun dang yang dag ldan/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong bar bya/_/rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis/_/bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni/_/me long sogs la khrus bya zhing /_/de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma sogs/_/ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis 
[\[257a.6\]]kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/_/de bzhin bdag gi sku khrus gsol/_/cod pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems/_/dbus su yi ge gsum dang spel/_/swA hA'i mtha' can brjod par bya/_/las kyi de nyid cho ga shes/_/de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya/_/o~M 
[\[257a.7\]]sarba A ba ra Na/_/shud+d+ha sarba pA paM dang /_/bi shud+d+ha badzra hU~M phaT/_/swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya/_/pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang /_/yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas/_/nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed/_/'khyud cing bskor bas dor bar bya/_/de nas cho ga 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bzhin legs mchod/_/sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya/_/rang rang sngags dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/_/buSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha dang /_/sa mu dra dang s+pha ra Na/_/sa ma ya dang shri ye AH/_/hU~M gi sngags ni rjes su brjod/_/
[\[257b.2\]]rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni/_/gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin/_/cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' legs bsgyings pa/_/rdo rje slob dpon cho ga shes/_/sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya/_/o~M dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang /_/badzra swA hA'i mtha' can bzlas/_/
[\[257b.3\]]yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni/_/sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni/_/me tog char ni dbab par bya/_/slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas/_/glu yis yang dag bskul nas ni/_/sad pa na ni phyag kyang byas/_/las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag_/gtor ma don kun 
[\[257b.4\]]grub par byed/_/las la byang zhing mkhas pa dang /_/cho ga bzhin du bsgyings bcas dang /_/chang dang sna tshogs sha dang ni/_/de bzhin la du 'o ma dang /_/'bras chan phye yi khur ba dang /_/sran khur bye ba mang po dang /_/mchod yon me tog sogs kyis mchod/_/snod 
[\[257b.5\]]bcu chu yis gang ba la'o/_/gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis/_/snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis/_/de dbus 'byung po kun la ni/_/ngo mtshar chen po'i gtor ma sbyin/_/snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis/_/til bsregs bza' bas khyad par du/_/blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas bya/_/
[\[257b.6\]]'di ni don kun sgrub byed pa/_/o~M brah+ma de ba tA sarba/_in+d+ra da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka/_nA ga gan d+dar+b+ba kuM b+hAN+Da/_yak+Sha b+hU ta ga NAH/_ta thA bre ta ut+ga ta/_pi shA tsi a pa smA ra/_DA ki nI gra ha/_/big+h+nAM mA tr-i ga NA/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ag ni ma ra gra hA/_/o~M dzo b+hak+Sha ma hA te dza/_ma nu Sh+ya nA ma/_bi hiM 
[\[257b.7\]]sa ka/_/mu drA man+t+ra a d+hi d+ho b+h+yaHtsa/_gra hA nak+Sha tra ma nu Sh+ya/_i maM ba liM/_pra gr-i h+nan+tu/_sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu me san d+ha/_sa t+ya ma ne Shu kar me Shu/_sata sa ha ya b+ha ban tu tse/_d+hA na d+hA na/_su par nany+tsa/_d+ha DAn+tu ma ma to Shi ta/_i ti u pA trA Na tro Sha Ni satwA ta nA ma nA sha yan+tu tse/_thog mar o~M 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dang AHhU~M phaT/_/swA hA'i mtha' can las kun byed/_/de ltar sngags 'di snod la bzlas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par rol/_/slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/_/mtshan nyid yon tan gyis brgyan pa/_/tsan+dan ga pur gla rtsi yi/_/chu yis kyang ni khrus 
[\[258a.2\]]byas te/_/dad pa'i chu ni 'chang ba yis/_/sems kyi dri ma rnam par 'khrud/_/bdog ba thams cad gtong bar byed/_/gos gtsang ba ni mchog tu bgo/_/khang pa brtsegs ma byas nas ni/_/ras kyi yol ba kun nas bre/_/yi ge gsum dang yang dag ldan/_/rdo 
[\[258a.3\]]rje can gyis sngags chu ni/_/lan bdun gdong la gtor ba yis/_/las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed/_/de nas sa yi snying po sogs/_/mig la sogs la rnam par dgod/_/sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni/_/dbang po so so la reg pas/_/sngags brjod bya zhing byin 
[\[258a.4\]]gyis brlab/_/lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor gyis/_/o~M dang tsak+Shu tsak+ShuHdang /_/sa man+ta dang cak+ShuHbzlas/_/mai tri satwa lo tsa ne/_/sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_/swA hA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod/_/mthe bo gung mo yang dag sbyar/_/zhabs bsil chu dang mnyes nas 
[\[258a.5\]]ni/_/sngags de lan gsum bzlas par bya/_/slob ma'i mig la so sor ni/_/mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par bya/_/khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i/_/skud pa zhags pa 'dra pa la/_/yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum/_/bzlas nas zhabs bsil chus bsang bya/_/
[\[258a.6\]]skud pa lan gsum dkris pa ni/_/rdo rje gsum ni mdud par ldan/_/dpung ba g.yon par bcings pa ni/_/sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya/_/o~M dang lo tsa ne yi sgra/_/ya ta twad taM saM pra taM/_/mi b+ha bi shud+dI yi sgra/_/ra~M dang rat+na tra yA ya/_/sid+d+hi na ni da da sha/_/
[\[258a.7\]]ya swA hA yi sngags 'di ni/_/theg pa bla med lan bdun bzlas/_/slob ma la ni me tog gtor/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni/_/sor ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yi/_/zur ni gsum du yongs su bya/_/yi ge gsum gyis byin brlab bsgom/_/slob ma'i lag tu gtad 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]par bya/_/o~M dang pra ti badzra dang /_/sa man+ta dang i shwa ri/_/AHhU~M swA hA'i mtha' can sngags/_/bzlas nas slob mas dor bar bya/_/sar 'bab pa yi phur bu ste/_/phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid/_/slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis/_/de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya/_/
[\[258b.2\]]nam langs yang dag bla ma la/_/ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu/_/de la dmigs nas sbyin sreg ni/_/zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas/_/las ni thams cad pa nyid dam/_/bgegs zhi ba yi don du bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas/_/rnal 'byor ji bzhin 
[\[258b.3\]]cho ga bzhin/_/sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni/_/bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya/_/de nas gsol 'debs slob ma ni/_/rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/_/thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/_/mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te/_/dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa 
[\[258b.4\]]bas/_/slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/_/byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/_/mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/_/dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/_/sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/_/thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/_/mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 
[\[258b.5\]]'tshal/_/de nas bla mas de la yang /_/bya dang mi bya gsungs pa ni/_/sems can las kyi srad bus gdab/_/rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim pa dgye/_/'gro ba 'di dag dkyil 'khor te/_/rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o/_/thog mar dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bdag_/rdo rje 
[\[258b.6\]]slob dpon rang nyid bsgom/_/slob ma bdag nyid 'drar dmigs nas/_/de 'og thams cad rab bsgrub bya/_/bla ma bzang la dbang bskur phyir/_/slob mas de rjes gsol ba gdab/_/'di nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la/_/nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab/_/las kyi rlung gis 
[\[258b.7\]]dba' klong 'khrugs/_/bdag byin thugs rje'i rgya mtsho kye/_/mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig_/nyon mongs dbang du bya ba ni/_/bde ba sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyob/_/thugs rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod/_/de 'dra tshig gsan rdo rje can/_/thugs rje'i 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]thugs ni yongs su gang /_/slob ma la ni yongs su gsungs/_/bu khyod dus 'di nas bzung ste/_/rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan/_/rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis zung /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas/_/bu khyod 'di ni bdud rtsi ste/_/srungs 
[\[259a.2\]]shig ma srung na ni sreg_/bsrungs na dngos grub kun 'grub 'gyur/_/nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i klung /_/o~M dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta/_/u da ka dang AHhU~M Tha/_/slob mas bdud rtsi lnga btung bya/_/rdo rje ye shes rmad byung ba'o/_/gsang ba dran na skyon 'gyur phyir/_/
[\[259a.3\]]rdo rje slob ma la ni dbab/_/dri chen dri chu la sogs pa/_/mtshal chen 'bab pa'i bu mo'i gos/_/khrag dang khu bas yang dag bsgos/_/gu gul dang ni rnam par bsres/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]me ni blangs nas su/_/pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/_/der ni thams cad gzhug par bya/_/khro bo rdo rje 
[\[259a.4\]]gsum bdag nyid/_/g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/_/rdo rje 'chang dbang slob ma la/_/rmad byung chen po'i bdug pas bdugs/_/'bab par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/o~M tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha/_/de bzhin A be sha ya hU~M/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod/_/
[\[259a.5\]]slob ma la ni gsal bar dbab/_/badzra sa twa hi ma he/_/bid+ya rA dza ya bid+ya ma he/_/de ltar sngags ni 'di yis kyang /_/slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas/_/rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus/_/dkyil 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba na/_/de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang /_/rgyal 
[\[259a.6\]]ba'i sras kyi yang dag gzhi/_/khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni/_/phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/gnyis po de la bstan par bya/_/slar yang slob mas gsol ba gdab/_/bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/_/rnam rgyal bum pa 
[\[259a.7\]]blangs nas ni/_/pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la/_/de yi dbus su blo bzang po/_/hU~M rdor las byung mi bskyod bsgom/_/rang nyid ye shes sa bon gyi/_/'od zer yang dag bskul bas byung /_/slar yang ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/_/mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]mi bskyod ngo bo de nyid kyis/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po bsgom/_/slob ma'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag_/rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/_/o~M dang ma hA sa twa dang /_/de bzhin I shwa ra taM dang /_/a b+hiShI ny+tsa mi swA hA/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/_/a b+hi She ka sa ma ya/_/shri ye 
[\[259b.2\]]AHhU~M de nas bzla/_/chu yi gting nas slob ma la/_/dbu rgyan dbang bskur don du ni/_/cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/_/sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/_/snying rjes khyab pa ngas byin gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan gnas/_/sa bon tra~M las byung ba yi/_/rin chen 
[\[259b.3\]]'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni/_/ri mo dar sogs cod pan yang /_/slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/_/rat+na mu ku Ta sgra dang /_/de bzhin sgra dang pU dza ya/_/a tiSh+Tha dang AHhU~M dang /_/sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni/_/me tog mgo la sbyin par bya/_/slob 
[\[259b.4\]]ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir/_/slar yang bla ma la gsol gdab/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos/_/rdo rje brtul zhugs ngas byin gyis/_/gang gis ma rig sgo nga 'byed/_/ye shes thob 'gyur nga yis byas/_/hrIHlas pad+ma rdzogs par ni/_/'od dpag med du rnam par 
[\[259b.5\]]bsgom/_/rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin/_/slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod/_/ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur bya/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/_/kun du bzang po'i brtul zhugs brtan/_/dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje yong /_/kha~M las byung ba'i ral gri'am/_/don yod grub 
[\[259b.6\]]pa'i rang ngo bo/_/rdzogs par lag pa g.yon par ni/_/slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang /_/byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i gzhi/_/rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes la/_/rdo rje 
[\[259b.7\]]sems dpa' rang ngo bo/_/rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang /_/bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur/_/rnam par snang mdzad rang ngo bo/_/slob ma'i mgo la lag bzhag ste/_/rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur/_/gzugs kyi phung po rnam par bsgom/_/o~M sarba ta 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]thA ga ta/_/che ge mo zhes badzra sa twaM/_/a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi swA hA/_/phung po lnga yi rnam dag pas/_/thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar/_/dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes/_/rmad byung chen po bshad par bya/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni dag pa 'di/_/dbang bskur lnga ni thob 
[\[260a.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/ma rig pa ni bsal nas ni/_/ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang sbyin/_/sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog_/ngas byin dngos grub ster bar byed/_/de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT/_/
[\[260a.3\]]swA hA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum/_/kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas/_/sngags kyi sku yis dag pa dang /_/bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod/_/bla mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/snying po yi ni ye shes mchog_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[260a.4\]]bsdus pa ni/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang /_/de nas slob ma spyod brtul zhugs/_/sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis/_/gang gi spyod pa rnam dag pa/_/'dod la thugs rje'i gtso bo yis/_/sems can don ni byed pa'i thabs/_/nga yis spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin/_/de 
[\[260a.5\]]nas glegs bam dung la sogs/_/mda' gzhu ral gri 'khor lo dang /_/sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed/_/slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin/_/'di ni kun bzang spyod brtul zhugs/_/bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang /_/sems 
[\[260a.6\]]can kun gyi don gyis byos/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta/_/de bzhin d+h+rI Ta ra twa~M dang /_/d+ha r+ya mi AHhU~M dang /_/de ltar sngags 'di dgod par bya/_/de nas lung bstan thob don du/_/bsam pa dang bas bla ma la/_/da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug_/khyed kyis bdag la lung bstan gsol/_/
[\[260a.7\]]don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod/_/rigs kyi dbang phyug lung bstan bya/_/de nas slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod/_/bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni skye/_/mgon po yang dag bdag dbugs phyung /_/byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan/_/de nas rdo rje chos gos mtha'/_/g.yon pa'i lag 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]pas bzung nas ni/_/g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la/_/dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba/_/nga yis rdo rje gsung bdag khyod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par brjod/_/khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/_/dpal ldan yon tan 
[\[260b.2\]]'byung gnas bdag_/bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal/_/grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs so/_/de nas slob ma don 'dod la/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la stsol/_/de nas ye shes rdor dbang 
[\[260b.3\]]phyug_/ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis/_/spyan drangs sangs rgyas lnga la sogs/_/lha mo'i 'khor lo rim bzhin 'byung /_/de yis ye shes chus bkang pa'i/_/bum pa phyag bsnams de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal/_/rin chen 'dzin dang 
[\[260b.4\]]'khor ba sgrol/_/shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin/_/gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la/_/de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs/_/gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed/_/pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/_/'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas/_/rdo rje slob ma rnam par 
[\[260b.5\]]bsam/_/dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/_/khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/_/gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung /_/sangs rgyas kun ni nga yis sbyin/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs lha mo/_/khro bo rang gi gnas su dgod/_/'jam dpal rnam par bsgoms nas ni/_/ye 
[\[260b.6\]]shes rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/_/o~M dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang /_/badzra swA hA zhes ni dgod/_/blo bzang gis ni sngags brjod nas/_/slob ma la ni me tog gtor/_/de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod/_/slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra/_/thugs rjes khyab pa'i 
[\[260b.7\]]bla ma yis/_/de nas slob ma rjes gnang bya/_/de nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/mi bya ba ni ci yang med/_/dpal chen khyod kyis bka' drin gyis/_/da ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod/_/sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas/_/rten 'brel las byung chos rnams ni/_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni/_/sems can don ni mnyam med byos/_/bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni/_/ci bde bar ni bsgrub par gyis/_/de nas bla ma la yon dbul/_/bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang bya/_/skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu/_/de nas bla ma gsang 
[\[261a.2\]]don gnyer/_/thur du kha bltas kha sbyar te/_/ji ltar bdag nyid chen po khyed/_/bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mdzod/_/de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i/_/las dang chos sogs dbye ba yis/_/sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol/_/skal ldan bud med phyag rgyar bshad/_/skye 
[\[261a.3\]]bos dben pa'i mtshan phyed na/_/ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas/_/thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi/_/rdo rje slob dpon yon tan 'byung /_/ji ltar de ltar rnyed phyag rgya/_/snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i/_/bla na med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni/_/
[\[261a.4\]]rnal 'byor ma yi yang dag ltung /_/kun rdzob byang chub sems gang yin/_/gsang ba de yis dbang bskur bya/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig chen po rnam byung ba/_/khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len/_/bde ba chen pos myong bar gyis/_/slob ma 
[\[261a.5\]]rtog pa dang bral bas/_/pad+ma la gnas de myang gyis/_/'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba yis/_/rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur ba/_/byang chub sems kyi chu yis ni/_/bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya/_/de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir/_/bla mas don 'dod slob ma la/_/dngos 
[\[261a.6\]]grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/_/bdag la khyed kyis dbang bskur stsol/_/de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che/_/phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob/_/mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir/_/de 'og slob ma la ni sbyin/_/lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di/_/dpag med bde ba rab ster ba/_/
[\[261a.7\]]bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni/_/bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis/_/de nas shes rab ye shes de'i/_/sgrub po mchog tu 'dod pa'i don/_/lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog_/dngos grub don du nga yis sbyin/_/lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba/_/dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med/_/dpa' 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]bo khyod ni spro'am ci/_/byang chub sems ni za nus sam/_/yang dag de ni nges par ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smros/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog_/lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus/_/de nas lha mo de dgyes nas/_/skra bkrol gos ni bor nas kyang /_/pad+ma dag ni 
[\[261b.2\]]'byed byed cing /_/b+hany+dza mo k+Sha ho zhes gsungs/_/b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa/_/bde ba kun du rgyu ba'i rtsa/_/sor mos bskul nas dga' bar bya/_/dzi hwas kyang ni rol bar bya/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i bde byed pa/_/'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten na/_/mchog tu dga' 
[\[261b.3\]]bas nyams myong nas/_/lhung ba'i bde bas de myang bya/_/de nas bcom ldan ma dgyes nas/_/b+hany+dza mok+Sha'i sngags gsung zhing /_/rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la bzhag_/bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan/_/de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/_/
[\[261b.4\]]rmi lam bzhin du sems can gyi/_/bla na med pa'i don byos shig_/bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi/_/man ngag las ni 'di mi shes/_/rig pa 'di ni dor byas na/_/thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/_/brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog_/rig pa'i brtul 
[\[261b.5\]]zhugs bu yis spyod/_/de ltar 'di ni byang chub mchog_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma/_/rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rten/_/bdag la go 'phang mchog stsol lags/_/ting 'dzin kun gyis 'bras bu gsal/_/sems can kun la 
[\[261b.6\]]ci 'dod par/_/dngos grub bla na med pa gsol/_/slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i phyir/_/rang gi gnas gshegs badzra muH/_/de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin/_/'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim/_/u ts+tshiSh+Ta k+She tra pa la/_/a ti tsakra u ts+tshiSh+Ta/_/su b+ho dza na~M bi ba gnyis/_/
[\[261b.7\]]b+huk+Sha gnyis dang sarba dang /_/sid d+hiM pra yats+tsha me dang /_/o~M sngon AHhU~M phaT swA hA/_/de yi rjes la brjod par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu 'chang 'gyur ba/_/g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin dang /_/rdo rje slob dpon rang bzhin ni/_/khams 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang /_/de ltar cho ga nyi shu las/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bstan/_/de nyid mang du shes pa yis/_/bla ma dge ba'i las bzang po/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu'i 
[\[262a.2\]]las rgyas pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni/_/las ni cho ga nyi shur bshad/_/dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci/_/de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur/_/chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs/_/de nas bcom 
[\[262a.3\]]ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang /_/sngon du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni/_/rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad/_/ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam bsgom zhing /_/sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 
[\[262a.4\]]'grus bsam gtan rab tu rdzogs/_/shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/_/gsang ba la sogs la gnas pa/_/skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan no/_/kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams kyis/_/mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni/_/bla ma dad pas 
[\[262a.5\]]mchod pa ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don/_/chu sogs ming ni mthar thug pa/_/ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir/_/spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'/_/sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir/_/shes rab brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'/_/dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i 
[\[262a.6\]]phyir/_/dkyil 'khor sa tshon phra rab dang /_/mtshungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_/de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni/_/las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/_/dbang 
[\[262a.7\]]bskur ba ni thob pa dang /_/dngos po'i ngo bo ji bzhin du/_/shes rab ye shes kyis ni thob/_/bla ma yis ni sgrub pa yang /_/mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog_/de ltar yun mi ring bar 'thob/_/dag pa'i spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/_/mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med/_/gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim/_/rdo shing 
[\[262b.2\]]sa dang gser gyi ni/_/sku gzugs la ni phyag mi bya/_/rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang /_/de nas nam yang mi bya'o/_/dri chen rdor chu dkon mchog sogs/_/bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod/_/de phyir de la mngon zhugs pa'o/_/thugs kyi rdo rje rang nyid gtso/_/sems 
[\[262b.3\]]de yang ni de dngos med/_/gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni/_/stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa med/_/de phyir thams cad nam mkha' 'dra/_/de ltar rnam dag rnam shes kyang /_/rtsa ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya/_/gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun/_/sems las gzhan pa yod 
[\[262b.4\]]ma yin/_/rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas/_/lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa/_/sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med/_/de phyir de ltar rnam dpyod pa/_/rang lus gcig bu rtag tu mchod/_/rigs lnga dag tu rtag spyod pas/_/rigs 
[\[262b.5\]]gcig tu ni rnam par brtag_/'dod dang mi 'dod dbye ba dang /_/btung dang mi btung rnam par spangs/_/rnal 'byor skal yod skal med ces/_/nam yang smra bar mi bya'o/_/phyag rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs/_/de bzhin gzugs la'ang dbye ba gsum/_/gzugs rdo rje ma 
[\[262b.6\]]bkug nas su/_/sa snying la ni dbul bar bya/_/yang dag glu dang brjod bral dbyangs/_/de bzhin sgra la'ang dbye ba gsum/_/sgra rdo rje ma yang dag dgug_/phyag na rdo rje la ni dbul/_/ga pur a gar dzA ti sogs/_/de bzhin dri yang dbye ba gsum/_/dri rdo rje ma yang dag 
[\[262b.7\]]dgug_/nam mkha'i snying po la yang dbul/_/'o byed pa dang 'jib pa dang /_/ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum/_/rdo rje ro ma yang dag dgug_/'jig rten dbang phyug la ni dbul/_/rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor/_/gos dang 'khyud pa'i dbye ba gsum/_/reg bya rdo rje yang 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dag dgug_/sgrib sel la ni dbul bar bya/_/phyi yi chos rnams 'di dag kun/_/brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'ang /_/chos dbyings rdo rje yang dag dgug_/'jam pa'i rdo rje la ni dbul/_/de bzhin phyi dang nang dang ni/_/gnyis ka yang ni mi dmigs 
[\[263a.2\]]pa/_/gzugs la gsum du byas nas ni/_/lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/yul ni lnga ni nges gnas te/_/rgyud lngar nges par 'byung ba ni/_/rmi lam rlung dang ldan pa ru/_/'dod pa lnga rnams spyod par byed/_/dbang po gang dang gang lam gyis/_/sgrub pa po ni yul 'thob bo/_/
[\[263a.3\]]de dag thams cad thugs rje che/_/mnyes pa'i phyir ni dbul bar bya/_/yang dag dga' ba'i me tog gis/_/rdo rje nyi ma pad+ma 'byung /_/me tog bdag nyid la mchod pa/_/rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog_/rnam rtog tshul gyi yul min zhing /_/de ltar gtum mo'i me yis ni/_/
[\[263a.4\]]nges par bsregs pa de ni spos/_/thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul/_/rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par/_/zhugs pa la sogs rim las byung /_/rnal 'byor pa yi mi shigs sgra/_/thugs rdo rje la dbul bar bya/_/yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung /_/sngags kyi 'od zer shin tu gsal/_/mar 
[\[263a.5\]]me 'bar ba'i yang dag 'od/_/thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya/_/bde ba chen po nam mkhar gnas/_/byang chub sems ni sad pa dang /_/de nyid kyis kyang byugs pa ni/_/thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya/_/'dir ni gang dang gang longs spyod/_/dbang po thams cad yang dag bsten/_/de dag 
[\[263a.6\]]thams cad thugs rdo rje/_/bza' ba'i snod du mchod par bya/_/dgod dang sgeg dang rtse 'jo ni/_/sna tshogs kyis ni sems dga' byed/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag dang /_/thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid 
[\[263a.7\]]mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/lha mo yi ni mtshan nyid mchog_/rnal 'byor bde la rtog pa rnams/_/rtsa dbye ba yi rang bzhin gyis/_/rtag tu lus kyi rtse 'jo bya/_/de yi lha rnams su ni bshad/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]rtag tu bde ba kun gyis dga'/_/kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus/_/bde ba chen pos kun du khyab/_/lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod/_/dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /_/bral ba lhan cig skyes skad cig_/char pa dang ni rtse 'jo dang /_/kun nas lhag par sgeg pa dang /_/brgyal dang 
[\[263b.2\]]sad par gyur pa dang /_/de rnams lha mo ru ni bshad/_/phyi rol du ni byung ba na/_/gang phyir yang dag sbyor bar 'gyur/_/lus kyi rtsa rnams yang dag sad/_/de phyir rnal 'byor mar ni bshad/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las lha mo'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u 
[\[263b.3\]]ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/e ba~M zhes bya yi ge gnyis/_/e ni stong pa nyid du bshad/_/de bzhin ba~M ni thugs rje dang /_/thig le de gnyis sbyor las byung /_/de ni rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung /_/e ba~M gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang /_/
[\[263b.4\]]mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis/_/rgyud rnams su ni thog mar gsungs/_/e ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do/_/pad+ma'i rten du shes par bya/_/rten pa rdo rje zhes ni gsungs/_/brtan pa rdo rje 'chang ba yi/_/de la gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs/_/sna 
[\[263b.5\]]tshogs sprul pa ston par byed/_/bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/_/e ni gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings sam/_/b+ha ga chos 'byung pad+ma la/_/rnal 'byor seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/_/mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/_/rdo rje sems dpa' ba~M rdo rje/_/
[\[263b.6\]]rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang /_/he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo/_/dang po sangs rgyas la sogs mtshan/_/e ba~M de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya/_/gnyis su med pa'i bde mchog dang /_/stong nyid snying rje dbyer med dang /_/gang la de nyid mngon par brjod/_/de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[263b.7\]]pa'i rgya/_/gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni/_/rgyud kun gyi ni gleng gzhir gsungs/_/rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa/_/stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa/_/gang la de nyid mngon par brjod/_/e ba~M zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/_/gang la 'di nyid med pa ni/_/de la de kho na nyid 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]med/_/gang la de nyid yongs shes pa/_/btso ma'i gser ltar gsal por ni/_/rgyud ni legs bshad de nyid shes/_/sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par/_/de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog_/e pa~M don ni rnam par nges/_/chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis/_/dang po'i 
[\[264a.2\]]ngag tu yang dag bshad/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las e ba~M zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa dang rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/e ba~M la sogs don rgyas pa/_/gang 
[\[264a.3\]]gis yang dag yongs su shes/_/chos kyi de ni yang dag rtogs/_/e/_e ni shes rab dam pa ste/_/'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag_/srid pa gsum na yongs shes pa/_/'di ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan/_/ba~M/_'od ma bsgreng ba ltar mdzes shing /_/chags la 
[\[264a.4\]]sogs pa rab bskyed ldan/_/snang ba gsal ba rnam par shes/_/ming ni thabs shes bya ba yin/_/ma/_rig chen rang nyid rtsa ba ste/_/ma rig pa ni zlog pa yin/_/ma rig pa las 'di 'byung bas/_/de bas snang ba 'byung ba'o/_/yA/_'gro ba rnam shes gsum dang po'i/_/de 
[\[264a.5\]]ming snang ba gsal ba ste/_/de ni stong pa cher 'gyur la/_/de yang 'od gsal bar 'gro'o/_/shru/_snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can/_/gang 'di rnam shes gsum thob pa/_/sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i/_/rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin no/_/ta~M/_de ni re re'i don snang ba/_/rlung 
[\[264a.6\]]gis blangs nas 'dzin byed pa/_/la~M/_rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni/_/kun du 'gro la gnas par 'gyur/_/e/_'di ni rlung khams chen po ste/_/rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin/_/de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni/_/ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ka/_sra ba'i sa khams chu 
[\[264a.7\]]nyid dang /_/de bzhin me dang rlung dag ni/_/rnam par shes par blangs nas su/_/srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_/smi/_'di ni phung po lnga rnams su/_/'byung ba 'dus byas mtshan nyid ni/_/gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang /_/rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/sa/_mnyam 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]nyid so sor rtog pa dang /_/bya ba grub pa nyid dang ni/_/me long dang ni chos kyi dbyings/_/'di ni ye shes lnga po yin/_/ma/_yid kyi skye mched nyid dang ni/_/mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang /_/sna dang lce dang lus rnams te/_/'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o/_/ye/_gang yang khams 
[\[264b.2\]]gsum sems can rnams/_/srog dang rtsol ba la brten pa/_/gsang sngags rgyal po zlos bzhin du/_/mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs/_/b+ha/_'di las rang bzhin chags pa dang /_/chags med la sogs par yang 'gyur/_/de las dge dang mi dge'i las/_/de las skye 
[\[264b.3\]]ba 'byung ba yin/_/ga/_'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de/_/mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes/_/ming gis rab tu bskul ba yin/_/bAn/_rlung dang chu dang me dang sa/_/spyan la sogs pa bzhi po ste/_/ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du/_/
[\[264b.4\]]shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster/_/sa/_thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur/_/phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing /_/mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der/_/sa snying la sogs rgyal sras so/_/ha/_rol pas dga' ba gang yin pa'i/_/khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams/_/
[\[264b.5\]]de yi phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru/_/dpung pa yan lag rnams su brtag_/ta/_de dang de yi rigs las byung /_/lha dang lha mo tha dad pa/_/de ni yod min de dag kyang /_/'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin/_/thA/_'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi/_/rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes gsum/_/mthong 
[\[264b.6\]]phyir dman dang bar ma dang /_/dam pa'i yul la gzhag par bya/_/ga/_dbang po rang nyid rang yul la/_/'gro bar 'gyur ba de dang de/_/dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang /_/de dang de snang tsam nyid do/_/ta/_dbang po de yi lam nas ni/_/sgrub pa pos ni yul thob pa/_/de bzhin 
[\[264b.7\]]de las ma gsungs par/_/tshim par bya phyir dbul bar bya/_/kA/_sku gsum dag ni tha dad par/_/skyob pa yis ni yang dag bstan/_/rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis/_/gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin/_/ya/_gang zhig sangs rgyas sku mtshan nyid/_/kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ni/_/de nyid rdzogs rim sbyor ba yis/_/'od gsal bar ni rnam dag 'gyur/_/bAka/_tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid/_/gtso bo ye shes sku rang bzhin/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin/_/tsita/_/sems dang sems byung ma 
[\[265a.2\]]rig pa/_/shes rab thabs dang nyer thob dang /_/stong dang shin tu stong pa dang /_/stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod/_/ta/_rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes na/_/de nas spyod pa rab tu bya/_/las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas/_/rdo rje sku nyid thob par 'gyur/_/hr-i/_thugs la 'jig 
[\[265a.3\]]rten pa rnams kyi/_/don spyod bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs/_/kun rdzob tu ni sbul skur gnas/_/ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa spyod/_/da/_yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du/_/'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang /_/stobs kyis blangs 
[\[265a.4\]]nas spyod par 'gyur/_/ya/_rnal 'byor dbang po gang gang 'dod/_/de ni sgrib pa med par bya/_/mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis/_/rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/_/ba/_rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/_/ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa/_/blo la gos dang ma gos pa/_/
[\[265a.5\]]der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas/_/dzra/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dngos dag kun las rnam par rol/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du/_/gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas/_/yo/_rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur/_/rdo rje can 
[\[265a.6\]]dang mkha' 'gro ma/_/gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid/_/ShI/_dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na/_/bya dang bya min rnam spangs te/_/pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis bzhin/_/ngo bo nyid ces gos mi 'gyur/_/b+ha/_yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas/_/sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[265a.7\]]'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/_/bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spyod/_/ge/_gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi/_/de yi khyim ni nam mkha' nyid/_/bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/de nyid du ni rtag tu rol/_/ShA/_'di la snang ba dbye ba la/_/thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi/_/'jig 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]rten tha snyad byas pa yis/_/ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro/_/bi/_sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag_/'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa/_/lam gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/_/ye shes gsum las byung ba'o/_/dza/_skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang /_/srid pa bar mar gnas pa 
[\[265b.2\]]ste/_/ji snyed 'jig rten gyis brtags pa/_/sems kyi rlung ni rnam 'phrul lo/_/ha/_dgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang /_/gar gyi nyams dgur ldan pa dang /_/sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/_/ra/_bdag byin rlabs chen ma gtogs pa/_/
[\[265b.3\]]rin chen gzhan dag 'di na med/_/me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa'o/_/'di skad la sogs dang po'i ngag_/mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa/_/gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo/_/de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni/_/rim pa ji lta 
[\[265b.4\]]ba bzhin shes/_/sgrub po'i de nyid shes pa ni/_/ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis/_/gang du gsal bar ma gsungs so/_/rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa/_/de ltar rim pa 'di yis shes/_/sems can kun la phan skyed pa'o/_/
[\[265b.5\]]rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las e ba~M ma yA zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog_/nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams/_/gang 
[\[265b.6\]]gis thim par gyur pa dang /_/rnam rtog bag chags sa bon ni/_/phung po lnga yi bud shing dang /_/rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mes/_/rtag tu sbyin sreg rmad byung bya/_/lte dbus gnas pa'i sgra tsam ni/_/sgra tsam phyi rol gsang pad+ma/_/de la rang rgyud rlung gis ni/_
[\[265b.7\]]yongs su bskul ba'i me yis ni/_/dbang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor/_/gzi brjid gsal bar rab tu 'bar/_/gang tshe mar gang gsang pad+ma/_/de la 'di ni snod du brjod/_/haM ni blugs gzar zhes byar gsungs/_/rdo rje dgang gzar du ni brjod/_/b+ha ga thab khung zhes ni 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]bshad/_/dbang po lnga yi bsreg rdzas dang /_/phung po yam shing du ni gyur/_/mar ni byang chub sems su bshad/_/gnam stong nas brtsams nya yi bar/_/ji srid byed pa gshegs su gsol/_/me thab thig le tsam du gsungs/_/blugs gzar nam yang 
[\[266a.2\]]mi 'pho ba/_/sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs/_/gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal sras rnams/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni/_/rtag tu sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa gang /_/de yang dgang blugs su ni brjod/_/hu~M phaT yang dag ldan sngags 
[\[266a.3\]]kyis/_/cho ga bzhin du sreg blugs dbul/_/de yis lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na/_/lha yi dam tshig bla na med/_/yid la ji ltar 'dod pa rnams/_/de ltar dngo grub stsal nas ni/_/sbyin sreg 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/_/dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[266a.4\]]chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug cu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni/_/dngos grub kun byed de nyid mchog_/ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin/_/rnam snang 
[\[266a.5\]]mdzad dang mi bskyod dang /_/don yod grub dang 'od dpag med/_/rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do/_/khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang /_/byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med/_/de bzhin don yod grub pa sha/_/mi bskyod de bzhin rdo rje chu/_/
[\[266a.6\]]dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad/_/de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog_/bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben/_/skra yi tsher ma rnam par spangs/_/de la khang pa bya ba ni/_/khang pa gnyis brtsegs sgo dang bcas/_/sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing /_/gzhan dag de yi steng du 
[\[266a.7\]]bya/_/gzhan ni gsangs nas bya ba ste/_/'jig rten pa ni gcig tu shes/_/sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing /_/sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba/_/brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang /_/yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs/_/sgrub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang /_/de lta bu 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]nyid sgrub grogs mchog_/chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/_/brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang /_/khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang /_/mang du thos shing yod par lta/_/thog ma gnyis ka yi ni lus/_/'bras bu sogs kyis dag bya ba/_/gnod mdzes skul byed 
[\[266b.2\]]'bum phrag gcig_/de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya/_/oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/_/o~M gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M gr-ih+NA ba ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM an ya ho/_b+ha ga bA na bid+yA rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT/_de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum/_/sgrub pos mi smra bzlas par bya/_/kun du bzang po 
[\[266b.3\]]'gro ba'i gtso/_/de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong /_/des ni bka' yis bsgo ba ni/_/ka n+ya mchog ni bsten gyis la/_/sems can don ni mtshungs med byos/_/ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang /_/bu mo skal ldan mig yangs ma/_/gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/_/brkam 
[\[266b.4\]]chags med cing chags bcas sems/_/sgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas/_/nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba/_/rnam rtog med cing mang du thos/_/sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya/_/ji srid khu ba dang bcas gyur/_/de nas gdong ni pad+ma gnyis/_/gnyis 
[\[266b.5\]]ka 'byung ba blangs nas ni/_/pad+ma'i snod der gzhag par bya/_/mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du/_/glang po rta khyi ba lang mi/_/dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gnyis ka shar/_/skye gnas nas ni blangs nas ni/_/de bzhin de ru rim pa bzhin/_/pad snod de nyid la ni der/_/zhag 
[\[266b.6\]]bdun bar du gzhag par bya/_/nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/_/yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya/_/'du 'dzi med cing dben pa'i gnas/_/tsan+dan bzang po byugs nas ni/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH'i sngags bkod pa'i/_/pad+mo'i snod la gzhag par bya/_/ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar/_/
[\[266b.7\]]mar dang li kha dkar po dang /_/cha bsnyams bskol ba byas nas ni/_/de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre/_/rgya shug tshig gu tshad tsam gyis/_/blo dang ldan pas ril bu bya/_/grib ma la ni bskam byas nas/_/rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje ming sring spun dang ni/_/rnal 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'/_/zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag_/mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo/_/mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am/_/yang na bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/_/de la gtor ma bya ba ni/_/las kun la ni bla na med/_/de las kyang 
[\[267a.2\]]ni dngos grub skye/_/phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang /_/dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs/_/de yis 'bad mi dgos par 'thob/_/rlung gi de nyid yang dag slob/_/mkha' spyod nyid ni thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa 
[\[267a.3\]]las bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga mchog_/gang gis mchod pa las byung ba/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi dngos grub mchog_/rnal 'byor che dang lhan cig tu/_/
[\[267a.4\]]sgrub pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/_/phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing /_/de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug_/de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang /_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes ni brjod/_/kun kyang dam tshig la gnas pa/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/bla ma la 
[\[267a.5\]]dad dam tshig gnas/_/gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/thabs zhes bya ba bgegs med na/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug_/gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur/_/shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs/_/mdza' 
[\[267a.6\]]bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas/_/lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon/_/lhag ma yongs su spangs nas ni/_/thabs dang so sor shes rab dang /_/kun la gcig ni phan yon med/_/thog ma yid 'ong nyams dga' bar/_/me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor bya/_/de nyid sna tshogs mchod 
[\[267a.7\]]pa ni/_/legs par mnyam par bzhag nas mchod/_/gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod/_/tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes la/_/dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas/_/dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni/_/mnyam pas blta 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]bas bsgoms nas ni/_/bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig rten dang /_/'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya/_/gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa/_/mtshan phyed ni ni dgug par bya/_/slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod/_/ji ltar gdan stengs bzhugs gsol nas/_/
[\[267b.2\]]gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang /_/mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs/_/dkyil 'khor pa ni gzhan rnams dang /_/de bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa gzhan/_/dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya/_/
[\[267b.3\]]tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang /_/rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang /_/mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang /_/rkang pa la sogs rkyong ba dang /_/yang dang yang du ldang ba ni/_/de la dus kun du mi bya/_/phyag rgya brda yi tshogs rnams kyis/_/bya zhing bya bar shes par bya/_/
[\[267b.4\]]shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bya/_/gtso bo la ni snod kyi mchog_/dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang /_/de med dum bu gsum pa la/_/me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod/_/lha yi chang la sogs pa gang /_/legs par mnyam par 
[\[267b.5\]]gzhag ste dbul/_/tshogs rnams la yang so sor snod/_/me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba/_/thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin/_/sngon bzhin bza' ba la sogs ldan/_/gang gis dga' ba rnams nyams pa/_/de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o/_/yang dang yang du phyag byas 
[\[267b.6\]]nas/_/phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya/_/de nas bza' ba thams cad ni/_/sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyangs/_/o~M dang AHdang hU~M gis ni/_/sbyang dang sad dang rtogs par bya/_/gur gum tsan+dan dpa' bo dang /_/gangs dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lte ba dang /_/'di ni dag byed 
[\[267b.7\]]bdud rtsi lnga/_/bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod/_/sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin/_/rang gi lce yis myang bar bya/_/dpa' bo dbus su dus kun du/_/kha la dpa' bo rnam par dgod/_/bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya/_/pad+ma'i lte 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]ba'i dbus la ni/_/dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod/_/gal te dpa' bos ma shes na/_/dpa' bo don gyi mtshan nyid rnams/_/dngos grub thams cad stsol ba yi/_/'khor lo de yi 'bras bu med/_/de lta'i 'bras bu cung zad gang /_/phyi 
[\[268a.2\]]nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod/_/de yis rnam dag dngos grub 'gyur/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ster/_/rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig 'dres/_/rab tu bshad kyis de nyid nyon/_/'dul ba'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ga' zhig_/sems rtog med pa'i phyir 'ongs 
[\[268a.3\]]nas/_/de la de tshe smra ba yang /_/sgrub pa pos ni mi bya zhing /_/tshig tsam gyis ni lan mi gdab/_/bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgyas bya/_/de la cung zad bya smra gang /_/slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya/_/yang na bya ba thams cad ni/_/las kyi rdo rjes yang dag sbyar/_/
[\[268a.4\]]gang phyir rang nyid rdo rje sems/_/las kyi rdo rje gzhan dga' min/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma/_/yang dang yang du dgug par bya/_/de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa med/_/slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod/_/gang yang skyon gyi spyod pas ni/_/de yi lus ni 
[\[268a.5\]]ltung bar 'gyur/_/shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes/_/bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya/_/rdo rje bcing ba de yang bya/_/lha rnams ji ltar mnyes pa nyid/_/ma'am sring mo bu mo'am/_/gal te mchod par 'dod pa na/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/rtog pa 
[\[268a.6\]]med pas bstan par bya/_/rab mchog de yi dngos grub ni/_/thob par 'di la the tshom med/_/lhag ma'i gtor ma blangs nas ni/_/dgon pa chen por song nas dor/_/k+Sh+mIM u ts+tshiSh+Ta k+She tA pA/_/lA ya swA hA sngags brjod bya/_/gal te de ltar rab byed pa'i/_/rnal 
[\[268a.7\]]'byor pa yis slar yang mthong /_/de ltar de ni yongs shes nas/_/rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog_/gang gis gdong ni 'bar ba'i 'od/_/zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes pa dang /_/smin ma ring ba de shes bya/_/'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung /_/de las pad+ma'i 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]phyag rgya bstan/_/rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no/_/mchu rle mig dkyus ring ba dang /_/kha dog ser mo yid 'phrog ma/_/'di yi dpral bar ri mo gsum/_/ji srid skra mtshams bar du gnas/_/g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyis ni/_/gtam dag la ni rab tu nyan/_/
[\[268b.2\]]'di 'dra'i nyan pa ma mthong nas/_/mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/rkang ba g.yon pa bskum pa dang /_/de ni gar byed rab tu ston/_/g.yon pa yongs su bskor nas ni/_/phyag rgya'i lan ni bstan par bya/_/sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/_/rin chen 'byung 
[\[268b.3\]]ldan rigs las byung /_/kha dog gnag cing gos kyang gnag_/skra ni 'khyil cing dar gyis bcings/_/dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yi/_/de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong na ni/_/rtag tu de yi sems g.yo ba/_/ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags/_/dril bu'i phyag rgya 
[\[268b.4\]]bstan par bya/_/de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya ston/_/mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes/_/mtshan mo 'ongs nas 'gro ba mchog_/thung ngu lto sbom kha dog dkar/_/byin pa sbom zhing shin tu mdzes/_/sa spyod mar ni shes par bya/_/dung gi phyag rgya lan yin no/_/
[\[268b.5\]]rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung /_/mig yangs rdzi ma stug pa dang /_/yan lag kun la ba spus khyab/_/sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang /_/yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring /_/de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags/_/don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung /_/de 'dra ba 
[\[268b.6\]]ni rab mthong na/_/ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya dang /_/g.yon pa'i phyag rgya lan yin no/_/de ltar 'bad pas shis nas ni/_/mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni/_/de la cung zad 'jigs mi bya/_/gang phyir de nyid mchod par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng 
[\[268b.7\]]ba mngon par rtogs pa las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma dang 'dres pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/gsang ba'i tshig ni bshad pa ni/_/rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams su/_/rigs 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]kun las byung rnal 'byor ma/_/mtshan mo 'du ba'i dam tshig ni/_/'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang /_/de lta bu yi gsang ba ni/_/bshad kyis dad pa yis ni nyon/_/sa~M po dang ka~M chang 'thung ba/_/bri ra~M sha ru rnam par brjod/_/ni la nA bla tra~M thod pa/_/
[\[269a.2\]]gu lang mi yi thod pas brgyan/_/kun du ra~M 'dod yang dag spyod/_/tsha dru~M ro drug bza' ba po/_/su~M su TA~M dbang gnyis sbyor ba/_/a lo ka~M yod pa yi ming /_/sha~M rim ga skam skal yod shes/_/tsa kra ka ni skal med brjod/_/tu~M shA~M ra~M ni khu tshur shes/_/me 
[\[269a.3\]]ka ma tra~M gcig tu brjod/_/tsan+d+ra ma ni khrag tu bshad/_/ga na~M bshang bar yongs su grags/_/g+ha na~M sha chen du ni bshad/_/ni dza~M d+ha du ra ru brjod/_/b+ha sa na~M ni chu ru bshad/_/ba k+Sha~M yan lag rab tu bshad/_/shu pa~M bzang po zhes ni brjod/_/ho ni tshim pa zhes 
[\[269a.4\]]ni grags/_/marga ltogs pa ru ni brjod/_/g+h+ri ta~M lam du bshad pa dang /_/byo ma ga~M na~M pha rol dpung /_/ka ma ya ni gyis shig brjod/_/na ga ra~M ni bdag lus brjod/_/ba ta ka ni nyos zhes brjod/_/a dza~M ya ni me zhes brjod/_/sha kham za ba zhes ni brjod/_/
[\[269a.5\]]ra gam 'dor ni cho ga brjod/_/sha ta ka~M mi bza' bar brjod/_/ci 'dra ba ni sngags zhes brjod/_/sha ra~M khyi 'tshed sha zhes brjod/_/ra~M pa ka ni bla mar bshad/_/ka ya 'dir ni rgyal rigs brjod/_/ra ga~M rje rigs zhes ni bshad/_/be ra~M rgya ni dmangs rigs 
[\[269a.6\]]brjod/_/tsa ba~M rigs ngan zhes ni brjod/_/sha ra~M sme sha can du brjod/_/b+ha ba tsa kra~M ko lpags mkhan/_/khad kom ro sreg ma ru bshad/_/sa mun tra ni rgyal por brjod/_/mi ra~M ma yi ring du brjod/_/b+ha ra ha gang zhes ni bshad/_/bim+kh+ya phag ces brjod par bya/_/
[\[269a.7\]]pa la~M sha ni nya zhes brjod/_/di na mar skyes su ni bshad/_/nag tu~M sbyin sreg tu ni bshad/_/marta ah+na ni 'dab chags brjod/_/hi ra phyu ni me tog brjod/_/sha drul la~M ni spos su bshad/_/mA la tri ni dri ru bshad/_/sha ku ni ka mar mer brjod/_/ka shi 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]ka~M ni gos su bshad/_/ke se ra ni gdong du brjod/_/ba~M tra~M dpral ba zhes su bshad/_/ma la smin mar yang dag grags/_/ko bal ya~M ni mig tu shes/_/a da ra ni so ru brjod/_/pal la po ni mchu ru shes/_/pa sha mgrin pa ru ni grags/_/hU~M so 'phrag pa 
[\[269b.2\]]ru ni bshad/_/a gu ro ni dpung par brjod/_/so so ru ni lag par bshad/_/shri pang le ni nu mar brjod/_/dza ti~M pha la~M rkang par brjod/_/da la na~M ni lte bar brjod/_/pad+ma dza lam gsang ba'i gnas/_/ka ta~M ba ka~M brla gnyis so/_/be sa~M rje ngar du ni bshad/_/
[\[269b.3\]]tshA ga na ni rkang par brjod/_/pa ra a ka ke sa ra/_/sen mo zhes ni yad dag bshad/_/pad+ma gar ni ga ni snang /_/sha kra ku su la~M mal stan/_/shag tu bu zhes bya bar brjod/_/na la ni nA lam ston med/_/go bag Sh+ma lam thams cad brjod/_/sA ga ra~M ni rgas 
[\[269b.4\]]par bshad/_/sa la~M ro ni zhim por brjod/_/a k+Sho ra~M rim mi zhim bshad/_/mr-i ga~M mi smra bar ni bshad/_/pa go la mu da~M glu len/_/mi tra gar zhes bya bar brjod/_/sha b+ta tshul 'chos su ni bshad/_/spar sha zhags par rab tu grags/_/ra sa sgeg mo'i 
[\[269b.5\]]ro 'bebs ma/_/ru pa~M ri yi rtse mo'o/_/twa ne ha ni bsad par bshad/_/pA rA pa ta 'chi bar brjod/_/ta ma lA ko se ma yul/_/pha la~M grong khyer du ni brjod/_/pra na grong du bshad pa yin/_/th+ya n+ya srog ces bya bar bshad/_/ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad/_/
[\[269b.6\]]na ya na ni rnam shes brjod/_/a bi na pa~M dgod par bshad/_/ru ti ra ni 'chang bar brjod/_/ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad/_/kan nya mtshan mor rab tu grags/_/da sa nyi ma phyed du bshad/_/da pi mtshan gyi cha ru grags/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 
[\[269b.7\]]phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/sku ni mgo bor gnas pa ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis byang sems 'bab/_/
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]de ni so sor rab phye bas/_/sku yi 'khor lo ru zhes bya/_/yi ge phyi mo'i dbye ba yis/_/gsung la gnas par rab tu shes/_/chags sogs bag chags dbye ba yis/_/thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni shes/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni/_/sems 
[\[270a.2\]]dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig_/rdo rje slob dpon sku la ni/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas/_/dang po sku yi rdo rje ni/_/gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs/_/de rjes nam mkha' rdo rje ni/_/tshor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni/_/'du 
[\[270a.3\]]shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni/_/'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/_/yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/_/bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhugs so/_/
[\[270a.4\]]khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni/_/bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma bzhugs/_/dro ba la sogs me khams la/_/bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs/_/mi bskyod la sogs rlung khams la/_/bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs/_/de mig dbang 
[\[270a.5\]]po gnyis la ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa snying po/_/de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la/_/bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o/_/de yi sna bug gnyis la ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i mdzod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang /_/de yi lce yi dbang 
[\[270a.6\]]la gnas/_/de yi yid kyi dbang po la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs/_/khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/_/lus zhes bya bar brtags pa la/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so/_/lus kyi 
[\[270a.7\]]tshigs ni thams cad la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang /_/lus kyi rtsa rgyus thams cad la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje'i gshed/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni/_/de 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/_/kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no/_/gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo 
[\[270b.2\]]ba/_/dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/_/pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig pa sngo/_/pus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che/_/rang gi mgo 
[\[270b.3\]]stengs bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los sgyur/_/rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te/_/lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs/_/sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa/_/
[\[270b.4\]]rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di/_/lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku/_/skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa/_/mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob/_/khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa/_/de bas rdo rje slob dpon 
[\[270b.5\]]gyi/_/lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/_/mthong na don ni yod pa kye/_/phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che/_/de bas sems can thams cad kyi/_/lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis/_/rab tu 'bad de bla ma bsten/_/de nas mthong ba don yod bcas/_/byang 
[\[270b.6\]]chub sems dpa' grags pa che/_/dga' zhing mgu bas phyag byas nas/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags/_/gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs/_/legs so bya ba byin nas ni/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/_/a A i I u 
[\[270b.7\]]U dang /_/r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai dang /_/o au aM aHdbyangs zhes bya/_/ka tsa Ta ta pa sde tshan/_/ya ra la wa sha Sha sa/_/ha dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes/_/ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan/_/'dod chags la sogs bag chags kyang /_/grangs ni nyi 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]shu brgyad kyis so/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa/_/dpal mchog las ni shes par bya/_/de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/rdo rje gsum ni dam tshig mchog_/mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni/_/sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang 
[\[271a.2\]]dag shes/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang /_/bla ma ston pa 
[\[271a.3\]]slob dpon dang /_/rdo rje 'chang dang slob ma yi/_/mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni/_/dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs/_/sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas/_/sangs rgyas yi ge hU~M du 
[\[271a.4\]]bshad/_/gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod/_/dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge oM/_/kun nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do/_/sangs rgyas a ba d+hU tIr 'gyur/_/chos kyang la la nA ru brjod/_/dge 'dun ra sa nA ru brjod/_/'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do/_/gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/
[\[271a.5\]]gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni/_/'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te/_/de ltar khams gsum mtshan nyid mchog_/snying por gyur pa rang srog las/_/khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/_/sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa/_/rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du mthong /_/
[\[271a.6\]]khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/_/gcig pur myur bar mthong bar 'gyur/_/byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/dam pa'i chos ni chos kyi sku/_/dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur 
[\[271a.7\]]ni 'gyur/_/de ni sku gsum bdag nyid can/_/snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/_/chos ni snang ba thob pa'o/_/dge 'dun snang ba mched par 'gyur/_/de ni snang ba gsum mtshan nyid/_/zhi ba la sogs las la byang /_/sngags dang rnal 'byor che rnams 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]shes/_/cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs/_/de ni bla mar mngon par brjod/_/tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong /_/bzod dang brtson 'grus mchog tu ldan/_/nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen/_/shes rab ldan zhing bzo la mkhas/_/bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs/_/
[\[271b.2\]]dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod/_/nang gi gsang 'dus la rab dga'/_/phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa/_/de lta'i man ngag rim pa yis/_/slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab/_/de ni ston par yongs su gsungs/_/de skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/rtog pa 
[\[271b.3\]]rnams dang dkyil 'khor tshogs/_/dam pa'i don gyi bya ba dang /_/slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni/_/rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la/_/slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug_/de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o/_/de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[271b.4\]]la sogs bya ba shes/_/slob ma rjes su nus pa dang /_/gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang /_/shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan/_/rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs/_/zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog_/tshar gcod phan 
[\[271b.5\]]'dogs pa la mkhas/_/de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad/_/dad cing bla ma la yang gus/_/rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas/_/gnyis med sgyu yang med pa dang /_/rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs/_/lung ni mang du thos pa dang /_/gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs/_/sems 
[\[271b.6\]]can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos/_/kun du brtson dang yang dag ldan/_/de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan/_/dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang /_/stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/_/gang la de nyid nges shes bya/_/gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog_/sngags dang rnal 
[\[271b.7\]]'byor rim pa sogs/_/ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang /_/sangs rgyas lnga ni rang bzhin nyid/_/mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/_/snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang /_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang /_/sku gsum rnam par bsgom pa dang /_/bde chen 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]yon tan mtshan nyid ni/_/dga' ba la sogs dbye ba dang /_/de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni/_/rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang /_/shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/_/dang po sbyor ba mdor bsdus pas/_/de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po
