[\[272a.2\]]mchog/_/las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog_/'jug dad gnas dang ldang ba ni/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/bde gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis la sogs/_/gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod/_/yon tan 
[\[272a.3\]]ji lta bu yi rgyud/_/thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni/_/rten dang snod ces bya bar gsungs/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang /_/ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni/_/sa yi snod du bzhag mi bya/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/_/snod min dag la sbyin mi 
[\[272a.4\]]bya/_/slob ma skad cig de la 'chi/_/'di dang pha rol du ni phung /_/snod min man ngag rab bshad na/_/slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/_sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun 
[\[272a.5\]]la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/_/slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni/_/zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang /_/sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi/_/lham dang gdugs dang gtsug tor 
[\[272a.6\]]dang /_/so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang /_/snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs/_/'dor zhing rkang pa rkyong ba dang /_/gzhan du lta dang spyi brtol smra/_/nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang /_/rgyan la sogs pa bltab pa dang /_/bag med par ni smra ba dang /_/bla ma'i 
[\[272a.7\]]grib ma 'gom pa dang /_/de la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs/_/bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs/_/'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod/_/rab bdog kun gtod dam bcas pas/_/ngo tsha bcas shing gdong smad pas/_/slob mas 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bla ma'i mdun gnas bya/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams/_/de lta bu sogs spyod ces bya/_/dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa/_/de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o/_/de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni/_/bla mas bstan par bya ba'i rigs/_/
[\[272b.2\]]de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya/_/thun mong cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya/_/dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni las/_/zla ba mar gyi ngo la brtsam/_/byang du kha bltas zhi ba la/_/de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta/_/drag po'i 
[\[272b.3\]]las la lho phyogs su/_/dbang gi las la nub tu blta/_/gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs/_/sdang bar bya la bden bral du/_/gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs/_/rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs/_/zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste/_/rgyas pa la ni ser po bya/_/dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar/_/
[\[272b.4\]]kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o/_/byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la/_/chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la/_/khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o/_/zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya/_/de bzhin rgyas pa snga dro bya/_/dbang dang mngon 
[\[272b.5\]]spyod dag gi las/_/nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed la'o/_/de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad/_/sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis/_/zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad/_/blo ldan cho ga bzhin du bsgrub/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon 
[\[272b.6\]]par rtogs pa las/_slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang /_zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/_/khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/gang gis rnal 'byor dngos 
[\[272b.7\]]grub brgyad/_/thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/khro bo'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni/_/khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes ni brjod/_/yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/_/sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya/_/dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]stsol/_/'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod du/_/'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas/_/skyes bu thod pa'i khrag gis gos/_/rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blang /_/skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang /_/bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni/_/de na bsgrub bya'i 
[\[273a.2\]]rnam pa dang /_/gsal dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang /_/g.yon brkyang ba yis mnan nas ni/_/zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du/_/gshin rje'i gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni/_/dngos grub rgyur ni bzlas par bya/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_o~M kha kha 
[\[273a.3\]]khA hi khA hi/_sarba duSh+Ta satwa dam ka/_a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha sta/_khaD+ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni haSh+Tha/_tsa tur mu kha/_tsa tur b+hu dza/_Sha Da tsa ra Na/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_sarba duSh+Ta prA Na a pa ha ri Ne/_ma hA big+ha nAM g+hA ta ka/_bikr-i ha A nan/_sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka 
[\[273a.4\]]ra/_aT+Ta aT+Ta hA sa nA di ne/_byA g+h+ra tsa rmA ni bA sa na/_ku ru ku ru/_sarba karmA Ni/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_sarba man trAn/_b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/_pa ra mu drA na/_A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/_sarba b+hU tA na/_ma tha ma tha/_ni ra ma tha ni ra ma tha/_sarba duSh+TA na/_pra be sha ya pra be sha 
[\[273a.5\]]ya/_maN+Dal ma d+h+ye/_bai ba shwa ta/_dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_hU~M hU~M/_tardza ya/_b+he gA nAM/_phaT phaT/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_kA ra kA ra/_sarbA sha pa ri pU rA ya 
[\[273a.6\]]he he b+ha ga bAn/_kiny+dzi rA ya sin/_namaHsarbA r+tha sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_thog mar khro bo'i bzlas pa 'di/_/dbang du bya dang dgug pa'i mchog_/bskrad pa rab tu bshad par bya/_/khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang /_/skye tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang /_/dug dang d+ha du ra'i 
[\[273a.7\]]khu ba/_/sdigs mdzub khrag dang bsres nas su/_/dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni/_/zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya/_/de dbus bsgrub bya'i ming bris la/_/g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni/_/
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]sngags 'di yongs su bzla bar bya/_/sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas/_/mtshan phyed kyi ni dus su ni/_/kun nas zhag bdun bsgrub par bya/_/bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/na maHsa man+ta kA la bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/_ma bA daM Sh+To ta 
[\[273b.2\]]ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/_/a si mu sa la bar shu pA sha ha stA ya/_/o~M a mr-i ta ku N+Da li/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_gardza gardza/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/_/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/_sarba big+ha nAM bi nA ya kAn+ma hA ga Na pa ti/_dzI bi tA n+ti 
[\[273b.3\]]ka rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni/_/bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yin/_/zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba/_/gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ni/_/khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas ni/_/me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed/_/lag pa gnyis la 
[\[273b.4\]]nyi ma gnyis/_/de la hU~M gnyis bsgom par bya/_/bsgrub pa'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis/_/brabs la de la zhugs nas ni/_/bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis/_/'byung po bsreg par bsam par bya/_/me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i/_/'di yi sngags ni 
[\[273b.5\]]bshad par bya/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_o~M a pa rA jI ti ri dzi hU~M phaT/_che ge mo 'byung po'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig_/d+h+r-IHdug sel ba'i sngags kyis ni/_/bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig_/khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni/_/yang dag mi 
[\[273b.6\]]mtshungs pa yi mchog_/bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom/_/snying gar zla gnas ye shes sems/_/de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang /_/bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam/_/rab tu 'bar ba de yis dug_/de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni/_/zla 
[\[273b.7\]]ba haM gis rnam par brgyan/_/kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod/_/de ltar sgrub pa po la bya/_hU~M d+h+r-IHdzi k+ShI~M sA d+ha dgod/_/las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed/_/bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te/_/rkang pa'i mtha' yi bar du bsgom/_/chu rgyun rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]pa ni/_/dug ni 'og btang rim pa yis/_/'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste/_/rta mgrin du ni mngon par brjod/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ta rU la bi rU la/_sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wA li ta bi s+phu ling+ga/_aT+TA T+Ta hA sa nA da sa hI 
[\[274a.2\]]ta/_ka sa ri sa ho ba taM ad de ba badzra khu ra g+ha ta na/_tsa ta pa su d+ha ta la ni shwA sa ma ru ta uta k+Shi p+ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/_pi Sha na aT+Ta hA sa a pa ri mi tA ba la pa rA kra ma Ar+ya ga Na b+hI ta/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_ha ya grI ba kha kha/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_A be sha ya/_sarba gra he Sh+wa/_pra ti ha to b+ha ba/_
[\[274a.3\]]badzra daMSh+T+ri kiny+tsi rA ya si i daM duSh+Ta gra haM daMSh+Ta sar+b+baM bA/_d+hu na d+hu na/_mA tha mA tha/_marda marda/_bud+d+ha d+harma ra d+ha/_bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA na kaR+YaM ku ru swA hA/_che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod cig hU~M zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te/_/
[\[274a.4\]]lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/dngos grub thams cad 
[\[274a.5\]]bsdus pa ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog_/dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ni/_/sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang /_/'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang /_/byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang /_/yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel/_/mig dang rna ba yid dang lus/_/
[\[274a.6\]]rtsa yi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab/_/mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra/_/mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed/_/bzhi pa yi ni dbang bskur bas/_/blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur/_/snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur/_/nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o/_/mtshams ni snang ba thob 
[\[274a.7\]]pa'o/_/de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid/_/mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min/_/kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed/_/de ni skad cig mngon byang chub/_/mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod/_/tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba'am/_/dbus mi 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]ba'am/_/mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba'am/_/de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/_/gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing /_/zad med 'phel med dngos dang dngos med min/_/ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min/_/gnas 
[\[274b.2\]]par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min/_/gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/_/bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin/_/bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa/_/de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/_/skad 
[\[274b.3\]]cig gcig la mngon byang chub/_/mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog_/rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni/_/'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid/_/de yis de nyid byang sems ni/_/rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas/_/rigs pas steng du byed pa ni/_/rgas pa med par the tshom med/_/
[\[274b.4\]]hU~M hoHrim bzhin shes pa ni/_/'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel/_/sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga/_/'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod/_/'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed/_/lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni/_/rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che/_/zung du 'jug pas thob 
[\[274b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang /_/gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba/_/de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni/_/gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur 
[\[274b.6\]]ba/_/zung du 'jug ces de la bshad/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag_/rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral/_/gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa/_/de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/_/rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas/_/rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni/_/rnam rtog rlung 
[\[274b.7\]]rnams rnam par gcod/_/sems la dmigs pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdag la byin brlabs rim pas kyang /_/dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur/_/snang ba la sogs dbye ba shes/_/mngon par byang chub rim pa thob/_/zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa/_/
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom med/_/phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher/_/zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni/_/thob pa 'di la the tshom med/_/
[\[275a.2\]]lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brten/_/zur bzhi pa yi mdun rgyab dang /_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so/_/steng 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis/_/sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/sna rtse bzhi yi dbyibs kyis ni/_/rta babs bzhi 
[\[275a.3\]]ni brjod par bya/_/dra ba chu bar yang dag bshad/_/rgyus par gyur pa dra ba phyed/_/cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang /_/bum pa lto bar yang dag shes/_/rje ngar brla dpung lag ngar ni/_/ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad/_/mig gi rnam shes me long sogs/_/sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang /_/sna yi rnam 
[\[275a.4\]]shes me tog phreng /_/rin chen pha gu lce rnam shes/_/lus kyi rnam shes ras 'phan dang /_/yid kyi rnam shes [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]so/_/mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang /_/rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams/_/sna ni ba dan du ni bshad/_/lce 
[\[275a.5\]]ni dril bu ru ni gsungs/_/rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa/_/lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/_/yid ni dbus kyi pad+mar gsungs/_/rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten/_/ye shes lnga ni rnam dag pa/_/re khA lngar ni yang dag brjod/_/phung po lnga ni rnam dag 
[\[275a.6\]]lnga/_/rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye/_/de dag gzhal yas khang du bsgom/_/dang po sbyor bar shes par bya/_/mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo bo/_/de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod/_/dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o/_/khams 
[\[275a.7\]]bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni/_/gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus na/_/gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni/_/mig gi rnam shes sa snying po/_/phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad/_/byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus na bzhugs/_/de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/_/shar 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]dang lho yi mtshams su ni/_/me long ye shes su ni bshad/_/rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid/_/bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skyo/_/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod/_/tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni/_/phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang /_/rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad/_/
[\[275b.2\]]rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid/_/dri yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur/_/sna yi rnam shes mkha' snying bo/_/khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes/_/mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang /_/dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes/_/snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can/_/'du shes phung 
[\[275b.3\]]po me khams dang /_/phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang /_/lce yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon/_/de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/_/de ni so sor rtog ye shes/_/'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung /_/dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis/_/bag chags 'du byed 
[\[275b.4\]]mtshan nyid ni/_/'du shes phung po rlung gi khams/_/phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang /_/lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnam sel/_/kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs/_/de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/_/bya ba nan tan grub ye shes/_/don yod grub pa'i 
[\[275b.5\]]rigs las byung /_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/_/ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod/_/rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams/_/yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje/_/de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/_/shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/_/mi bskyod pa yi 
[\[275b.6\]]rigs las byung /_/mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs/_/de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis/_/rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya/_/skra rus phyi sa mchil ma snying /_/sa ni rnam snang bdag nyid do/_/spu dang rnag dang nye ba'i 
[\[275b.7\]]snying /_/sen mo chu yi khams su shes/_/rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi/_/rigs kyi rten du shes par bya/_/so dang pags pa sha dang snying /_/me yi khams zhes bya bar brjod/_/'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang /_/rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya/_/
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]rgyus pa sha dang rtsib logs snying /_/rlung ni don yod grub pa'o/_/dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa snying /_/de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags/_/mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang /_/snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya/_/re re la yang so sor ni/_/rnam pa 
[\[276a.2\]]lnga ni spro ba shes/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po lnga/_/nang gi bdag nyid rdzas bye ba/_/sha rtsa rgyus pa sha kham tshad/_/klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang /_/rus pa rkang dang snye ma dang /_/mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang /_/glo ba mtsher pa gcin dang ni/_/bshang 
[\[276a.3\]]ba pho ba long ka dang /_/zhag dang chu ser rnag dang ni/_/khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang /_/ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang /_/sen mo spu dang pags pa dang /_/lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs/_/mtshog ma dpung ba zhes ni brjod/_/de dag rim par shes 
[\[276a.4\]]par bya/_/gzhal yas khang ni rnam dag pas/_/de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/_/pU l+li ra ni mgo bor shes/_/spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra dang /_/rna ba g.yas par o D+yan dang /_/spyi bo'i rgyab ni arbu da/_/go dA ba ri rna ba 
[\[276a.5\]]g.yon/_/rA me shwa ri smin ma'i dbus/_/mig gnyis de bi ko Ti dang /_/mA la we ni dpung pa'i rtsa/_/kA ma rU pa mchan khung gnyis/_/o De nu ma gnyis su grags/_/ko sa la ni lte bar shes/_/tri sa kU ne sna yi rtsa/_/kha yi pad+ma ka ling ga/_/mgrin pa 
[\[276a.6\]]lam pA kar ni brjod/_/snying ni kAny+tsir shes par bya/_/hi ma la ya mdoms su shes/_/mtshan ma gr-i ha de wa dang /_/bre ta pu ri bshang ba'i lam/_/brla gnyis su war+N+Na dwI pa/_/sau raSh+T+wa ni byin pa gnyis/_/rkang pa'i bol ni sin d+hA'i yul/_/sor mo rnams la nA 
[\[276a.7\]]ga ra/_/mthe bong gnyis ni ma rur shes/_/ku lu tA ni rkang pa'i mthil/_/de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang /_/sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid/_/de nyid dang ldan shes par bya/_/thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid/_/'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis/_/rim gyis rdo rje 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]sems dpa' nyid/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog_/srog gi rlung ni snying gar gnas/_/mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes/_/mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni/_/rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes/_/stod du rgyu ba lkog 
[\[276b.2\]]mthar gnas/_/'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no/_/me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas/_/don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no/_/khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas/_/rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni/_/srog dang rtsol 
[\[276b.3\]]ba rgyun 'di dang /_/dus kun du ni rgyu ba ni/_/srog ces bya ba yin par bshad/_/srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang /_/de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs/_/'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung /_/rtag tu rnal 'byor bas shes bya/_/dgod dang za dang lhag pa dang /_/kun du 'thung dang 
[\[276b.4\]]'jib pa dang /_/gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa/_/mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod/_/gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang /_/bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa/_/shes nas lhan cig 'byor pa dag_/gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya/_/khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni/_/
[\[276b.5\]]de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs/_/tshigs kun du ni khyab pa'i phyir/_/khyab byed ces ni bya bar bshad/_/rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/_/de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod/_/snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs/_/phan tshun du ni gnod par byed/_/gzhan ni 
[\[276b.6\]]gzhan la 'tshe ba yin/_/stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro/_/ji ltar zla ba gzas bzung la/_/rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba/_/snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong /_/rang gi bdag nyid la thim par/_/btang bzung slar yang 
[\[276b.7\]]'gro bar byed/_/ji ltar mes bsregs dngos med dang /_/rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro/_/slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba/_/las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa/_/de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang /_/slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas/_/de las las dang de las skyes/_/
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]de las chags sogs bag chags dang /_/de las slar yang 'chi dang skye/_/de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra/_/sngon bzhin rdo rje bzlas la sogs/_/rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur/_/de nas sems dpa' chen po kun/_/de nyid mig sman thur ma 
[\[277a.2\]]yis/_/thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal/_/yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong /_/de nas yang yang phyag byas te/_/mchi bcas mig gis bcom ldan la/_/lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas/_/rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod/_/e ma'o kun 'gro kun dbang 
[\[277a.3\]]phyug_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes/_/e ma'o dam tshig de nyid gsum/_/mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/_/khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/_/'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 
[\[277a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang /_/skye mched rnams la mi rten cing /_/srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing /_/spros pa med cing gos pa med/_/mkha' dang 
[\[277a.5\]]mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa/_/'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos/_/bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni/_/'jig rten gsum nas 
[\[277a.6\]]lha las rgyal/_/khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis/_/'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur/_/sa yi cha ni gang na 'di/_/rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud/_/dus kun du ni spyod 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[277a.7\]]rgyun du de nyid rang nyid kyis/_/khro bo bcu yis de las ni/_/rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la/_/bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor dang /_/rang rang phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni/_/de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul/_/sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/_/sna tshogs sprul 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]pa bstan nas ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun du/_/nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//_//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud 
[\[277b.2\]]dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang /_sgra bsgyur gyi 
[\[277b.3\]]lo tsA ba chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D446}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsa turde bI pa ri pr-its+tsha/_bod skad du/_lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa/_
[\[277b.4\]]dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing /_/sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa/_/shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhugs te/_/'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi/_/gsang chen chos kyi 'byung 
[\[277b.5\]]gnas la/_/byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su/_/chos kyi dbyings nas zhu mdzad do/_/zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas/_/lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa/_/bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/_/tshig 'di dag ni gsol pa ste/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni/_/
[\[277b.6\]]gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags/_/dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin/_/de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags/_/yan lag med pa gang de ni/_/yan lag dang bcas 'gyur nas su/_/lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags/_/mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/_/de bzhin lce dang lus 
[\[277b.7\]]dang yid/_/dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang /_/khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang /_/ma rig bag chags sred pa yis/_/bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs/_/rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa/_/ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags/_/dngos po med 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]pa bsgoms pa'i gzugs/_/gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams/_/rang bzhin med cing dmigs med la/_/dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags/_/de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni/_/bdag gi the tshom lhas bka' stsol/_/de ltar 
[\[278a.2\]]zhus ma thag tu ni/_/bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/_/shes rab zab pa zad med ni/_/nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya/_/dpyad du med cing shes bya min/_/de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/_/nam 
[\[278a.3\]]mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul lo/_/mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na/_/nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min/_/spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni/_/rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste/_/de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes/_/shes med so so'i skye gnas dang /_/
[\[278a.4\]]ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la/_/byol song bag chags las byung ba'i/_/dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skye ba rnams/_/de kun gyis kyang mi shes te/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen no/_/snying po shin tu snying po'i mchog_/gang de 
[\[278a.5\]]kun bdag la gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/_/lha mo khyod la bshad par bya/_/byang chub sems dag 'od gsal ba/_/zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos/_/yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo/_/de yi dbus 
[\[278a.6\]]su bzhugs pa'i lha/_/mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te/_/phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog_/yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs/_/rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa/_/'od zer chen po 'bar ba can/_/ji snyed dgu ba'i bar du ni/_/dpral bar la 
[\[278a.7\]]gnas rkang mthil bar/_/thig le de kho nar bsdus te/_/lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/_/cha shas lnga pa tsam yin te/_/bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la/_/cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyid/_/nga ro thig les brgyan byed pa/_/rdo rje khong nas phyung nas su/_/sa 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste/_/chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed/_/de ni rim par skyed byed na/_/sgo dgu la ni kun du 'gro/_/khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la/_/mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas/_/tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi/_/gzhi ni de las gyur 
[\[278b.2\]]ba'o/_/gang las gtso bor skyed byed pa/_/sa dang nam mkha' de zhes gsungs/_/ji srid lus la gnas pa'i bar/_/de yis las dang las min byed/_/dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang /_/bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin/_/sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te/_/mchod 
[\[278b.3\]]pa bsgom par gsungs pa yin/_/gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na/_/de tshe de yi rang mthu yis/_/de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te/_/gang gis g.yo dang mi g.yo khyab/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba/_/de ni gnas par shes par bya/_/bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig 
[\[278b.4\]]gi don/_/gang gis rtag tu bsgom byas na/_/des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur/_/so dang mchu dang rkan dang lce/_/mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni/_/gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid/_/de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro/_/brjod pa med 
[\[278b.5\]]cing the tshom pa/_/sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni/_/rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid/_/byang chub sems ni 'dir gsungs so/_/lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas lha mo mA ma kIs/_/rdo rje 
[\[278b.6\]]can la 'di zhus te/_/byang chub sems kyi rim pa yi/_/kha snying lte ba gsang ba la/_/'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni/_/rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal/_/cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs/_/gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur ba du/_/kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs/_/
[\[278b.7\]]de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal/_/rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal ba/_/cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing /_/pad+ma bzhi la yang dag gnas/_/snying ga'i pad+ma la gnas gnag_/kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar/_/nga ro lte ba'i pad+mar gnas/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma nga ro 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]mtha'/_/stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas/_/thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas/_/snom byed pa dang thos byed pa/_/de tshe mthong byed za byed pa/_/reg par byed kyang de kho nas/_/bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o/_/gang las bzhad byed bza' byed pa/_/
[\[279a.2\]]de bzhin cho nge dang ngu ba/_/'byed pa gcod pa de kho nas/_/cho ga rnam pa mang po shes/_/rgyal bo don yang byed par 'gyur/_/dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur/_/bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs smad pa'i rigs rnams dang /_/bud med du ma sprul 
[\[279a.3\]]par byed/_/dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skye ba dang /_/gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang /_/de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las/_/'byung ba thams cad skyed byed ma/_/de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas/_/mo gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs/_/bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas/_/
[\[279a.4\]]de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa/_/dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa gang /_/des ni gsang chen shes pa ste/_/gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa/_/kha dog med cing kha dog dmar/_/kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi/_/thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur ba 'di/_/'gro dang phyir 'ong rnam 
[\[279a.5\]]par bstan/_/gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs/_/skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la/_/thig le'i gzugs su rab gnas so/_/gang gi brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos/_/stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang /_/de yis de nyid mi shes te/_/de dag 
[\[279a.6\]]kun kyang 'bras med do/_/bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang /_/brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dus/_/sgra yig dang po yi ge a/_/lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan/_/snying rje chen po las byung ba/_/kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas btags/_/gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha/_/de 
[\[279a.7\]]ni spyi bor bstan pa yin/_/de dag gsang chen dam pa yin/_/lha mo bdag gis rab bstan to/_/lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo mA ma kIs zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lha mo gos dkar mos/_/yan lag kun gyis btud nas su/_/thal 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]mo snying gar sbyar byas te/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags/_/lha yi dbang phyug khyod la zhu/_/gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu/_/rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar 
[\[279b.2\]]lags/_/gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig_/'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags/_/chu khams dang ni me yi khams/_/ji ltar ro ni mnyam por 'gyur/_/ma las skye ba gsum tsam dang /_/de bzhin pha las skye ba gsum/_/de dag drug sogs gong bu las/_/
[\[279b.3\]]ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal/_/thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod/_/rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa/_/gsang ba shin tu gsang gyur pa/_/nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/_/skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/_/g.yon 
[\[279b.4\]]dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste/_/g.yon du byang chub sems zhes bya/_/g.yas su de bzhin rak+ta'o/_/de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba/_/chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin/_/mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs/_/thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te/_/rngul ni rak+ta byang 
[\[279b.5\]]chub sems/_/mun pa de bzhin skyed pa yin/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/_/rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro/_/dri chen chu dang shel me tog_/de bzhin lnga ba byang chub sems/_/bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus/_/de las rdo rje 'dir gsungs so/_/cha shas 
[\[279b.6\]]gnyis pa dang ldan pa/_/de bzhin dgu pa yang yin no/_/de skad gsungs pa de la ni/_/sum cu dang ni bcu dang ni/_/de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te/_/cha shas gnyis pa lnga yis ni/_/drug gis btags pa des byung ba/_/de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[279b.7\]]dbyings kyi yig 'bru bru~M/_/skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa/_/de nyid sa bon swA hAM mtha'/_/'dus pa la ni shes par bya/_/chu khams pha las skye zhes bya/_/me yi khams ni ma las skyes/_/sha dang khrag dang pags ba yang /_/ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do/_/tshil 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dang rkang dang khu ba ni/_/pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin/_/gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni/_/de dag tsam du bshad pa yin/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /_/de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams/_/sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs/_/phung 
[\[280a.2\]]po zhes byar bshad pa'o/_/lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo na bza' dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u gsum ba'o//_//de nas bzhad pa'i zhal 'gyur te/_/lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[280a.3\]]kyi sgrub pa ni/_/gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po/_/rdzas rnams sgrub par bka' stsal 'tshal/_/de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang /_/dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag pa dang /_/sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang /_/de bzhin mchod pa'i chog yang /_/khyad par du 
[\[280a.4\]]yang bka' stsal 'tshal/_/de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag_/rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni/_/nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/_/de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs/_/khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 
[\[280a.5\]]de dag kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o/_/de dag nyid las byung ba ni/_/byang chub sems zhes shes par bya/_/byang chub sems las gong bu skye/_/gong bu las kyang yid skyed do/_/yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni/_/khams rnams dang ni skye mched 
[\[280a.6\]]rnams/_/dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams/_/de ltar dbyings su bsdus pa ste/_/bsdu ba de ni bstan byas pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin/_/de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/_/sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya/_/ji ltar ka la pa zhes dngos kyis/_/bsgrub 
[\[280a.7\]]par bya ba rab tu brtag_/chos dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su/_/rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad/_/ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang /_/sa 'og ral gri'i dngos grub dang /_/nam mkhar 'phur dang mig sman dang /_/'chi ba med dang nad 'joms dang /_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]mi dang glang po che dang rta/_/glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang /_/rnga mo ma he spyang gi rnams/_/cha ni mnyam por bya ba'o/_/mthe bong tshigs tshad tsam du ni/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar/_/dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang /_/byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni/_/sngags 
[\[280b.2\]]bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te/_/byin gyis brlabs kyang bya ba'o/_/phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge AH/_/dbus su de bzhin hU~M byas te/_/'bar ba'i hU~M yig 'bar byed pa/_/dgu po de ni rab tu bsgrub/_/lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/_/sngags bzlas nas ni bye mar btags/_/
[\[280b.3\]]yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam du/_/lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya/_/tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/_/ril bu rnams ni byas nas su/_/pad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te/_/stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya/_/mtshams bzhi la ni bsgom byas nas/_/nyin dang mtshan du bza' 
[\[280b.4\]]bar bya/_/de nas bskal pa'i mtha' bar yang /_/dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste/_/gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson 'grus/_/lnga pa la ni smon lam yang /_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa/_/ril bu chen po zos phyir ro/_/rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams 
[\[280b.5\]]rdzogs nas/_/rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol/_/yi ge e dang ba~M yig dang /_/la~M yig dbus su yang dag gnas/_/dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste/_/gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba/_/gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su 
[\[280b.6\]]bsgom par bya/_/'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni/_/nyin phyed dang ni mtshan byed la/_/rig pa de ni rab 'byor na/_/de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub/_/lha mo lha min bu mo dang /_/mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor kun du ni/_/sngags kyis 
[\[280b.7\]]bkug nas spyad par bya/_/bsgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags/_/bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te/_/dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad par bya/_/dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon/_/dkyil 'khor lus zhes gsungs pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pa yin/_/dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni/_/dkyil 'khor gsum du btags pa yin/_/btags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste/_/gang du gtso bo skyed bar byed/_/phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs/_/'byung ba rig mar 
[\[281a.2\]]btags pa'o/_/chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste/_/zhags pa pad+mar chud byed pa/_/kha phrad pa ni sgrog yin par/_/sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bur bshad/_/spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te/_/me tog rak+ta zhes 'dod do/_/mar me sha rnams kho na yin/_/
[\[281a.3\]]dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod/_/sgeg mo ling+gar bstan pa ste/_/phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin/_/dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang /_/gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs/_/de rtogs ba ni skal bzang yin/_/
[\[281a.4\]]rtogs pa de rnams byams pa sogs/_/de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs/_/dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin/_/sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya/_/nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi/_/sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te/_/phyi ni sngon du bstan pa 
[\[281a.5\]]yin/_/nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni/_/pad+ma bzhi rnams 'byor pa ni/_/lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas/_/me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni/_/dbang chen dang ni chu de bzhin/_/rlung gis me ni 'bar byas te/_/chu yis yongs su smin par byed/_/dbang chen 
[\[281a.6\]]dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/gang du me ni bskyod pa'o/_/ra yig mngon spyod yi ge ste/_/ya yig dbang gi las kho na/_/la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/_/ba yig zhi ba zhes gsungs so/_/gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni/_/de dag thams cad chu 
[\[281a.7\]]la ste/_/pad+ma ra k+ShaHyig kha mar lta/_/snying gi pad+mar btsud par bya/_/lte ba'i pad+mar 'gro phyi rol/_/kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis/_/gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro ma thag_/thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan/_/de ltar sbyin sreg bdag bshad pa/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]nyin dang nyin du bya ba ste/_/rtag par rgyun du zas zos na/_/tshe 'di kho nar 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgas pa med cing nad kyang med/_/'chi ba med cing 'bras rnams med/_/de ni glo bur 'chi ba med/_/'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing /_/rmi lam ngan 
[\[281b.2\]]yang zhi bar 'gyur/_/bzang po bskal par gson ba ste/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar smra/_/mthong ba tsam gyis skul byed do/_/sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas/_/lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya/_/dri dang phreng sogs gos rnams dang /_/
[\[281b.3\]]spos me zas dang lha bshos kyis/_/dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas/_/bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya/_/bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te/_/de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 
[\[281b.4\]]rtag tu mchod/_/gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las/_/rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bsgom/_/zas dang btung ba de bzhin gos/_/de bzhin dri dang phreng kho nas/_/rig ma bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i/_/bdag ni lha nyid bsam par bya/_/de ltar 
[\[281b.5\]]bshad nas rdo rje de/_/cang mi gsung bar dngos por bzhugs/_/de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis/_/phyag gis thal mo sbyar gyur te/_/rab tu zhal ni rnam bzhad nas/_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/_/rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste/_/cang mi gsung 
[\[281b.6\]]bar bzhugs gyur to/_/lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal o D+yan gyi yul nas 
[\[281b.7\]]byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]{D447}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji skad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes 
[\[282a.2\]]rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dang /_sems las byung ba dang /_sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags/_
[\[282a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/_/byams pas gsol 
[\[282a.4\]]ba/_bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' zab ba/_'gag pa med pa/_skye ba med pa/_de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang /_snang 
[\[282a.5\]]ba nye bar thob pa dang /_stong pa chen po'o/_/de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/_de ni snang ba mched pa dang shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so/_/sems las byung ba'i 
[\[282a.6\]]rkyen gyis sems te/_de ni snang ba dang stong pa ste/_sems dang sems las byung ba dang /_ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o/_/gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung bas rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/_/de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[282a.7\]]de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]kyi bu ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/_e ma'o ston pa rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu 
[\[282b.2\]]zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/_de ni chos 
[\[282b.3\]]thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang gzhan dag tu'o/_/rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo /_/rlung las me'o/_/me las chu'o/_/chu las sa'o/_de rnams las 
[\[282b.4\]]phung po lnga dang /_skye mched drug dang /_yul lnga ste/_de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o/_/de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/_snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 
[\[282b.5\]]'byung ngo /_/de la 'od gsal ba gnas med pa/_'gag pa med pa/_skye ba med pa/_don dam pa'i bden pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o/_/de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang /_'khrul pa dang /_rnam par g.yeng 
[\[282b.6\]]ba dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_le lo dang /_mi smra ba dang /_mi gsal ba'o/_/ma rig pa sems las byung ba ste/_nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang /_shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang /_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu 
[\[282b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_drag po la sogs pa dang /_kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang /_lha'i tshogs dang /_mtshan ma dang /_rdo rje'i brda'o/_/sems las byung ba las sems te/_zla ba'i snang ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o/_/rang 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o/_/kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyi/_bud med dang /_b+ha ga dang /_pad+ma dang /_lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o/_/rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las/_rang gi 
[\[283a.2\]]rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o/_/me las chu ste/_nur nur po'i rnam pa dang /_de las mer mer po dang /_nar nar po dang /_gor gor po dag go/_/de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so/_/de khu ba dang khrag dag gis 
[\[283a.3\]]bskyed pa'o/_/de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so/_/'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste/_de'i phyir lus te/_lus las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang /_
[\[283a.4\]]gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa/_A li kA li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang /_sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pas bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs 
[\[283a.5\]]su gyur pa'o/_/rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o/_/sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o/_/de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/_de'i 
[\[283a.6\]]phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_mig 'phrul dang /_dbang po'i gzhu dang /_glog 
[\[283a.7\]]dang /_chu bur dang /_me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed ba yin no/_/ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang /_ji ltar til las til mar te/_de bzhin du rdo rjes ni thabs 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang /_pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar 'o ma dang til dag yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/_sngags dang phyag rgya mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo 
[\[283b.2\]]rje dang /_pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so/_/gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus ba des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do/_/bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos 
[\[283b.3\]]ba tsam gyis ni las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/_phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro/_/gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni/_bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu 
[\[283b.4\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod 
[\[283b.5\]]chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa/_rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa/_'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa/_ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas 
[\[283b.6\]]smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar 
[\[283b.7\]]lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so/_/legs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig_/mtha' ni mu ste/_'od gsal ba yang dag 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phung po dang /_
[\[284a.2\]]khams dang /_skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo/_/stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur ba 
[\[284a.3\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar mes shing bsregs te/_thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi ye 
[\[284a.4\]]shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang /_ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[284a.5\]]bzhin du stong pa dang /_shin tu stong pa dang /_stong pa chen po rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[284a.6\]]cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dgongs pas bshad pa dang /_dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang /_drang ba'i don dang /_nges pa'i don dang /_sgra ji bzhin pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin 
[\[284a.7\]]pa ma yin pa rnams so/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste/_tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang mthar thug par bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bshad pa ste/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags ma yin pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang /_bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid med pa dang /_
[\[284b.2\]]bdag med pa dang /_thams cad stong pa dang /_dag pa dang /_'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o/_/ga pur dang /_khrag chen po dang /_tsan+dan dmar po dang /_rdo rje dang /_pad+ma dang /_phyag 
[\[284b.3\]]rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te/_ga bur ni khu ba dang /_khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang /_tsan+dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan+dan dmar po'o/_/rdo rje ni mtshan ma ste thabs so/_/pad+ma ni b+ha ga ste shes rab dang /_
[\[284b.4\]]phyag rgya dang /_btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to/_/gnyis ka dang /_spyod pa dang /_bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_dkyil 'khor dang /_mchod sbyin dang /_gtor ma dang /_sman 
[\[284b.5\]]dang /_zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang /_de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste/_de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o/_/kotrA khya/_ko trA ba/_ko trAH/_ko trA bash+tsa/_ko tri rA kA/_ko 
[\[284b.6\]]la khya/_ko la ba/_ko la/_ko la bash+tsa/_ko la sta tha/_'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/_de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/_
[\[284b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang /_gnyis ka'i rgyud dang /_spyod pa'i rgyud dang /_bya ba'i rgyud dang /_rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/_rgyas par phye na grangs med do/_/gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/_/spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do/_/bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/_/rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/_/de dag ni stong phrag sum cu 
[\[285a.2\]]rtsa bzhi ste/_rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni/_ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya ra la wa/_sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/_'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so/_/byang 
[\[285a.3\]]chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang /_cho ga dang /_bsgrub bya dang /_sgrub pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim 
[\[285a.4\]]gyis langs te/_'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyi bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/_'jig rten gyi spyod pa 
[\[285a.5\]]dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gang gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so/_/rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang /_de las byung ba'i byed pa dang /_las 
[\[285a.6\]]dang /_sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni gnyis ka'i rgyud la bzhugs so/_/las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang /_sgrub par byed pa ni 
[\[285a.7\]]spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so/_/'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang /_ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang /_bdag nyid lha'i bsnyems pa med pa dang /_rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang /_skyon gyi rgyu'i 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]rtog pas rab tu dpyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so/_/sngags dang /_sman dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_phye ma dang /_mig sman dang /_rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu dpyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni rtog pa'i rgyud la 
[\[285b.2\]]bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang /_rigs pa rnam pa bzhi 
[\[285b.3\]]dang /_bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang /_dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang /_gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang /_bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so/_/gleng ba bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste/_ming dang /_gang gi don du byas pa dang /_byed 
[\[285b.4\]]pa po dang /_tshad dang /_dgos pa rnams so/_/mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/_dgongs pas bshad pa dang /_dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang /_drang ba'i don dang /_nges ba'i don dang /_sgra ji bzhin pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin 
[\[285b.5\]]pa ma yin pa rnams so/_/rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni/_rgyud dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_nges tshig dang /_rgyu rnams so/_/bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni/_yi ge'i don dang /_spyi'i don dang /_sbas pa dang /_mthar thug pa rnams so/_/dbye ba rnam pa 
[\[285b.6\]]gnyis ni 'di lta ste/_tshogs la bshad pa dang /_slob ma la bshad pa'o/_/gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni 'di lta ste/_rin po che dang /_tsan+dan dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_ut+pal rnams so/_/bden pa rnam pa gnyis 
[\[285b.7\]]kyi dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o/_/de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o/_/don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/de'i mtha' ni gnas so/_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba/_/don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po pas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[286a.2\]]pa/_ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te/_sems 
[\[286a.3\]]can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do/_/de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa 
[\[286a.4\]]zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/_bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o/_/rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/_slad nas bla ma de nyid dang /_
[\[286a.5\]]dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa//_//ye shes rdo rje kun las btus/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin/_/ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo'o/_/de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste/_/
[\[286a.6\]]kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus/_/de ston pa la der btags nas/_/gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin//_//
[\[286a.7\]]
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]{D448}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa mA dza pa ra mA r+tha sarba ka rmod ya nA ma tA rA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_phrin las thams cad 'byung ba'i sgrol mang 'dus pa don dam pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas dngos grub 
[\[286b.2\]]thams cad ni/_/rab tu sgrub byed bshad par bya/_/bud med bye ba phrag brgya yang /_/bdag la dad pas 'dud par byed/_/lha dang lha min rig 'dzin dang /_/mi yi gtso bo dbang du byed/_/nyi ma zla ba dang mtshungs shing /_/mkha' lding rgyal pos rnam par 'dud/_/klu rnams sdigs 
[\[286b.3\]]par byed pa dang /_/mid nga mi min gang gi yang /_/bu mo thams cad 'dzag byed pa/_/skyes pa gcig gis 'dod chen gyis/_/mi yi bu mo khri phrag dang /_/nyin re lha dang lha min mo/_/bud med 'bum phrag zil gnon pa/_/khu bar rengs ba'i byed pa las/_/gcig gis 
[\[286b.4\]]thams cad 'dod spyod pa/_/rdo rjer byed pa rab tu bshad/_/'jigs pa kun las thar pa dang /_/bskal ba chen por tshe yang gnas/_/mkha' la 'gro dang mi snang dang /_/ri lu la sogs rig 'dzin dang /_/bcud kyi len dang gnon sbyin mo/_/rab tu sgrub byed sngags chen po/_/
[\[286b.5\]]khag khrig bcu gnyis mkha' 'gro ma/_/'byung po bye ba mthu chen dang /_/grong 'khyer gsum 'dzoms tshangs sogs lha/_/mngag gzhug nyid du byed par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na rdo rje can/_/sangs rgyas dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor sprul/_/bde mchog bde mchog 
[\[286b.6\]]dgos rdo rje/_/yid bde thigs le la sogs bstan/_/'bum phrag brgya ba sgrol ma yi/_/sngags kyi rgyal po sngon bshad pa/_/rdzogs ldan dus su mi rnams spyod/_/de nas 'bum phrag drug pa bshad/_/de yang nub nas khri gnyis spyod/_/phyi ma'i dus su bshad pa 
[\[286b.7\]]yin/_/de yi snying po rtsod dus 'dir/_/g.yon pas spyod pas rnams spyod pas/_/nges brjod 'bum gyi rjes 'brang ba/_/slar yang rgyud 'di snang ba 'gyur/_/nges pa 'dod chags chags chen 'dis/_/'dod ldan rnams la byang chub ster/_/sangs rgyas phrin 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]las thams cad 'byung /_/dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya'i sngags/_/mkha' 'gro ma kun 'dus pa las/_/dam pa'i don yang 'grub pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dam tshig sgron mas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/_/oM tA re 
[\[287a.2\]]tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'di ni dngos grub thams cad byed pa'o/_/oM ku ru kul+le hrIHswAhA/_ku ru ku l+le'o/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re hU~M phaT/_snying po'o/_/oM tA re swA hA/_gsung skul ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/oM AHta~M hU~M/_thugs sprul ba byed pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo 
[\[287a.3\]]A rla A ba lo ki te shra ru ya/_po d+hi sarbA ya/_ma hA swA twa ya/_ma hA ka ru NI kA ya/_ta ng+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TaM/_pra duSh+TaM/_ma ma kr-i te/_dzam+b+ha ya/_staM b+ha ya/_mo hA ya/_ban+d+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M h+ya~M/_phaT phaTaphaT/_sarba duSh+TaM staM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/_'di ni las 
[\[287a.4\]]thams cad byed pa'o/_/ma~M ma~M pa~M ta~M hU~M/_lha mo lnga'i'o/_/oM A ra l+l-i b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha si si si si/_zhes pa ni he ru ka'i sngags so/_/oM A ral+l-ir gi pheM pheM pheM b+h+yo swA hA/_zhes pa ni sngags gnyis pa'o/_/oM badzra pA rA hI A be sha ya sarba dz+wa ra Na hrIHswA hA/_rdo rje phag mo'o/_/
[\[287a.5\]]oM ma ri ts+ye ma swA hA/_'od zer can ma'i'o/_/oM hriM trIM hU~M phaT/_ral pa gcig ma'i'o/_/oM swA hA/_zhi bar byed pa'o/_/oM oM/_rgyas par byed pa'o/_/oM bA Sha Ta ho/_dbang du byed pa'o/_/oM phaT/_gsod pa byed pa'o/_/swA hA/_la~M/_la~M/_la~M/_hrIH_dzaH
[\[287a.6\]]phaT/_phaT/_ces pa ni las brgyad byed pa'o/_dzaHhU~M [(]baM [,]ba~M [)]hoH/_'gugs pa byed pa'o/_/oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_srung ba'i'o/_/spa ra Na phaT/_spro ba'i'o//_oM a krod+hai ka ya mAn+tA ka hU~M/_gshin rje gshin kyi'o/_/oM na mo a tsa la kA na tseT+TA tseT+TA tseT+TA tse T+TA 
[\[287a.7\]]tuT+Ta tuT+Ta g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/_gtam po'i'o//_oM pad+mAn+da kr-ita badzra kro d+ha b+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_rta mgrin gyi'o//_na maHsaman+ta bud+d+he b+ho/_na mo mA hA badzra krod+hA ya/_ma hA b+h+ro tA Ta b+hai ra dA bA ya/_badzra san+do tad ng+ha ya/_oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M phaT/_
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o//_oM hU~M shri ya de bI kA lI kA lI mA hA kA lI hU~M b+h+yo/_oM mA hA kA lI ka ra lI bikran+da kA la rA tI can+Da ru piNI hU~M phaT/_lha mo nag mo'i sngags so/_/oM badzra kI li kI lA ya sarba big+hAnA m+ta hU~M phaT/_phur bus gdab pa'i 'o/_/sngags kyi le'u ste 
[\[287b.2\]]dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs ka nas zhags pa dang lcags dkyu'i tshogs spros te/_na maHsan+ta kA ya pA k+tsiT+Ta badzrANAM oM Tak+ki hU~M dzaH_zhes pa'i sngags 'di phyung ngo /_/gdug pa thams cad bkug nas kyang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[287b.3\]]su skyel nas ni/_/rdo rje phur ba'i tshogs spros nas/_/gnas lnga dag tu phur bus btab/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil ba khro bo che/_/rdo rje phur bu skul bar mdzod/_/stong gsum dag gi khor yug la/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching bar mdzad/_/oM laM s+t+wa m+b+ha ya laM/_
[\[287b.4\]]grog mkhar sa la gzigs byas nas/_/rkang pa g.yas pas mnan byas la/_/mi rus las skyes phur bu yis/_/btab na de yi mod la 'chi/_/sbrul dang seng+ge glang po dang /_/rkun po'i yan lag dag la gdab/_/'di yi gdug cing sdang sems ldan/_/log 
[\[287b.5\]]'dren dag la gdab par bya/_/ye shes pad+ma kha phye nas/_/rdo rje phur bu'i kha sbyor bas/_/rang rang rigs kyi mgo bo bcas/_/rdo rje sems sogs sngags la gdab/_/'di yis rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje phur bus btab pa na/_/phung po rab tu 'jig pa dang /_/
[\[287b.6\]]rdo rje gnas kyang thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/_/zla ba nyi ma'i rlung gi dbus/_/rang sngags sa bon bsgom par bya/_/lha yi de nyid dmigs gyur na/_/bcu drug pa la de 'grub 'gyur/_/sems ni nam 
[\[287b.7\]]mkha' gyur pa la/_/zla ba nyi ma nub pa dang /_/min pa'i ye shes thim pa na/_/rdo rje lha ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/yang na rdo rje'i rtul zhugs kyis/_/lus kyi dri ma rab sbyangs nas/_/ye shes chen po rang sngags lha/_/zla ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur/_/rang 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]sngags sa bon 'od zer gyis/_/rdo rje gur sogs brtag par bya/_/'jigs pa brgyad las bsrung pa dang /_/lus med rnams kyis kyang mi mthong /_/spu las nad rnams spre'u 'am/_/khyi dang 'dra bar rab tu dbyung /_/ye shes sems dpa'i 
[\[288a.2\]]dam tshig 'dis/_/rdo rjes mtshon chas bsnun par bya/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/ye shes me dpung dkar po bsam/_/sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i/_/gnas las me ni 'bar ba bsgrubs/_/mtshams med lnga dag byed pa yang /_/gtsang ma'i 
[\[288a.3\]]gnas su 'gropa bar bya/_/sdig pa rdo rje'i ye shes 'dis/_/skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur/_/lte ba'i dbus su reg pa sam/_/a ni mchog tu phra ba ste/_/mi 'gyur nyams dga' bde ba'i gnas/_/mi shigs tshangs pa 'grub pa'i 'gyur/_/rang sngags 
[\[288a.4\]]hU~M dang yi ge oM/_/rdo rje AHyig bsam par bya/_/rlung gi de nyid rab grub nas/_/mi 'gro drag po'i ngag tu 'gyur/_/'od zer rnam lnga snying gar gnas/_/pad+mas rdo rjer byed pa ste/_/ye shes khyab 'jug rgyal por 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[288a.5\]]rdo rje snying po la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'di ci zhig lags/_lte ba las ni rlung khams 'byung /_/ci phyir lus kyi chos su 'gyur/_/bdud las 'das pa'i lam bsgoms pas/_/ji ltar tshangs pa la sogs 'gyur/_/
[\[288a.6\]]pad+mas rdo rje 'byed byed ci/_/'di dag ci phyir 'gal mi 'gyur/_/dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pas gsungs/_/nyon cig rdo rje ji bzhin nyon/_/lus ni gzhan dag yod ma yin/_/sems kyi rang bzhin rnam g.yo ba/_/de las 'khrul ba'i lus po 'byung /_/lte ba spu zhes bshad pa ste/_/de dag de las byung ba 
[\[288a.7\]]yin/_/bram ze mo la 'dod spyod pa/_/rdo rje sku ru 'gyur ba'o/_/rlung gis smra bar byed pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje ngag ste de nyid brjod/_/dbyangs mkhan bu mos dam tshig gis/_/rdo rje'i gsungs du 'gyur ba yin/_/'khrul pas gnyis su rtog pa'i sems/_/thig le 'di las 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]mig mdzes g.yung mo'i dam tshig gis/_/rdo rje thugs su 'gyur pa'o/_/nga ni 'gro bas mi shes te/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/'phrul ldan lha zhes 'jig rten rtog_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ste/_/thams cad nga yi rnam par 'phrul/_/sku 
[\[288b.2\]]yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur/_/gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che/_/'jug sel thugs kyi rdo rje'o/_/'di ni yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sems can khams la dbyer med de/_/de dag rnams kyi lus ngag yid/_/mnyam gyur tshangs la sogs par snang /_/lus 
[\[288b.3\]]ni sprul ba'i 'khor lo gnas/_/mgrin pa de bzhin rmi lam mo/_/gnyid kyi rnal 'byor snying gar dgod/_/bde bar spyi bor mngon par brjod/_/gzhan yang rtsa lhug brjod pa dang /_/ri bong stag sogs chu bo dang /_/nyin mtshan la sogs dngos kun tu/_/sangs 
[\[288b.4\]]rgyas gar mkhan zlos dar mdzad/_/gnyid la rdo rjes rnam sgom pa/_/tshangs pa'i dam tshig gti mug spor/_/gzhan gyis gnyid dag spong bar dka'/_/bud med bral la sdom brtson med/_/'dod ldan tshangs spyod chen po ni/_/zhi ba'i dam tshig 'dod chags 
[\[288b.5\]]spong /_/zhe sdang rdo rjer rnam sgom na/_/rmongs sel khyab 'jug dam tshig go/_/gzhan la byams pas spong bar dka'/_/rnam pa 'di gsum gsang chen po/_/lha yi bde ba ser snar bcas/_/brtson 'grus phrag dog dam tshig ste/_/g.yo sgyus bdud rnams 
[\[288b.6\]]'dul byed pa/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka'/_/pad+ma'i snying po bde ba can/_/ji srid ma rnyed 'bras bu med/_/rdor dbyings dbang phyug rtsa 'di yis/_/rdo rje gnyis spang 'byed par byed/_/shes rab rtogs pa byed pa thabs/_/shes rab med la thabs 
[\[288b.7\]]mkhas med/_/rdo rjes pad+ma rgyas byed kyi/_/pad+mas rdo rje 'byed par byed/_/sprul pa bde chen 'khor los kyang /_/chos dang longs spyod rnam par 'byed/_/de ltas 'di ni gsang chen ste/_/rgyud gzhan du ni 'bad pas sbas/_/de la 'di ni sku gsum rdo rje'i 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gsang ba'o/_/sems med gnas dang 'khrul skyed dang /_/sngon gnas rnam par gsal ba yi/_/'jig rten 'di la sku gsum gnas/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa'o/_/rang byung ngo bo brjod med pa/_/chos kun rang bzhin zhi 
[\[289a.2\]]ba brnyes/_/rkyen ni rnam par bkra ba mkhyen/_/rdo rje can gyi chos sku'o/_/me long gzugs brnyan ltar sems 'di/_/phra zhing lus ni rngul med pa/_/skad kyang sgra brnyan lta bu ste/_/dag pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'o/_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/
[\[289a.3\]]sprul pa tha dad sna tshogs 'jug_/longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa ste/_/gcig gyur 'dren pa bde ba che/_/rtsa yi dra ba lha mo ste/_/de bzhin khams dang nyer bcas pa'i/_/bud med rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor/_/spangs nas ri mo su zhig len/_/de la 
[\[289a.4\]]'di ni rjes su rnal 'byor gyi dam tshig go/_/dri mas sems ni mngon bsgos pas/_/rnam shes ye shes bdag mi 'gyur/_/theg pa mchog gi bgrod pa'i gnas/_/ye shes dbang mo nyan par ma 'tshal/_/nyon cig ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/_/dngos po bden rdzun rnam 
[\[289a.5\]]dpyad na/_/rdzun pa'i rdo rje yang dag mthong /_/rang bzhin dag pa'i de kho na/_/a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/hU~M zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/phaT kyi bya ba ni gdags par byed pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/tra~M zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 
[\[289a.6\]]gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/AHzhes bya ba ni smra ba thams cad kyi gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/ha zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/hrU+i zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/oM zhes bya ba ni 'jigs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/khaM zhes bya 
[\[289a.7\]]ba ni nam mkha' lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/oM zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/k+Sha zhes bya ba ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/aHzhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/ya zhes bya ba ni rdi rje rlung ste gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]ra zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me ste gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/wa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chu ste gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sa ste gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/taM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ste gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/iM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dpa' bo rnams te gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/bi 
[\[289b.2\]]zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams su byed pa ste gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi sgo'o/_/rnam shes ye shes rnal 'byor te/_/de dag rdo rje rab sbyor bas/_/rnal 'byor la ni rnal 'byor bsgom/_/rjes kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o/_/
[\[289b.3\]]de la 'di ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi dam tshig go/_/spre'u dang glog ltar mi gnas pa/_/rab tu gzungs par dka' ba'i sems/_/'dod pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa/_/ye shes dbang mo mnyan par 'tshal/_/nyon cig ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/_/gser khams rdo la snum 
[\[289b.4\]]gnas pa/_/mngon par zhi ba yod ma yin/_/sreg dang dbye ba'i thabs kyi ni/_/nyi ma bzhin du rnam par gsal/_/lcags bzhin me la rnam bzod na/_/gzhan dag ci phyir mi bzod byed/_/de phyir ye shes rnam shes dag_/cha gnyis rnam par rtog 
[\[289b.5\]]mi bya/_/cha gnyis las ni sdig pa 'byung /_/sdig pas bsod nams zad par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal sdig pa zhes brjod de/_/bla med bde ba bsod nams so/_/bde dang sdug bsngal mnyam gyur ba/_/bsod nams sdig med rnam par thar/_/sdug 
[\[289b.6\]]bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs te/_/dge dang sdig pa rnam par 'byed/_/bu mo'i longs spyod bde ba yis/_/rnam par mi rtog gnyis med 'grub/_/ri bo nyams ni dga' ba dang /_/nags tshal dben pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mig bzang brtan pa'o blo ldan 
[\[289b.7\]]bzung /_/dang po 'dus par byas nas ni/_/rdo rje cho ga rab tu bsgrub/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'o mchog_/dam tshig chen po byin gyis brlab/_/khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang /_/de bzhin shin tu rgyong ba dang /_/khab dang gru mo'i mtshan nyid bya/_/
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]bung ba lta bur i yi sgra/_/nges par blo dang ldan pas bskul/_/sgeg chos stabs kyis 'khrud nas ni/_/mgo yi skra bzung lkog ma gzir/_/ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi gzhib par bya/_/rdo rje 'khyud pas 'khyud pa dang /_/rdo rje 'o 
[\[290a.2\]]yis 'o gdab cing /_/so dang sen mos bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje pad+mar rab 'jug cing /_/swi ta kyi sgra rnams byed pa dang /_/nu ma 'tshir dang skyes pa'i tshul/_/sbyor ba thams cad bya bar bya/_/nu ma sor mo rke dang ma mchu dang /_/rna ba mig dang spyi bo b+ha gar 
[\[290a.3\]]yang /_/'o bya rna ba mchan khung rke dang rtags/_/sen mos gdab byu nu ma mchan khung dang /_/mkhur tshos 'gram dang rkang lag mthil dag tu/_/nyed par bya zhing 'khyud pa'i stabs brgyad bya/_/sor mo ling ga lce dang lces bskyod nas/_/pad+ma bskul zhing rtsa mchog 
[\[290a.4\]]sad par bya/_/zab che ba dang /_shin tu chung ba dang /_lhod pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_rtag tu 'dzag pa dang /_drod dang gsher dang bral ba'i b+ha ga ni spang ngo /_/dpangs mtho ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_steng mnyam pa dang /_brgyas shing dam pa dang /_khrag 
[\[290a.5\]]dang khu bar ldan pa dang /_spu nyung ba dang /_dus ma yin par mi 'dzag pa dang /_ring zhing snying po zlum pa ni skal ba bzang mo'o/_/de yongs su bskul bas ji srid du khong nas sIta kyi sgra 'byung ba de srid du'o/_/haHzhes bya bas mchog tu dga' ba'i tshe bcing bar bya'o/_/yang 
[\[290a.6\]]na/_hU~M zhes bya ba snying ga la gnas pa'i sgra yis so/_/yang na hriM ha zhes bya ba mgrin pa la gnas pa'i sgra yis so/_/hU~M dang phaTaHkyi bya ba dang /_mda' bo che'i sbyong ba byas la khu ba bcing bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang cha bzhi ba'i phyed kyi mtshams su lhan cig skyes pa 
[\[290a.7\]]bsgoms par bya ste/_gal te b+ha ga'i ze'u 'bru la gnas pa'i thig le yang rdo rje'i khas btung bar bya'o/_/skor ba la sogs pa'i sbyar ba dang /_rlung gis sbyor bas mnyam par bya'o/_/'di la dgang ba dang /_gzhil ba dang /_rengs pa dang /_bum pa can gyi sbyor bas dag
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]par byas nas/_mi mo rnams kyi sbyor ba la 'jug ste//_lus 'di nyid kyi dngos grub thob par bya'o/_/de las dga' ba bzhi'i dbye bas sgrub pa po la rengs pa dang /_rngul ba dang /_ba spu ldang ba dang /_dbugs 'gyur ba dang /_'dar ba dang /_kha dog log pa dang /_
[\[290b.2\]]mchi ma 'byung ba dang /_thim pa zhes bya ba snying stobs brgyad 'byung ngo /_/bu mos ye shes thob pa ni/_/snying ni 'gul zhing thob pa dang /_/'dar dang dran pa nyams pa dang /_/skra grol gcer bu gsher bas khyab/_/mdog dmar rab tu phra ba'i mig_/ye shes 
[\[290b.3\]]lnga yi rnam par 'phrul/_/bud med shes bar ye shes te/_/de las ye shes lnga thob 'gyur/_/rdo rje chu skyes sbyor ldan pa/_/sku yi rdo rje snyan par brjod/_/rlung ni mnyam par gyur ba dang /_/sIta kyi sgra dang skad 'gyur pa/_/gsung ni nye bar sgrub pa po/_/skyob pa 
[\[290b.4\]]las ni rab zhu ba/_/nor bu bcu drug cha babs te/_/yid kyi bde bas gnyis 'gag pas/_/thugs kyi de nyid sgrub par mdzod/_/gzhu yi gzugs can rab sbyor bas/_/dung dang kun+da ltar thig le/_/sdom brtson bde bas gzung bar bya/_/rang gi rig pa'i 
[\[290b.5\]]ye shes mchog_/grub pa chen po de nyid de/_/rnam shes ye shes dag par byed/_/'di yis rdo rje bdag nyid che/_/sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba'i/_/ye shes rgya mtsho 'grub par 'gyur/_/ye shes chen po rab sbyor bas/_/shin tu rnal 'byor mkhas pas 
[\[290b.6\]]bstod/_/bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/_/dam tshig rnams kyi mchog gi mchog_/ngan zos ngan spyad thams cad kyis/_/sgrib pa dag tu yongs mi 'gyur/_/de skad ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rnal 'byor dang po'i dam tshig go/_u t+pal mi 'jigs 
[\[290b.7\]]phyag rgya can/_/phyag gnyis rnal 'byor bsgoms byas la/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi ba/_/dbus su kun nas zlum po ste/_/las kyi snam bu lnga dang ldan/_/ut+pal dmar po sil mar dgram/_/zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]ba las/_/dam tshig sgrol ma bsam par bya/_/ljang sngon 'od zer dmar po 'khyil/_/mche ba gtsigs pa me stag 'bar/_/mchod sbyin gri gug Da ma ru/_/mda' dang ut+pal sdong po dang /_/thod pa khrag can rtsa gsum dang /_/bzhi ba me 
[\[291a.2\]]tog gzhu 'dzin pa'o/_/dur khrod rgyan dang ut+pal rgyan/_/g.yas brkyang rol ba'i skyil krung can/_/rang rang sngags las lha mo'o tshogs/_/snying ga'i dbus nas spro bar bya/_/oM tA re swA hA/_mig la'o/_/oM tut+tA re swA hA/_rna ba la'o/_/oM tu swA hA/_
[\[291a.3\]]lce la'o/_/oM re swA hA/_snying ga la'o/_/oM tA re Ni swA hA/_spyi bo la'o//sngags kyi bdag pos byin rlabs dang /_/ye shes dam tshig mnyam par bya/_/dbang gi don ni bsgoms byas la/_/rang lhar sems ni brtan bya'o/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i le'u ste 
[\[291a.4\]]gnyis pa'o//_//de nas sgrol mas bka' stsal pa/_/oM lA~M mA~M pA~M tA~M/_hU~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_oM hu~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_oM hU~M tA~M hU~M badzra a ng+hi ba ti stAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_oM dzaHhU~M bo hoH
[\[291a.5\]]badzra sa twa staM badzra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/ka ba brgyad kyi nye bar mdzes/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/phyi rol rwa ba me rir bcas/_/dur khrod dag kyang bri bar bya/_/dbus su u t+pal 
[\[291a.6\]]mthing ga dgod/_/shar tu zhi ba'i u t+pal dang /_/byang du bum pa bri bar bya/_/nub tu lcags kyu 'bar ba ste/_/ral gri lho ru dgod par bya/_zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/_/gsod byed rnams kyi mtshan ma'o/_/grwa bzhir rigs kyi lha mo ste/_/ut+pal 
[\[291a.7\]]mdzes pa re re bri/_/lcags kyu la sogs sgo ru dgod/_/stobs chen pha rol gnod pa yi/_khro bo rnams kyang grwar dgod do/_/las rnams byed pa'i lha mo'i tshogs/_/phyi rol dag tu bri bar bya/_/dbus su bdag nyid gnas byas nas/_/rdo rje mtshan ma'i 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]tshogs spros pas/_/sems can khams rnams sbyang bar bya/_/mchod pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i khams/_/mchog tu gang ba spro bar bya/_/me tog gang du ma nyams pa/_/b+ha ga mchog las yang dag blangs/_/rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo mchod/_/
[\[291b.2\]]yang gsungs pa/_sgo dgu nges pa bkag byas nas/_/rgyas par lnga yi mchod rten las/_/srog gi rtse mor rang gi sems/_/mda' gzhi'i sbyor bas 'pho bar bya/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/'di yis grol 'gyur the tshom med/_/rig pa'i 
[\[291b.3\]]brtul zhugs spyad bya ste/_/mi lpags ras rnying bgo ba'am/_/gcer bu'i brtul zhugs byas nas ni/_/dogs pa'i sems ni kun spangs nas/_/ji lta bur na snang ba 'di/_/'dod spyod bde ba la bsdus nas/_/ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis/_/bla 
[\[291b.4\]]med byang chub bsgrub par bya/_/de la 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'o/_/gang las slob dpon dbang bskur ba/_/slob dpon gcig tu gyur ba yi/_/sring mo sgrol ma dang mnyam brtag_/rdo rje slob dpon de bzhin du/_/rig ma'am bdag gi rig ma yang /_/slob dpon 
[\[291b.5\]]mchog tu yongs su brjod/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun mnyam pas/_/de yi grib ma'ang 'gong mi bya/_/'on kyang dga' ma dges dbang mo/_/gnyis kyi sgo dgu las byung ba/_/mi rtog snod gcig bza' ba dang /_/gtsang sbra'i sems kyis tsum+ha dbul/_/lhan cig 
[\[291b.6\]]mal bstan longs bstan nas/_/lag gis rdo rje bzung gsor te/_/yo nir sor bya dam 'khyud nas/_/tshig dang yi ges dges bskul bas/_/so dang sen ris 'drud pa dang /_/'jib dang sgo yis zas 'bul ba/_/gus dang chags bcas bag rkyong bas/_/'gong 
[\[291b.7\]]ba 'di la nyes med de/_/slob dpon dges las dngos grub kun/_/bzang mo de yi rtag tu thob/_/yu dza gus pas gzhib pa dang /_/phyag rgya gal te sems lhungs gyur/_/'dab ldan las phyung bza' bar bya/_/yo nis tsA ru dbul ba dang /_'khrig thabs 'phrul 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]'khor nyes med de/_/gang des de nyid mnyes byed pa'o/_/de nas las sna tshogs pa rnam pa gsungs pa/_phyogs bzhi dang grwa bzhir ut+pala'i gzugs bya/_re re yang tA~M gsum gyi mtshan pa/_lte ba kun nas zlum po la/_oM pra 
[\[292a.2\]]san+na tA re amr-ita mu khI ta lo tsa nA+e sarba ar+tha swang+ha ni sarba ar+thasA ng+ha ni sarba sa twa bA shaM ka ri/_sI bA pu ru Sho sA rwa ni bA ba sh+yi ku ru tA~M swA hwa/_zhes pa lte bar bkod la/_'khor lo rtsibs bcu bar pad+ma la yi ge bcu ba'o/_/hriHgnyis kyi nang du ming chud par byas na dbang du byed do/_/yang 
[\[292a.3\]]na rtsibs brgyad pa yi ge yang brgyad pa ste dbus su zla ba la tA~M yig go/_/'khor lo kha sbyor du byas na/_nyi ma bdun na nges pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yang na rtsibs drug na yi ge drug pa'o/_/dbus su hrIHbA shaM ku ru hrIHswA hA/_go ro tsa na dang /_tsan+danA 
[\[292a.4\]]dmar po dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_khrag gis b+ho dza pa tra la bri bar bya ste/_srid pa gsum yang dbang du byed do/_/gur kum la sogs 'khor lo ni/_/rtsibs brgyad mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/kha sbyor sbyor bas dbang du byed/_/oM sarba ma hA ni tA re tu t+tA res 
[\[292a.5\]]duSh+TAM mo hA ya b+ha ga ba ti sarba duSh+TA nAM ban+ng+ha ban+ng+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gos kyi mtha' ni 'dud byas nas/_/chom rkun 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog_/ut+pal la mngon bsngags pas/_/gang la sbyin pa de dbang gyur/_/ut+pal las mtshan 'khor lo'o/_/chu 
[\[292a.6\]]dbus sna tshogs rdo rje'i lter/_/thod les ming mthar hrIHbris la/_/kham phor dbus su bzhag na rengs/_/'dab brgyad pad+mar ga yi nang /_/chud cing lte bar ga brgyad bris/_/yungs bas rdo leb dag la ste/_/kha phub bzhag na shin tu rengs/_/'khor lo de ni 
[\[292a.7\]]dug dang bral/_/ske tshe mi rus btags pa'i chus/_/thod par hU~M phaT mtshan pa bri/_/'di yis nges par gsod par byed/_/gro gar gur gum gyis bris la/_/oM bcas me tog ser pos mchod/_/yang na swA hAr chud pa bris/_/rgyas dang srung ba byed pa'i mchog_/
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]rtsibs gsum a yig nang chud pa/_/tsan+dan chus bri bam phor bcas/_/me tog dri bzang gis mchod na/_/shin tu zhi ba'i las la mchog_/b+ha ga ling+ga hrIHyig gis/_/bskor ba ming dang skul sngags bcas/_/'di yis bsgrub bya 'gugs par 'gyur/_/pad+ma 
[\[292b.2\]]'dab ma nyi shu bzhir/_/re khA gsum bskor oM hrIM k+Sh+liM/_/rgyal la bris nas reg byas na/_/bran pho bran mo ltar las byed/_/'khrul 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/_/sna tshogs rdo rje stegs bus brgyan/_/tho bar dbyug to pad+ma dang /_/ral gri sgo dang ut+pal/_/thod 
[\[292b.3\]]bcas lcags kyu mtshams su'o/_/de dbus pad+ma bcu ba bri/_/oM pra san+na tA re a mr-i ta mu khI a mr-i ta lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha swa ng+ha ni swA hA/_dbang du byed pi sngags so/_/de nas bka' bstsal ba/_oM sarba mo hA ni tA re tu t+tA re sarba duSh+TA ni mo hA ya b+ha ga ba tI sarba duSh+TA 
[\[292b.4\]]ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_de dbus zla ba tA~M yig bcas/_/dbus rtsibs drug la ku ri kul+le/_/sngags ni hrI gnyis dbus chud pa'i/_/ming dang skul bas las kun byed/_/'bum phrag bzlas pas sa g.yo zhing /_/rgya mtsho bdun snyom dug zhir byed/_/
[\[292b.5\]]gyo mo'i sbyor bas 'byung po kun/_/bcings nas klu dang mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/sbyor ba 'phrog cing char 'bebs dang /_/mtshon chas mi gnon lus su 'gyur/_/dpyid zla ra bar bu mo mdzes/_/rdul ldan gyis ni ras btags la/_/zla mtshan gyis ni bsgos de la ni/_/
[\[292b.6\]]ri mor dam tshig ldan pas bris/_/sgrol ma 'od zer can ma dang /_/phag mo'i gzugs mngon mchod na/_/gang gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad/_/thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rtsa ba'i gzungs kyi mthu gsungs pa/_gos mtha' 
[\[292b.7\]]skra la mngon bsngags bcings/_/'brog dgon dag tu 'jigs med 'gyur/_/ut+pal sbyin sreg brgya rtsa yis/_/nges par dbang du byed pa yin/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kaM me bA sha man ye swA hA/_bya rog gshog pa bsngags nas ni/_/dgra bo'i khyim du sbas 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]na skrod/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsa la sra tsa la shI hU~M ga mi ni/_de ba dat+ta u TA ya hU~M phaT/_bo so cha dang yungs kar dang /_/thang phrom a sho ka'i me tog_/'dab bcas sbyin sreg byed pa'am/_/yang na mngar gsum bsregs byas nas/_/nyin 
[\[293a.2\]]bdun bu mo mchog thob 'gyur/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+ha nAM/_ku mA ri/_ma he mud+da te na ta s+yaH_pI ta pra ya ts+tsha tu swA hA/_zla mtshan ras la sgrol ma ni/_/ut+pal zhags pa bsnams pa bri/_/mchod cing sngags stong bzlas nas ni/_/zhags pa lcags 
[\[293a.3\]]kyu'i sbyor sbyor bas spyad/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kI ma me bsi taM/_srap+na karna ka thA ya hU~M phaT/_rag phrug tsher ma zla mtshan bcas/_/sreg blugs stong phrag gcig gis ni/_/mi bdag bu mo mchog kyang 'gugs/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+ha nAM swa s+th+wa nA dA 
[\[293a.4\]]kar+Sha ya ma mAn+ti ke dzaH_zla ba gzas bzung 'jig rten dbang /_/dung dang btags te 'dod mar sbyin/_/yang na sprul mgo gnyis pa'i sha/_/a rka'i bal la dril byas la/_/pad ma mar khus mig sman bya/_/rdo rje chos dang nyi ma dang /_/rta rgyal mchog gi spos bdug 
[\[293a.5\]]nas/_/bltas pas pad+ma gar dbang 'bab/_/ha la ha la'i mjug ma dang /_/'jam 'bras rtsang pa'i mjug ma dang /_/mgron bur ngor bcas khu ba 'dzin/_/sdig pa'am sbal ba zhag gis sam/_/'o ma rnam gsum sbyar ba dang /_/a phu mtshar dang sbyar ba ni/_/
[\[293a.6\]]gu gul bcas pa'i ri lus kyang /_/rtag tu khu ba rengs par 'gyur/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re san+tA ra Ni hrIHde ba dat+ta wA shaM ku ru hoH_pad+ma lcags kyur bcas pa yi/_/sU t+ta ling+gas dgug par bya/_/zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams pa yi/_/lha mos 'gugs par 
[\[293a.7\]]byed pa yin/_/oM tsa tu r+g+hudza/_ShaT+Tu kha bi kri tA na na kar+Na pi shA tsi hU~M phaT/_gshin rje gshed kyi bris sku'i mdun du zhag bdun bzlas na/_rna bar sgrog pa sgrub po/_/oM bud+d+ha tsu ru mA tsu ru ke swA hA/_/mchod rten gyi drung du gtsang sbra dang bcas pas bzlas na/_bdag nyid gang 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]du skye par 'gyur pa dang /_tshe zad pa dang /_ring du 'tsho ba yang shes bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyis sbal ba bzung ba na/_/de dag dud med thal par bya/_/sbrang rtsi sbyar ba mchan khung du/_/thig le byas na 'gugs par 'gyur/_/mi tshil mi yi thod par bzhag_/na rma'i 
[\[293b.2\]]bal gyis sdong bur byas/_/gzugs 'tsho thod pa dag las ni/_/snag tsha blangs te bu mo la/_/thig le byas na 'gugs par 'gyur/_/oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya hU~M swA hA/_'o ma la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas bkrus na mig gi rab rib sel bar 'gyur ro/_/mi'i
